Only , as [Clyde]201-clyde observed , [they]1438-two mutually mated couples who would not interfere with each other in any way , but rather would aid each other in their various schemes to enjoy one another 's society stayed much longer than any single drink would have required .

And similarly , during this interval , it seemed as though it was intended even , by [Rita]260-rita , that [he]201-clyde and [she]260-rita should draw closer to [one another]702-one another . For , finding the conversation on the settee lagging for a moment , [she]260-rita got up and apropos of nothing — no music and no words — motioned [him]201-clyde to dance some more with [her]260-rita . [She]260-rita had danced certain steps with [Dillard]257-dillard which [she]260-rita pretended to show [Clyde]201-clyde . But because of [their]1438-two mutually mated couples who would not interfere with each other in any way , but rather would aid each other in their various schemes to enjoy one another 's society nature , these brought [her]260-rita and [Clyde]201-clyde into closer contact than before — very much so . And standing so close together and showing [Clyde]201-clyde by elbow and arm how to do , [her]260-rita face and cheek came very close to [him]201-clyde — too much for [his]201-clyde own strength of will and purpose . [He]201-clyde pressed [his]201-clyde cheek to [hers]260-rita and [she]260-rita turned smiling and encouraging eyes upon [him]201-clyde . On the instant , [his]201-clyde self - possession was gone and [he]201-clyde kissed [her]260-rita lips . And then again — and again . And instead of withdrawing them , as [he]201-clyde thought [she]260-rita might , [she]260-rita let [him]201-clyde — remained just as [she]260-rita was in order that [he]201-clyde might kiss [her]260-rita more .

And suddenly now , as [he]201-clyde felt this yielding of [her]260-rita warm body so close to [him]201-clyde , and the pressure of [her]260-rita lips in response to [his]201-clyde own , [he]201-clyde realized that [he]201-clyde had let [himself]201-clyde in for a relationship which might not be so very easy to modify or escape . Also that it would be a very difficult thing for [him]201-clyde to resist , since [he]201-clyde now liked [her]260-rita and obviously [she]260-rita liked [him]201-clyde .

Apart from the momentary thrill and zest of this , the effect was to throw [Clyde]201-clyde , as before , speculatively back upon the problem of [his]201-clyde proper course here . For here was [this girl]1435-this girl , and [she]1435-this girl was approaching [him]201-clyde in this direct and suggestive way . And so soon after telling [himself]201-clyde and [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother that [his]201-clyde course was to be so different here — no such approaches or relationships as had brought on [his]201-clyde downfall in [Kansas City]23-kansas city . And yet — and yet —

[He]201-clyde was sorely tempted now , for in [his]201-clyde contact with [Rita]260-rita [he]201-clyde had the feeling that [she]260-rita was expecting [him]201-clyde to suggest a further step — and soon . But just how and where ? Not in connection with [this large , strange house]1447-this large , strange house . There were [other rooms apart from the kitchen to which [Dillard]257-dillard and [Zella]259-zella had ostensibly departed]1448-other rooms apart from the kitchen to which dillard and zella had ostensibly departed . But even so , such a relationship once established ! What then ? Would [he]201-clyde not be expected to continue it , or let [himself]201-clyde in for possible complications in case [he]201-clyde did not ? [He]201-clyde danced with and fondled [her]260-rita in a daring and aggressive fashion , yet thinking as [he]201-clyde did so , " But this is not what [I]201-clyde should be doing either , is it ? This is [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus . [I]201-clyde am [a Griffiths]1127-a griffiths , here . [I]201-clyde know how [these people]1401-these people feel toward [me]201-clyde — [[their]1401-these people parents]668-their parents even . Do [I]201-clyde really care for [her]260-rita ? Is there not something about [her]260-rita quick and easy availability which , if not exactly dangerous in so far as [my]201-clyde future here is concerned , is not quite satisfactory — too quickly intimate ? "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde was experiencing a sensation not unrelated to [his]201-clyde mood in connection with the lupanar in [Kansas City]23-kansas city — attracted and yet repulsed . [He]201-clyde could do no more than kiss and fondle [her]260-rita here in a somewhat restrained way until at last [Dillard]257-dillard and [Zella]259-zella returned , whereupon the same degree of intimacy was no longer possible .

A clock somewhere striking two , it suddenly occurred to [Rita]260-rita that [she]260-rita must be going — [[her]260-rita parents]453-her parents would object to [her]260-rita staying out so late . And since [Diliard]276-diliard gave no evidence of deserting [Zella]259-zella , it followed , of course , that [Clyde]201-clyde was to see [[her]260-rita [home]4793-home]1450-her home , a pleasure that now had been allayed by a vague suggestion of disappointment or failure on the part of both . [He]201-clyde had not risen to [her]260-rita expectations , [he]201-clyde thought . Obviously [he]201-clyde lacked the courage yet to follow up the proffer of [her]260-rita favors , was the way [she]260-rita explained it to [herself]260-rita .

At [her]260-rita own door , not so far distant , and with a conversation which was still tinctured with intimations of some future occasions which might prove more favorable , [her]260-rita attitude was decidedly encouraging , even here . [They]1452-they parted , but with [Clyde]201-clyde still saying to [himself]201-clyde that this new relationship was developing much too swiftly . [He]201-clyde was not sure that [he]201-clyde should undertake a relationship such as this here — so soon , anyhow . Where now were all [his]201-clyde fine decisions made before coming [here]4728-here ? What was [he]201-clyde going to decide ? And yet because of the sensual warmth and magnetism of [Rita]260-rita , [he]201-clyde was irritated by [his]201-clyde resolution and [his]201-clyde inability to proceed as [he]201-clyde otherwise might .

Two things which eventually decided [him]201-clyde in regard to this came quite close together . One related to the attitude of [the Griffiths]201-clyde [themselves]201-clyde , which , apart from that of [Gilbert]200-gilbert , was not one of opposition or complete indifference , so much as it was a failure on the part of [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths in the first instance and the others largely because of [him]201-clyde to grasp the rather anomalous , if not exactly lonely position in which [Clyde]201-clyde would find [himself]201-clyde here unless [the family]433-the family chose to show [him]201-clyde at least some little courtesy or advise [him]201-clyde cordially from time to time . Yet [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths , being always very much pressed for time , had scarcely given [Clyde]201-clyde a thought during the first month , at least . [He]201-clyde was here , properly placed , as [he]201-clyde heard , would be properly looked after in the future , — what more , just now , at least ?

And so for all of five weeks before any action of any kind was taken , and with [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert comforted thereby , [Clyde]201-clyde was allowed to drift along in [his]201-clyde basement world wondering what was being intended in connection with [himself]201-clyde . The attitude of [others]561-others , including [Dillard]257-dillard and [these girls]1415-these girls , finally made [his]201-clyde position [here]4728-here seem strange .

However , about a month after [Clyde]201-clyde had arrived , and principally because [Gilbert]200-gilbert seemed so content to say nothing regarding [him]201-clyde , [the elder Griffiths]200-gilbert inquired one day :

" Well , what about [[your]200-gilbert cousin]5061-your cousin ? How 's [he]5061-your cousin doing by now ? "[200-gilbert] And [Gilbert]200-gilbert , only a little worried as to what this might bode , replied , " Oh , [he]5061-your cousin 's all right . [I]200-gilbert started [him]5061-your cousin off in [the shrinking room]4916-the shrinking room . Is that all right ? "[200-gilbert]

" Yes , [I]200-gilbert think so . That 's as good a place as any for [him]5061-your cousin to begin , [I]200-gilbert believe . But what do [you]200-gilbert think of [him]5061-your cousin by now ? "[200-gilbert]

" Oh , "[200-gilbert] answered [Gilbert]200-gilbert very conservatively and decidedly independently — a trait for which [[his]200-gilbert father]539-his father had always admired [him]200-gilbert — " Not so much . [He]5061-your cousin 's all right , [I]200-gilbert guess . [He]5061-your cousin may work out . But [he]5061-your cousin does not strike [me]200-gilbert as [a fellow who would ever make much of a stir in this game]5095-a fellow who would ever make much of a stir in this game . [He]5061-your cousin may be all right . [You]200-gilbert like [him]5061-your cousin and [I]200-gilbert may be wrong . "[200-gilbert]

" Oh , [you]200-gilbert think [he]5061-your cousin does . Well , if [he]5061-your cousin does , [he]5061-your cousin 's wrong . "[1459-i] But at the same time , [he]1459-i added , and that with a bantering smile : " [He]5061-your cousin may not be as impractical as [you]200-gilbert think , though . [He]5061-your cousin has n't been [here]4728-here long enough for [us]5099-us to really tell , has [he]5061-your cousin ? [He]5061-your cousin did n't strike [me]1459-i that way in [Chicago]5-chicago . "[1459-i]

" All right , [governor]5104-governor , "[4794-his son] replied [[his]1460-his son]4794-his son , who was hoping that [[his]4794-his son father]539-his father would absent - mindedly let [him]4794-his son stay where [he]4794-his son was — in the lowest of all the positions [the factory]440-the factory had to offer .

"[179-samuel griffiths] [He]179-samuel griffiths closed the drawer of a desk in which [he]179-samuel griffiths had been looking for certain papers , got up and took down [his]179-samuel griffiths hat and coat and left [the office]1022-the office .

In consequence of this discussion , an invitation was sent to [Clyde]201-clyde for the following Sunday at six - thirty to appear and participate in a Griffiths family meal . On Sunday at one - thirty was served the important family dinner to which usually was invited one or another of [the various local or visiting friends of [the family]433-the family]1466-the various local or visiting friends of the family . At six - thirty nearly [all of [these guests]1469-these guests]1468-all of these guests had departed , and sometimes [one or two of [the Griffiths]201-clyde [themselves]201-clyde]1470-one or two of the griffiths themselves , the cold collation served being partaken of by [Mr.]1471-mr. and [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths and [Myra]182-myra — [Bella]183-bella and [Gilbert]200-gilbert usually having appointments elsewhere .

On this occasion , however , as [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths and [Myra]182-myra and [Bella]183-bella decided in conference , [they]1468-all of these guests would all be present with the exception of [Gilbert]200-gilbert , who , because of [his]200-gilbert opposition as well as another appointment , explained that [he]200-gilbert would stop in for only a moment before leaving . Thus [Clyde]201-clyde as [Gilbert]200-gilbert was pleased to note would be received and entertained without the likelihood of contacts , introductions and explanations to such of [their]1468-all of these guests more important connections who might chance to stop in during the afternoon . But in the meantime in connection with [Dillard]257-dillard , [Rita]260-rita and [Zella]259-zella there had been a development which , because of the problem it had posed , was to be affected by this very decision on the part of [the Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths . " [You]201-clyde know [she]260-rita likes [you]201-clyde . "[201-clyde] And [he]201-clyde nudged [Clyde]201-clyde genially and intimately,—a proceeding in [this newer and grander world in which [he]201-clyde now found [himself,—and]1476-himself,—and considering who [he]201-clyde was [here]4728-here]1475-this newer and grander world in which he now found himself,—and considering who he was here , was not as appealing to [Clyde]201-clyde as it otherwise might have been . [These fellows who were so pushing where [they]1478-these fellows who were so pushing where they thought a fellow amounted to something more than they did thought [a fellow]4852-a fellow amounted to something more than [they]1478-these fellows who were so pushing where they thought a fellow amounted to something more than they did did]1478-these fellows who were so pushing where they thought a fellow amounted to something more than they did ! [He]201-clyde could tell .

At the same time , the proposition [he]201-clyde was now offering — as thrilling and intriguing as it might be from one point of view — was likely to cause [him]201-clyde endless trouble — was it not ? In the first place [he]201-clyde had no money — only fifteen dollars a week here so far — and if [he]201-clyde was going to be expected to indulge in such expensive outings as these , why , of course , [he]201-clyde could not manage . Carfare , meals , a hotel bill , maybe an automobile ride or two . And after that [he]201-clyde would be in close contact with [this Rita whom [he]201-clyde scarcely knew]1480-this rita whom he scarcely knew . It might even mean the end of [his]201-clyde career here ! Who could tell what it might lead to ?

[He]201-clyde coughed and made various excuses . Just now [he]201-clyde had a lot of work to do . Besides — a venture like that — [he]201-clyde would have to see first . [[His]201-clyde relatives]1379-his relatives , [you]1487-you know . After that time [he]201-clyde would see . Actually , in [his]201-clyde wavering way — and various disturbing thoughts as to [Rita]260-rita 's charm returning to [him]201-clyde at moments , [he]201-clyde was wondering if it was not desirable — [his]201-clyde other decision to the contrary notwithstanding , to skimp [himself]201-clyde as much as possible over two or three weeks and so go anyhow . [He]201-clyde had been saving something toward a new dress suit and collapsible silk hat . Might [he]201-clyde not use some of that — even though [he]201-clyde knew the plan to be all wrong ?

[The fair , plump , sensuous Rita]260-rita !

But then , not at that very moment — but in the interim following , the invitation from [the Griffiths]200-gilbert . Returning from [his]201-clyde work one evening very tired and still cogitating this gay adventure proposed by [Dillard]257-dillard , [he]201-clyde found lying on the table in [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room a note written on very heavy and handsome paper which had been delivered by [one of [the servants of [the Griffiths]200-gilbert in [his]201-clyde absence]1491-the servants of the griffiths in his absence]1490-one of the servants of the griffiths in his absence . "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde at once tore it open and eagerly read .

On reading [this Clyde]1492-this clyde , who , during all this silence and the prosecution of a task in [the shrinking room]4916-the shrinking room which was so eminently distasteful to [him]201-clyde , was being more and more weighed upon by the thought that possibly , after all , this quest of [his]201-clyde was going to prove a vain one and that [he]201-clyde was going to be excluded from any real contact with [[his]201-clyde great relatives]1295-his great relatives , was most romantically and hence impractically heartened . For only see — here was this grandiose letter with its " very happy to see [you]201-clyde , "[1495-they] which seemed to indicate that perhaps , after all , [they]1495-they did not think so badly of [him]201-clyde . [Mr. Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths had been away all the time . That was it . Now [he]201-clyde would get to see [[his]201-clyde aunt]1496-his aunt and [cousins]4805-cousins and the inside of [that great house]1498-that great house . It must be very wonderful . [They]1495-they might even take [him]201-clyde up after this — who could tell ? But how remarkable that [he]201-clyde should be taken up now , just when [he]201-clyde had about decided that [they]1495-they would not .

And forthwith [his]201-clyde interest in , as well as [his]201-clyde weakness for , [Rita]260-rita , if not [Zella]259-zella and [Dillard]257-dillard began to evaporate . What ! Mix with [people so far below [him]201-clyde]1499-people so far below him — [a Griffiths]1127-a griffiths — in the social scale here and at the cost of endangering [his]201-clyde connection with [that important family]1501-that important family . Never ! It was a great mistake . Did n't this letter coming just at this time prove it ? And fortunately—(how fortunately ! ) — [he]201-clyde had had the good sense not to let [himself]201-clyde in for anything as yet . And so now , without much trouble , and because , most likely from now on it would prove necessary for [him]201-clyde so to do [he]201-clyde could gradually eliminate [himself]201-clyde from this contact with [Dillard]257-dillard — move away from [Mrs. Cuppy's]277-mrs. cuppy's — if necessary , or say that [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle had cautioned [him]201-clyde — anything , but not go with [this crowd]1503-this crowd any more , just the same . It would n't do . It would endanger [his]201-clyde prospects in connection with this new development . And instead of troubling over [Rita]260-rita and [Utica]3-utica now , [he]201-clyde began to formulate for [himself]201-clyde once more the essential nature of the private life of [the Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths , the fascinating places [they]1504-they must go , [the interesting people with whom [they]1504-they must be in contact]1505-the interesting people with whom they must be in contact . And at once [he]201-clyde began to think of the need of a dress suit , or at least a tuxedo and trousers . Accordingly the next morning , [he]201-clyde gained permission from [Mr. Kemerer]248-mr. kemerer to leave at eleven and not return before one , and in that time [he]201-clyde managed to find coat , trousers and a pair of patent leather shoes , as well as a white silk muffler for the money [he]201-clyde had already saved . And so arrayed [he]201-clyde felt [himself]201-clyde safe . [He]201-clyde must make a good impression .

And for the entire time between then and Sunday evening , instead of thinking of [Rita]260-rita or [Dillard]257-dillard or [Zella]259-zella any more , [he]201-clyde was thinking of this opportunity . Plainly it was an event to be admitted to the presence of such magnificence .

The only drawback to all this , as [he]201-clyde well sensed now , was this same [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , who surveyed [him]201-clyde always whenever [he]201-clyde met [him]201-clyde anywhere with such hard , cold eyes . [He]201-clyde might be there , and then [he]201-clyde would probably assume that superior attitude , to make [him]201-clyde feel [his]201-clyde inferior position , if [he]201-clyde could — and [Clyde]201-clyde had the weakness at times of admitting to [himself]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde could . And no doubt , if [he]201-clyde ( [Clyde]201-clyde ) sought to carry [himself]201-clyde with too much of an air in the presence of [this family]828-this family , [Gilbert]200-gilbert most likely would seek to take it out of [him]201-clyde in some way later in connection with the work in [the factory]440-the factory . [He]200-gilbert might see to it , for instance , that [[his]200-gilbert father]539-his father heard only unfavorable things about [him]200-gilbert . And , of course , if [he]200-gilbert were retained in [this wretched shrinking room]1509-this wretched shrinking room , and given no show of any kind , how could [he]200-gilbert expect to get anywhere or be [anybody]1510-anybody ? It was just [his]200-gilbert luck that on arriving [here]4728-here [he]200-gilbert should find this same [Gilbert]200-gilbert looking almost like [him]200-gilbert and being so opposed to [him]200-gilbert for obviously no reason at all .

However , despite all [his]200-gilbert doubts , [he]200-gilbert decided to make the best of this opportunity , and accordingly on Sunday evening at six set out for [[the Griffiths]200-gilbert ' residence]1512-the griffiths ' residence , [his]200-gilbert nerves decidedly taut because of the ordeal before [him]200-gilbert . And when [he]200-gilbert reached the main gate , a large , arched wrought iron affair which gave in on a wide , winding brick walk which led to the front entrance , [he]200-gilbert lifted the heavy latch which held the large iron gates in place , with almost a quaking sense of adventure . And as [he]200-gilbert approached along [the walk]1513-the walk , [he]200-gilbert felt as though [he]200-gilbert might well be [the object of observant and critical eyes]1514-the object of observant and critical eyes . Perhaps [Mr. Samuel]179-samuel griffiths or [Mr. Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert or one or [the other of [the two sisters]1516-the two sisters]1515-the other of the two sisters was looking at [him]200-gilbert now from one of those heavily curtained windows . This mood , however , was brief . [It]1518-the very large living room contained so many handsome pieces of furniture and such rich rugs and hangings . A fire burned in the large , high fireplace before which was circled a number of divans and chairs . There were lamps , a tall clock , a great table . [No one]4713-no one was in [the room]489-the room at the moment , but presently as [Clyde]201-clyde fidgeted and looked about [he]201-clyde heard a rustling of silk to the rear , where a great staircase descended from [the rooms above]1523-the rooms above . "[1533-her] [She]1533-her smiled , for by now [she]1533-her had become interested by and , on the whole , rather taken with [Clyde]201-clyde 's appearance . [He]201-clyde looked so neat and generally presentable , so much like [[her]1533-her own son]1534-her own son that [she]1533-her was a little startled at first and intrigued on that score . If anything , [Clyde]201-clyde was taller , better built and hence better looking , only [she]1533-her would never have been willing to admit that . For to [[her]1533-her [Gilbert]200-gilbert]1535-her gilbert , although [he]201-clyde was intolerant and contemptuous even to [her]1533-her at times , simulating an affection which was as much a custom as a reality , was still [a dynamic and aggressive person putting [himself]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde conclusions before [everyone else]1537-everyone else]1536-a dynamic and aggressive person putting himself and his conclusions before everyone else . [Whereas Clyde]201-clyde was more soft and vague and fumbling . "[180-mrs. griffiths]

[Clyde]201-clyde flushed , since obviously this was a notice to [him]201-clyde that [his]201-clyde social position here was decidedly below that of [the Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths or [these girls]1415-these girls . At the same time , as [he]201-clyde also noticed , the look of [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , who was only interested in [youths of means and position]1630-youths of means and position , changed from one of curiosity to marked indifference . On the other hand , [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , by no means so practical as [[her]180-mrs. griffiths friend]1413-her friend , though of a superior station in [her]180-mrs. griffiths set , since [she]180-mrs. griffiths was so very attractive and [[her]180-mrs. griffiths parents]453-her parents possessed of even more means — re - surveyed [Clyde]201-clyde with one thought written rather plainly on [her]180-mrs. griffiths face , that it was too bad . [He]201-clyde really was so attractive .

At the same time [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths , having a peculiar fondness for [Sondra]186-sondra , if not [Bertine]197-bertine , whom [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths also disliked as being too tricky and sly , was calling to [her]180-mrs. griffiths : " [Here]4728-here , [Sondra]186-sondra , tie up [your]186-sondra dog to one of the dining - room chairs and come and sit by [me]179-samuel griffiths . " But [I]186-sondra ca n't , [Uncle Samuel]286-uncle samuel ! " Which foot is it ? "[180-mrs. griffiths] inquired [Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths , interested , while [Clyde]201-clyde continued to survey [Sondra]186-sondra as best [he]201-clyde might . [She]1633-her was so delicious , [he]201-clyde thought — [her]1633-her nose so tiny and tilted — [her]1633-her upper lip arched so roguishly upward toward [her]1633-her nose .

" It 's the left fore . [I]201-clyde was riding out on [the East Kingston road]5168-the east kingston road yesterday afternoon . [Jerry]287-jerry threw a shoe and must have picked up a splinter , but [John]288-john does n't seem to be able to find it . "[201-clyde]

" About eight miles — all the way back . "[201-clyde]

[The group]1581-the group showed no signs of leaving and [Clyde]201-clyde , left quite to [himself]201-clyde for the moment , was thinking what an easy , delightful world this must be — [this local society]1635-this local society . For here [they]1581-the group were without a care , apparently , between [any of [them]1581-the group]1636-any of them . All [their]1581-the group talk was of [houses]1098-houses being built , [horses]1638-horses [they]1581-the group were riding , [friends]451-friends [they]1581-the group had met , places [they]1581-the group were going to , things [they]1581-the group were going to do . And [Bella]183-bella , [[his]200-gilbert cousin]622-his cousin , trifling around with [these girls]1415-these girls in [the beautiful homes of [this street]946-this street]1644-the beautiful homes of this street , while [he]200-gilbert was shunted away in [a small third - floor room at [Mrs. Cuppy]256-mrs. cuppy 's with [no place to go]1647-no place to go]1646-a small third - floor room at mrs. cuppy 's with no place to go . And with only fifteen dollars a week to live on . And in the morning [he]200-gilbert would be working in [the basement]4938-the basement again , while [these girls]1415-these girls were rising to more pleasure . Suddenly [the two girls]519-the two girls declaring [they]519-the two girls must go , [they]519-the two girls took [themselves]519-the two girls off . And [he]200-gilbert and [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths were once more left to [themselves]519-the two girls — [he]200-gilbert with the feeling that [he]200-gilbert was very much out of place and neglected here , since [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths and [[his]179-samuel griffiths wife]576-his wife and [Bella]183-bella , anyhow , if not [Myra]182-myra , seemed to be feeling that [he]200-gilbert was merely being permitted to look into [a world to which [he]200-gilbert did not belong]1657-a world to which he did not belong ; also , that because of [his]200-gilbert poverty it would be impossible to fit [him]200-gilbert into — however much [he]200-gilbert might dream of associating with [three such wonderful girls as these]1658-three such wonderful girls as these . And at once [he]200-gilbert felt sad — very — [his]200-gilbert eyes and [his]200-gilbert mood darkening so much that not only [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths , but [[his]179-samuel griffiths wife]576-his wife as well as [Myra]182-myra noticed it . If [he]200-gilbert could enter upon [this world]1288-this world , find some way . But of [the group]1581-the group it was only [Myra]182-myra , not any of [the others]629-the others , who sensed that in all likelihood [he]200-gilbert was lonely and depressed . And in consequence as all were rising and returning to [the large living room]1663-the large living room ( [Samuel]179-samuel griffiths chiding [Bella]183-bella for [her]183-bella habit of keeping [[her]183-bella family]1607-her family waiting ) it was [Myra]182-myra who drew near to [Clyde]201-clyde to say : " [I]182-myra think after [you]201-clyde 've been [here]4728-here a little while [you]201-clyde 'll probably like [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus better than [you]201-clyde do now , even . "[182-myra]

[She]182-myra was by no means sure that this was true , but under the circumstances , whether it was or not , [she]182-myra felt like saying it to [Clyde]201-clyde . And thereafter , since [he]201-clyde felt more comfortable with [her]182-myra , [he]201-clyde talked with [her]182-myra as much as [he]201-clyde could without neglecting either [Bella]183-bella or [the family]433-the family , until about half - past nine , when , suddenly feeling very much out of place and alone , [he]201-clyde arose saying that [he]201-clyde must go , that [he]201-clyde had to get up early in the morning . And as [he]201-clyde did so , [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths walked with [him]201-clyde to the front door and let [him]201-clyde out . But [he]201-clyde , too , by now , as had [Myra]182-myra before [him]201-clyde , feeling that [Clyde]201-clyde was rather attractive and yet , for reasons of poverty , likely to be neglected from now on , not only by [[his]201-clyde family]521-his family , but by [himself]201-clyde as well , observed most pleasantly , and , as [he]201-clyde hoped , compensatively : " It 's rather nice out , is n't it ? [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue has n't begun to show what it can do yet because the spring is n't quite here . But in a few weeks , "[201-clyde] and [he]201-clyde looked up most inquiringly at the sky and sniffed the late April air , " [we]5175-we must have [you]201-clyde out . All the trees and flowers will be in bloom then and [you]201-clyde can see how really nice it is . Good night . "[201-clyde]

[He]201-clyde smiled and put a very cordial note into [his]201-clyde voice , and once more [Clyde]201-clyde felt that , whatever [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert ' attitude might be , most certainly [[his]201-clyde father]539-his father was not wholly indifferent to [him]201-clyde .

The days lapsed and , although no further word came from [the Griffiths]200-gilbert , [Clyde]201-clyde was still inclined to exaggerate the importance of this one contact and to dream from time to time of delightful meetings with [those girls]1668-those girls and how wonderful if a love affair with one of [them]1668-those girls might eventuate for [him]201-clyde . The beauty of that world in which [they]1668-those girls moved . The luxury and charm as opposed to this of which [he]201-clyde was a part . [Dillard]257-dillard ! [Rita]260-rita ! [Tush]289-tush ! [They]1668-those girls were really dead for [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde aspired to this other or nothing as [he]201-clyde saw it now and proceeded to prove as distant to [Dillard]257-dillard as possible , an attitude which by degrees tended to alienate [that youth]1669-that youth entirely for [he]257-dillard saw in [Clyde]201-clyde a snob which potentially [he]201-clyde was if [he]201-clyde could have but won to what [he]201-clyde desired . However , as [he]201-clyde began to see afterwards , time passed and [he]201-clyde was left to work until , depressed by the routine , meager pay and commonplace shrinking - room contacts , [he]201-clyde began to think not so much of returning to [Rita]260-rita or [Dillard,—he]290-dillard,—he could not quite think of [them]1668-those girls now with any satisfaction , but of giving up this venture here and returning to [Chicago]5-chicago or going to [New York]2-new york , where [he]201-clyde was sure that [he]201-clyde could connect [himself]201-clyde with [some hotel]1670-some hotel if need be . But then , as if to revive [his]201-clyde courage and confirm [his]201-clyde earlier dreams , a thing happened which caused [him]201-clyde to think that certainly [he]201-clyde was beginning to rise in the estimation of [the Griffiths]201-clyde — [father]435-father and [son]608-son — whether [they]1668-those girls troubled to entertain [him]201-clyde socially or not . For it chanced that one Saturday in spring , [Samuel Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths decided to make a complete tour of inspection of [the factory]440-the factory with [Joshua Whiggam]291-whiggam at [his]179-samuel griffiths elbow . Reaching [the shrinking department]1224-the shrinking department about noon , [he]179-samuel griffiths observed for the first time with some dismay , [Clyde]201-clyde in [his]201-clyde undershirt and trousers working at the feeding end of two of the shrinking racks , [[his]179-samuel griffiths nephew]606-his nephew having by this time acquired the necessary skill to " feed "[179-samuel griffiths] as well as " take . "[179-samuel griffiths] And recalling how very neat and generally presentable [he]201-clyde had appeared at [[his]201-clyde house]1676-his house but a few weeks before , [he]179-samuel griffiths was decidedly disturbed by the contrast . For one thing [he]179-samuel griffiths had felt about [Clyde]201-clyde , both in [Chicago]5-chicago and here at [[his]201-clyde home]634-his home , was that [he]201-clyde had presented a neat and pleasing appearance . And [he]179-samuel griffiths , almost as much as [[his]179-samuel griffiths son]4794-his son , was jealous , not only of the name , but the general social appearance of [the Griffiths]201-clyde before [the employees of [this factory]873-this factory]1679-the employees of this factory as well as [the community at large]1681-the community at large . And the sight of [Clyde]201-clyde here , looking so much like [Gilbert]200-gilbert and in an armless shirt and trousers working among [these men]773-these men , tended to impress upon [him]179-samuel griffiths more sharply than at any time before the fact that [Clyde]201-clyde was [[his]179-samuel griffiths nephew]606-his nephew , and that [he]179-samuel griffiths ought not to be compelled to continue at this very menial form of work any longer . To [the other employees]1684-the other employees it might appear that [he]179-samuel griffiths was unduly indifferent to the meaning of such a relationship .

Without , however , saying a word to [Whiggam]291-whiggam or anyone else at the time , [he]179-samuel griffiths waited until [[his]179-samuel griffiths son]4794-his son returned on Monday morning , from a trip that [he]179-samuel griffiths had taken out of [town]1686-town , when [he]179-samuel griffiths called [him]4794-his son into [[his]179-samuel griffiths office]439-his office and observed : " [I]179-samuel griffiths made a tour of [the factory]440-the factory Saturday and found [young Clyde]201-clyde still down in [the shrinking room]4916-the shrinking room . "[179-samuel griffiths]

" What of it , [Dad]191-dad ? " About fifteen , [I]200-gilbert think , "[200-gilbert] replied [Gilbert]200-gilbert blandly .

" Not enough , if [he]291-whiggam 's to make the right sort of an appearance here . Better make it twenty - five . "[588-griffiths senior]

" All right , all right , [governor]5104-governor . Please do n't be cross about it , will [you]5104-governor ? "[200-gilbert] pleaded [Gilbert]200-gilbert , noting [[his]200-gilbert father]539-his father 's irritation . " [I]200-gilbert 'm not entirely to blame . Just leave it to [me]200-gilbert . [I]200-gilbert 'll find a decent place for [him]201-clyde , "[200-gilbert] and turning , [he]200-gilbert proceeded in search of [Whiggam]291-whiggam , although at the same time thinking how [he]200-gilbert was to effect all this without permitting [Clyde]201-clyde to get the notion that [he]201-clyde was at all important here — to make [him]201-clyde feel that this was being done as a favor to [him]201-clyde and not for any reasons of merit in connection with [himself]201-clyde .

And at once , [Whiggam]291-whiggam appearing , [he]200-gilbert , after a very diplomatic approach on the part of [Gilbert]200-gilbert , racked [his]200-gilbert brains , scratched [his]200-gilbert head , went away and returned after a time to say that the only thing [he]200-gilbert could think of , since [Clyde]201-clyde was obviously lacking in technical training , was that of assistant to [Mr. Liggett]292-liggett , who was [foreman in charge of [five big stitching rooms on the fifth floor]1695-five big stitching rooms on the fifth floor]1694-foreman in charge of five big stitching rooms on the fifth floor , but who had under [him]292-liggett one small and very special , though by no means technical , department which required the separate supervision of either [an assistant forelady]1696-an assistant forelady or [man]1075-man .

This was [the stamping room]1698-the stamping room — [a separate chamber at the west end of [the stitching floor]1700-the stitching floor]1699-a separate chamber at the west end of the stitching floor , where were received daily from [the cutting room]1701-the cutting room above from seventy - five to one hundred thousand dozen unstitched collars of different brands and sizes . And here they were stamped by [a group of [girls]894-girls]1702-a group of girls according to the slips or directions attached to [them]1702-a group of girls with the size and brand of the collar . The sole business of [the assistant foreman in charge]1704-the assistant foreman in charge [here]4728-here , as [Gilbert]200-gilbert well knew , after maintaining due decorum and order , was to see that this stamping process went uninterruptedly forward . Also that after the seventy - five to one hundred thousand dozen collars were duly stamped and transmitted to [the stitchers , who were just outside in [the larger room]1707-the larger room]1706-the stitchers , who were just outside in the larger room , to see that [they]1706-the stitchers , who were just outside in the larger room were duly credited in a book of entry . And that the number of dozens stamped by [each girl]1708-each girl was duly recorded in order that [her]1708-each girl pay should correspond with [her]1708-each girl services .

For this purpose a little desk and various entry books , according to size and brand , were kept [here]4728-here . Also [the cutters]1710-the cutters ' slips , as taken from the bundles by [the stampers]1711-the stampers were eventually delivered to [this assistant]1712-this assistant in lots of a dozen or more and filed on spindles . It was really nothing more than a small clerkship , at times in the past held by [young men]983-young men or [girls]894-girls or [old men]1715-old men or [middle - aged women]1716-middle - aged women , according to the exigencies of the life of [the place]727-the place .

The thing that [Whiggam]291-whiggam feared in connection with [Clyde]201-clyde and which [he]291-whiggam was quick to point out to [Gilbert]200-gilbert on this occasion was that because of [his]201-clyde inexperience and youth [Clyde]201-clyde might not , at first , prove as urgent and insistent [a master of this department]1718-a master of this department as the work [there]4705-there required . There were nothing but [young girls]1720-young girls [there]4705-there — some of [them]1720-young girls quite attractive . Also was it wise to place [a young man of [Clyde]201-clyde 's years and looks among [so many girls]1723-so many girls]1722-a young man of clyde 's years and looks among so many girls ? For , being susceptible , as [he]201-clyde might well be at that age , [he]201-clyde might prove too easy — not stern enough . [The girls]5027-the girls might take advantage of [him]201-clyde . If so , it would n't be possible to keep [him]201-clyde [there]4705-there very long . Still there was this temporary vacancy , and it was the only one in [the whole factory]1726-the whole factory at the moment . Why not , for the time being , send [him]201-clyde [upstairs]575-upstairs for a tryout ? It might not be long before either [Mr. Liggett]292-liggett or [himself]201-clyde would know of something else or whether or not [he]201-clyde was suited for the work up there . In that case it would be easy to make a re - transfer .

Accordingly , about three in the afternoon of this same Monday , [Clyde]201-clyde was sent for and after being made to wait for some fifteen minutes , as was [Gilbert]200-gilbert 's method , [he]201-clyde was admitted to the austere presence .

" Well , how are [you]201-clyde getting along down where [you]201-clyde are now ? "[200-gilbert] asked [Gilbert]200-gilbert coldly and inquisitorially . And [Clyde]201-clyde , who invariably experienced a depression whenever [he]201-clyde came anywhere near [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin , replied , with a poorly forced smile , " Oh , just about the same , [Mr. Griffiths]200-gilbert . [I]201-clyde ca n't complain . [I]201-clyde like it well enough . [I]201-clyde 'm learning a little something , [I]201-clyde guess . "[201-clyde]

" [You]201-clyde guess ? "[201-clyde]

" Well , [I]201-clyde know [I]201-clyde 've learned a few things , of course , "[201-clyde] added [Clyde]201-clyde , flushing slightly and feeling down deep within [himself]201-clyde a keen resentment at the same time that [he]201-clyde achieved a half - ingratiating and half - apologetic smile .

" Well , that 's a little better . [A man]4740-a man could hardly be down there as long as [you]200-gilbert 've been and not know whether [he]4740-a man had learned anything or not . "[201-clyde] Then deciding that [he]201-clyde was being too severe , perhaps , [he]201-clyde modified [his]201-clyde tone slightly , and added : " But that 's not why [I]201-clyde sent for [you]200-gilbert . "[201-clyde]

" [I]201-clyde do n't believe [I]201-clyde quite understand , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde , who , because [he]201-clyde was a little nervous and flustered , had not quite registered the question accurately .

" [I]201-clyde mean have [you]200-gilbert ever had [any people]5206-any people work under [you]200-gilbert — been given [a few people]5209-a few people to direct in [some department]5210-some department somewhere ? " No , [sir]4880-sir , [I]201-clyde never have , "[201-clyde] answered [Clyde]201-clyde , but so nervous that [he]201-clyde almost stuttered . For [Gilbert]200-gilbert 's tone was very severe and cold — highly contemptuous . At the same time , now that the nature of the question was plain , its implication came to [him]200-gilbert . In spite of [[his]200-gilbert cousin]622-his cousin 's severity , [his]200-gilbert ill manner toward [him]200-gilbert , still [he]200-gilbert could see [[his]200-gilbert employers]1730-his employers were thinking of making [a foreman of [him]200-gilbert]1731-a foreman of him — putting [him]200-gilbert in charge of [somebody]4801-somebody — [people]4823-people . [They]4823-people must be ! At once [his]200-gilbert ears and fingers began to titillate — the roots of [his]200-gilbert hair to tingle : " But [I]200-gilbert 've seen how it 's done in clubs and [hotels]4961-hotels , "[200-gilbert] [he]200-gilbert added at once . " And [I]200-gilbert think [I]200-gilbert might manage if [I]200-gilbert were given a trial . "[200-gilbert] [His]200-gilbert cheeks were now highly colored — [his]200-gilbert eyes crystal clear .

" Not the same thing . Not the same thing , "[200-gilbert] insisted [Gilbert]200-gilbert sharply . " Seeing and doing are two entirely different things . [A person without any experience]5215-a person without any experience can think a lot , but when it comes to doing , [he]5215-a person without any experience 's not there . [He]200-gilbert stared at [Clyde]201-clyde critically and quizzically while [Clyde]201-clyde , feeling that [he]201-clyde must be wrong in [his]201-clyde notion that something was going to be done for [him]201-clyde , began to quiet [himself]201-clyde . " Yes , [sir]4880-sir , [I]201-clyde guess that 's true , too , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde commented .

" But [you]201-clyde do n't need to guess in this case , "[200-gilbert] insisted [Gilbert]200-gilbert . " [You]201-clyde know . That 's the trouble with [people who do n't know]5218-people who do n't know . [They]5218-people who do n't know 're always guessing . "[200-gilbert]

The truth was that [Gilbert]200-gilbert was so irritated to think that [he]200-gilbert must now make a place for [[his]200-gilbert cousin]622-his cousin , and that despite [his]200-gilbert having done nothing at all to deserve it , that [he]200-gilbert could scarcely conceal the spleen that now colored [his]200-gilbert mood .

" [You]200-gilbert 're right , [I]201-clyde know , "[201-clyde] said [Clyde]201-clyde placatingly , for [he]201-clyde was still hoping for this hinted - at promotion .

Then [he]291-whiggam arose and dismissed [them]1737-them both with an air , and [Whiggam]291-whiggam , still somewhat dubious as to the experiment , but now very anxious to be pleasant to [Clyde]201-clyde since [he]291-whiggam could not tell what [he]201-clyde might become , led the way to [[Mr. Liggett]292-liggett 's floor]1738-mr. liggett 's floor . " Why , certainly , [Mr. Whiggam]245-whiggam . And tall windows that reached from floor to ceiling let in a veritable flood of light . [These girls]1415-these girls were not all pretty . At last [Clyde]201-clyde saw what was required of [him]201-clyde and the conditions under which [he]201-clyde was about to work and said so . "[200-gilbert]

" Yes , [sir]4880-sir , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde .

[We]5242-we do n't want 'em and [we]5242-we wo n't have 'em . And once [we]5242-we 're through with 'em , [we]5242-we 're through with 'em . "[200-gilbert]

[He]1755-i paused and stared at [Clyde]201-clyde as much as to say : " Now [I]1755-i hope [I]1755-i have made [myself]1755-i clear . Also that [we]5242-we will never have any trouble in so far as [you]201-clyde are concerned . "[1755-i]

And [Clyde]201-clyde replied : " Yes , [I]201-clyde understand . [I]201-clyde think that 's right . In fact [I]201-clyde know that 's the way it has to be . "[201-clyde]

" And ought to be , "[200-gilbert] added [Gilbert]200-gilbert .

" And ought to be , "[201-clyde] echoed [Clyde]201-clyde .

At the same time [he]201-clyde was wondering whether it was really true as [Gilbert]200-gilbert said . Had [he]201-clyde not heard [the mill girls]1756-the mill girls already spoken about in a slighting way ? Yet consciously at the moment [he]201-clyde did not connect [himself]201-clyde in thought with [any of [these girls]1415-these girls [upstairs]575-upstairs]1757-any of these girls upstairs . And [he]201-clyde was now determined to keep it and to conduct [himself]201-clyde always as [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin wished .

" Well , now , then , "[200-gilbert] went on [Gilbert]200-gilbert as if to supplement [Clyde]201-clyde 's thoughts in this respect , " what [I]200-gilbert want to know of [you]201-clyde is , if [I]200-gilbert trouble to put [you]201-clyde in that department , even temporarily , can [I]200-gilbert trust [you]201-clyde to keep a level head on [your]201-clyde shoulders and go about [your]201-clyde work conscientiously and not have [your]201-clyde head turned or disturbed by the fact that [you]201-clyde 're working among a lot of [women]467-women and [girls]894-girls ? "[200-gilbert]

" Yes , [sir]4880-sir , [I]201-clyde know [you]622-his cousin can , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde very much impressed by [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin 's succinct demand , although , after [Rita]260-rita , a little dubious .

" If [I]200-gilbert ca n't , now is the time to say so , "[200-gilbert] persisted [Gilbert]200-gilbert . " By blood [you]201-clyde 're [a member of [this family]828-this family]5266-a member of this family . " Yes , [sir]4880-sir , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde most solemnly . " [I]201-clyde understand that . [I]201-clyde 'll conduct [myself]201-clyde properly or [I]201-clyde 'll get out . "[201-clyde] And [he]201-clyde was thinking seriously at the moment that [he]201-clyde could and would . " Very good . Now , [I]201-clyde 'll tell [you]201-clyde what else [I]201-clyde want [you]201-clyde to do . [I]201-clyde want [you]201-clyde to knock off for the day and go [home]4793-home and sleep on this and think it over well . Then come back in the morning and go to work up there , if [you]201-clyde still feel the same . [Your]201-clyde salary from now on will be twenty - five dollars , and [I]201-clyde want [you]201-clyde to dress neat and clean so that [you]201-clyde will be an example to [the other men who have charge of [departments]5274-departments]5273-the other men who have charge of departments . "[201-clyde]

[He]201-clyde arose coldly and distantly , but [Clyde]201-clyde , very much encouraged and enthused by the sudden jump in salary , as well as the admonition in regard to dressing well , felt so grateful toward [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin that [he]201-clyde longed to be friendly with [him]622-his cousin . To be sure , [he]201-clyde was hard and cold and vain , but still [he]201-clyde must think something of [him]622-his cousin , and [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle too , or [they]1768-they would not choose to do all this for [him]201-clyde and so speedily . And if ever [he]201-clyde were able to make [friends]451-friends with [him]622-his cousin , win [his]201-clyde way into [his]201-clyde good graces , think how prosperously [he]201-clyde would be placed [here]4728-here , what commercial and social honors might not come to [him]201-clyde ?

So elated was [he]201-clyde at the moment that [he]201-clyde bustled out of [the great plant]1771-the great plant with a jaunty stride , resolved among other things that from now on , come what might , and as a test of [himself]201-clyde in regard to life and work , [he]201-clyde was going to be all that [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle and cousin obviously expected of [him]201-clyde — cool , cold even , and if necessary severe , where [these women or [girls of this department]1774-girls of this department]1773-these women or girls of this department were concerned . No more relations with [Dillard]257-dillard or [Rita]260-rita or [anybody like that]1775-anybody like that for the present anyhow .

The import of twenty - five dollars a week ! Of being [the head of [a department employing [twenty - five girls]1742-twenty - five girls]1777-a department employing twenty - five girls]1776-the head of a department employing twenty - five girls ! Of wearing a good suit of clothes again ! Sitting at an official desk in a corner commanding a charming river view and feeling that at last , after almost two months in [that menial department below stairs]1779-that menial department below stairs , [he]201-clyde was a figure of some consequence in [this enormous institution]1780-this enormous institution ! And because of [his]201-clyde relationship and new dignity , [Whiggam]245-whiggam , as well as [Liggett]292-liggett , hovering about with advice and genial and helpful comments from time to time . And [some of [the managers of the other departments]1782-the managers of the other departments including [several from [the front office]1784-the front office]1783-several from the front office]1781-some of the managers of the other departments including several from the front office — [an auditor]1785-an auditor and [an advertising man]1786-an advertising man occasionally pausing in passing to say hello . And the details of the work sufficiently mastered to permit [him]201-clyde to look about [him]201-clyde from time to time , taking an interest in [the factory]440-the factory as a whole , [its]440-the factory processes and supplies , such as where the great volume of linen and cotton came from , how it was cut in [an enormous cutting room above [this one]1789-this one]1788-an enormous cutting room above this one , holding [hundreds of experienced cutters]1790-hundreds of experienced cutters receiving very high wages ; how there was [an employment bureau for [recruiting help]1792-recruiting help]1791-an employment bureau for recruiting help , [a company doctor]1793-a company doctor , [a company hospital]1794-a company hospital , [a special dining room in [the main building]1796-the main building , where [the officials of [the company]990-the company]1797-the officials of the company]1795-a special dining room in the main building , where the officials of the company were allowed to dine — but [no others]1799-no others — and that [he]201-clyde , being [an accredited department head]1800-an accredited department head could now lunch with [those others in [that special restaurant]1802-that special restaurant]1801-those others in that special restaurant if [he]201-clyde chose and could afford to . Also [he]201-clyde soon learned that several miles out from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , on [the Mohawk]44-the mohawk , near [a hamlet called [Van Troup]59-van troup]1803-a hamlet called van troup , was [an inter - factory country club]1804-an inter - factory country club , to which [most of [the department heads of [the various factories]1807-the various factories]1806-the department heads of the various factories about belonged]1805-most of the department heads of the various factories about belonged , but , alas , as [he]201-clyde also learned , [Griffiths]201-clyde and [Company]625-company did not really favor [[their]1809-their officials]1810-their officials mixing with those of [any other company]1811-any other company , and for that reason [few of [them]1809-their]1812-few of them did . Yet [he]201-clyde , being [a member of [the family]433-the family]1813-a member of the family , as [Liggett]292-liggett once said to [him]201-clyde , could probably do as [he]201-clyde chose as to that . But [he]201-clyde decided , because of the strong warnings of [Gilbert]200-gilbert , as well as [his]201-clyde high blood relations with [[his]201-clyde family]521-his family , that [he]201-clyde had better remain as aloof as possible . And so smiling and being as genial as possible to [all]1395-all , nevertheless for the most part , and in order to avoid [Dillard]257-dillard and [others of [his]201-clyde ilk]1817-others of his ilk , and although [he]201-clyde was much more lonely than otherwise [he]201-clyde would have been , returning to [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room or [the public squares of this and [near - by cities]1820-near - by cities]1819-the public squares of this and near - by cities on Saturday and Sunday afternoons , and even , since [he]201-clyde thought this might please [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle and [cousin]1822-cousin and so raise [him]201-clyde in [their]1823-their esteem , beginning to attend [one of [the principal Presbyterian churches]1825-the principal presbyterian churches]1824-one of the principal presbyterian churches — [the Second or High Street Church]1826-the second or high street church , to which on occasion , as [he]201-clyde had already learned , [the Griffiths]200-gilbert [themselves]200-gilbert were accustomed to resort . Yet without ever coming in contact with [them]1823-their in person , since from June to September [they]1823-their spent [their]1823-their week - ends at [Greenwood Lake]7-greenwood lake , to which most of the society life of [this region]503-this region as yet resorted .

In fact the summer life of [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , in so far as [its]1-lycurgus society was concerned , was very dull . Nothing in particular ever eventuated then in [the city]477-the city , although previous to this , in May , there had been various affairs in connection with [the Griffiths]200-gilbert and [[their]1823-their friends]1829-their friends which [Clyde]201-clyde had either read about or saw at a distance — a graduation reception and dance at [the Snedeker School]460-the snedeker school , a lawn fete upon [[the Griffiths]200-gilbert ' grounds]1831-the griffiths ' grounds , with a striped marquee tent on one part of [the lawn]1832-the lawn and Chinese lanterns hung in among the trees . [Clyde]201-clyde had observed this quite by accident one evening as [he]201-clyde was walking alone about [the city]477-the city . It raised many a curious and eager thought in regard to [this family]828-this family , [its]828-this family high station and [his]201-clyde relation to [it]828-this family . But having placed [him]201-clyde comfortably in a small official position which was not arduous , [the Griffiths]200-gilbert now proceeded to dismiss [him]201-clyde from [their]1823-their minds . [He]201-clyde was doing well enough , and [they]1823-their would see something more of [him]201-clyde later , perhaps .

And then a little later [he]201-clyde read in the Lycurgus Star that there was to be staged on June twentieth the annual inter - city automobile floral parade and contest ( [Fonda]47-fonda , [Gloversville]52-gloversville , [Amsterdam]55-amsterdam and [Schenectady]60-schenectady ) , which this year was to be held in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and which was the last local social affair of any consequence , as [The Star]296-the star phrased it , before the annual hegira to the lakes and mountains of those who were able to depart for [such places]1835-such places . And the names of [Bella]183-bella , [Bertine]197-bertine and [Sondra]186-sondra , to say nothing of [Gilbert]200-gilbert , were mentioned as [contestants]1836-contestants or [defendants of the fair name of [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]1837-defendants of the fair name of lycurgus . And since this occurred on a Saturday afternoon , [Clyde]201-clyde , dressed in [his]201-clyde best , yet decidedly wishing to obscure [himself]201-clyde as [an ordinary spectator]1838-an ordinary spectator , was able to see once more [the girl who had so infatuated [him]201-clyde on sight , obviously breasting [a white rose - surfaced stream]1840-a white rose - surfaced stream and guiding [her]1839-the girl who had so infatuated him on sight , obviously breasting a white rose - surfaced stream and guiding her craft with a paddle covered with yellow daffodils — a floral representation of some indian legend in connection with the mohawk river craft with a paddle covered with yellow daffodils — a floral representation of some Indian legend in connection with [the Mohawk River]17-the mohawk river]1839-the girl who had so infatuated him on sight , obviously breasting a white rose - surfaced stream and guiding her craft with a paddle covered with yellow daffodils — a floral representation of some indian legend in connection with the mohawk river . How marvelous to be of [that world]1841-that world .

In the same parade [he]201-clyde had seen [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert accompanied by [a very attractive girl]1842-a very attractive girl chauffeuring one of four floats representing the four seasons . And while the one [he]201-clyde drove was winter , with [this local society girl posed in ermine with white roses for snow]1843-this local society girl posed in ermine with white roses for snow all about , directly behind came another float , which presented [Bella Griffiths]183-bella as spring , swathed in filmy draperies and crouching beside a waterfall of dark violets . The effect was quite striking and threw [Clyde]201-clyde into a mood in regard to love , youth and romance which was delicious and yet very painful to [him]201-clyde . Perhaps [he]201-clyde should have retained [Rita]260-rita , after all .

In the meantime [he]201-clyde was living on as before , only more spaciously in so far as [his]201-clyde own thoughts were concerned . For [his]201-clyde first thought after receiving this larger allowance was that [he]201-clyde had better leave [[Mrs. Cuppy]256-mrs. cuppy 's]1844-mrs. cuppy 's and secure [a better room in [some private home which , if less advantageously situated for [him]201-clyde]1846-some private home which , if less advantageously situated for him , would be in [a better street]1847-a better street]1845-a better room in some private home which , if less advantageously situated for him , would be in a better street . It took [him]201-clyde out of all contact with [Dillard]257-dillard . And what would [one such]1851-one such think if [he]201-clyde found [him]201-clyde living in [a small room such as [he]201-clyde now occupied]1852-a small room such as he now occupied ?

Ten days after [his]201-clyde salary was raised , therefore , and because of the import of [his]201-clyde name , [he]201-clyde found it possible to obtain a room in [one of [the better houses and streets]1854-the better houses and streets]1853-one of the better houses and streets — [Jefferson Avenue]61-jefferson avenue , which paralleled [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue , only a few blocks farther out . And [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton , having long been [a resident of [the city]477-the city and knowing much about [the Griffiths]200-gilbert]1861-a resident of the city and knowing much about the griffiths , recognized not only the name but the resemblance of [Clyde]201-clyde to [Gilbert]200-gilbert . And being intensely interested by this , as well as [his]201-clyde general appearance , [she]297-mrs. peyton at once offered [him]201-clyde an exceptional room for so little as five dollars a week , which [he]201-clyde took at once .

In connection with [his]201-clyde work at [the factory]440-the factory , however , and in spite of the fact that [he]201-clyde had made such drastic resolutions in regard to [the help who were beneath [him]201-clyde]1864-the help who were beneath him , still it was not always possible for [him]201-clyde to keep [his]201-clyde mind on the mere mechanical routine of the work or off of [this company of girls]1865-this company of girls as [girls]894-girls , since at least [a few of [them]1865-this company of girls]1867-a few of them were attractive . For it was summer — late June . And over all [the factory]440-the factory , especially around two , three and four in the afternoon , when the endless repetition of the work seemed to pall on all , a practical indifference not remote from languor and in some instances sensuality , seemed to creep over [the place]727-the place . There were so many [women]467-women and [girls of so many different types and moods]1871-girls of so many different types and moods . And here [they]1872-they were so remote from [men]445-men or idle pleasure in any form , all alone with just [him]201-clyde , really . Again the air within [the place]727-the place was nearly always heavy and physically relaxing , and through the many open windows that reached from floor to ceiling could be seen the Mohawk swirling and rippling , [its]727-the place banks carpeted with green grass and in places shaded by trees . Always it seemed to hint of pleasures which might be found by idling along [its]727-the place shores . And since [these workers]1875-these workers were employed so mechanically as to leave [their]1875-these workers minds free to roam from one thought of pleasure to another , [they]1875-these workers were for the most part thinking of [themselves]1875-these workers always and what [they]1875-these workers would do , assuming that [they]1875-these workers were not here chained to this routine .

And because [their]1875-these workers moods were so brisk and passionate , [they]1875-these workers were often prone to fix on the nearest object . And since [Clyde]201-clyde was almost always [the only male present]1876-the only male present — and in these days in [his]201-clyde best clothes — [they]1872-they were inclined to fix on [him]201-clyde . [They]1872-they were , indeed , full of all sorts of fantastic notions in regard to [his]201-clyde private relations with [the Griffiths]201-clyde and [their]1872-they like , where [he]201-clyde lived and how , whom in the way of [a girl [he]201-clyde might be interested in]1877-a girl he might be interested in . And [he]201-clyde , in turn , when not too constrained by the memory of what [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert had said to [him]201-clyde , was inclined to think of [them]1878-them — certain girls in particular — with thoughts that bordered on the sensual . For , in spite of the wishes of [the Griffiths Company]1879-the griffiths company , and [the discarded Rita]260-rita or perhaps because of [her]260-rita , [he]201-clyde found [himself]201-clyde becoming interested in [three different girls]1880-three different girls here . [They]1880-three different girls were of [a pagan and pleasure - loving turn]1881-a pagan and pleasure - loving turn — [this trio]1882-this trio — and [they]1880-three different girls thought [Clyde]201-clyde very handsome . [Ruza Nikoforitch]298-ruza nikoforitch — [a Russian - American girl — big and blonde and animal , with swimming brown eyes , a snub fat nose and chin]1883-a russian - american girl — big and blonde and animal , with swimming brown eyes , a snub fat nose and chin , was very much drawn to [him]201-clyde . Only , such was the manner with which [he]201-clyde carried [himself]201-clyde always , that [she]298-ruza nikoforitch scarcely dared to let [herself]298-ruza nikoforitch think so . For to [her]298-ruza nikoforitch , with [his]201-clyde hair so smoothly parted , torsoed in a bright - striped shirt , the sleeves of which in this weather were rolled to the elbows , [he]201-clyde seemed almost too perfect to be real . [She]298-ruza nikoforitch admired [his]201-clyde clean , brown polished shoes , [his]201-clyde brightly buckled black leather belt , and the loose four - in - hand tie [he]201-clyde wore .

Again there was [Martha Bordaloue]299-martha bordaloue , [a stocky , brisk Canadian - French girl of trim , if rotund , figure and ankles , hair of a reddish gold and eyes of greenish blue with puffy pink cheeks and hands that were plump and yet small]1884-a stocky , brisk canadian - french girl of trim , if rotund , figure and ankles , hair of a reddish gold and eyes of greenish blue with puffy pink cheeks and hands that were plump and yet small . At the same time , being feline and savage , [she]298-ruza nikoforitch hated all or any who even so much as presumed to attempt to interest [him]201-clyde , and despised [Ruza]298-ruza nikoforitch for that reason . For as [she]298-ruza nikoforitch could see [Ruza]298-ruza nikoforitch tried to nudge or lean against [Clyde]201-clyde whenever [he]201-clyde came sufficiently near . At the same time [she]298-ruza nikoforitch [herself]298-ruza nikoforitch sought by every single device known to [her]298-ruza nikoforitch — [her]298-ruza nikoforitch shirtwaist left open to below the borders of [her]298-ruza nikoforitch white breast , [her]298-ruza nikoforitch outer skirt lifted trimly above [her]298-ruza nikoforitch calves when working , [her]298-ruza nikoforitch plump round arms displayed to the shoulders to show [him]201-clyde that physically at least [she]298-ruza nikoforitch was worth [his]201-clyde time . And the sly sighs and languorous looks when [he]201-clyde was near , which caused [Ruza]298-ruza nikoforitch to exclaim one day : " [That French cat]5275-that french cat ! And yet again there was [the stocky and yet gay Flora Brandt]1886-the stocky and yet gay flora brandt , [a decidedly low class American type of coarse and yet enticing features , black hair , large , swimming and heavily - lashed black eyes , a snub nose and full and sensuous and yet pretty lips]1887-a decidedly low class american type of coarse and yet enticing features , black hair , large , swimming and heavily - lashed black eyes , a snub nose and full and sensuous and yet pretty lips , and a vigorous and not ungraceful body , who , from day to day , once [he]201-clyde had been there a little while , had continued to look at [him]201-clyde as if to say—"What ! And , in connection with [these three]1888-these three , the thought came to [him]201-clyde after a time that since [they]1888-these three were so different , more common as [he]201-clyde thought , less well - guarded and less sharply interested in the conventional aspects of [their]1888-these three contacts , it might be possible and that without detection on the part of [any one]4764-any one for [him]201-clyde to play with one or another of [them]1888-these three — or all three in turn if [his]201-clyde interest should eventually carry [him]201-clyde so far — without being found out , particularly if beforehand [he]201-clyde chose to impress on [them]1888-these three the fact that [he]201-clyde was condescending when [he]201-clyde noticed [them]1888-these three at all . Nevertheless , having given [his]201-clyde word as [he]201-clyde had to [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , [he]201-clyde was still in no mood to break it . These were merely thoughts which from time to time were aroused in [him]201-clyde by a situation which for [him]201-clyde was difficult in the extreme . [His]201-clyde was a disposition easily and often intensely inflamed by the chemistry of sex and the formula of beauty . [He]201-clyde could not easily withstand the appeal , let alone the call , of sex . And by the actions and approaches of each in turn [he]201-clyde was surely tempted at times , especially in these warm and languorous summer days , with no place to go and [no single intimate to commune with]1891-no single intimate to commune with . From time to time [he]201-clyde could not resist drawing near to [these very girls who were most bent on tempting [him]201-clyde]1892-these very girls who were most bent on tempting him , although in the face of [their]1892-these very girls who were most bent on tempting him looks and nudges , not very successfully concealed at times , [he]201-clyde maintained an aloofness and an assumed indifference which was quite remarkable for [him]201-clyde .

But just about this time there was a rush of orders , which necessitated , as both [Whiggam]245-whiggam and [Liggett]292-liggett advised , [Clyde]201-clyde taking on [a few extra " try - out "[292-liggett] girls who were willing to work for the very little [they]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate could earn at the current piece work rate]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate until [they]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate had mastered the technique , when of course [they]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate would be able to earn more . There were [many such who applied at [the employment branch of [the main office on the ground floor]1896-the main office on the ground floor]1895-the employment branch of the main office on the ground floor]1894-many such who applied at the employment branch of the main office on the ground floor . In slack times all applications were rejected or the sign hung up " No Help Wanted . "[292-liggett]

And since [Clyde]201-clyde was relatively new to this work , and thus far had neither hired nor discharged [any one]4764-any one , it was agreed between [Whiggam]245-whiggam and [Liggett]292-liggett that all the help thus sent up should first be examined by [Liggett]292-liggett , who was looking for extra stitchers also . And in case any were found who promised to be satisfactory as [stampers]1898-stampers , [they]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate were to be turned over to [Clyde]201-clyde with the suggestion that [he]201-clyde try [them]1893-a few extra " try - out " girls who were willing to work for the very little they could earn at the current piece work rate . Only before bringing [any one]4764-any one back to [Clyde]201-clyde , [Liggett]292-liggett was very careful to explain that in connection with this temporary hiring and discharging there was a system . [One]578-one must not ever give [a new employee]1901-a new employee , however well [they]1901-a new employee did , the feeling that [they]1901-a new employee were doing anything but moderately well until [their]1901-a new employee capacity had been thoroughly tested . It interfered with [their]1901-a new employee proper development as [piece workers]1902-piece workers , the greatest results that could be obtained by [any one person]1903-any one person . Also one might freely take on as many girls as were needed to meet any such situation , and then , once the rush was over , as freely drop [them]1904-them — unless , occasionally , [a very speedy worker]1905-a very speedy worker was found among [the novices]1906-the novices . In that case it was always advisable to try to retain [such a person]1907-such a person , either by displacing [a less satisfactory person]1908-a less satisfactory person or transferring some one from some other department , to make room for new blood and new energy .

The next day , after this notice of a rush , back came [four girls at different times]1909-four girls at different times and escorted always by [Liggett]292-liggett , who in each instance explained to [Clyde]201-clyde : " Here 's [a girl who might do for [you]201-clyde]5276-a girl who might do for you .
