"[292-liggett] Or , " [You]201-clyde might see if [this girl]1435-this girl will be of any use to [you]201-clyde . "[201-clyde] And [Clyde]201-clyde , after [he]201-clyde had questioned [them]1909-four girls at different times as to where [they]1909-four girls at different times had worked , what the nature of the general working experiences were , and whether [they]1909-four girls at different times lived at [home]4793-home [here]4728-here in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus or alone ( [the bachelor girl]1912-the bachelor girl was not much wanted by [the factory]440-the factory ) would explain the nature of the work and pay , and then call [Miss Todd]293-miss todd , who in [her]293-miss todd turn would first take [them]1909-four girls at different times to [the rest room]1914-the rest room where were lockers for [their]1909-four girls at different times coats , and then to one of the tables where [they]1909-four girls at different times would be shown what the process was . And later it was [Miss Todd]293-miss todd 's and [[Clyde]201-clyde 's business]1915-clyde 's business to discover how well [they]1909-four girls at different times were getting on and whether it was worth while to retain [them]1909-four girls at different times or not .

Up to this time , apart from [the girls to whom [he]201-clyde was so definitely drawn]1916-the girls to whom he was so definitely drawn , [Clyde]201-clyde was not so very favorably impressed with [the type of girl who was working [here]4728-here]1917-the type of girl who was working here . For the most part , as [he]201-clyde saw [them]1917-the type of girl who was working here , [they]1917-the type of girl who was working here were of [a heavy and rather unintelligent company]1919-a heavy and rather unintelligent company , and [he]201-clyde had been thinking that [smarter - looking girls]1920-smarter - looking girls might possibly be secured . Why not ? Were there none in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus in [the factory]440-the factory world ? So many of these had fat hands , broad faces , heavy legs and ankles . [Some of [them]1917-the type of girl who was working here]1922-some of them even spoke with an accent , being [Poles]301-poles or [the children of [Poles]1924-poles]1923-the children of poles , living in [that slum north of [the mill]888-the mill]1925-that slum north of the mill . And [they]1917-the type of girl who was working here were all concerned with catching [a " feller]5278-a " feller , "[1917-the type of girl who was working here] going to some dancing place with [him]1927-him afterwards , and little more . Also , [Clyde]201-clyde had noticed that [the American types who were here were of a decidedly different texture , thinner , more nervous and for the most part more angular , and with a general reserve due to prejudices , racial , moral and religious]1928-the american types who were here were of a decidedly different texture , thinner , more nervous and for the most part more angular , and with a general reserve due to prejudices , racial , moral and religious , which would not permit [them]1928-the american types who were here were of a decidedly different texture , thinner , more nervous and for the most part more angular , and with a general reserve due to prejudices , racial , moral and religious to mingle with [these others]1409-these others or with [any men]1930-any men , apparently .

But among the extras or try - outs that were brought to [him]201-clyde during this and several succeeding days , finally came one who interested [Clyde]201-clyde more than [any girl whom [he]201-clyde had seen here so far]1931-any girl whom he had seen here so far . [She]1932-her was , as [he]201-clyde decided on sight , more intelligent and pleasing — more spiritual — though apparently not less vigorous , if more gracefully proportioned . As a matter of fact , as [he]201-clyde saw [her]1932-her at first , [she]1932-her appeared to [him]201-clyde to possess a charm which [no one else in this room]1933-no one else in this room had , a certain wistfulness and wonder combined with a kind of self - reliant courage and determination which marked [her]1932-her at once as [one possessed of will and conviction to a degree]1934-one possessed of will and conviction to a degree . Nevertheless , as [she]1932-her said , [she]1932-her was inexperienced in this kind of work , and highly uncertain as to whether [she]1932-her would prove of service [here]4728-here or anywhere .

[Her]1932-her name was [Roberta Alden]302-roberta , and , as [she]1932-her at once explained , previous to this [she]1932-her had been working in [a small hosiery factory in [a town called Trippetts Mills fifty miles north of Lycurgus]1937-a town called trippetts mills fifty miles north of lycurgus]1936-a small hosiery factory in a town called trippetts mills fifty miles north of lycurgus . [She]1932-her had on a small brown hat that did not look any too new , and was pulled low over a face that was small and regular and pretty and that was haloed by bright , light brown hair . [Her]1932-her eyes were of a translucent gray blue . [Her]1932-her little suit was commonplace , and [her]1932-her shoes were not so very new - looking and quite solidly - soled . [She]1932-her looked practical and serious and yet so bright and clean and willing and possessed of so much hope and vigor that along with [Liggett]292-liggett , who had first talked with [her]1932-her , [he]292-liggett was at once taken with [her]1932-her . Distinctly [she]1932-her was above [the average of [the girls in [this room]1054-this room]1939-the girls in this room]1938-the average of the girls in this room . And [he]292-liggett could not help wondering about [her]1932-her as [he]292-liggett talked to [her]1932-her , for [she]1932-her seemed so tense , a little troubled as to the outcome of this interview , as though this was a very great adventure for [her]1932-her .

[She]1932-her explained that up to this time [she]1932-her had been living with [[her]1932-her parents]453-her parents near [a town called [Biltz]62-biltz]1942-a town called biltz , but was now living with [friends]451-friends [here]4728-here . [She]1932-her talked so honestly and simply that [Clyde]201-clyde was very much moved by [her]1932-her , and for this reason wished to help [her]1932-her . At the same time [he]292-liggett wondered if [she]1932-her were not really above the type of work [she]1932-her was seeking . [Her]1932-her eyes were so round and blue and intelligent — [her]1932-her lips and nose and ears and hands so small and pleasing .

" [You]1932-her 're going to live in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , then , if [you]1932-her can get work [here]4728-here ? "[292-liggett] [he]292-liggett said , more to be talking to [her]1932-her than anything else .

Then presently [he]292-liggett saw [her]1932-her returning , a fluff of light hair about [her]1932-her forehead , [her]1932-her cheeks slightly flushed , [her]1932-her eyes very intent and serious . Then [she]1932-her fell to , and by [her]1932-her gestures [Clyde]201-clyde guessed that [she]1932-her would prove both speedy and accurate . For [she]1932-her seemed most anxious to obtain and keep [this place]793-this place .

After [she]1932-her had worked a little while , [he]292-liggett went to [her]1932-her side and watched [her]1932-her as [she]1932-her picked up and stamped the collars piled beside [her]1932-her and threw them to one side . Then , because for a second [she]1932-her turned and looked at [him]292-liggett , giving [him]292-liggett an innocent and yet cheerful and courageous smile , [he]292-liggett smiled back , most pleased .

" Well , [I]292-liggett guess [you]1932-her 'll make out all right , "[292-liggett] [he]292-liggett ventured to say , since [he]292-liggett could not help feeling that [she]1932-her would . Then [the twain]1963-the twain smiled most wisely , a choice bit between [them]1960-them . [Ruza Nikoforitch]298-ruza nikoforitch was jealous .

The reasons why [a girl of [Roberta]302-roberta 's type]1964-a girl of roberta 's type should be seeking employment with [Griffiths and Company]1965-griffiths and company at this time and in this capacity are of some point . For , somewhat after the fashion of [Clyde]201-clyde in relation to [[his]201-clyde family]521-his family and [his]201-clyde life , [she]298-ruza nikoforitch too considered [her]298-ruza nikoforitch life a great disappointment . [She]298-ruza nikoforitch was [the daughter of [Titus Alden]304-titus alden]1967-the daughter of titus alden , [a farmer]1968-a farmer — of near [Biltz]62-biltz , [[a small town]1969-a small town in [Mimico County]64-mimico county]1970-a small town in mimico county , some fifty miles north . And from [her]298-ruza nikoforitch youth up [she]298-ruza nikoforitch had seen little but poverty . [[Her]302-roberta father]510-her father — [the youngest of three sons of [Ephraim Alden]305-ephraim alden]1972-the youngest of three sons of ephraim alden , [a farmer in [this region]503-this region before [him]305-ephraim alden]1973-a farmer in this region before him — was so unsuccessful that at forty - eight [he]305-ephraim alden was still living in [a house which , though old and much in need of repair at the time]1975-a house which , though old and much in need of repair at the time [[his]305-ephraim alden father]539-his father willed [it]1975-a house which , though old and much in need of repair at the time to [him]305-ephraim alden , was now bordering upon a state of dilapidation . [The house]532-the house itself , while primarily a charming example of that excellent taste which produced [those delightful gabled homes which embellish [the average New England town and street]1979-the average new england town and street]1978-those delightful gabled homes which embellish the average new england town and street , had been by now so reduced for want of paint , shingles , and certain flags which had once made a winding walk from [a road]1980-a road gate to the front door , that [it]532-the house presented a decidedly melancholy aspect to [the world]4755-the world , as though it might be coughing and saying : " Well , things are none too satisfactory with [me]302-roberta . "[302-roberta]

The interior of [the house]532-the house corresponded with the exterior . The floor boards and stair boards were loose and creaked most eerily at times . Some of the windows had shades — some did not . Furniture of both an earlier and a later date , but all in a somewhat decayed condition , intermingled and furnished it in some nondescript manner which need hardly be described .

As for [the parents of [Roberta]302-roberta]1983-the parents of roberta , [they]1983-the parents of roberta were excellent examples of [that native type of Americanism which resists facts and reveres illusion]1984-that native type of americanism which resists facts and reveres illusion . [Titus Alden]304-titus alden was [one of [that vast company of individuals who are born , pass through and die out of [the world]4755-the world]1986-that vast company of individuals who are born , pass through and die out of the world without ever quite getting any one thing straight . [They]1988-they appear , blunder , and end in a fog . Like [[his]304-titus alden two brothers]1989-his two brothers , both older and almost as nebulous , [Titus]304-titus alden was [a farmer]1968-a farmer solely because [[his]304-titus alden father]539-his father]1985-one of that vast company of individuals who are born , pass through and die out of the world without ever quite getting any one thing straight . they appear , blunder , and end in a fog . like his two brothers , both older and almost as nebulous , titus was a farmer solely because his father had been [a farmer]1968-a farmer . And [he]304-titus alden was here on [this farm]1993-this farm because it had been willed to [him]304-titus alden and because it was easier to stay [here]4728-here and try to work this than it was to go elsewhere . [He]304-titus alden was [a Republican]1995-a republican because [[his]304-titus alden father]539-his father before [him]304-titus alden was a Republican and because [this county]1997-this county was Republican . It never occurred to [him]304-titus alden to be otherwise . And , as in the case of [his]304-titus alden politics and [his]304-titus alden religion , [he]304-titus alden had borrowed all [his]304-titus alden notions of what was right and wrong from those about [him]304-titus alden . A single , serious , intelligent or rightly informing book had never been read by [any member of [this family]828-this family]1998-any member of this family — not one . But [they]2000-they were nevertheless excellent , as conventions , morals and religions go — honest , upright , [God]306-god - fearing and respectable .

In so far as [the daughter of these parents]2001-the daughter of these parents was concerned , and in the face of natural gifts which fitted [her]2001-the daughter of these parents for something better than [this world]1288-this world from which [she]2001-the daughter of these parents derived , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was still , in part , at least , a reflection of the religious and moral notions there and then prevailing,—the views of [the local ministers]2003-the local ministers and [the laity in general]2004-the laity in general . At the same time , because of a warm , imaginative , sensuous temperament , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was filled — once [she]2001-the daughter of these parents reached fifteen and sixteen — with the world - old dream of all of [[Eve]307-eve 's daughters]2005-eve 's daughters from the homeliest to the fairest — that [her]2001-the daughter of these parents beauty or charm might some day and ere long smite bewitchingly and so irresistibly the soul of [a given man]2006-a given man or [men]445-men .

So it was that although throughout [her]2001-the daughter of these parents infancy and girlhood [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was compelled to hear of and share a depriving and toilsome poverty , still , because of [her]2001-the daughter of these parents innate imagination , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was always thinking of something better . Maybe , some day , who knew , [a larger city like [Albany]4-albany or [Utica]3-utica]2008-a larger city like albany or utica ! A newer and greater life .

And then what dreams ! And in the orchard of a spring day later , between [her]2001-the daughter of these parents fourteenth and eighteenth years when the early May sun was making pink lamps of every aged tree and the ground was pinkly carpeted with the falling and odorous petals , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents would stand and breathe and sometimes laugh , or even sigh , [her]2001-the daughter of these parents arms upreached or thrown wide to life . To be alive ! To have youth and [the world]4755-the world before one . To think of the eyes and the smile of [some youth of [the region]481-the region who by the merest chance had passed [her]2001-the daughter of these parents and looked , and who might never look again , but who , nevertheless , in so doing , had stirred [her]2001-the daughter of these parents young soul]2010-some youth of the region who by the merest chance had passed her and looked , and who might never look again , but who , nevertheless , in so doing , had stirred her young soul to dreams .

None the less [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was shy , and hence recessive — afraid of [men]445-men , especially the more ordinary types common to [this region]503-this region . And these in turn , repulsed by [her]2001-the daughter of these parents shyness and refinement , tended to recede from [her]2001-the daughter of these parents , for all of [her]2001-the daughter of these parents physical charm , which was too delicate for [this region]503-this region . Nevertheless , at the age of sixteen , having repaired to [Biltz]62-biltz , in order to work in [[Appleman]308-appleman 's Dry Goods Store]2015-appleman 's dry goods store for five dollars a week , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents saw [many young men who attracted [her]2001-the daughter of these parents]2016-many young men who attracted her . But here because of [her]2001-the daughter of these parents mood in regard to [[her]2001-the daughter of these parents family]1607-her family 's position , as well as the fact that to [her]2001-the daughter of these parents inexperienced eyes [they]1607-her family appeared so much better placed than [herself]2001-the daughter of these parents , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was convinced that [they]1607-her family would not be interested in [her]2001-the daughter of these parents . And here again it was [her]2001-the daughter of these parents own mood that succeeded in alienating [them]1607-her family almost completely . Nevertheless [she]2001-the daughter of these parents remained working for [Mr. Appleman]308-appleman until [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was between eighteen and nineteen , all the while sensing that [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was really doing nothing for [herself]2001-the daughter of these parents because [she]2001-the daughter of these parents was too closely identified with [[her]2001-the daughter of these parents home]1450-her home and [[her]2001-the daughter of these parents family]1607-her family , who appeared to need [her]2001-the daughter of these parents .

And then about this time , an almost revolutionary thing for [this part of [the world]4755-the world]2020-this part of the world occurred . For because of the cheapness of labor in such an extremely rural section , [a small hosiery plant]2022-a small hosiery plant was built at [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills . And though [Roberta]302-roberta , because of the views and standards that prevailed hereabout , had somehow conceived of this type of work as beneath [her]302-roberta , still [she]302-roberta was fascinated by the reports of the high wages to be paid . Accordingly [she]2001-the daughter of these parents repaired to [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills , where , boarding at [the house of [a neighbor who had previously lived in [Biltz]62-biltz]2024-a neighbor who had previously lived in biltz , and returning [home]4793-home every Saturday afternoon]2023-the house of a neighbor who had previously lived in biltz , and returning home every saturday afternoon , [she]2001-the daughter of these parents planned to bring together the means for some further form of practical education — a course at [a business college at [Homer]66-homer or [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2026-a business college at homer or lycurgus or somewhere which might fit [her]2001-the daughter of these parents for something better — bookkeeping or stenography .

And in connection with this dream and this attempted saving two years went by . And in the meanwhile , although [she]2001-the daughter of these parents earned more money ( eventually twelve dollars a week ) , still , because [various members of [[her]2001-the daughter of these parents family]1607-her family]2027-various members of her family required so many little things and [she]2001-the daughter of these parents desired to alleviate to a degree the privations of [these others from which [she]2001-the daughter of these parents suffered]2029-these others from which she suffered , nearly all that [she]2001-the daughter of these parents earned went to [them]2029-these others from which she suffered .

And again here , as at [Biltz]62-biltz , most of [the youths of [the town]4925-the town who were better suited to [her]2001-the daughter of these parents intellectually and temperamentally]2030-the youths of the town who were better suited to her intellectually and temperamentally — still looked upon [the mere factory type]2032-the mere factory type as beneath [them]2029-these others from which she suffered in many ways . And although [Roberta]302-roberta was far from being that type , still having associated [herself]302-roberta with [them]2029-these others from which she suffered [she]302-roberta was inclined to absorb some of [their]2029-these others from which she suffered psychology in regard to [themselves]2029-these others from which she suffered . Indeed by then [she]302-roberta was fairly well satisfied that [no one of these here in whom [she]302-roberta was interested]2033-no one of these here in whom she was interested would be interested in [her]302-roberta — at least not with any legitimate intentions .

And then two things occurred which caused [her]302-roberta to think , not only seriously of marriage , but of [her]302-roberta own future , whether [she]302-roberta married or not . For [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister , [Agnes]309-agnes , now twenty , and three years [her]302-roberta junior , having recently reencountered [a young schoolmaster who some time before had conducted [the district school near [the Alden farm]2037-the alden farm]2036-the district school near the alden farm , and finding [him]2038-him more to [her]302-roberta taste now than when [she]302-roberta had been in school]2035-a young schoolmaster who some time before had conducted the district school near the alden farm , and finding him more to her taste now than when she had been in school , had decided to marry [him]2038-him . And this meant , as [Roberta]302-roberta saw it , that [she]302-roberta was about to take on the appearance of [a spinster]2039-a spinster unless [she]302-roberta married soon . Yet [she]302-roberta did not quite see what was to be done until [the hosiery factory at [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills]2040-the hosiery factory at trippetts mills suddenly closed , never to reopen . And then , in order to assist [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother , as well as help with [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister 's wedding , [she]302-roberta returned to [Biltz]62-biltz .

But then there came a third thing which decidedly affected [her]302-roberta dreams and plans . [Grace Marr]310-grace , [a girl whom [she]302-roberta had met at [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills]2043-a girl whom she had met at trippetts mills , had gone to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and after a few weeks there had managed to connect [herself]310-grace with the [Finchley Vacuum Cleaner Company]2044-finchley vacuum cleaner company at a salary of fifteen dollars a week and at once wrote to [Roberta]302-roberta telling [her]310-grace of the opportunities that were then present in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus . For in passing [the Griffiths Company]1879-the griffiths company , which [she]302-roberta did daily , [she]302-roberta had seen a large sign posted over the east employment door reading " [Girls Wanted . "]5283-girls wanted . "[2162-a certain " feller " whom she had met the night before] And inquiry revealed the fact that [girls at this company]2046-girls at this company were always started at nine or ten dollars , quickly taught some one of the various phases of piece work and then , once [they]2046-girls at this company were proficient , were frequently able to earn as much as from fourteen to sixteen dollars , according to [their]2046-girls at this company skill . And since board and [room]2047-room were only consuming seven of what [she]302-roberta earned , [she]302-roberta was delighted to communicate to [Roberta]302-roberta , whom [she]302-roberta liked very much , that [she]302-roberta might come and room with [her]302-roberta if [she]302-roberta wished .

[Roberta]302-roberta , having reached the place where [she]302-roberta felt that [she]302-roberta could no longer endure farm life but must act for [herself]302-roberta once more , finally arranged with [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother to leave in order that [she]302-roberta might help [her]302-roberta more directly with [her]302-roberta wages .

But once in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and employed by [Clyde]201-clyde , [her]302-roberta life , after the first flush of self - interest which a change so great implied for [her]302-roberta , was not so much more enlarged socially or materially either , for that matter , over what it had been in [Biltz]62-biltz and [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills . For , despite the genial intimacy of [Grace Marr]310-grace — [a girl not nearly as attractive as [Roberta]302-roberta , and who , because of [Roberta]302-roberta 's charm and for the most part affected [gayety]311-gayety]2049-a girl not nearly as attractive as roberta , and who , because of roberta 's charm and for the most part affected gayety , counted on [her]310-grace to provide a cheer and companionship which otherwise [she]310-grace would have lacked — still the world into which [she]310-grace was inducted [here]4728-here was scarcely any more liberal or diversified than that from which [she]310-grace sprang .

For , to begin with , [the Newtons]2051-the newtons , sister and [brother - in - law of [Grace Marr]310-grace]2052-brother - in - law of grace marr , with whom [she]310-grace lived , and who , despite the fact that [they]2051-the newtons were not unkindly , proved to be , almost more so than were the types with whom , either in [Biltz]62-biltz or [Trippets Mills]68-trippets mills , [she]310-grace had been in constant contact , [the most ordinary small town mill workers]2053-the most ordinary small town mill workers — religious and narrow to a degree . [George Newton]312-george newton , as [every one]4944-every one could see and feel , was a pleasant if not very emotional or romantic person who took [his]312-george newton various small plans in regard to [himself]312-george newton and [his]312-george newton future as of the utmost importance . Primarily [he]312-george newton was saving what little cash [he]312-george newton could out of the wages [he]312-george newton earned as threadman in [the Cranston Wickwire factory]2055-the cranston wickwire factory to enable [him]312-george newton to embark upon some business for which [he]312-george newton thought [himself]312-george newton fitted . And to this end , and to further enhance [his]312-george newton meager savings , [he]312-george newton had joined with [[his]312-george newton wife]576-his wife in the scheme of taking over [an old house in [Taylor Street]63-taylor street]2057-an old house in taylor street which permitted the renting of [enough rooms to carry the rent]2058-enough rooms to carry the rent and in addition to supply the food for [the family]433-the family and [five boarders]2060-five boarders , counting [their]2060-five boarders labor and worries in the process as nothing . And on the other hand , [Grace Marr]310-grace , as well as [[Newton]312-george newton 's wife]2061-newton 's wife , [Mary]271-mary , were of that type that [here as elsewhere]2062-here as elsewhere find the bulk of [their]2060-five boarders social satisfaction in such small matters as relate to the organization of [a small home]2063-a small home , the establishing of its import and integrity in [a petty and highly conventional neighborhood]2064-a petty and highly conventional neighborhood and the contemplation of life and conduct through the lens furnished by a purely sectarian creed .

And so , once part and parcel of [this particular household]2065-this particular household , [Roberta]302-roberta found after a time , that [it]2066-it , if not [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , was narrow and restricted — not wholly unlike [the various narrow and restricted homes at [Biltz]62-biltz]2067-the various narrow and restricted homes at biltz . And these lines , according to [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [[their]2060-five boarders like]2068-their like , to be strictly observed . No good could come of breaking [them]2069-them . If [you]2070-you were [a factory employee]2071-a factory employee [you]2070-you should accommodate [yourself]2070-you to the world and customs of [the better sort of [Christian factory employees]2073-christian factory employees]2072-the better sort of christian factory employees . Every day therefore — and that not so very long after [she]302-roberta had arrived — [she]302-roberta found [herself]302-roberta up and making the best of a not very satisfactory breakfast in [the Newton dining room]2074-the newton dining room , which was usually shared by [Grace]310-grace and [two other girls of nearly [their]2075-two other girls of nearly their own age own age]2075-two other girls of nearly their own age — [Opal Feliss]314-opal feliss and [Olive Pope]315-olive pope — who were connected with [the Cranston Wickwire Company]15-the cranston wickwire company . And immediately after breakfast joining a long procession that day after day at this hour made for [the mills across [the river]950-the river]2078-the mills across the river . For just outside [her]302-roberta own door [she]302-roberta invariably met with [a company of [factory girls]2081-factory girls and [women]467-women , [boys]465-boys and [men , of the same relative ages]2084-men , of the same relative ages , to say nothing of many old and weary - looking women who looked more like [wraiths than human beings]2085-wraiths than human beings , who had issued from [the various streets and houses of [this vicinity]2087-this vicinity]2086-the various streets and houses of this vicinity]2080-a company of factory girls and women , boys and men , of the same relative ages , to say nothing of many old and weary - looking women who looked more like wraiths than human beings , who had issued from the various streets and houses of this vicinity . And as [the crowd]2088-the crowd , because of the general inpour into it from [various streets]2089-various streets , thickened at [Central Avenue]43-central avenue , there was much ogling of [the prettier girls]2090-the prettier girls by [a certain type of factory man]2091-a certain type of factory man , who , not knowing any of [them]2090-the prettier girls , still sought , as [Roberta]302-roberta saw it , unlicensed contacts and even worse . Yet there was much giggling and simpering on the part of [girls of a certain type]2092-girls of a certain type who were by no means as severe as [most of those [she]302-roberta had known elsewhere]2093-most of those she had known elsewhere . Shocking !

And at night [the same throng]2094-the same throng , re - forming at [the mills]2095-the mills , crossing the bridge at [the depot]910-the depot and returning as it had come . And [Roberta]302-roberta , because of [her]302-roberta social and moral training and mood , and in spite of [her]302-roberta decided looks and charm and strong desires , feeling alone and neglected . Oh , how sad to see [the world]4755-the world so gay and [she]302-roberta so lonely . And it was always after six when [she]302-roberta reached [home]4793-home . And after dinner there was really nothing much of anything to do unless [she]302-roberta and [Grace]310-grace attended one or another of [the moving picture theaters]2099-the moving picture theaters or [she]302-roberta could bring [herself]302-roberta to consent to join [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [Grace]310-grace at a meeting of [the Methodist Church]2100-the methodist church .

None the less once part and parcel of [this household]2101-this household and working for [Clyde]201-clyde [she]302-roberta was delighted with the change . [This big city]2102-this big city . [This fine Central Avenue]2103-this fine central avenue with [[its]2103-this fine central avenue stores]2104-its stores and [moving picture theaters]2105-moving picture theaters . [These great mills]2106-these great mills . And again [this Mr. Griffiths]201-clyde , so young , attractive , smiling and interested in [her]302-roberta .

In the same way [Clyde]201-clyde , on encountering [her]302-roberta , was greatly stirred . Since the abortive contact with [Dillard]257-dillard , [Rita]260-rita and [Zella]259-zella , and afterwards the seemingly meaningless invitation to [the Griffiths]179-samuel griffiths with its introduction to and yet only passing glimpse of such personages as [Bella]183-bella , [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra and [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , [he]201-clyde was lonely indeed . [That high world]2107-that high world ! But plainly [he]201-clyde was not to be allowed to share in it . And yet because of [his]201-clyde vain hope in connection with it , [he]201-clyde had chosen to cut [himself]201-clyde off in this way . And to what end ? Was [he]201-clyde not if anything more lonely than ever ? [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton ! Going to and from [his]201-clyde work but merely nodding to [people]4823-people or talking casually — or however sociably with one or another of [the storekeepers along [Central Avenue]43-central avenue who chose to hail [him]201-clyde]2109-the storekeepers along central avenue who chose to hail him — or even [some of [the factory girls here in whom [he]201-clyde was not interested or with whom [he]201-clyde did not dare to develop a friendship]2111-the factory girls here in whom he was not interested or with whom he did not dare to develop a friendship]2110-some of the factory girls here in whom he was not interested or with whom he did not dare to develop a friendship . What a situation really ! What to do !

And at the same time , this [Roberta Alden]302-roberta , once [she]302-roberta was placed [here]4728-here in this fashion and becoming more familiar with local conditions , as well as the standing of [Clyde]201-clyde , [his]201-clyde charm , [his]201-clyde evasive and yet sensible interest in [her]302-roberta , was becoming troubled as to [her]302-roberta state too . For once part and parcel of [this local home]2115-this local home [she]302-roberta had joined [she]302-roberta was becoming conscious of various local taboos and restrictions which made it seem likely that never at any time here would it be possible to express an interest in [Clyde]201-clyde or [any one above [her]302-roberta officially]2116-any one above her officially . [Religious , moral and reserved girls]2119-religious , moral and reserved girls did n't do it . And another taboo in regard to [all the foreign family girls]2122-all the foreign family girls and [men,—ignorant , low , immoral , un - American]2123-men,—ignorant , low , immoral , un - american ! And so it was that [Roberta]302-roberta , after encountering [Clyde]201-clyde and sensing the superior world in which [she]302-roberta imagined [he]201-clyde moved , and being so taken with the charm of [his]201-clyde personality , was seized with the very virus of ambition and unrest that afflicted [him]201-clyde . And every day that [she]302-roberta went to [the factory]440-the factory now [she]302-roberta could not help but feel that [his]201-clyde eyes were upon [her]302-roberta in a quiet , seeking and yet doubtful way . Yet [she]302-roberta also felt that [he]201-clyde was too uncertain as to what [she]302-roberta would think of any overture that [he]201-clyde might make in [her]302-roberta direction to risk a repulse or any offensive interpretation on [her]302-roberta part . And yet at times , after the first two weeks of [her]302-roberta stay [here]4728-here , [she]302-roberta wishing that [he]201-clyde would speak to [her]302-roberta — that [he]201-clyde would make some beginning — at other times that [he]201-clyde must not dare — that it would be dreadful and impossible . [The other girls there]2140-the other girls there would see at once . And since [they]2140-the other girls there all plainly felt that [he]201-clyde was too good or too remote for [them]2140-the other girls there , [they]2140-the other girls there would at once note that [he]201-clyde was making an exception in [her]302-roberta case and would put [their]2140-the other girls there own interpretation on it . And [she]302-roberta knew the type of [a girl who worked in [the Griffiths stamping room]2142-the griffiths stamping room]2141-a girl who worked in the griffiths stamping room would put but one interpretation on it,—that of looseness .

At the same time in so far as [Clyde]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde leaning toward [her]302-roberta was concerned there was that rule laid down by [Gilbert]200-gilbert . And although , because of it , [he]201-clyde had hitherto appeared not to notice or to give any more attention to [one girl]2143-one girl than another , still , once [Roberta]302-roberta arrived , [he]201-clyde was almost unconsciously inclined to drift by [her]302-roberta table and pause in [her]302-roberta vicinity to see how [she]302-roberta was progressing . And , as [he]201-clyde saw from the first , [she]302-roberta was [a quick and intelligent worker]2144-a quick and intelligent worker , soon mastering without much advice of any kind all the tricks of the work , and thereafter earning about as much as any of the others — fifteen dollars a week . And [her]302-roberta manner was always that of one who enjoyed it and was happy to have the privilege of working [here]4728-here . And pleased to have [him]201-clyde pay any little attention to [her]302-roberta .

At the same time [he]201-clyde noted to [his]201-clyde surprise and especially since to [him]201-clyde [she]302-roberta seemed so refined and different , a certain exuberance and gayety that was not only emotional , but in a delicate poetic way , sensual . Also that despite [her]302-roberta difference and reserve [she]302-roberta was able to make [friends with]2146-friends with and seemed to be able to understand the viewpoint of [most of [the foreign girls who were essentially so different from [her]302-roberta]2148-the foreign girls who were essentially so different from her]2147-most of the foreign girls who were essentially so different from her . And yet [she]302-roberta did not appear to lose [their]2152-their respect either .

Thus , one noontime , coming back from [the office]1022-the office lunch [downstairs]513-downstairs a little earlier than usual , [he]201-clyde found [her]302-roberta and [several of [the foreign - family girls]2156-the foreign - family girls]2155-several of the foreign - family girls , as well as [four of [the American girls]2158-the american girls]2157-four of the american girls , surrounding [Polish Mary]271-mary , [one of [the gayest and roughest of [the foreign - family girls]2156-the foreign - family girls]2160-the gayest and roughest of the foreign - family girls , who was explaining in rather a high key how [a certain " feller "[302-roberta] whom [she]302-roberta had met the night before]2162-a certain " feller " whom she had met the night before had given [her]302-roberta a beaded bag , and for what purpose]2159-one of the gayest and roughest of the foreign - family girls , who was explaining in rather a high key how a certain " feller " whom she had met the night before had given her a beaded bag , and for what purpose .

" [I]302-roberta should go with [heem]201-clyde to be [[his]201-clyde sweetheart]5284-his sweetheart , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta announced with a flourish , the while [she]302-roberta waved the bag before [the interested group]2163-the interested group . And although , according to the laws of [her]302-roberta upbringing , as [Clyde]201-clyde suspected , [Roberta]302-roberta should have been shocked by all this , [she]302-roberta was not , as [he]201-clyde noticed — far from it . " Oh , but [he]201-clyde no wait , "[271-mary] declared [Mary]271-mary archly , and with plainly a keen sense of the riskiness of the situation , the while [she]271-mary winked at [Clyde]201-clyde who had drawn near . " Gee , this is pretty strong stuff for [a little country girl like [Miss Alden]303-miss alden]5286-a little country girl like miss alden . [She]5286-a little country girl like miss alden wo n't like this , maybe , "[302-roberta] thought [Clyde]201-clyde to [himself]201-clyde .

However , [Roberta]302-roberta , as [he]201-clyde now saw , appeared to be equal to the situation , for [she]302-roberta pretended to be troubled . " [Gee]205-gee , [you]201-clyde are in a fix , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta commented . " [I]317-lena schlict do n't know what [you]201-clyde 'll do now . And frizzled - haired Dutch [Lena]317-lena schlict now leaned over to say : " [I]302-roberta take it and [him]201-clyde too , [you]201-clyde bet , if [you]201-clyde do n't want [him]201-clyde . Even [Roberta]302-roberta laughed loudly , a fact which [Clyde]201-clyde noted with pleasure , for [he]201-clyde liked all this rough humor , considering it mere innocent play .

" Well , maybe [you]201-clyde 're right , [Lena]317-lena schlict , "[302-roberta] [he]201-clyde heard [her]302-roberta add just as the whistle blew and the hundreds of sewing machines in [the next room]2167-the next room began to hum . " [A good man]5288-a good man is n't to be found every day . "[317-lena schlict] [Her]302-roberta blue eyes were twinkling and [her]302-roberta lips , which were most temptingly modeled , were parted in a broad smile . There was much banter and more bluff in what [she]302-roberta said than anything else , as [Clyde]201-clyde could see , but [he]201-clyde felt that [she]302-roberta was not nearly as narrow as [he]201-clyde had feared . [She]302-roberta was human and gay and tolerant and good - natured . There was decidedly a very liberal measure of play in [her]302-roberta . And in spite of the fact that [her]302-roberta clothes were poor , the same little round brown hat and blue cloth dress that [she]302-roberta had worn on first coming to work [here]4728-here , [she]302-roberta was prettier than [anyone else]529-anyone else . And [she]302-roberta never needed to paint [her]302-roberta lips and cheeks like [the foreign girls , whose faces at times looked like pink - frosted cakes]2170-the foreign girls , whose faces at times looked like pink - frosted cakes . And how pretty were [her]302-roberta arms and neck — plump and gracefully designed ! And there was a certain grace and abandon about [her]302-roberta as [she]302-roberta threw [herself]302-roberta into [her]302-roberta work as though [she]302-roberta really enjoyed it . As [she]302-roberta worked fast during the hottest portions of the day , there would gather on [her]302-roberta upper lip and chin and forehead little beads of perspiration which [she]302-roberta was always pausing in [her]302-roberta work to touch with [her]302-roberta handkerchief , while to [him]2171-him , like jewels , they seemed only to enhance [her]302-roberta charm .

Wonderful days , these , now for [Clyde]201-clyde . For once more and here , where [he]201-clyde could be near [her]302-roberta the long day through , [he]201-clyde had [a girl whom [he]201-clyde could study and admire and by degrees proceed to crave with all of the desire of which [he]201-clyde seemed to be capable — and with which [he]201-clyde had craved [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs]2172-a girl whom he could study and admire and by degrees proceed to crave with all of the desire of which he seemed to be capable — and with which he had craved hortense briggs — only with more satisfaction , since as [he]201-clyde saw it [she]302-roberta was simpler , more kindly and respectable . And though for quite a while at first [Roberta]302-roberta appeared or pretended to be quite indifferent to or unconscious of [him]201-clyde , still from the very first this was not true . [She]302-roberta was only troubled as to the appropriate attitude for [her]302-roberta . The beauty of [his]201-clyde face and hands — the blackness and softness of [his]201-clyde hair , the darkness and melancholy and lure of [his]201-clyde eyes . [He]201-clyde was attractive — oh , very . Beautiful , really , to [her]302-roberta .

And then one day shortly thereafter , [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert walking through here and stopping to talk to [Clyde]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta was led to imagine by this that [Clyde]201-clyde was really much more of [a figure]2173-a figure socially and financially than [she]302-roberta had previously thought . For just as [Gilbert]200-gilbert was approaching , [Lena Schlict]317-lena schlict , who was working beside [her]302-roberta , leaned over to say : " Here comes [Mr. Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert . [[His]200-gilbert father]539-his father owns [this whole factory]5290-this whole factory and when [he]539-his father dies , [he]539-his father 'll get it , [they]5291-they say . " [They]5291-they look a lot alike , do n't [they]5291-they ? "[302-roberta]

" Yes , [they]5291-they do , "[200-gilbert] replied [Roberta]302-roberta , slyly studying not only [Clyde]201-clyde but [Gilbert]200-gilbert , " only [I]318-hoda petkanas think [Mr. Clyde Griffiths]201-clyde is a little nicer looking , do n't [you]200-gilbert ? "[318-hoda petkanas]

[Hoda Petkanas]318-hoda petkanas , sitting on the other side of [Roberta]302-roberta and overhearing this last remark , laughed . " That 's what [every one here]811-every one here thinks . [He]201-clyde 's not stuck up like that [Mr. Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , either . "[302-roberta]

" Is [he]201-clyde rich , too ? "[302-roberta] inquired [Roberta]302-roberta , thinking of [Clyde]201-clyde .

" [I]302-roberta do n't know . [They]5294-they say not , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta pursed [her]302-roberta lips dubiously , [herself]302-roberta rather interested in [Clyde]201-clyde along with [the others]629-the others . " [He]201-clyde worked down in [the shrinking room]4916-the shrinking room before [he]201-clyde came up [here]4728-here . [He]201-clyde was just working by the day , [I]2249-he guess . But [he]201-clyde only came on [here]4728-here a little while ago to learn the business . Maybe [he]201-clyde wo n't work in [here]4728-here much longer . "[2249-he]

[Roberta]302-roberta was suddenly troubled by this last remark . [She]302-roberta had not been thinking , or so [she]302-roberta had been trying to tell [herself]302-roberta , of [Clyde]201-clyde in any romantic way , and yet the thought that [he]201-clyde might suddenly go at any moment , never to be seen by [her]302-roberta any more , disturbed [her]302-roberta now . [He]201-clyde was so youthful , so brisk , so attractive . And so interested in [her]302-roberta , too . Yes , that was plain . It was wrong to think that [he]201-clyde would be interested in [her]302-roberta — or to try to attract [him]201-clyde by any least gesture of [hers]302-roberta , since [he]201-clyde was so important [a person here — far above [her]302-roberta]2175-a person here — far above her .

For , true to [her]302-roberta complex , the moment [she]302-roberta heard that [Clyde]201-clyde was so highly connected and might even have money , [she]302-roberta was not so sure that [he]201-clyde could have any legitimate interest in [her]302-roberta . For was [she]302-roberta not [a poor working girl]2176-a poor working girl ? And was [he]201-clyde not [[a very rich man]2177-a very rich man 's nephew]2178-a very rich man 's nephew ? [He]201-clyde would not marry [her]302-roberta , of course . And what other legitimate thing would [he]201-clyde want with [her]302-roberta ? [She]302-roberta must be on [her]302-roberta guard in regard to [him]201-clyde .

The thoughts of [Clyde]201-clyde at this time in regard to [Roberta]302-roberta and [his]201-clyde general situation in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus were for the most part confused and disturbing . For had not [Gilbert]200-gilbert warned [him]201-clyde against associating with the help here ? On the other hand , in so far as [his]201-clyde actual daily life was concerned , [his]201-clyde condition was socially the same as before . Apart from the fact that [his]201-clyde move to [[Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton 's]2179-mrs. peyton 's had taken [him]201-clyde into [a better street]1847-a better street and [neighborhood]2181-neighborhood , [he]201-clyde was really not so well off as [he]201-clyde had been at [[Mrs. Cuppy]256-mrs. cuppy 's]1844-mrs. cuppy 's . For there at least [he]201-clyde had been in touch with [those young people who would have been diverting enough had [he]201-clyde felt that it would have been wise to indulge [them]2183-those young people who would have been diverting enough had he felt that it would have been wise to indulge them]2183-those young people who would have been diverting enough had he felt that it would have been wise to indulge them . But now , aside from [a bachelor brother who was as old as [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton [herself]297-mrs. peyton]2184-a bachelor brother who was as old as mrs. peyton herself , and [a son thirty — slim and reserved , who was connected with one of [the Lycurgus banks]2186-the lycurgus banks]2185-a son thirty — slim and reserved , who was connected with one of the lycurgus banks — [he]201-clyde saw [no one who could or would trouble to entertain [him]201-clyde]2187-no one who could or would trouble to entertain him . Like the others with whom [he]201-clyde came in contact , [they]2188-they thought [him]201-clyde possessed of relationships which would make it unnecessary and even a bit presumptuous for [them]2188-they to suggest ways and means of entertaining [him]201-clyde .

On the other hand , while [Roberta]302-roberta was not of that high world to which [he]201-clyde now aspired , still there was that about [her]302-roberta which enticed [him]201-clyde beyond measure . Day after day and because so much alone , and furthermore because of so strong a chemic or temperamental pull that was so definitely asserting itself , [he]201-clyde could no longer keep [his]201-clyde eyes off [her]302-roberta — or [she]302-roberta hers from [him]201-clyde . There were evasive and yet strained and feverish eye - flashes between [them]2189-them . And after one such in [his]201-clyde case — a quick and furtive glance on [her]302-roberta part at times — by no means intended to be seen by [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde found [himself]201-clyde weak and then feverish . [Her]302-roberta pretty mouth , [her]302-roberta lovely big eyes , [her]302-roberta radiant and yet so often shy and evasive smile . And , oh , [she]302-roberta had such pretty arms — [such a trim , lithe , sentient , quick figure and movements]2190-such a trim , lithe , sentient , quick figure and movements . If [he]201-clyde only dared be friendly with [her]302-roberta — venture to talk with and then see [her]302-roberta somewhere afterwards — if [she]302-roberta only would and if [he]201-clyde only dared .

Confusion . Aspiration . Hours of burning and yearning . For indeed [he]201-clyde was not only puzzled but irritated by the anomalous and paradoxical contrasts which [his]201-clyde life here presented — loneliness and wistfulness as against the fact that it was being generally assumed by such as knew [him]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde was rather pleasantly and interestingly employed socially .

Therefore in order to enjoy [himself]201-clyde in some way befitting [his]201-clyde present rank , and to keep out of the sight of those who were imagining that [he]201-clyde was being so much more handsomely entertained than [he]201-clyde was , [he]201-clyde had been more recently , on Saturday afternoons and Sundays , making idle sightseeing trips to [Gloversville]52-gloversville , [Fonda]47-fonda , [Amsterdam]55-amsterdam and other places , as well as [Gray]70-gray and [Crum Lakes]71-crum lakes , where there were [boats]2191-boats , [beaches and bathhouses , with bathing suits for rent]2192-beaches and bathhouses , with bathing suits for rent . And there , because [he]201-clyde was always thinking that if by chance [he]201-clyde should be taken up by [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths , [he]201-clyde would need as many social accomplishments as possible , and by reason of encountering [a man who took a fancy to [him]201-clyde and who could both swim and dive]2194-a man who took a fancy to him and who could both swim and dive , [he]201-clyde learned to do both exceedingly well . But canoeing fascinated [him]201-clyde really . [He]201-clyde was pleased by the picturesque and summery appearance [he]201-clyde made in an outing shirt and canvas shoes paddling about [Crum Lake]77-crum lake in one of the bright red or green or blue canoes that were leased by the hour . And at such times these summer scenes appeared to possess an airy , fairy quality , especially with a summer cloud or two hanging high above in the blue . And so [his]201-clyde mind indulged itself in day dreams as to how it would feel to be [a member of one of the wealthy groups that frequented [the more noted resorts of [the north]734-the north]2196-the more noted resorts of the north — [Racquette Lake]73-racquette lake — [Schroon Lake]74-schroon lake — [Lake George]75-lake george and [Champlain]76-champlain]2195-a member of one of the wealthy groups that frequented the more noted resorts of the north — racquette lake — schroon lake — lake george and champlain — dance , golf , tennis , canoe with [those who could afford to go]2198-those who could afford to go to such places — [the rich of [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2199-the rich of lycurgus .

But it was about this time that [Roberta]302-roberta with [[her]302-roberta friend]1413-her friend [Grace]310-grace found [Crum Lake]77-crum lake and had decided on [it]77-crum lake , with the approval of [Mr.]2201-mr. and [Mrs. Newton]320-mrs. newton , as [one of the best and most reserved of all the smaller watering places about here]2202-one of the best and most reserved of all the smaller watering places about here . And so it was that [they]2199-the rich of lycurgus , too , were already given to riding out to [the pavilion]2203-the pavilion on a Saturday or Sunday afternoon , and once there following the west shore along which ran a well - worn footpath which led to clumps of trees , underneath which [they]2199-the rich of lycurgus sat and looked at [the water]4702-the water , for [neither]2205-neither could row [a boat]2206-a boat or swim . Also there were wild flowers and berry bushes to be plundered . And from [certain marshy spots]2207-certain marshy spots , to be reached by venturing out for a score of feet or more , it was possible to reach and take white lilies with [their]2208-their delicate yellow hearts . They were decidedly tempting and on two occasions already [the marauders]2209-the marauders had brought [Mrs. Newton]320-mrs. newton large armfuls of blooms from [the fields]2210-the fields and shore line here .

On the third Sunday afternoon in July , [Clyde]201-clyde , as lonely and rebellious as ever , was paddling about in [a dark blue canoe]2211-a dark blue canoe along [the south bank of [the lake]4706-the lake]2212-the south bank of the lake about a mile and a half from [the boathouse]4756-the boathouse . [His]201-clyde coat and hat were off , and in a seeking and half resentful mood [he]201-clyde was imagining vain things in regard to the type of life [he]201-clyde would really like to lead . At different points on [the lake]4706-the lake in [canoes]2216-canoes , or [[their]2216-canoes more clumsy companions]2217-their more clumsy companions , [the row - boats]2218-the row - boats , were [boys]465-boys and [girls]894-girls , [men]445-men and [women]467-women . And over [the water]4702-the water occasionally would come [their]2216-canoes laughter or bits of [their]2216-canoes conversation . And in the distance would be other canoes and [other dreamers]2224-other dreamers , happily in love , as [Clyde]201-clyde invariably decided , that being to [him]201-clyde the sharpest contrast to [his]201-clyde own lorn state .

At any rate , the sight of [any other youth]2225-any other youth thus romantically engaged with [[his]201-clyde girl]2226-his girl was sufficient to set dissonantly jangling the repressed and protesting libido of [his]201-clyde nature . And this would cause [his]201-clyde mind to paint another picture in which , had fortune favored [him]201-clyde in the first place by birth , [he]201-clyde would now be in some canoe on [Schroon]78-schroon or [Racquette]79-racquette or [Champlain Lake]80-champlain lake with [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra or [some such girl]2227-some such girl , paddling and looking at the shores of a scene more distingue than this . Or might [he]201-clyde not be riding or playing tennis , or in the evening dancing or racing from place to place in [some high - powered car]2228-some high - powered car , [Sondra]186-sondra by [his]201-clyde side ? [He]201-clyde felt so out of it , so lonely and restless and tortured by all that [he]201-clyde saw [here]4728-here , for everywhere that [he]201-clyde looked [he]201-clyde seemed to see love , romance , contentment . What to do ? Where to go ? [He]201-clyde could not go on alone like this forever . [He]201-clyde was too miserable .

In memory as well as mood [his]201-clyde mind went back to the few gay happy days [he]201-clyde had enjoyed in [Kansas City]23-kansas city before that dreadful accident — [Ratterer]224-ratterer , [Hegglund]226-hegglund , [Higby]230-higby , [Tina Kogel]321-kit , [Hortense]220-hortense briggs , [[Ratterer]224-ratterer 's sister]2230-ratterer 's sister [Louise]234-louise — in short , the gay company of which [he]201-clyde was just beginning to be a part when that terrible accident had occurred . And next to [Dillard]257-dillard , [Rita]260-rita , [Zella,—a]322-zella,—a companionship that would have been better than this , certainly . Were [the Griffiths]201-clyde never going to do any more for [him]201-clyde than this ? Had [he]201-clyde only come here to be sneered at by [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin , pushed aside , or rather completely ignored by all the bright company of which [the children of [[his]201-clyde rich uncle]2233-his rich uncle]2232-the children of his rich uncle were a part ? And so plainly , from so many interesting incidents , even now in this dead summertime , [he]201-clyde could see how privileged and relaxed and apparently decidedly happy were those of that circle . Notices in the local papers almost every day as to [their]2234-their coming and going here and there , [the large and expensive cars of [Samuel]179-samuel griffiths]2235-the large and expensive cars of samuel as well as [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert parked outside [the main office]968-the main office entrance on such days as [they]2234-their were in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus — an occasional group of [young society figures]2237-young society figures to be seen before [the grill of [the Lycurgus Hotel]1180-the lycurgus hotel]2238-the grill of the lycurgus hotel , or before [one of [the fine homes in [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue]2241-the fine homes in wykeagy avenue]2240-one of the fine homes in wykeagy avenue , some one having returned to [the city]477-the city for an hour or a night .

And in [the factory itself]2243-the factory itself , whenever either was [there]4705-there — [Gilbert]200-gilbert or [Samuel]179-samuel griffiths — in the smartest of summer clothes and attended by either [Messrs. Smillie]323-messrs. smillie , [Latch]242-mr. latch , [Gotboy]243-mr. gotboy or [Burkey]244-mr. burkey , [all high officials of [the company]990-the company]2245-all high officials of the company , making a most austere and even regal round of [the immense plant]2247-the immense plant and consulting with or listening to the reports of [the various minor department heads]2248-the various minor department heads . And yet here was [he]2249-he — [a full cousin to [this same Gilbert]200-gilbert]2250-a full cousin to this same gilbert , [a nephew to this distinguished [Samuel]179-samuel griffiths]2251-a nephew to this distinguished samuel — being left to drift and pine by [himself]2249-he , and for no other reason than , as [he]2249-he could now clearly see , [he]2249-he was not good enough . [[His]2249-he father]539-his father was not as able as this , [[his]2249-he great uncle]2253-his great uncle — [[his]2249-he mother]587-his mother ( might [Heaven]324-heaven keep [her]587-his mother ) not as distinguished or as experienced as [[his]2249-he cold , superior , indifferent aunt]2255-his cold , superior , indifferent aunt . Might it not be best to leave ? Had [he]2249-he not made a foolish move , after all , in coming on [here]4728-here ? What , if anything , did [these high relatives]2257-these high relatives ever intend to do for [him]2249-he ?

In loneliness and resentment and disappointment , [his]2249-he mind now wandered from [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths and [[their]555-the griffiths world]2259-their world , and particularly that beautiful [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , whom [he]2249-he recalled with a keen and biting thrill , to [Roberta]302-roberta and [the world which [she]302-roberta as well as [he]2249-he was occupying [here]4728-here]2260-the world which she as well as he was occupying here . For although [a poor factory girl]2262-a poor factory girl , [she]2262-a poor factory girl was still so much more attractive than any of [these other girls with whom [he]2249-he was every day in contact]2263-these other girls with whom he was every day in contact .

And [his]2249-he thoughts were played over by exactly the same emotions that swept [him]2249-he so regularly at [the factory]440-the factory . For poor or not — [a working girl]1953-a working girl by misfortune only — [he]2249-he could see how [he]2249-he could be very happy with [her]2262-a poor factory girl if only [he]2249-he did not need to marry [her]2262-a poor factory girl . For now [his]2249-he ambitions toward marriage had been firmly magnetized by [the world to which [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths belonged]2271-the world to which the griffiths belonged . And yet [his]2249-he desires were most colorfully inflamed by [her]2262-a poor factory girl , if only [he]2249-he might venture to talk to [her]2262-a poor factory girl more — to walk [home]4793-home with [her]2262-a poor factory girl some day from [the mill]888-the mill — to bring [her]2262-a poor factory girl out here to [this lake]2275-this lake on a Saturday or Sunday , and row about — just to idle and dream with [her]2262-a poor factory girl .

[He]2249-he rounded a point studded with a clump of trees and bushes and covering a shallow where were scores of water lilies afloat , their large leaves resting flat upon [the still water of [the lake]4706-the lake]2276-the still water of the lake . And on the bank to the left was [a girl]2278-a girl standing and looking at [them]2279-them . [She]2278-a girl had [her]2278-a girl hat off and one hand to [her]2278-a girl eyes for [she]2278-a girl was facing the sun and was looking down in [the water]4702-the water . [Her]2278-a girl lips were parted in careless inquiry . [She]2278-a girl was very pretty , [he]2249-he thought , as [he]2249-he paused in [his]2249-he paddling to look at [her]2278-a girl . It was n't [Roberta]302-roberta ! It could n't be ! Yes , it was !

Almost before [he]2249-he had decided , [he]2249-he was quite beside [her]2278-a girl , some twenty feet from [the shore]2281-the shore , and was looking up at [her]2278-a girl , [his]2249-he face lit by the radiance of one who had suddenly , and beyond [his]2249-he belief , realized a dream . And as though [he]2249-he were [a pleasant apparition]2282-a pleasant apparition suddenly evoked out of nothing and nowhere , a poetic effort taking form out of smoke or vibrant energy , [she]2278-a girl in turn stood staring down at [him]2249-he , [her]2278-a girl lips unable to resist the wavy line of beauty that a happy mood always brought to [them]2283-them .

" [My]2249-he , [Miss Alden]303-miss alden ! It is [you]2278-a girl , is n't it ? "[2249-he] [he]2249-he called . " [I]2278-a girl was wondering whether it was . [I]2278-a girl could n't be sure from out there . "[2278-a girl]

" Why , yes it is , "[2249-he] [she]2278-a girl laughed , puzzled , and again just the least bit abashed by the reality of [him]2249-he . For in spite of [her]2278-a girl obvious pleasure at seeing [him]2249-he again , only thinly repressed for the first moment or two , [she]2278-a girl was on the instant beginning to be troubled by [her]2278-a girl thoughts in regard to [him]2249-he — the difficulties that contact with [him]2249-he seemed to prognosticate . For this meant contact and friendship , maybe , and [she]2278-a girl was no longer in any mood to resist [him]2249-he , whatever [people]4823-people might think . And yet here was [[her]2278-a girl friend]1413-her friend , [Grace Marr]310-grace . Would [she]2278-a girl want [her]1413-her friend to know of [Clyde]201-clyde and [her]1413-her friend interest in [him]2249-he ? [She]2278-a girl was troubled . And yet [she]2278-a girl could not resist smiling and looking at [him]2249-he in a frank and welcoming way . [She]2278-a girl had been thinking of [him]2249-he so much and wishing for [him]2249-he in some happy , secure , commendable way . And now here [he]2249-he was . And there could be nothing more innocent than [his]2249-he presence here — nor [hers]2278-a girl .

" Just out for a walk ? "[2278-a girl] [he]2249-he forced [himself]2249-he to say , although , because of [his]2249-he delight and [his]2249-he fear of [her]2278-a girl really , [he]2249-he felt not a little embarrassed now that [she]2278-a girl was directly before [him]2249-he . " Uh , huh , "[2278-a girl] [she]2278-a girl replied , still smiling and looking directly at [him]2249-he , for the sight of [his]2249-he dark hair blown by the wind , the pale blue outing shirt [he]2249-he wore open at the neck , [his]2249-he sleeves rolled up and the yellow paddle held by [him]2249-he above [the handsome blue boat]2287-the handsome blue boat , quite thrilled [her]2278-a girl . [Roberta]302-roberta looked . [She]302-roberta was thinking [she]302-roberta would like to get in without [[her]302-roberta companion]2303-her companion , if possible — with [her]302-roberta , if need be . [She]302-roberta wanted so much to have [him]2303-her companion all to [herself]302-roberta . If [she]302-roberta had only come out here alone . For if [Grace Marr]310-grace were included , [she]302-roberta would know and later talk , maybe , or think , if [she]302-roberta heard anything else in regard to [them]2304-them ever . [She]302-roberta stood staring and thinking , and [Clyde]201-clyde , troubled and pained by [her]302-roberta doubt on this occasion and [his]201-clyde own loneliness and desire for [her]302-roberta , suddenly called : " Oh , please do n't say no .
