[She]302-roberta marked the " [I]302-roberta want [you]201-clyde to . "[302-roberta] It soothed and strengthened [her]302-roberta . [He]201-clyde had no desire to take any advantage of [her]302-roberta as [she]302-roberta could see .

" But [I]302-roberta have [[my]302-roberta friend]5303-my friend with [me]302-roberta here , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta exclaimed almost sadly and dubiously , for [she]302-roberta still wanted to go alone — never in [her]302-roberta life had [she]302-roberta wanted any one less than [Grace Marr]310-grace at this moment . Why had [she]302-roberta brought [her]302-roberta ? [She]302-roberta was n't so very pretty and [Clyde]201-clyde might not like [her]302-roberta , and that might spoil the occasion . " Besides , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta added almost in the same breath and with many thoughts fighting [her]302-roberta , " maybe [I]201-clyde 'd better not . Is it safe ? "[201-clyde]

" Oh , yes , maybe [you]302-roberta better had , "[201-clyde] laughed [Clyde]201-clyde seeing that [she]302-roberta was yielding . " It 's perfectly safe , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde added eagerly . Then maneuvering [the canoe]2297-the canoe next to [the bank]2306-the bank , which was a foot above [the water]4702-the water , and laying hold of a root to hold it still , [he]201-clyde said : " Of course [you]302-roberta wo n't be in any danger . Call [[your]302-roberta friend]5304-your friend then , if [you]302-roberta want to , and [I]302-roberta 'll row the two of [you]302-roberta . There 's room for two and there are lots of water lilies everywhere over there . "[302-roberta] [He]201-clyde nodded toward [the east side of [the lake]4706-the lake]2308-the east side of the lake .

[Roberta]302-roberta could no longer resist and seized an overhanging branch by which to steady [herself]302-roberta . At the same time [she]302-roberta began to call : " Oh , [Gray - ace]5305-gray - ace ! [Gray - ace]5305-gray - ace ! Where are [you]5305-gray - ace ? "[302-roberta] for [she]302-roberta had at last decided that it was best to include [her]302-roberta .

A far - off voice as quickly answered : " Hello - o ! What do [you]302-roberta want ? "[302-roberta]

" Come up here . Come on . [I]302-roberta got something [I]302-roberta want to tell [you]5305-gray - ace . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , no , [you]302-roberta come on down here . The daisies are just wonderful . "[302-roberta]

" No , [you]302-roberta come on up here . There 's some one here that wants to take [us]5307-we boating . "[302-roberta] [She]302-roberta intended to call this loudly , but somehow [her]302-roberta voice failed and [[her]302-roberta friend]1413-her friend went on gathering flowers . [Roberta]302-roberta frowned . [She]302-roberta did not know just what to do . " Oh , very well , then , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta suddenly decided , and straightening up added : " [We]5307-we can row down to where [she]1413-her friend is , [I]201-clyde guess . "[201-clyde]

And [Clyde]201-clyde , delighted , exclaimed : " Oh , that 's just fine . Sure . Do get in . [We]5307-we 'll pick these here first and then if [she]1413-her friend has n't come , [I]302-roberta 'll paddle down nearer to where [she]1413-her friend is . Just step square in the center and that will balance it . "[302-roberta]

[He]201-clyde was leaning back and looking up at [her]302-roberta and [Roberta]302-roberta was looking nervously and yet warmly into [his]201-clyde eyes . Actually it was as though [she]302-roberta were suddenly diffused with joy , enveloped in a rosy mist .

[She]302-roberta balanced one foot . " Will it be perfectly safe ? "[201-clyde]

" Sure , sure , "[201-clyde] emphasized [Clyde]201-clyde . " [I]201-clyde 'll hold it safe . Just take hold of that branch there and steady [yourself]302-roberta by that . "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde held [the boat]2311-the boat very still as [she]302-roberta stepped . Then , as [the canoe]2297-the canoe careened slightly to one side , [she]302-roberta dropped to the cushioned seat with a little cry . It was like that of [a baby]2313-a baby to [Clyde]201-clyde .

" It 's all right , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde reassured [her]302-roberta . " Just sit in the center there . It wo n't tip over . Gee , but this is funny . [I]302-roberta ca n't make it out quite . [You]302-roberta know just as [I]302-roberta was coming around that point [I]302-roberta was thinking of [you]302-roberta — how maybe [you]302-roberta might like to come out to a place like this sometime . And now here [you]302-roberta are and here [I]302-roberta am , and it all happened just like that . "[302-roberta] [He]201-clyde waved [his]201-clyde hand and snapped [his]201-clyde fingers .

And [Roberta]302-roberta , fascinated by this confession and yet a little frightened by it , added : " Is that so ? "[201-clyde] [She]302-roberta was thinking of [her]302-roberta own thoughts in regard to [him]201-clyde .

" Yes , and what 's more , "[201-clyde] added [Clyde]201-clyde , " [I]302-roberta 've been thinking of [you]302-roberta all day , really . That 's the truth . [I]302-roberta was wishing [I]302-roberta might see [you]302-roberta somewhere this morning and bring [you]302-roberta out here . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , now , [Mr. Griffiths]201-clyde . [You]201-clyde know [you]201-clyde do n't mean that , "[201-clyde] pleaded [Roberta]302-roberta , fearful lest this sudden contact should take too intimate and sentimental a turn too quickly . [She]302-roberta scarcely liked that because [she]302-roberta was afraid of [him]201-clyde and [herself]302-roberta , and now [she]302-roberta looked at [him]201-clyde , trying to appear a little cold or at least disinterested , but it was a very weak effort .

" That 's the truth , though , just the same , "[302-roberta] insisted [Clyde]201-clyde .

" Well , [I]201-clyde think it is beautiful [myself]201-clyde , "[201-clyde] admitted [Roberta]302-roberta . " [I]201-clyde 've been out here , too , several times now . [[My]201-clyde friend]5303-my friend and [I.]201-clyde "[201-clyde] [Clyde]201-clyde was once more delighted . [She]302-roberta was smiling now and full of wonder .

" Oh , have [you]302-roberta ? "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde exclaimed , and there was more talk as to why [he]201-clyde liked to come out and how [he]201-clyde had learned to swim [here]4728-here . " And to think [I]302-roberta turned in here and there [you]302-roberta were on [the bank]2306-the bank , looking at those water lilies . Was n't that queer ? [I]302-roberta almost fell out of [the boat]2311-the boat . [I]302-roberta do n't think [I]302-roberta ever saw [you]302-roberta look as pretty as [you]302-roberta did just now standing there . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , now , [Mr. Griffiths]201-clyde , "[302-roberta] again pleaded [Roberta]302-roberta cautiously . " [You]201-clyde must n't begin that way . [I]302-roberta 'll be afraid [you]201-clyde 're [a dreadful flatterer]5311-a dreadful flatterer . [I]302-roberta 'll have to think [you]201-clyde are if [you]201-clyde say anything like that so quickly . "[302-roberta]

[Clyde]201-clyde once more gazed at [her]302-roberta weakly , and [she]302-roberta smiled because [she]302-roberta thought [he]201-clyde was more handsome than ever . But what would [he]201-clyde think , [she]302-roberta added to [herself]302-roberta , if [she]302-roberta were to tell [him]201-clyde that just before [he]201-clyde came around that point [she]302-roberta was thinking of [him]201-clyde too , and wishing that [he]201-clyde were there with [her]302-roberta , and not [Grace]310-grace . And how [they]2315-they might sit and talk , and hold hands perhaps . [He]201-clyde might even put [his]201-clyde arms around [her]302-roberta waist , and [she]302-roberta might let [him]201-clyde . That would be terrible , as [some people here]2316-some people here would see it , [she]302-roberta knew . And it would never do for [him]201-clyde to know that — never . That would be too intimate — too bold . But just the same it was so . Yet what would [these people here in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2317-these people here in lycurgus think of [her]302-roberta and [him]201-clyde now if [they]2317-these people here in lycurgus should see [her]302-roberta , letting [him]201-clyde paddle [her]302-roberta about in [this canoe]2318-this canoe ! [He]201-clyde [a factory manager]2319-a factory manager and [she]302-roberta [an employee in [[his]201-clyde department]2321-his department]2320-an employee in his department . The conclusion ! The scandal , maybe , even . And yet [Grace Marr]310-grace was along — or soon would be . And [she]302-roberta could explain to [her]302-roberta — surely . [He]201-clyde was out rowing and knew [her]302-roberta , and why should n't [he]201-clyde help [her]302-roberta get some lilies if [he]201-clyde wanted to ? It was almost unavoidable — this present situation , was n't it ?

Already [Clyde]201-clyde had maneuvered [the canoe]2297-the canoe around so that [they]2323-they were now among the water lilies . And as [he]201-clyde talked , having laid [his]201-clyde paddle aside , [he]201-clyde had been reaching over and pulling [them]2323-they up , tossing them with [their]2323-they long , wet stems at [her]302-roberta feet as [she]302-roberta lay reclining in the seat , one hand over the side of [the canoe]2297-the canoe in the water , as [she]302-roberta had seen [other girls]2325-other girls holding [theirs]2323-they . And for the moment [her]302-roberta thoughts were allayed and modified by the beauty of [his]201-clyde head and arms and the tousled hair that now fell over [his]201-clyde eyes . How handsome [he]201-clyde was !

The outcome of that afternoon was so wonderful for [both]874-both that for days thereafter [neither]2205-neither could cease thinking about it or marveling that anything so romantic and charming should have brought [them]874-both together so intimately when [both]874-both were considering that it was not wise for either to know [the other]5024-the other any better than [employee and superior]2330-employee and superior .

After a few moments of badinage in [the boat]2311-the boat in which [he]201-clyde had talked about the beauty of the lilies and how glad [he]201-clyde was to get them for [her]302-roberta , [they]874-both picked up [[her]302-roberta friend]1413-her friend , [Grace]310-grace , and eventually returned to [the boathouse]4756-the boathouse .

Once on [the land]2334-the land again there developed not a little hesitation on [her]302-roberta part as well as [his]201-clyde as to how farther to proceed , for [they]874-both were confronted by the problem of returning into [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus together . As [Roberta]302-roberta saw it , it would not look right and might create talk . And on [his]201-clyde part , [he]201-clyde was thinking of [Gilbert]200-gilbert and [other people [he]201-clyde knew]2335-other people he knew . The trouble that might come of it . What [Gilbert]200-gilbert would say if [he]200-gilbert did hear . And so both [he]201-clyde and [she]302-roberta , as well as [Grace]310-grace , were dubious on the instant about the wisdom of riding back together . [Grace]310-grace 's own reputation , as well as the fact that [she]310-grace knew [Clyde]201-clyde was not interested in [her]310-grace , piqued [her]310-grace . And [Roberta]302-roberta , realizing this from [her]302-roberta manner , said : " What do [you]201-clyde think [we]2336-they had better do , excuse [ourselves]2336-they ? "[316-shurlock]

At once [Roberta]302-roberta tried to think just how [they]2336-they could extricate [themselves]2336-they gracefully without offending [Clyde]201-clyde . Personally [she]302-roberta was so enchanted that had [she]302-roberta been alone [she]302-roberta would have preferred to have ridden back with [him]201-clyde . But with [Grace]310-grace here and in this cautious mood , never . [She]302-roberta must think up some excuse .

And at the same time , [Clyde]201-clyde was wondering just how [he]201-clyde was to do now — ride in with [them]2336-they and brazenly face the possibility of being seen by [some one who might carry the news to [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert or evade doing so on some pretext or other]2337-some one who might carry the news to gilbert griffiths or evade doing so on some pretext or other . [He]201-clyde could think of none , however , and was about to turn and accompany [them]2336-they to [the car]650-the car when [the young electrician]2339-the young electrician , [Shurlock]316-shurlock , who lived in [the Newton household]2340-the newton household and who had been on [the balcony of [the pavilion]2203-the pavilion]2341-the balcony of the pavilion , hailed [them]2336-they . [He]316-shurlock was with [a friend]2343-a friend who had [a small car]2344-a small car , and [they]2336-they were ready to return to [the city]477-the city .

" Well , here 's luck , "[316-shurlock] [he]316-shurlock exclaimed . " How are [you]2343-a friend , [Miss Alden]303-miss alden ? How do [you]2343-a friend do , [Miss Marr]325-miss marr ? [You]2343-a friend two do n't happen to be going [our]2336-they way , do [you]2343-a friend ? If [you]2343-a friend are , [we]2336-they can take [you]2343-a friend in with [us]2336-they . "[201-clyde]

Not only [Roberta]302-roberta but [Clyde]201-clyde heard . And at once [she]302-roberta was about to say that , since it was a little late and [she]302-roberta and [Grace]310-grace were scheduled to attend church services with [the Newtons]313-the newtons , it would be more convenient for [them]2336-they to return this way . [She]302-roberta was , however , half hoping that [Shurlock]316-shurlock would invite [Clyde]201-clyde and that [he]201-clyde would accept . But on [his]201-clyde doing so , [Clyde]201-clyde instantly refused . [He]201-clyde explained that [he]201-clyde had decided to stay out a little while longer . And so [Roberta]302-roberta left [him]201-clyde with a look that conveyed clearly enough the gratitude and delight [she]302-roberta felt . [They]2336-they had had such a good time . And [he]201-clyde in turn , in spite of many qualms as to the wisdom of all this , fell to brooding on how sad it was that just [he]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta might not have remained [here]4728-here for hours longer . And immediately after [they]2336-they had gone , [he]201-clyde returned to [the city]477-the city alone .

The next morning [he]201-clyde was keener than ever to see [Roberta]302-roberta again . And although the peculiarly exposed nature of the work at [the factory]440-the factory made it impossible for [him]201-clyde to demonstrate [his]201-clyde feelings , still by the swift and admiring and seeking smiles that played over [his]201-clyde face and blazed in [his]201-clyde eyes , [she]302-roberta knew that [he]201-clyde was as enthusiastic , if not more so , as on the night before . And on [her]302-roberta part , although [she]302-roberta felt that a crisis of some sort was impending , and in spite of the necessity of a form of secrecy which [she]302-roberta resented , [she]302-roberta could not refrain from giving [him]201-clyde a warm and quite yielding glance in return . The wonder of [his]201-clyde being interested in [her]302-roberta ! The wonder and the thrill !

[Clyde]201-clyde decided at once that [his]201-clyde attentions were still welcome . Also that [he]201-clyde might risk saying something to [her]302-roberta , supposing that a suitable opportunity offered . And so , after waiting an hour and seeing [two fellow workers]2349-two fellow workers leave from either side of [her]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde seized the occasion to drift near and to pick up one of the collars [she]302-roberta had just stamped , saying , as though talking about that : " [I]302-roberta was awfully sorry to have to leave [you]302-roberta last night . [I]302-roberta wish [we]5312-we were out there again to - day instead of here , just [you]302-roberta and [me]302-roberta , do n't [you]302-roberta ? "[302-roberta]

[Roberta]302-roberta turned , conscious that now was the time to decide whether [she]302-roberta would encourage or discourage any attention on [his]201-clyde part . At the same time [she]302-roberta was almost faintingly eager to accept [his]201-clyde attentions regardless of the problem in connection with [them]2350-them . [His]201-clyde eyes ! [His]201-clyde hair ! [His]201-clyde hands ! And then instead of rebuking or chilling [him]201-clyde in any way , [she]302-roberta only looked , but with eyes too weak and melting to mean anything less than yielding and uncertainty . [Clyde]201-clyde saw that [she]302-roberta was hopelessly and helplessly drawn to [him]201-clyde , as indeed [he]201-clyde was to [her]302-roberta . On the instant [he]201-clyde was resolved to say something more , when [he]201-clyde could , as to where [they]2351-they could meet when [no one]4713-no one was along , for it was plain that [she]302-roberta was no more anxious to be observed than [he]201-clyde was . [He]201-clyde well knew more sharply to - day than ever before that [he]201-clyde was treading on [dangerous ground]2353-dangerous ground .

[He]201-clyde began to make mistakes in [his]201-clyde calculations , to feel that , with [her]302-roberta so near [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde was by no means concentrating on the various tasks before [him]201-clyde . [She]302-roberta was too enticing , too compelling in so many ways to [him]201-clyde . There was something so warm and gay and welcome about [her]302-roberta that [he]201-clyde felt that if [he]201-clyde could persuade [her]302-roberta to love [him]201-clyde [he]201-clyde would be among [the most fortunate of [men]445-men]2354-the most fortunate of men . Yet there was that rule , and although on [the lake]4706-the lake the day before [he]201-clyde had been deciding that [his]201-clyde position [here]4728-here was by no means as satisfactory as it should be , still with [Roberta]302-roberta in it , as now it seemed [she]302-roberta well might be , would it not be much more delightful for [him]201-clyde to stay ? Could [he]201-clyde not , for the time being at least , endure the further indifference of [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths ? And who knows , might [they]555-the griffiths not yet become interested in [him]201-clyde as [a suitable social figure]2359-a suitable social figure if only [he]201-clyde did nothing to offend [them]555-the griffiths ? And yet here [he]201-clyde was attempting to do exactly the thing [he]201-clyde had been forbidden to do . What kind of an injunction was this , anyhow , wherewith [Gilbert]200-gilbert had enjoined [him]201-clyde ? If [he]201-clyde could come to some understanding with [her]302-roberta , perhaps [she]302-roberta would meet [him]201-clyde in some clandestine way and thus obviate all possibility of criticism .

It was thus that [Clyde]201-clyde , seated at [his]201-clyde desk or walking about , was thinking . For now [his]201-clyde mind , even in the face of [his]201-clyde duties , was almost entirely engaged by [her]302-roberta , and [he]201-clyde could think of nothing else . [He]201-clyde had decided to suggest that [they]2360-they meet for the first time , if [she]302-roberta would , in [a small park which was just west of [the first outlying resort on [the Mohawk]44-the mohawk]2362-the first outlying resort on the mohawk]2361-a small park which was just west of the first outlying resort on the mohawk . But throughout the day , so close to [each other]1439-each other did [the girls]5027-the girls work , [he]201-clyde had no opportunity to communicate with [her]302-roberta . Indeed noontime came and [he]201-clyde went below to [his]201-clyde lunch , returning a little early in the hope of finding [her]302-roberta sufficiently detached to permit [him]201-clyde to whisper that [he]201-clyde wished to see [her]302-roberta somewhere . But [she]302-roberta was surrounded by [others]561-others at the time and so the entire afternoon went by without a single opportunity .

However , as [he]201-clyde was going out , [he]201-clyde bethought [him]201-clyde that if [he]201-clyde should chance to meet [her]302-roberta alone somewhere in [the street]1421-the street , [he]201-clyde would venture to speak to [her]302-roberta . For [she]302-roberta wanted [him]201-clyde to — that [he]201-clyde knew , regardless of what [she]302-roberta might say at any time . And [he]201-clyde must find some way that would appear as accidental and hence as innocent to [her]302-roberta as to [others]561-others . But as the whistle blew and [she]302-roberta left [the building]978-the building [she]302-roberta was joined by [another girl]2369-another girl , and [he]201-clyde was left to think of some other way .

That same evening , however , instead of lingering about [the Peyton house]2370-the peyton house or going to [a moving picture theater]928-a moving picture theater , as [he]201-clyde so often did now , or walking alone somewhere in order to allay [his]201-clyde unrest and loneliness , [he]201-clyde chose now instead to seek out [the home of [Roberta]302-roberta on [Taylor Street]63-taylor street]2372-the home of roberta on taylor street . [It]2372-the home of roberta on taylor street was not [a pleasing house]2373-a pleasing house , as [he]201-clyde now decided , not nearly so attractive as [Mrs. Cuppy]256-mrs. cuppy 's or [the house in which [he]201-clyde now dwelt]2374-the house in which he now dwelt . [It]2372-the home of roberta on taylor street was too old and brown , [the neighborhood]2375-the neighborhood too nondescript , if conservative . But the lights in [different rooms]2376-different rooms glowing at this early hour gave [it]2372-the home of roberta on taylor street a friendly and genial look . And the few trees in front were pleasant . What was [Roberta]302-roberta doing now ? Why could n't [she]302-roberta have waited for [him]201-clyde in [the factory]440-the factory ? Why could n't [she]302-roberta sense now that [he]201-clyde was outside and come out ? [He]201-clyde wished intensely that in some way [he]201-clyde could make [her]302-roberta feel that [he]201-clyde was out here , and so cause [her]302-roberta to come out . But [she]302-roberta did n't . On the contrary , [he]201-clyde observed [Mr. Shurlock]326-mr. shurlock issue forth and disappear toward [Central Avenue]43-central avenue . And , after that , [pedestrian]2378-pedestrian after [pedestrian]2378-pedestrian making [their]2380-their way out of [different houses along [the street]1421-the street]2381-different houses along the street and toward [Central]81-central , which caused [him]201-clyde to walk briskly about [the block]2383-the block in order to avoid being seen . At the same time [he]201-clyde sighed often , because it was such a fine night — a full moon rising about nine - thirty and hanging heavy and yellow over the chimney tops . [He]201-clyde was so lonely .

But at ten , the moon becoming too bright , and no [Roberta]302-roberta appearing , [he]201-clyde decided to leave . It was not wise to be hanging about [here]4728-here . But the night being so fine [he]201-clyde resented the thought of [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room and instead walked up and down [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue , looking at [the fine houses there]2386-the fine houses there — [his]201-clyde uncle [[Samuel]179-samuel griffiths 's among [them]2386-the fine houses there]2387-samuel 's among them . Now , [all [their]2386-the fine houses there occupants]2388-all their occupants were away at [[their]2388-all their occupants summer places]2389-their summer places . [The houses]1102-the houses were dark . And [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra and [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine and [all that company]2391-all that company — what were [they]1102-the houses doing on a night like this ? Where dancing ? Where speeding ? Where loving ? It was so hard to be poor , not to have money and position and to be able to do in life exactly as [you]2392-you wished .

And the next morning , more eager than usual , [he]201-clyde was out of [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton 's by six - forty - five , anxious to find some way of renewing [his]201-clyde attentions to [Roberta]302-roberta . For there was [that crowd of factory workers that proceeded north along [Central Avenue]43-central avenue]2393-that crowd of factory workers that proceeded north along central avenue . And [she]302-roberta would be a unit in [it]2393-that crowd of factory workers that proceeded north along central avenue , of course , at about 7.10 . But [his]201-clyde trip to [the factory]440-the factory was fruitless . For , after swallowing a cup of coffee at one of [the small restaurants near [the post - office]1181-the post - office and walking the length of [Central Avenue]43-central avenue]2395-the small restaurants near the post - office and walking the length of central avenue toward [the mill]888-the mill , and pausing at [a cigar store]4858-a cigar store to see if [Roberta]302-roberta should by any chance come along alone , [he]201-clyde was rewarded by the sight of [her]302-roberta with [Grace Marr]310-grace again . What [a wretched , crazy world]2399-a wretched , crazy world this was , [he]201-clyde at once decided , and how difficult it was in [this miserable town]2400-this miserable town for [anyone]2401-anyone to meet [anyone else]529-anyone else alone . [Everyone]2403-everyone , nearly , knew [everyone else]1537-everyone else . Besides , [Roberta]302-roberta knew that [he]201-clyde was trying to get a chance to talk to [her]302-roberta . Why should n't [she]302-roberta walk alone then ? [He]201-clyde had looked at [her]302-roberta enough yesterday . And yet here [she]302-roberta was walking with [Grace Marr]310-grace and appeared seemingly contented . What was the matter with [her]302-roberta anyhow ?

By the time [he]201-clyde reached [the factory]440-the factory [he]201-clyde was very sour . But the sight of [Roberta]302-roberta taking [her]302-roberta place at [her]302-roberta bench and tossing [him]201-clyde a genial " good morning "[4723-some one] with a cheerful smile , caused [him]201-clyde to feel better and that all was not lost .

It was three o'clock in the afternoon and a lull due to the afternoon heat , the fag of steadily continued work , and the flare of reflected light from [the river]950-the river outside was over all . The tap , tap , tap of metal stamps upon scores of collars at once — nearly always slightly audible above the hum and whirr of the sewing machines beyond was , if anything , weaker than usual . And there was [Ruza Nikoforitch]298-ruza nikoforitch , [Hoda Petkanas]318-hoda petkanas , [Martha Bordaloue]299-martha bordaloue , [Angelina Pitti]319-angelina pitti and [Lena Schlict]317-lena schlict , all joining in a song called " Sweethearts "[302-roberta] which [some one]4723-some one had started . And [Roberta]302-roberta , perpetually conscious of [Clyde]201-clyde 's eyes , as well as [his]201-clyde mood , was thinking how long it would be before [he]201-clyde would come around with some word in regard to something . For [she]302-roberta wished [him]201-clyde to — and because of [his]201-clyde whispered words of the day before , [she]302-roberta was sure that it would not be long , because [he]201-clyde would not be able to resist it . [His]201-clyde eyes the night before had told [her]302-roberta that . Yet because of the impediments of this situation [she]302-roberta knew that [he]201-clyde must be having a difficult time thinking of any way by which [he]201-clyde could say anything to [her]302-roberta . And still at certain moments [she]302-roberta was glad , for there were such moments when [she]302-roberta felt [she]302-roberta needed the security which the presence of [so many girls]1723-so many girls gave [her]302-roberta .

And as [she]302-roberta thought of all this , stamping at [her]302-roberta desk along with [the others]629-the others , [she]302-roberta suddenly discovered that a bundle of collars which [she]302-roberta had already stamped as sixteens were not of that size but smaller . [She]302-roberta looked at it quickly and nervously , then decided that there was but one thing to do — lay the bundle aside and await comment from one of [the foremen]2410-the foremen , including [Clyde]201-clyde , or take it directly to [him]201-clyde now — really the better way , because it prevented [any of [the foremen]2410-the foremen]2411-any of the foremen seeing it before [he]201-clyde did . That was what [all the girls]2413-all the girls did when [they]2413-all the girls made mistakes of any kind . And [all trained girls]2414-all trained girls were supposed to catch all possible errors of that kind .

And yet now and in the face of all [her]302-roberta very urgent desires [she]302-roberta hesitated , for this would take [her]302-roberta direct to [Clyde]201-clyde and give [him]201-clyde the opportunity [he]201-clyde was seeking . But , more terrifying , it was giving [her]302-roberta the opportunity [she]302-roberta was seeking . [She]302-roberta wavered between loyalty to [Clyde]201-clyde as [a superintendent]2415-a superintendent , loyalty to [her]302-roberta old conventions as opposed to [her]302-roberta new and dominating desire and [her]302-roberta repressed wish to have [Clyde]201-clyde speak to [her]302-roberta — then went over with the bundle and laid it on [his]201-clyde desk . But [her]302-roberta hands , as [she]302-roberta did so , trembled . [Her]302-roberta face was white — [her]302-roberta throat taut . At the moment , as it chanced , [he]201-clyde was almost vainly trying to calculate the scores of [the different girls]2416-the different girls from the stubs laid before [him]201-clyde , and was having a hard time of it because [his]201-clyde mind was not on what [he]201-clyde was doing . And then [he]201-clyde looked up . And there was [Roberta]302-roberta bending toward [him]201-clyde . [His]201-clyde nerves became very taut , [his]201-clyde throat and lips , dry , for here and now was [his]201-clyde opportunity . And , as [he]201-clyde could see , [Roberta]302-roberta was almost suffocating from the strain which [her]302-roberta daring and self - deception was putting upon [her]302-roberta nerves and heart .

" There 's been a distake "[302-roberta] ( [she]302-roberta meant to say mistake ) " in regard to this bundle [upstairs]575-upstairs , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta began . " [I]201-clyde did n't notice it either until [I]201-clyde 'd stamped nearly all of [them]5314-them . [They]5314-them 're fifteen - and - a - half and [I]201-clyde 've stamped nearly all of [them]5314-them sixteen . [I]201-clyde 'm sorry . "[201-clyde]

[Clyde]201-clyde noticed , as [she]302-roberta said this , that [she]302-roberta was trying to smile a little and appear calm , but [her]302-roberta cheeks were quite blanched and [her]302-roberta hands , particularly the one that held the bundle , trembled . On the instant [he]201-clyde realized that although loyalty and order were bringing [her]302-roberta with this mistake to [him]201-clyde , still there was more than that to it . In a weak , frightened , and yet love - driven way , [she]302-roberta was courting [him]201-clyde , giving [him]201-clyde the opportunity [he]201-clyde was seeking , wishing [him]201-clyde to take advantage of it . And [he]201-clyde , embarrassed and shaken for the moment by this sudden visitation , was still heartened and hardened into a kind of effrontery and gallantry such as [he]201-clyde had not felt as yet in regard to [her]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta was seeking [him]201-clyde — that was plain . [She]302-roberta was interested , and clever enough to make the occasion which permitted [him]201-clyde to speak . Wonderful ! The sweetness of [her]302-roberta daring .

" Oh , that 's all right , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said , pretending a courage and a daring in regard to [her]302-roberta which [he]201-clyde did not feel even now . " [I]201-clyde 'll just send [them]5315-them down to [the wash room]5316-the wash room and then [we]5317-we 'll see if [we]5317-we ca n't restamp [them]5315-them . It 's not [our]5317-we mistake , really . "[201-clyde]

[He]201-clyde smiled most warmly and [she]302-roberta met [his]201-clyde look with a repressed smile of [her]302-roberta own , already turning and fearing that [she]302-roberta had manifested too clearly what had brought [her]302-roberta .

" But do n't go , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde added quickly . " [I]201-clyde want to ask [you]302-roberta something . [I]201-clyde 've been trying to get a word with [you]302-roberta ever since Sunday . [I]201-clyde want [you]302-roberta to meet [me]201-clyde somewhere , will [you]302-roberta ? There 's a rule here that says [a head of [a department]5319-a department]5318-a head of a department ca n't have anything to do with [a girl who works for [him]5318-a head of a department]5320-a girl who works for him — outside [I]201-clyde mean . But [I]201-clyde want [you]302-roberta to see [me]201-clyde just the same , wo n't [you]302-roberta ? [You]302-roberta know , "[201-clyde] and [he]201-clyde smiled winsomely and coaxingly into [her]2417-her eyes , " [I]302-roberta 've been just nearly crazy over [you]302-roberta ever since [you]302-roberta came in [here]4728-here and [Sunday]327-sunday made it worse . And now [I]302-roberta 'm not going to let any old rule come between [me]302-roberta and [you]302-roberta , if [I]302-roberta can help it . Will [you]302-roberta ? "[302-roberta]

" Oh , [I]302-roberta do n't know whether [I]302-roberta can do that or not , "[302-roberta] replied [Roberta]302-roberta , who , now that [she]302-roberta had succeeded in accomplishing what [she]302-roberta had wished , was becoming terrorized by [her]302-roberta own daring . [She]302-roberta began looking around nervously and feeling that every eye in [the room]489-the room must be upon [her]302-roberta . " [I]302-roberta live with [Mr.]5322-mr. and [Mrs. Newton]320-mrs. newton , [[my]302-roberta friend 's sister and brother - in - law]5323-my friend 's sister and brother - in - law , [you]302-roberta know , and [they]5323-my friend 's sister and brother - in - law 're very strict . It is n't the same as if — "[302-roberta] [She]302-roberta was going to add " [I]201-clyde was [home]4793-home , "[201-clyde] but [Clyde]201-clyde interrupted [her]302-roberta .

" Oh , now please do n't say no , will [you]302-roberta ? Please do n't . [I]302-roberta want to see [you]302-roberta . [I]302-roberta do n't want to cause [you]302-roberta any trouble , that 's all . Otherwise [I]302-roberta 'd be glad to come round to [[your]302-roberta house]5325-your house . [You]302-roberta know how it is . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , no , [you]201-clyde must n't do that , "[302-roberta] cautioned [Roberta]302-roberta . " Not yet anyhow . "[201-clyde] [She]302-roberta was so confused that quite unconsciously [she]302-roberta was giving [Clyde]201-clyde to understand that [she]302-roberta was expecting [him]201-clyde to come around some time later .

" Well , "[201-clyde] smiled [Clyde]201-clyde , who could see that [she]302-roberta was yielding in part . " [We]5326-we could just walk out near the end of [some street]5327-some street here — [that street [you]302-roberta live in]5328-that street you live in , if [you]302-roberta wish . There are [no houses out there]5329-no houses out there . Or there 's [a little park — [Mohawk]44-the mohawk]5330-a little park — mohawk — just [west of [Dreamland]86-dreamland on [the Mohawk Street line]5332-the mohawk street line]5331-west of dreamland on the mohawk street line . [It]5330-a little park — mohawk 's right on [the river]950-the river . [You]302-roberta might come out there . [I]2419-she could meet [you]302-roberta where [the car]650-the car stops . Will [you]2419-she do that ? "[2419-she]

" Oh , [I]201-clyde 'd be afraid to do that [I]201-clyde think — go so far , [I]201-clyde mean . [I]201-clyde never did anything like that before . "[201-clyde] [She]2419-she looked so innocent and frank as [she]2419-she said this that [Clyde]201-clyde was quite carried away by the sweetness of [her]2419-she . And to think [he]201-clyde was making a clandestine appointment with [her]2419-she . " [I]2419-she 'm almost afraid to go anywhere here alone , [you]302-roberta know . [People]4823-people talk so here , [they]4823-people say , and [some one]4723-some one would be sure to see [me]2419-she . But — "[2419-she]

" Yes , but what ? "[2419-she]

" [I]201-clyde 'm afraid [I]201-clyde 'm staying too long at [your]302-roberta desk here , do n't [you]302-roberta think ? "[201-clyde] [She]2419-she actually gasped as [she]2419-she said it . And [Clyde]201-clyde realizing the openness of it , although there was really nothing very unusual about it , now spoke quickly and forcefully .

" Well , then , how about [the end of [that street]5338-that street [you]302-roberta live in]5337-the end of that street you live in ? Could n't [you]302-roberta come down [there]4705-there for just a little while to - night — a half hour or so , maybe ? "[2419-she]

" Oh , [I]2419-she could n't make it to - night , [I]2419-she think — not so soon . [I]2419-she 'll have to see first , [you]302-roberta know . Arrange , that is . But another day . "[2419-she] [She]2419-she was so excited and troubled by this great adventure of [hers]2419-she that [her]2419-she face , like [Clyde]201-clyde 's at times , changed from a half smile to a half frown without [her]2419-she realizing that it was registering these changes .

" Well , then , how about Wednesday night at eight - thirty or nine ? Could n't [you]201-clyde do that ? Please , now . "[2419-she]

[Roberta]302-roberta considered most sweetly , nervously . [Clyde]201-clyde was enormously fascinated by [her]2419-she manner at the moment , for [she]2419-she looked around , conscious , or so [she]2419-she seemed , that [she]2419-she was being observed and that [her]2419-she stay here for a first visit was very long .

" [I]201-clyde suppose [I]201-clyde 'd better be going back to [my]201-clyde work now , "[201-clyde] [she]2419-she replied without really answering [him]201-clyde .

" Wait a minute , "[201-clyde] pled [Clyde]201-clyde . " [We]5340-we have n't fixed on the time for Wednesday . Are n't [you]2419-she going to meet [me]2419-she ? Make it nine or eight - thirty , or any time [you]2419-she want to . [I]2419-she 'll be there waiting for [you]2419-she after eight if [you]2419-she wish . Will [you]2419-she ? "[2419-she]

" All right , then , say eight - thirty or between eight - thirty and nine , if [I]201-clyde can . Is that all right ? [I]201-clyde 'll come if [I]201-clyde can , [you]2419-she know , and if anything does happen [I]201-clyde 'll tell [you]2419-she the next morning , [you]2419-she see . "[201-clyde] [She]2419-she flushed and then looked around once more , a foolish , flustered look , then hurried back to [her]2419-she bench , fairly tingling from head to toe , and looking as guilty as though [she]2419-she had been caught red - handed in some dreadful crime . And [Clyde]201-clyde at [his]201-clyde desk was almost choking with excitement . The wonder of [her]2419-she agreeing , of [his]201-clyde talking to [her]2419-she like that , of [her]2419-she venturing to make a date with [him]201-clyde at all here in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , where [he]201-clyde was so well - known ! Thrilling !

For [her]2419-she part , [she]2419-she was thinking how wonderful it would be just to walk and talk with [him]201-clyde in the moonlight , to feel the pressure of [his]201-clyde arm and hear [his]201-clyde soft appealing voice .

It was quite dark when [Roberta]302-roberta stole out on Wednesday night to meet [Clyde]201-clyde . But before that what qualms and meditations in the face of [her]2419-she willingness and [her]2419-she agreement to do so . For not only was it difficult for [her]2419-she to overcome [her]2419-she own mental scruples within , but in addition there was all the trouble in connection with the commonplace and religious and narrow atmosphere in which [she]2419-she found [herself]2419-she imbedded at [the Newtons]313-the newtons ' . For since coming [here]4728-here [she]2419-she had scarcely gone anywhere without [Grace Marr]310-grace . Besides on this occasion — a thing [she]2419-she had forgotten in talking to [Clyde]201-clyde — [she]2419-she had agreed to go with [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [Grace]310-grace to [the Gideon Baptist Church]2421-the gideon baptist church , where a Wednesday prayer meeting was to be followed by a social with games , cake , tea and ice cream .

In consequence [she]2419-she was troubled severely as to how to manage , until it came back to [her]2419-she that a day or two before [Mr. Liggett]292-liggett , in noting how rapid and efficient [she]2419-she was , had observed that at any time [she]2419-she wanted to learn one phase of the stitching operations going on in [the next room]2167-the next room , [he]292-liggett would have [her]2419-she taken in hand by [Mrs. Braley]246-mrs. braley , who would teach [her]2419-she . And now that [Clyde]201-clyde 's invitation and this church affair fell on the same night , [she]2419-she decided to say that [she]2419-she had an appointment with [Mrs. Braley]246-mrs. braley at [[her]2419-she home]1450-her home . Only , as [she]2419-she also decided , [she]2419-she would wait until just before dinner Wednesday and then say that [Mrs. Braley]246-mrs. braley had invited [her]2419-she to come to [[her]2419-she house]2424-her house . Then [she]2419-she could see [Clyde]201-clyde . And by the time [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [Grace]310-grace returned [she]2419-she could be back . Oh , how it would feel to have [him]201-clyde talk to [her]2419-she — say again as [he]201-clyde did in [the boat]2311-the boat that [he]201-clyde never had seen [any one]4764-any one look so pretty as [she]2419-she did standing on [the bank]2306-the bank and looking for water lilies . Many , many thoughts — vague , dreadful , colorful , came to [her]2419-she — how and where [they]2428-they might go — be — do — from now on , if only [she]2419-she could arrange to be friends with [him]201-clyde without harm to [her]2419-she or [him]201-clyde . If need be , [she]2419-she now decided , [she]2419-she could resign from [the factory]440-the factory and get a place somewhere else — a change which would absolve [Clyde]201-clyde from any responsibility in regard to [her]2419-she .

There was , however , another mental as well as emotional phase in regard to all this and that related to [her]2419-she clothes . For since coming to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus [she]2419-she had learned that [the more intelligent girls]2430-the more intelligent girls [here]4728-here dressed better than did those about [Biltz]62-biltz and [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills . At the same time [she]2419-she had been sending a fair portion of [her]2419-she money to [[her]2419-she mother]447-her mother — sufficient to have equipped [her]2419-she exceptionally well , as [she]2419-she now realized , had [she]2419-she retained it . But now that [Clyde]201-clyde was swaying [her]2419-she so greatly [she]2419-she was troubled about [her]2419-she looks , and on the evening after [her]2419-she conversation with [him]201-clyde at [the mill]888-the mill , [she]2419-she had gone through [her]2419-she small wardrobe , fixing upon a soft blue hat which [Clyde]201-clyde had not yet seen , together with a checkered blue and white flannel skirt and a pair of white canvas shoes purchased the previous summer at [Biltz]62-biltz . [Her]2419-she plan was to wait until [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [Grace]310-grace had departed for [church]2434-church and then swiftly dress and leave .

At eight - thirty , when night had finally fallen , [she]2419-she went east along [Taylor]87-taylor to [Central Avenue]43-central avenue , then by a circuitous route made [her]2419-she way west again to [the trysting place]2435-the trysting place . And [Clyde]201-clyde was already there . Against an old wooden fence that enclosed [a five - acre cornfield]2436-a five - acre cornfield , [he]201-clyde was leaning and looking back toward [the interesting little city]2437-the interesting little city , the lights in so many of [the homes of which were aglow through the trees]2438-the homes of which were aglow through the trees . The air was laden with spices — the mingled fragrance of many grasses and flowers . There was a light wind stirring in the long swords of the corn at [his]201-clyde back — in the leaves of the trees overhead . And there were stars — the big dipper and the little dipper and the milky way — sidereal phenomena which [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother had pointed out to [him]201-clyde long ago .

And [he]201-clyde was thinking how different was [his]201-clyde position here to what it had been in [Kansas City]23-kansas city . There [he]201-clyde had been so nervous in regard to [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs or [any girl]2440-any girl , really — afraid almost to say a word to any of [them]2441-them . Whereas here , and especially since [he]201-clyde had had charge of [this stamping room]2442-this stamping room , [he]201-clyde had seemed to become aware of the fact that [he]201-clyde was more attractive than [he]201-clyde had ever thought [he]201-clyde was before . Also that [the girls]5027-the girls were attracted to [him]201-clyde and that [he]201-clyde was not so much afraid of [them]5027-the girls . The eyes of [Roberta]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta showed [him]201-clyde this day how much [she]302-roberta was drawn to [him]201-clyde . [She]302-roberta was [[his]201-clyde girl]2226-his girl . And when [she]302-roberta came , [he]201-clyde would put [his]201-clyde arms around [her]302-roberta and kiss [her]302-roberta . And [she]302-roberta would not be able to resist [him]201-clyde .

[He]201-clyde stood listening , dreaming and watching , the rustling corn behind [him]201-clyde stirring an old recollection in [him]201-clyde , when suddenly [he]201-clyde saw [her]302-roberta coming . [She]302-roberta looked trim and brisk and yet nervous , and paused at the street end and looked about like a frightened and cautious animal . At once [Clyde]201-clyde hurried forward toward [her]302-roberta and called softly : " Hello . [Gee]205-gee , it 's nice to have [you]302-roberta meet [me]302-roberta . Did [you]302-roberta have any trouble ? "[302-roberta] [He]201-clyde was thinking how much more pleasing [she]302-roberta was than either [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs or [Rita Dickerman]260-rita , [the one so calculating]2445-the one so calculating , [the other]5024-the other so sensually free and indiscriminate .

" Did [I]302-roberta have any trouble ? Oh , did n't [I]302-roberta though ? "[302-roberta] And at once [she]302-roberta plunged into a full and picturesque account , not only of the mistake in regard to [the Newtons]313-the newtons ' church night and [her]302-roberta engagement with [them]2447-them , but of a determination on the part of [Grace Marr]310-grace not to go to [the church social]2448-the church social without [her]302-roberta , and how [she]302-roberta had to fib , oh , so terribly , about going over to [Mrs. Braley]246-mrs. braley 's to learn to stitch — a Liggett - Roberta development of which [Clyde]201-clyde had heard nothing so far and concerning which [he]201-clyde was intensely curious , because at once it raised the thought that already [Liggett]292-liggett might be intending to remove [her]302-roberta from under [his]201-clyde care . [He]201-clyde proceeded to question [her]302-roberta about that before [he]201-clyde would let [her]302-roberta go on with [her]302-roberta story , an interest which [Roberta]302-roberta noticed and because of which [she]302-roberta was very pleased .

" But [I]201-clyde ca n't stay very long , [you]201-clyde know , "[201-clyde] [she]302-roberta explained briskly and warmly at the first opportunity , the while [Clyde]201-clyde laid hold of [her]302-roberta arm and turned toward [the river]950-the river , which was to [the north and untenanted this far out]2450-the north and untenanted this far out . " [The Baptist Church]5341-the baptist church socials never last much beyond ten - thirty or eleven , and [they]2451-they 'll be back soon . So [I]302-roberta 'll have to manage to be back before [they]2451-they are . "[302-roberta]

Then [she]302-roberta gave many reasons why it would be unwise for [her]302-roberta to be out after ten , reasons which annoyed yet convinced [Clyde]201-clyde by [their]2451-they wisdom . [He]201-clyde had been hoping to keep [her]302-roberta out longer . But seeing that the time was to be brief , [he]201-clyde was all the keener for a closer contact with [her]302-roberta now , and fell to complimenting [her]302-roberta on [her]302-roberta pretty hat and cape and how becoming [they]2451-they were . At once [he]201-clyde tried putting [his]201-clyde arm about [her]302-roberta waist , but feeling this to be a too swift advance [she]302-roberta removed [his]201-clyde arm , or tried to , saying in the softest and most coaxing voice " Now , now — that 's not nice , is it ? Ca n't [you]201-clyde just hold [my]201-clyde arm or let [me]201-clyde hold yours ? "[201-clyde] But [he]201-clyde noted , once [she]302-roberta persuaded [him]201-clyde to disengage [her]302-roberta waist , [she]302-roberta took [his]201-clyde arm in a clinging , snuggling embrace and measured [her]302-roberta stride to [his]201-clyde . On the instant [he]201-clyde was thinking how natural and unaffected [her]302-roberta manner was now that the ice between [them]2451-they had been broken .

And how [she]302-roberta went on babbling ! [She]302-roberta liked [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , only [she]302-roberta thought it was [the most religious town [she]302-roberta had ever been in — worse than [Biltz]62-biltz or [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills]2452-the most religious town she had ever been in — worse than biltz or trippetts mills that way . And then back to [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [Grace Marr]310-grace and how [they]2454-they watched [her]302-roberta every move . [Clyde]201-clyde was thinking as [she]302-roberta talked how different [she]302-roberta was from [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs or [Rita]260-rita , or [any other girl [he]201-clyde had ever known]2455-any other girl he had ever known — so much more simple and confiding — not in any way mushy as was [Rita]260-rita , or brash or vain or pretentious , as was [Hortense]220-hortense briggs , and yet really as pretty and so much sweeter . [He]201-clyde could not help thinking if [she]302-roberta were smartly dressed how sweet [she]302-roberta would be . And again [he]201-clyde was wondering what [she]302-roberta would think of [him]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde attitude toward [Hortense]220-hortense briggs in contrast to [his]201-clyde attitude toward [her]302-roberta now , if [she]302-roberta knew .

" [You]302-roberta know , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said at the very first opportunity , " [I]201-clyde 've been trying to talk to [you]302-roberta ever since [you]302-roberta came to work at [the factory]440-the factory but [you]302-roberta see how very watchful every one is . "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde squeezed [her]302-roberta arm affectionately , then stopped suddenly and , disengaging [his]201-clyde arm from [hers]302-roberta , put both [his]201-clyde about [her]302-roberta . " [You]302-roberta know , [Roberta]302-roberta , [I]302-roberta 'm crazy about [you]302-roberta . [I]302-roberta really am . [I]302-roberta think [you]302-roberta 're the dearest , sweetest thing . Oh , [Roberta]302-roberta , "[302-roberta] suddenly [he]201-clyde caught [her]302-roberta face between [his]201-clyde two hands and kissed [her]302-roberta , before really [she]302-roberta could evade [him]201-clyde . Then having done this [he]201-clyde held [her]302-roberta while [she]302-roberta resisted [him]201-clyde , although it was almost impossible for [her]302-roberta to do so . Instead [she]302-roberta felt as though [she]302-roberta wanted to put [her]302-roberta arms around [him]201-clyde or have [him]201-clyde hold [her]302-roberta tight , and this mood in regard to [him]201-clyde and [herself]302-roberta puzzled and troubled [her]302-roberta . It was awful . What would [people]4823-people think — say — if [they]4823-people knew ? [She]302-roberta was [a bad girl]2457-a bad girl , really , and yet [she]302-roberta wanted to be this way — near [him]201-clyde — now as never before .

" Oh , [you]201-clyde must n't , [Mr. Griffiths]201-clyde , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta pleaded . " [You]201-clyde really must n't , [you]201-clyde know . Please . "[302-roberta] [She]302-roberta looked about quite frightened , apparently , while [Clyde]201-clyde laughed ecstatically . [Life]329-life had presented [him]201-clyde a delicious sweet at last . " [You]201-clyde know [I]302-roberta never did anything like this before , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta went on . " [Honest]330-honest , [I]201-clyde did n't . Please . It 's only because [you]201-clyde said — "[201-clyde]

[Clyde]201-clyde was pressing [her]302-roberta close , not saying anything in reply — [his]201-clyde pale face and dark hungry eyes held very close to [hers]302-roberta . [He]201-clyde kissed [her]302-roberta again and again despite [her]302-roberta protests , [her]302-roberta little mouth and chin and cheeks seeming too beautiful — too irresistible — then murmured pleadingly , for [he]201-clyde was too overcome to speak vigorously .

" Oh , [Roberta]302-roberta , dearest , please , please , say that [you]302-roberta love [me]302-roberta . Please do ! [I]302-roberta know that [you]302-roberta do , [Roberta]302-roberta . [I]302-roberta can tell . Please , tell [me]302-roberta now . [I]302-roberta 'm crazy about [you]302-roberta . [We]5350-we have so little time . "[302-roberta]

[He]201-clyde kissed [her]302-roberta again upon the cheek and mouth , and suddenly [he]201-clyde felt [her]302-roberta relax . [She]302-roberta stood quite still and unresisting in [his]201-clyde arms . [He]201-clyde felt a wonder of something — [he]201-clyde could not tell what . All of a sudden [he]201-clyde felt tears upon [her]302-roberta face , [her]302-roberta head sunk to [his]201-clyde shoulder , and then [he]201-clyde heard [her]302-roberta say : " Yes , yes , yes . [I]201-clyde do love [you]201-clyde . Yes , yes . [I]201-clyde do . [I]201-clyde do . "[201-clyde]

There was a sob — half of misery , half of delight — in [her]302-roberta voice and [Clyde]201-clyde caught that . [He]201-clyde was so touched by [her]302-roberta honesty and simplicity that tears sprang to [his]201-clyde own eyes . " It 's all right , [Roberta]302-roberta . It 's all right . Please do n't cry . Oh , [I]310-grace think [you]302-roberta 're so sweet . [I]310-grace do . [I]310-grace do , [Roberta]302-roberta . "[310-grace]

[He]201-clyde looked up and before [him]201-clyde in the east over [the low roofs of [the city]477-the city]2458-the low roofs of the city was the thinnest , yellowest topmost arc of the rising July moon . It seemed at the moment as though life had given [him]201-clyde all — all — that [he]201-clyde could possibly ask of it .

The culmination of this meeting was but the prelude , as both [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta realized , to a series of contacts and rejoicings which were to extend over an indefinite period . [They]2460-they had found love . [They]2460-they were deliciously happy , whatever the problems attending its present realization might be . But the ways and means of continuing with it were a different matter . For not only was [her]302-roberta connection with [the Newtons]313-the newtons a bar to any normal procedure in so far as [Clyde]201-clyde was concerned , but [Grace Marr]310-grace [herself]310-grace offered a distinct and separate problem . Far more than [Roberta]302-roberta [she]310-grace was chained , not only by the defect of poor looks , but by the narrow teachings and domestic training of [her]310-grace early social and religious life . Yet [she]310-grace wanted to be gay and free , too . And in [Roberta]302-roberta , who , while gay and boastful at times , was still well within the conventions that chained [Grace]310-grace , [she]310-grace imagined that [she]310-grace saw one who was not so bound . And so it was that [she]302-roberta clung to [her]302-roberta closely and as [Roberta]302-roberta saw it a little wearisomely . [She]302-roberta imagined that [they]2460-they could exchange ideas and jests and confidences in regard to the love life and [their]2460-they respective dreams without injury to [each other]1439-each other . And to date this was [her]302-roberta one solace in an otherwise gray world .

But [Roberta]302-roberta , even before the arrival of [Clyde]201-clyde in [her]302-roberta life , did not want to be so clung to . It was a bore . And afterwards [she]302-roberta developed an inhibition in regard to [him]201-clyde where [Grace]310-grace was concerned . For [she]302-roberta not only knew that [Grace]310-grace would resent this sudden desertion , but also that [she]302-roberta had no desire to face out within [herself]302-roberta the sudden and revolutionary moods which now possessed [her]302-roberta . Having at once met and loved [him]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta was afraid to think what , if anything , [she]302-roberta proposed to permit [herself]302-roberta to do in regard to [him]201-clyde . Were not such contacts between the classes banned here ? [She]302-roberta knew [they]2462-they were . Hence [she]302-roberta did not care to talk about [him]201-clyde at all .

In consequence on Monday evening following the Sunday on [the lake]4706-the lake when [Grace]310-grace had inquired most gayly and familiarly after [Clyde]201-clyde , [Roberta]302-roberta had as instantly decided not to appear nearly as interested in [him]201-clyde as [Grace]310-grace might already be imagining . Accordingly , [she]302-roberta said little other than that [he]201-clyde was very pleasant to [her]302-roberta and had inquired after [Grace]310-grace , a remark which caused [the latter]546-the latter to eye [her]302-roberta slyly and to wonder if [she]310-grace were really telling what had happened since . " [He]201-clyde was so very friendly [I]302-roberta was beginning to think [he]201-clyde was struck on [you]302-roberta . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , what nonsense ! "[302-roberta] [Roberta]302-roberta replied shrewdly , and a bit alarmed . " Why , [he]201-clyde would n't look at [me]302-roberta . Besides , there 's a rule of [the company]990-the company that does n't permit [him]201-clyde to , as long as [I]302-roberta work [there]4705-there . "[302-roberta]

This last , more than anything else , served to allay [Grace]310-grace 's notions in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta , for [she]302-roberta was of that conventional turn of mind which would scarcely permit [her]302-roberta to think of any one infringing upon a company rule . Nevertheless [Roberta]302-roberta was nervous lest [Grace]310-grace should be associating [her]302-roberta and [Clyde]201-clyde in [her]302-roberta mind in some clandestine way , and [she]302-roberta decided to be doubly cautious in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde — to feign a distance [she]302-roberta did not feel .

But all this was preliminary to troubles and strains and fears which had nothing to do with what had gone before , but took [their]2465-their rise from difficulties which sprang up immediately afterwards . For once [she]302-roberta had come to this complete emotional understanding with [Clyde]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta saw no way of meeting [him]201-clyde except in this very clandestine way and that so very rarely and uncertainly that [she]302-roberta could not say when there was likely to be another meeting .

" [You]201-clyde see , it 's this way , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta explained to [Clyde]201-clyde when , a few evenings later , [she]302-roberta had managed to steal out for an hour and [they]2466-they walked from the region at [the end of [Taylor Street]63-taylor street]2467-the end of taylor street down to [the Mohawk]44-the mohawk , where were [some open fields]2468-some open fields and [a low bank rising above the pleasant river]2469-a low bank rising above the pleasant river . Immediately [Clyde]201-clyde sensed that [he]201-clyde was treading on dangerous ground and withdrew the suggestion because [he]201-clyde did not care to offend or frighten [her]302-roberta in any way . " Oh , well . Just as [you]201-clyde say . [I]302-roberta only thought since [you]201-clyde do n't seem to be able to think of any other way . "[302-roberta]

[Clyde]201-clyde shook [his]201-clyde head . A recollection of [his]201-clyde own youthful inhibitions caused [him]201-clyde to feel that perhaps it was not right for [him]201-clyde to have suggested it .

[They]2474-they returned in the direction of [Taylor Street]63-taylor street without , apart from the proposed trip to [Fonda]47-fonda , either having hit upon any definite solution . Instead , after kissing [her]302-roberta again and again and just before letting [her]302-roberta go , the best [he]201-clyde could suggest was that [both]874-both were to try and think of some way by which [they]2474-they could meet before , if possible . And [she]302-roberta , after throwing [her]302-roberta arms about [his]201-clyde neck for a moment , ran east along [Taylor Street]63-taylor street , [her]302-roberta little figure swaying in the moonlight .

However , apart from another evening meeting which was made possible by [Roberta]302-roberta 's announcing a second engagement with [Mrs. Braley]246-mrs. braley , there was no other encounter until the following Saturday when [Roberta]302-roberta departed for [Fonda]47-fonda . And [Clyde]201-clyde , having ascertained the exact hour , left by [the car ahead]2476-the car ahead , and joined [Roberta]302-roberta at [the first station west]2477-the first station west . From that point on until evening , when [she]302-roberta was compelled to take [the seven o'clock train]2478-the seven o'clock train , [they]2474-they were unspeakably happy together , loitering near [the little city]2479-the little city comparatively strange to [both]874-both .

For [outside of [Fonda]47-fonda]2481-outside of fonda a few miles [they]2474-they came to [a pleasure park called Starlight where , in addition to a few clap - trap pleasure concessions such as a ring of [captive aeroplanes]2483-captive aeroplanes]2482-a pleasure park called starlight where , in addition to a few clap - trap pleasure concessions such as a ring of captive aeroplanes , a Ferris wheel , a merry - go - round , [an old mill and a dance floor]2484-an old mill and a dance floor , was [a small lake with [boats]2191-boats]2485-a small lake with boats . [It]2485-a small lake with boats was after [its]2485-a small lake with boats fashion an idyllic spot with a little band - stand out on [an island near the center of [the lake]4706-the lake]2487-an island near the center of the lake and on the shore a grave and captive bear in a cage . Since coming to [Lycurgus Roberta]88-lycurgus roberta had not ventured to visit [any of [the rougher resorts near]2490-the rougher resorts near [there]4705-there]2489-any of the rougher resorts near there , which were very much like this , only much more strident . On sight of this both exclaimed : " Oh , look ! "[201-clyde] And [Clyde]201-clyde added at once : " Let 's get off here , will [you]302-roberta — shall [we]2492-we ? What do [you]302-roberta say ? [We]2492-we 're almost to [Fonda]47-fonda anyhow . And [we]2492-we can have more fun here . "[201-clyde]

At once [they]2492-we climbed down . And having disposed of [her]88-lycurgus roberta bag for the time being , [he]201-clyde led the way first to the stand of [a man who sold frankfurters]2493-a man who sold frankfurters . Then , since the merry - go - round was in full blast , nothing would do but that [Roberta]302-roberta should ride with [him]201-clyde . And in the gayest of moods , [they]2492-we climbed on , and [he]201-clyde placed [her]302-roberta on a zebra , and then stood close in order that [he]201-clyde might keep [his]201-clyde arm about [her]302-roberta , and both try to catch the brass ring . And as commonplace and noisy and gaudy as it all was , the fact that at last [he]201-clyde had [her]302-roberta all to [himself]201-clyde unseen , and [she]302-roberta [him]201-clyde , was sufficient to evoke in both a kind of ecstasy which was all out of proportion to the fragile , gimcrack scene . Round and round [they]2492-we spun on [the noisy , grinding machine]2494-the noisy , grinding machine , surveying now [a few idle pleasure seekers who were in boats upon [the lake]4706-the lake]2495-a few idle pleasure seekers who were in boats upon the lake , now [some who were flying round in [the gaudy green and white captive aeroplanes]2498-the gaudy green and white captive aeroplanes or turning upward and then down in the suspended cages of [the Ferris wheel]2499-the ferris wheel]2497-some who were flying round in the gaudy green and white captive aeroplanes or turning upward and then down in the suspended cages of the ferris wheel .

[Both]874-both looked at [the woods]2501-the woods and sky beyond [the lake]4706-the lake ; the idlers and [dancers]2503-dancers in [the dancing pavilion]2504-the dancing pavilion dreaming and thrilling , and then suddenly [Clyde]201-clyde asked : " [You]302-roberta dance , do n't [you]302-roberta , [Roberta]302-roberta ? "[302-roberta]

" Why , no , [I]201-clyde do n't , "[201-clyde] [she]302-roberta replied , a little sadly , for at the very moment [she]302-roberta had been looking at [the happy dancers]2505-the happy dancers rather ruefully and thinking how unfortunate it was that [she]302-roberta had never been allowed to dance . It might not be right or nice , perhaps — [[her]302-roberta own church]2506-her own church said it was not — but still , now that [they]2505-the happy dancers were [here]4728-here and in love like this — [these others]1409-these others looked so gay and happy — a pretty medley of colors moving round and round in the green and brown frame — it did not seem so bad to [her]302-roberta . Why should n't [people]4823-people dance , anyway ? [Girls like [herself]302-roberta]2510-girls like herself and [boys like [Clyde]201-clyde]2511-boys like clyde ? [[Her]302-roberta younger brother]2512-her younger brother and sister , in spite of the views of [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents , were already declaring that when the opportunity offered , [they]2505-the happy dancers were going to learn .

" Oh , is n't that too bad ! "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde exclaimed , thinking how delightful it would be to hold [Roberta]302-roberta in [his]201-clyde arms . " [We]2505-the happy dancers could have such fun now if [you]302-roberta could . [I]302-roberta could teach [you]302-roberta in a few minutes if [you]302-roberta wanted [me]302-roberta to . "[302-roberta]

" [I]302-roberta do n't know about that , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta replied quizzically , [her]302-roberta eyes showing that [his]201-clyde suggestion appealed to [her]302-roberta . " [I]201-clyde 'm not so clever that way . And [you]302-roberta know dancing is n't considered so very nice in [[my]201-clyde part of [the country]5374-the country]5373-my part of the country . And [[my]201-clyde church]5375-my church does n't approve of it , either . And [I]201-clyde know [[my]201-clyde parents]5376-my parents would n't like [me]201-clyde to . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , shucks , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde foolishly and gayly , " what nonsense , [Roberta]302-roberta . Why , [everybody]1330-everybody dances these days or nearly [everybody]1330-everybody . How can [you]302-roberta think there 's anything wrong with it ? "[302-roberta]

" Oh , [I]302-roberta know , "[302-roberta] replied [Roberta]302-roberta oddly and quaintly , " maybe [they]5376-my parents do in [your]201-clyde set . [I]201-clyde know [most of [those factory girls]5380-those factory girls]5379-most of those factory girls do , of course . And [I]201-clyde suppose where [you]201-clyde have money and position , everything 's right . But with [a girl like [me]201-clyde]5381-a girl like me , it 's different . [I]201-clyde do n't suppose [[your]201-clyde parents]5382-your parents were as strict as [mine]201-clyde , either . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , were n't [they]5382-your parents , though ? "[302-roberta] laughed [Clyde]201-clyde who had not failed to catch the " [your]201-clyde set "[201-clyde] ; also the " where [you]201-clyde have money and position . "[201-clyde]

" Well , that 's all [you]302-roberta know about it , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde went on . " [They]5382-your parents were as strict as [yours]302-roberta and stricter , [I]302-roberta 'll bet . But [I]302-roberta danced just the same . Why , there 's no harm in it , [Roberta]302-roberta . Come on , let [me]302-roberta teach [you]302-roberta . It 's wonderful , really . Wo n't [you]302-roberta , [dearest]5383-dearest ? "[302-roberta]

[He]201-clyde put [his]201-clyde arm around [her]2514-her and looked into [her]2514-her eyes and [she]2514-her half relented , quite weakened by [her]2514-her desire for [him]201-clyde .

Just then the merry - go - round stopped and without any plan or suggestion [they]2515-they seemed instinctively to drift to the side of [the pavilion]2203-the pavilion where [the dancers — not many but avid]2517-the dancers — not many but avid — were moving briskly around . Fox - trots and one - steps were being supplied by an orchestrelle of considerable size . At a turnstile , all the remaining portions of [the pavilion]2203-the pavilion being screened in , [a pretty concessionaire]2519-a pretty concessionaire was sitting and taking tickets — ten cents per dance per couple . But the color and the music and the motions of [the dancers]2520-the dancers gliding rhythmically here and there quite seized upon both [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta .

[The orchestrelle]2521-the orchestrelle stopped and [the dancers]2520-the dancers were coming out . But no sooner were [they]2515-they out than five - cent admission checks were once more sold for the new dance .

" [I]201-clyde do n't believe [I]201-clyde can , "[201-clyde] pleaded [Roberta]302-roberta , as [Clyde]201-clyde led [her]302-roberta to [the ticket - stile]2523-the ticket - stile . " [I]201-clyde 'm afraid [I]201-clyde 'm too awkward , maybe . [I]201-clyde never danced , [you]201-clyde know . "[201-clyde]

" [You]302-roberta awkward , [Roberta]302-roberta , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde exclaimed . " Oh , how crazy . Why , [you]302-roberta 're as graceful and pretty as [you]302-roberta can be . [You]302-roberta 'll see . [You]302-roberta 'll be [a wonderful dancer]5384-a wonderful dancer . "[201-clyde]

Already [he]201-clyde had paid the coin and [they]2515-they were inside .

Carried away by a bravado which was three - fourths [her]302-roberta conception of [him]201-clyde as [a member of [the Lycurgus upper crust and possessor of means and position]2525-the lycurgus upper crust and possessor of means and position]2524-a member of the lycurgus upper crust and possessor of means and position , [he]201-clyde led the way into a corner and began at once to illustrate the respective movements . They were not difficult and for [a girl of [Roberta]302-roberta]2526-a girl of roberta 's natural grace and zest , easy . Once the music started and [Clyde]201-clyde drew [her]302-roberta to [him]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta fell into the positions and steps without effort , and [they]2515-they moved rhythmically and instinctively together . It was the delightful sensation of being held by [him]201-clyde and guided here and there that so appealed to [her]302-roberta — the wonderful rhythm of [his]201-clyde body coinciding with [hers]302-roberta .

" Oh , [you]302-roberta darling , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde whispered . " Are n't [you]302-roberta [the dandy little dancer]5385-the dandy little dancer , though . [You]302-roberta 've caught on already . If [you]302-roberta are n't [the wonderful kid]5386-the wonderful kid . [I]2521-the orchestrelle can hardly believe it . "[2521-the orchestrelle]

[They]2515-they went about the floor once more , then a third time , before the music stopped and by the time it did , [Roberta]302-roberta was lost in a sense of delight such as had never come to [her]302-roberta before . To think [she]302-roberta had been dancing ! And it should be so wonderful ! And with [Clyde]201-clyde ! [He]201-clyde was so slim , graceful — quite the handsomest of any of [the young men on the floor]2527-the young men on the floor , [she]302-roberta thought . And [he]201-clyde , in turn , was now thinking that never had [he]201-clyde known [any one]4764-any one as sweet as [Roberta]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta was so gay and winsome and yielding . [She]302-roberta would not try to work [him]201-clyde for anything . And as for [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , well , [she]302-roberta had ignored [him]201-clyde and [he]201-clyde might as well dismiss [her]302-roberta from [his]201-clyde mind — and yet even here , and with [Roberta]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde could not quite forget [her]302-roberta .

At five - thirty when [the orchestrelle]2521-the orchestrelle was silenced for lack of [customers]2530-customers and a sign reading " Next Concert 7.30 "[332-miss feliss] hung up , [they]2531-they were still dancing . After that [they]2531-they went for an ice - cream soda , then for something to eat , and by then , so swiftly had sped the time , it was necessary to take [the very next car]2532-the very next car for [the depot at [Fonda]47-fonda]2533-the depot at fonda .

As [they]2531-they neared [this terminal]2534-this terminal , both [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta were full of schemes as to how [they]2531-they were to arrange for to - morrow . For [Roberta]302-roberta would be coming back then and if [she]302-roberta could arrange to leave [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister 's a little early Sunday [he]201-clyde could come over from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus to meet [her]302-roberta . [They]2531-they could linger around [Fonda]47-fonda until eleven at least , when [the last train]2536-the last train south from [Homer]66-homer was due . And pretending [she]302-roberta had arrived on that [they]2531-they could then , assuming there was [no one whom [they]2531-they knew on [the Lycurgus car]2538-the lycurgus car]2537-no one whom they knew on the lycurgus car , journey to [that city]444-that city .

And as arranged so [they]2531-they met . And in [the dark outlying streets of [that city]444-that city]2540-the dark outlying streets of that city , walked and talked and planned , and [Roberta]302-roberta told [Clyde]201-clyde something — though not much — of [[her]302-roberta home life at [Biltz]62-biltz]2542-her home life at biltz .

But the great thing , apart from [their]2531-they love for each other and its immediate expression in kisses and embraces , was the how and where of further contacts . [They]2531-they must find some way , only , really , as [Roberta]302-roberta saw it , [she]302-roberta must be the one to find the way , and that soon . For while [Clyde]201-clyde was obviously very impatient and eager to be with [her]302-roberta as much as possible , still [he]201-clyde did not appear to be very ready with suggestions — available ones .

But that , as [she]302-roberta also saw , was not easy . For the possibility of another visit to [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister in [Homer]66-homer or [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents in [Biltz]62-biltz was not even to be considered under a month . And apart from [them]2545-them what other excuses were there ? [[New friends]2546-new friends at [the factory]440-the factory]2547-new friends at the factory — [the post - office]1181-the post - office — [the library]626-the library — the Y. W. C. A.—all suggestions of [Clyde]201-clyde 's at the moment . But these spelled but an hour or two together at best , and [Clyde]201-clyde was thinking of other week - ends like this . And there were so few remaining summer week - ends .

The return of [Roberta]302-roberta and [Clyde]201-clyde , as well as [their]2551-they outing together , was quite unobserved , as [they]2551-they thought . On [the car]650-the car from [Fonda]47-fonda [they]2551-they recognized [no one]4713-no one . And at [the Newtons]313-the newtons ' [Grace]310-grace was already in bed . [She]310-grace merely awakened sufficiently to ask a few questions about the trip — and those were casual and indifferent . How was [[Roberta]302-roberta 's sister]2554-roberta 's sister ? Had [she]2554-roberta 's sister stayed all day in [Homer]66-homer or had [she]2554-roberta 's sister gone to [Biltz]62-biltz or [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills ? ( [Roberta]302-roberta explained that [she]302-roberta had remained at [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister 's . ) [She]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta must be going up pretty soon to see [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents at [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills . Then [she]302-roberta fell asleep .

But at dinner the next night [the Misses Opal Feliss]314-opal feliss and [Olive Pope]315-olive pope , who had been kept from the breakfast table by a too late return from [Fonda]47-fonda and [the very region in which [Roberta]302-roberta had spent Saturday afternoon]2557-the very region in which roberta had spent saturday afternoon , now seated [themselves]314-opal feliss and at once , as [Roberta]302-roberta entered , interjected a few genial and well - meant but , in so far as [Roberta]302-roberta was concerned , decidedly troubling observations .

" Oh , there [you]302-roberta are ! Look who 's back from [Starlight Park]89-starlight park . Howja like the dancing over there , [Miss Alden]303-miss alden ? [We]314-opal feliss saw [you]302-roberta , but [you]302-roberta did n't see [us]314-opal feliss . "[332-miss feliss] And before [Roberta]302-roberta had time to think what to reply , [Miss Feliss]332-miss feliss had added : " [We]314-opal feliss tried to get [your]302-roberta eye , but [you]302-roberta could n't see any one but [him]5387-him , [I]310-grace guess . [I]310-grace 'll say [you]302-roberta dance swell . "[310-grace]

At once [Roberta]302-roberta , who had never been on very intimate terms with [either of [these girls]1415-these girls]2558-either of these girls and who had neither the effrontery nor the wit to extricate [herself]302-roberta from so swift and complete and so unexpected an exposure , flushed . [She]302-roberta was all but speechless and merely stared , bethinking [her]302-roberta at once that [she]302-roberta had explained to [Grace]310-grace that [she]302-roberta was at [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister 's all day . And opposite sat [Grace]310-grace , looking directly at [her]302-roberta , [her]310-grace lips slightly parted as though [she]310-grace would exclaim : " Well , of all things ! And dancing ! [A man]4740-a man ! "[302-roberta] And at the head of the table , [George Newton]312-george newton , thin and meticulous and curious , [his]312-george newton sharp eyes and nose and pointed chin now turned in [her]302-roberta direction .
