But on the instant , realizing that [she]302-roberta must say something , [Roberta]302-roberta replied : " Oh , yes , that 's so . [I]302-roberta did go over there for a little while . [Some friends of [[my]302-roberta sister]4842-my sister 's]5389-some friends of my sister 's were coming over and [I]302-roberta went with [them]5389-some friends of my sister 's . "[302-roberta] [She]302-roberta was about to add , " [We]5391-we did n't stay very long , "[333-miss pope] but stopped [herself]302-roberta . For at that moment a certain fighting quality which [she]302-roberta had inherited from [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother , and which had asserted itself in the case of [Grace]310-grace before this , now came to [her]302-roberta rescue . After all , why should n't [she]302-roberta be at [Starlight Park]89-starlight park if [she]302-roberta chose ? And what right had [the Newtons]313-the newtons or [Grace]310-grace or anyone else to question [her]302-roberta for that matter ? [She]302-roberta was paying [her]302-roberta way . Nevertheless , as [she]302-roberta realized , [she]302-roberta had been caught in a deliberate lie and all because [she]302-roberta lived [here]4728-here and was constantly being questioned and looked after in regard to [her]302-roberta very least move . [Miss Pope]333-miss pope added curiously , " [I]302-roberta do n't suppose [he]5392-he 's [a Lycurgus boy]5393-a lycurgus boy . [I]302-roberta do n't remember ever seeing [him]5392-he around [here]4728-here . "[302-roberta]

" No , [he]5392-he is n't from here , "[310-grace] returned [Roberta]302-roberta shortly and coldly , for by now [she]302-roberta was fairly quivering with the realization that [she]302-roberta had been caught in a falsehood before [Grace]310-grace . Also that [Grace]310-grace would resent intensely this social secrecy and desertion of [her]310-grace . At once [she]302-roberta felt as though [she]302-roberta would like to get up from the table and leave and never return . But instead [she]302-roberta did [her]302-roberta best to compose [herself]302-roberta , and now gave [the two girls with whom [she]302-roberta had never been familiar]2563-the two girls with whom she had never been familiar , a steady look . At the same time [she]302-roberta looked at [Grace]310-grace and [Mr. Newton]334-mr. newton with defiance . If anything more were said [she]302-roberta proposed to give a fictitious name or two — [friends of [[her]302-roberta brother - in - law]2565-her brother - in - law in [Homer]66-homer]2564-friends of her brother - in - law in homer , or better yet to refuse to give any information whatsoever . Why should [she]302-roberta ?

Nevertheless , as [she]302-roberta learned later that evening , [she]302-roberta was not to be spared the refusing of it . [Grace]310-grace , coming to [[their]2566-their room]2567-their room immediately afterward , reproached [her]302-roberta with : " [I]302-roberta thought [you]302-roberta said [you]302-roberta stayed out at [[your]302-roberta sister]4809-your sister 's all the time [you]302-roberta were gone ? "[302-roberta]

" Well , what if [I]2568-i did say it ? "[2568-i] replied [Roberta]302-roberta defiantly and even bitterly , but without a word in extenuation , for [her]302-roberta thought was now that unquestionably [Grace]310-grace was pretending to catechize [her]302-roberta on moral grounds , whereas in reality the real source of [her]310-grace anger and pique was that [Roberta]302-roberta was slipping away from and hence neglecting [her]310-grace .

" Well , [you]310-grace do n't have to lie to [me]310-grace in order to go anywhere or see anybody without [me]310-grace in the future . [I]310-grace do n't want to go with [you]310-grace . And what 's more [I]310-grace do n't want to know where [you]310-grace go or who [you]310-grace go with . But [I]310-grace do wish [you]310-grace would n't tell [me]310-grace one thing and then have [George]312-george newton and [Mary]271-mary find out that it ai n't so , and that [you]310-grace 're just trying to slip away from [me]310-grace or that [I]310-grace 'm lying to [them]5396-them in order to protect [myself]310-grace . [I]310-grace do n't want [you]310-grace to put [me]310-grace in that position . "[310-grace]

[She]2568-i was very hurt and sad and contentious and [Roberta]302-roberta could see for [herself]302-roberta that there was no way out of this trying situation other than to move . [Grace]310-grace was [a leech]2569-a leech — [a hanger - on]2570-a hanger - on . [She]310-grace had no life of [her]310-grace own and could contrive none . As long as [she]310-grace was anywhere near [her]310-grace [she]310-grace would want to devote [herself]310-grace to [her]310-grace — to share [her]310-grace every thought and mood with [her]310-grace . And yet if [she]310-grace told [her]310-grace about [Clyde]201-clyde [she]310-grace would be shocked and critical and would unquestionably eventually turn on [her]310-grace or even expose [her]310-grace . So [she]310-grace merely replied : " Oh , well , have it that way if [you]310-grace want to . [I]320-mrs. newton do n't care . [I]320-mrs. newton do n't propose to tell anything unless [I]320-mrs. newton choose to . "[320-mrs. newton]

And at once [Grace]310-grace conceived the notion that [Roberta]302-roberta did not like [her]310-grace any more and would have nothing to do with [her]310-grace . [She]310-grace arose immediately and walked out of [the room]489-the room — [her]310-grace head very high and [her]310-grace spine very stiff . And [Roberta]302-roberta , realizing that [she]310-grace had made [an enemy of [her]310-grace]2572-an enemy of her , now wished that [she]302-roberta was out of [here]4728-here . [They]2574-they were all too narrow here anyway . [They]2574-they would never understand or tolerate this clandestine relationship with [Clyde]201-clyde — so necessary to [him]201-clyde apparently , as [he]201-clyde had explained — so troublesome and even disgraceful to [her]302-roberta from one point of view , and yet so precious . [She]302-roberta did love [him]201-clyde , so very , very much . And [she]302-roberta must now find some way to protect [herself]302-roberta and [him]201-clyde — move to [another room]2575-another room .

But that in this instance required almost more courage and decision than [she]302-roberta could muster . The anomalous and unprotected nature of [a room where [one]578-one was not known]2576-a room where one was not known . The look of it . Subsequent explanation to [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [sister]2579-sister maybe . Yet to remain [here]4728-here after this was all but impossible , too , for the attitude of [Grace]310-grace as well as [the Newtons]2051-the newtons — particularly [Mrs. Newton]320-mrs. newton , [[Grace]310-grace 's sister]2582-grace 's sister — was that of [the early Puritans]2583-the early puritans or Friends who had caught [a " brother "[302-roberta] or " sister "]5397-a " brother " or " sister "[201-clyde] in a great sin . [She]302-roberta was dancing — and secretly ! There was the presence of [that young man]2584-that young man not quite adequately explained by [her]302-roberta trip [home]4793-home , to say nothing of [her]302-roberta presence at [Starlight Park]89-starlight park . Besides , in [Roberta]302-roberta 's mind was the thought that under such definite espionage as must now follow , to say nothing of the unhappy and dictatorial attitude of [Grace]310-grace , [she]302-roberta would have small chance to be with [Clyde]201-clyde as much as [she]302-roberta now most intensely desired . And accordingly , after two days of unhappy thought and then a conference with [Clyde]201-clyde who was all for [her]302-roberta immediate independence in [a new room where [she]302-roberta would not be known or spied upon]2586-a new room where she would not be known or spied upon , [she]302-roberta proceeded to take an hour or two off ; and having fixed upon [the southeast section of [the city]477-the city]2587-the southeast section of the city as one most likely to be free from contact with either [the Newtons]313-the newtons or [those whom thus far [she]302-roberta had encountered at [the Newtons]313-the newtons ']2589-those whom thus far she had encountered at the newtons ' , [she]302-roberta inquired [there]4705-there , and after little more than an hour 's search found one place which pleased [her]302-roberta . This was in [an old brick house in [Elm Street]90-elm street]2591-an old brick house in elm street occupied by [an upholsterer]2592-an upholsterer and [[his]2592-an upholsterer wife]576-his wife and [two daughters]2594-two daughters , one [a local milliner]2595-a local milliner and [another still in school]2596-another still in school . [The room]489-the room offered was on the ground floor to the right of [a small front porch]2598-a small front porch and overlooking [the street]1421-the street . A door off [this same porch]2600-this same porch gave into [a living room which separated [this room]1054-this room from the other parts of [the house]532-the house]2601-a living room which separated this room from the other parts of the house and permitted ingress and egress without contact with [any other portion of [the house]532-the house]2604-any other portion of the house . And since [she]302-roberta was still moved to meet [Clyde]201-clyde clandestinely this as [she]302-roberta now saw was important .

Besides , as [she]302-roberta gathered from [her]302-roberta one conversation with [Mrs. Gilpin]335-mrs. gilpin , [the mother of [this family]828-this family]2606-the mother of this family , the character of [this home]1859-this home was neither so strict nor inquisitive as that of [the Newtons]313-the newtons . [Mrs. Gilpin]335-mrs. gilpin was large , passive , cleanly , not so very alert and about fifty . [She]335-mrs. gilpin informed [Roberta]302-roberta that as a rule [she]335-mrs. gilpin did n't care to take [boarders]2609-boarders or [roomers]2610-roomers at all , since [the family]433-the family had sufficient means to go on . However , since [the family]433-the family scarcely ever used [the front room]2613-the front room , which was rather set off from [the remainder of [the house]532-the house]2614-the remainder of the house , and since [[her]335-mrs. gilpin husband]614-her husband did not object , [she]335-mrs. gilpin had made up [her]335-mrs. gilpin mind to rent [it]532-the house . And again [she]335-mrs. gilpin preferred [some one who worked like [Roberta]302-roberta]2617-some one who worked like roberta — [a girl]2278-a girl , not [a man]4740-a man — and [one who would be glad to have [her]2620-one who would be glad to have her breakfast and dinner along with her family breakfast and dinner along with [[her]2620-one who would be glad to have her breakfast and dinner along with her family family]1607-her family]2620-one who would be glad to have her breakfast and dinner along with her family . Since [she]335-mrs. gilpin asked no questions as to [[her]335-mrs. gilpin family]1607-her family or connections , merely looking at [her]335-mrs. gilpin interestedly and seeming to be favorably impressed by [her]335-mrs. gilpin appearance , [Roberta]302-roberta gathered that here were no such standards as prevailed at [the Newtons]313-the newtons .

And yet what qualms in connection with the thought of moving thus . For about this entire clandestine procedure there hung , as [she]302-roberta saw it , a sense of something untoward and even sinful , and then on top of it all , quarreling and then breaking with [Grace Marr]310-grace , [[her]302-roberta one girl friend]2623-her one girl friend here thus far , and [the Newtons]313-the newtons on account of it , when , as [she]302-roberta well knew , it was entirely due to [Grace]310-grace that [she]310-grace was here at all . Supposing [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents or [[her]302-roberta sister in [Homer]66-homer]2625-her sister in homer should hear about this through [some one whom [Grace]310-grace knew and think strangely of [her]310-grace going off by [herself]310-grace in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus in this way]2626-some one whom grace knew and think strangely of her going off by herself in lycurgus in this way ? Was it right ? Was it possible that [she]302-roberta could do things like this — and so soon after [her]302-roberta coming [here]4728-here ? [She]302-roberta was beginning to feel as though [her]302-roberta hitherto impeccable standards were crumbling .

And yet there was [Clyde]201-clyde now . Could [she]302-roberta give [him]201-clyde up ?

After many emotional aches [she]302-roberta decided that [she]302-roberta could not . And accordingly after paying a deposit and arranging to occupy [the room]489-the room within the next few days , [she]302-roberta returned to [her]302-roberta work and after dinner the same evening announced to [Mrs. Newton]320-mrs. newton that [she]302-roberta was going to move . [Her]302-roberta premeditated explanation was that recently [she]302-roberta had been thinking of having [[her]302-roberta younger brother]2512-her younger brother and [sister]2579-sister come and live with [her]302-roberta and since [one or both]2631-one or both were likely to come soon , [she]302-roberta thought it best to prepare for [them]2631-one or both .

And [the Newtons]313-the newtons , as well as [Grace]310-grace , feeling that this was all due to the new connections which [Roberta]302-roberta had recently been making and which were tending to alienate [her]302-roberta from [Grace]310-grace , were now content to see [her]302-roberta go . Plainly [she]302-roberta was beginning to indulge in a type of adventure of which [they]2631-one or both could not approve . Also it was plain that [she]302-roberta was not going to prove as useful to [Grace]310-grace as [they]2631-one or both had at first imagined . Possibly [she]302-roberta knew what [she]302-roberta was doing . But more likely [she]302-roberta was being led astray by notions of a good time not consistent with the reserved life led by [her]302-roberta at [Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills .

And [Roberta]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta , once having made this move and settled [herself]302-roberta in this new atmosphere ( apart from the fact that it gave [her]302-roberta much greater freedom in connection with [Clyde]201-clyde ) was dubious as to [her]302-roberta present course . Perhaps — perhaps — [she]302-roberta had moved hastily and in anger and might be sorry . Still [she]302-roberta had done it now , and it could not be helped . So [she]302-roberta proposed to try it for a while .

To salve [her]302-roberta own conscience more than anything else , [she]302-roberta at once wrote [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister a very plausible version of why [she]302-roberta had been compelled to leave [the Newtons]313-the newtons . [Grace]310-grace had grown too possessive , domineering and selfish . It had become unendurable . However , [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother need not worry . [She]302-roberta was satisfactorily placed . [She]302-roberta had [a room to [herself]302-roberta]2635-a room to herself and could now entertain [Tom]225-tom and [Emily]336-emily or [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother or [Agnes]309-agnes , in case [they]2637-they should ever visit [her]302-roberta [here]4728-here . And [she]302-roberta would be able to introduce [them]2637-they to [the Gilpins whom [she]302-roberta proceeded to describe]2639-the gilpins whom she proceeded to describe .

Nevertheless , [her]302-roberta underlying thought in connection with all this , in so far as [Clyde]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde great passion for [her]302-roberta was concerned — and [hers]302-roberta for [him]201-clyde — was that [she]302-roberta was indeed trifling with fire and perhaps social disgrace into the bargain . For , although consciously at this time [she]302-roberta was scarcely willing to face the fact that [this room]1054-this room — [its]1054-this room geometric position in relation to the rest of [the house]532-the house — had been of the greatest import to [her]302-roberta at the time [she]302-roberta first saw [it]1054-this room , yet subconsciously [she]302-roberta knew it well enough . The course [she]302-roberta was pursuing was dangerous — that [she]302-roberta knew . And yet how , as [she]302-roberta now so often asked [herself]302-roberta at moments when [she]302-roberta was confronted by some desire which ran counter to [her]302-roberta sense of practicability and social morality , was [she]302-roberta to do ?

However , as both [Roberta]302-roberta and [Clyde]201-clyde soon found , after several weeks in which [they]2642-they met here and there , such spots as could be conveniently reached by interurban lines , there were still drawbacks and the principal of these related to the attitude of both [Roberta]302-roberta and [Clyde]201-clyde in regard to [this room]1054-this room , and what , if any , use of [it]1054-this room was to be made by [them]2642-they jointly . For in spite of the fact that thus far [Clyde]201-clyde had never openly agreed with [himself]201-clyde that [his]201-clyde intentions in relation to [Roberta]302-roberta were in any way different to those normally entertained by [any youth toward [any girl for whom [he]201-clyde had a conventional social regard]2645-any girl for whom he had a conventional social regard , still , now that [she]302-roberta had moved into [this room]1054-this room]2644-any youth toward any girl for whom he had a conventional social regard , still , now that she had moved into this room , there was that ineradicable and possibly censurable , yet very human and almost unescapable , desire for something more — the possibility of greater and greater intimacy with and control of [Roberta]302-roberta and [her]302-roberta thoughts and actions in everything so that in the end [she]302-roberta would be entirely [his]201-clyde . But how [his]201-clyde ? By way of marriage and the ordinary conventional and durable existence which thereafter must ordinarily ensue ? [He]201-clyde had never said so to [himself]201-clyde thus far . For in flirting with [her]302-roberta or [any girl of a lesser social position than that of the Griffiths]2647-any girl of a lesser social position than that of the griffiths [here]4728-here ( [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , for instance ) [he]201-clyde would not — and that largely due to the attitude of [[his]201-clyde newly - found relatives]2649-his newly - found relatives , [their]2649-his newly - found relatives very high position in [this city]904-this city — have deemed marriage advisable . And what would [they]2649-his newly - found relatives think if [they]2649-his newly - found relatives should come to know ? For socially , as [he]201-clyde saw [himself]201-clyde now , if not before coming here , [he]201-clyde was supposed to be above the type of [Roberta]302-roberta and should of course profit by that notion . Besides there were all those that knew [him]201-clyde here , at least to speak to . On the other hand , because of the very marked pull that [her]302-roberta temperament had for [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde had not been able to say for the time being that [she]302-roberta was not worthy of [him]201-clyde or that [he]201-clyde might not be happy in case it were possible or advisable for [him]201-clyde to marry [her]302-roberta .

And there was another thing now that tended to complicate matters . And that was that fall with its chilling winds and frosty nights was drawing near . Already it was near October first and most of [those out - of - door resorts which , up to the middle of September]2651-those out - of - door resorts which , up to the middle of september at least , had provided diversion , and that at [a fairly safe distance from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2652-a fairly safe distance from lycurgus , were already closed for the season . And dancing , except in [the halls of [the near - by cities]2654-the near - by cities]2653-the halls of the near - by cities and which , because of a mood of [hers]302-roberta in regard to [them]2654-the near - by cities , were unacceptable , was also for the time being done away with . As for [the churches]2655-the churches , moving pictures , and [restaurants of Lycurgus]2656-restaurants of lycurgus , how under the circumstances , owing to [Clyde]201-clyde 's position here , could [they]2657-they be seen in [them]2657-they ? [They]2657-they could not , as both reasoned between [them]2657-they . And so now , while [her]302-roberta movements were unrestrained , there was no place to go unless by some readjustment of [their]2657-they relations [he]201-clyde might be permitted to call on [her]302-roberta at the Gilpins ' . But that , as [he]201-clyde knew , [she]302-roberta would not think of and , at first , neither had [he]201-clyde the courage to suggest it .

However [they]2657-they were at a street - end one early October night about six weeks after [she]302-roberta had moved to [[her]302-roberta new room]2658-her new room . The stars were sharp . The air cool . The leaves were beginning to turn . [Roberta]302-roberta had returned to a three - quarter green - and - cream - striped winter coat that [she]302-roberta wore at this season of the year . [Her]302-roberta hat was brown , trimmed with brown leather and of a design that became [her]302-roberta . There had been kisses over and over — that same fever that had been dominating [them]2657-they continuously since first [they]2657-they met — only more pronounced if anything .

" It 's getting cold , is n't it ? "[201-clyde] It was [Clyde]201-clyde who spoke . And it was eleven o'clock and chill .

" Yes , [I]201-clyde should say it is . [I]201-clyde 'll soon have to get a heavier coat . "[201-clyde]

" [I]201-clyde do n't see how [we]2657-they are to do from now on , do [you]302-roberta ? There 's no place to go any more much , and it wo n't be very pleasant walking [the streets]2129-the streets this way every night . [You]302-roberta do n't suppose [we]2657-they could fix it so [I]201-clyde could call on [you]302-roberta at [the Gilpins]395-the gilpins ' once in a while , do [you]302-roberta ? It is n't the same there now as it was at [the Newtons]313-the newtons ' . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , [I]201-clyde know , but then [they]2657-they use [[their]2657-they sitting room]5399-their sitting room every night nearly until ten - thirty or eleven . And besides [[their]2657-they two girls]5400-their two girls are in and out all hours up to twelve , anyhow , and [they]5400-their two girls 're in [there]4705-there often . [I]201-clyde do n't see how [I]201-clyde can . Besides , [I]201-clyde thought [you]302-roberta said [you]302-roberta did n't want to have [any one]4764-any one see [you]302-roberta with [me]201-clyde that way , and if [you]302-roberta came [there]4705-there [I]201-clyde could n't help introducing [you]302-roberta . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , but [I]201-clyde do n't mean just that way , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde audaciously and yet with the feeling that [Roberta]302-roberta was much too squeamish and that it was high time [she]302-roberta was taking a somewhat more liberal attitude toward [him]201-clyde if [she]302-roberta cared for [him]201-clyde as much as [she]302-roberta appeared to : " Why would n't it be all right for [me]201-clyde to stop in for a little while ? [They]5404-they would n't need to know , would [they]5404-they ? "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde took out [his]201-clyde watch and discovered with the aid of a match that it was eleven - thirty . [He]201-clyde showed the time to [her]302-roberta . " There would n't be [anybody there]5405-anybody there now , would there ? "[201-clyde]

[She]302-roberta shook [her]302-roberta head in opposition . The thought not only terrified but sickened [her]302-roberta . [Clyde]201-clyde was getting very bold to even suggest anything like that . Besides this suggestion embodied in itself all the secret fears and compelling moods which hitherto , although actual in [herself]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta was still unwilling to face . There was something sinful , low , dreadful about it . [She]302-roberta would not . That was one thing sure . At the same time within [her]302-roberta was that overmastering urge of repressed and feared desire now knocking loudly for recognition .

" No , no , [I]302-roberta ca n't let [you]201-clyde do that . It would n't be right . [I]302-roberta do n't want to . [Some one]4723-some one might see [us]5407-us . [Somebody]4801-somebody might know [you]201-clyde . "[302-roberta] For the moment the moral repulsion was so great that unconsciously [she]302-roberta endeavored to relinquish [herself]302-roberta from [his]201-clyde embrace .

[Clyde]201-clyde sensed how deep was this sudden revolt . All the more was [he]201-clyde flagellated by the desire for possession of that which now [he]201-clyde half feared to be unobtainable . A dozen seductive excuses sprang to [his]201-clyde lips . " Oh , who would be likely to see [us]5407-us anyhow , at this time of night ? There is n't [any one around]5409-any one around . Why should n't [we]5407-us go [there]4705-there for a few moments if [we]5407-us want to ? [No one]4713-no one would be likely to hear [us]5407-us . [We]5407-us need n't talk so loud . There is n't [any one]4764-any one on [the street]1421-the street , even . Let 's walk by [the house]532-the house and see if [anybody]1510-anybody is up . "[201-clyde]

Since hitherto [she]302-roberta had not permitted [him]201-clyde to come within half a block of [the house]532-the house , [her]302-roberta protest was not only nervous but vigorous . Nevertheless on this occasion [Clyde]201-clyde was proving a little rebellious and [Roberta]302-roberta , standing somewhat in awe of [him]201-clyde as [[her]302-roberta superior]1955-her superior , as well as [[her]302-roberta lover]2661-her lover , was unable to prevent [their]2662-we walking within a few feet of [the house]532-the house where [they]2662-we stopped . Except for a barking dog there was not a sound to be heard anywhere . And in [the house]532-the house no light was visible .

" See , there 's [no one]4713-no one up , "[201-clyde] protested [Clyde]201-clyde reassuringly . " Why should n't [we]2662-we go in for a little while if [we]2662-we want to ? Who will know ? [We]2662-we need n't make any noise . Besides , what is wrong with it ? [Other people]5417-other people do it . It is n't such a terrible thing for [a girl]2278-a girl to take [a fellow]4852-a fellow to [[her]2278-a girl room]4766-her room if [she]2278-a girl wants to for a little while . "[2665-she]

" Oh , is n't it ? Well , maybe not in [your]201-clyde set . But [I]201-clyde know what 's right and [I]201-clyde do n't think that 's right and [I]201-clyde wo n't do it . "[201-clyde]

At once , as [she]2665-she said this , [Roberta]302-roberta 's heart gave a pained and weakening throb , for in saying so much [she]2665-she had exhibited more individuality and defiance than ever [he]201-clyde had seen or that [she]2665-she fancied [herself]2665-she capable of in connection with [him]201-clyde . It terrified [her]302-roberta not a little . Perhaps [he]201-clyde would not like [her]302-roberta so much now if [she]302-roberta were going to talk like that .

[His]201-clyde mood darkened immediately . Why did [she]302-roberta want to act so ? [She]302-roberta was too cautious , too afraid of anything that spelled a little life or pleasure . [Other girls]2325-other girls were not like that,—Rita , [those girls at [the factory]440-the factory]2667-those girls at the factory . [She]302-roberta pretended to love [him]201-clyde . [She]302-roberta did not object to [his]201-clyde holding [her]302-roberta in [his]201-clyde arms and kissing [her]302-roberta under a tree at the end of [the street]1421-the street . But when it came to anything slightly more private or intimate , [she]302-roberta could not bring [herself]302-roberta to agree . What kind of [a girl]2278-a girl was [she]302-roberta , anyhow ? What was the use of pursuing [her]302-roberta ? Was this to be another case of [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs with all [her]220-hortense briggs wiles and evasions ? Of course [Roberta]302-roberta was in no wise like [her]220-hortense briggs , but still [she]302-roberta was so stubborn .

Although [she]302-roberta could not see [his]201-clyde face [she]302-roberta knew [he]201-clyde was angry and quite for the first time in this way .

" All right , then , if [you]302-roberta do n't want to , [you]302-roberta do n't have to , "[201-clyde] came [his]201-clyde words and with decidedly a cold ring to them . " There are others places [I]302-roberta can go . [I]302-roberta notice [you]302-roberta never want to do anything [I]302-roberta want to do , though . [I]302-roberta 'd like to know how [you]302-roberta think [we]2671-we 're to do . [We]2671-we ca n't walk [the streets]2129-the streets every night . "[302-roberta] [His]201-clyde tone was gloomy and foreboding — more contentious and bitter than at any time ever between [them]2671-we . And [his]201-clyde references to other places shocked and frightened [Roberta]302-roberta — so much so that instantly almost [her]302-roberta own mood changed . [Those other girls in [[his]201-clyde own world]2673-his own world that no doubt [he]201-clyde saw from time to time]2672-those other girls in his own world that no doubt he saw from time to time ! [Those other girls at [the factory]440-the factory who were always trying to make eyes at [him]201-clyde]2674-those other girls at the factory who were always trying to make eyes at him ! [She]302-roberta had seen [them]2674-those other girls at the factory who were always trying to make eyes at him trying , and often . [That Ruza Nikoforitch]298-ruza nikoforitch — as coarse as [she]298-ruza nikoforitch was , but pretty , too . And that [Flora Brandt]337-flora brandt ! And [Martha Bordaloue]299-martha bordaloue — ugh ! To think that any one as nice as [he]201-clyde should be pursued by [such wretches as those]2676-such wretches as those . However , because of that , [she]302-roberta was fearful lest [he]201-clyde would think [her]302-roberta too difficult — some one without the experience or daring to which [he]201-clyde , in [[his]201-clyde superior world]2677-his superior world , was accustomed , and so turn to one of those . Then [she]302-roberta would lose [him]201-clyde . The thought terrified [her]302-roberta . Immediately from one of defiance [her]302-roberta attitude changed to one of pleading persuasion .

" Oh , please , [Clyde]201-clyde , do n't be mad with [me]302-roberta now , will [you]201-clyde ? [You]201-clyde know that [I]302-roberta would if [I]302-roberta could . [I]302-roberta ca n't do anything like that here . Ca n't [you]201-clyde see ? [You]201-clyde know that . Why , [they]5422-they 'd be sure to find out . And how would [you]201-clyde feel if [some one]4723-some one were to see [us]5424-we or recognize [you]201-clyde ? "[302-roberta] In a pleading way [she]302-roberta put one hand on [his]201-clyde arm , then about [his]201-clyde waist and [he]201-clyde could feel that in spite of [her]302-roberta sharp opposition the moment before , [she]302-roberta was very much concerned — painfully so . " Please do n't ask [me]201-clyde to , "[201-clyde] [she]302-roberta added in a begging tone .

" Well , what did [you]302-roberta want to leave [the Newtons]313-the newtons for then ? "[302-roberta] [he]201-clyde asked sullenly . " [I]302-roberta ca n't see where else [we]5424-we can go now if [you]302-roberta wo n't let [me]302-roberta come to see [you]302-roberta once in a while . [We]5424-we ca n't go any place else . "[302-roberta]

The thought gave [Roberta]302-roberta pause . Plainly this relationship was not to be held within conventional lines . At the same time [she]302-roberta did not see how [she]302-roberta could possibly comply . It was too unconventional — too unmoral — bad .

" [I]302-roberta thought [we]5424-we took it , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta said weakly and placatively , " just so that [we]5424-we could go places on Saturday and Sunday . "[302-roberta]

" But where can [we]5424-we go Saturday and Sunday now ? Everything 's closed . "[302-roberta]

Again [Roberta]302-roberta was checked by these unanswerable complexities which beleaguered [them]2678-them both and [she]302-roberta exclaimed futilely , " Oh , [I]302-roberta wish [I]302-roberta knew what to do . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , it would be easy enough if [you]302-roberta wanted to do it , but that 's always the way with [you]302-roberta , [you]302-roberta do n't want to . "[302-roberta]

[She]302-roberta stood there , the night wind shaking the drying whispering leaves . Distinctly the problem in connection with [him]2679-he that [she]302-roberta had been fearing this long while was upon [her]302-roberta . Could [she]302-roberta possibly , with all the right instruction that [she]302-roberta had had , now do as [he]2679-he suggested . [She]302-roberta was pulled and swayed by contending forces within [herself]302-roberta , strong and urgent in either case . In the one instance , however painful it was to [her]302-roberta moral and social mood , [she]302-roberta was moved to comply — in another to reject once and for all , any such , as [she]302-roberta saw it , bold and unnatural suggestion . Nevertheless , in spite of the latter and because of [her]302-roberta compelling affection [she]302-roberta could not do other than deal tenderly and pleadingly with [him]2679-he .

" [I]2679-he ca n't , [Clyde]201-clyde , [I]2679-he ca n't . [I]2679-he would if [I]2679-he could but [I]2679-he ca n't . It would n't be right . [I]2679-he would if [I]2679-he could make [myself]2679-he , but [I]2679-he ca n't . "[2679-he] [She]302-roberta looked up into [his]2679-he face , a pale oval in the dark , trying to see if [he]2679-he would not see , sympathize , be moved in [her]302-roberta favor . However , irritated by this plainly definite refusal , [he]2679-he was not now to be moved . All this , as [he]2679-he saw it , smacked of that long series of defeats which had accompanied [his]2679-he attentions to [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs . [He]2679-he was not going to stand for anything now like that , [you]2680-you bet . If this was the way [she]302-roberta was going to act , well let [her]302-roberta act so — but not with [him]2679-he . [He]2679-he could get plenty of [girls]894-girls now — lots of [them]894-girls — who would treat [him]2679-he better than this .

At once , and with an irritated shrug of the shoulders , as [she]302-roberta now saw , [he]2679-he turned and started to leave [her]302-roberta , saying as [he]2679-he did so , " Oh , that 's all right , if that 's the way [you]302-roberta feel about it . "[302-roberta] And [Roberta]302-roberta dumfounded and terrified , stood there .

" Please do n't , go , [Clyde]201-clyde . Please do n't leave [me]302-roberta , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta exclaimed suddenly and pathetically , [her]302-roberta defiance and courage undergoing a deep and sad change . " [I]2679-he do n't want [you]201-clyde to . [I]2679-he love [you]201-clyde so , [Clyde]201-clyde . [I]2679-he would if [I]2679-he could . [You]201-clyde know that . "[2679-he]

" Oh , yes , [I]302-roberta know , but [you]302-roberta need n't tell [me]302-roberta that "[302-roberta] ( it was [his]2679-he experience with [Hortense]220-hortense briggs and [Rita]260-rita that was prompting [him]2679-he to this attitude ) . With a twist [he]2679-he released [his]2679-he body from [her]302-roberta arm and started walking briskly down [the street]1421-the street in the dark .

And [Roberta]302-roberta , stricken by this sudden development which was so painful to [both]874-both , called , " [Clyde]201-clyde ! "[302-roberta] And then ran after [him]2679-he a little way , eager that [he]2679-he should pause and let [her]302-roberta plead with [him]2679-he more . But [he]2679-he did not return . Instead [he]2679-he went briskly on . And for the moment it was all [she]302-roberta could do to keep from following [him]2679-he and by sheer force , if need be , restrain [him]2679-he . [Her]302-roberta [Clyde]201-clyde ! And [she]302-roberta started running in [his]2679-he direction a little , but as suddenly stopped , checked for the moment by the begging , pleading , compromising attitude in which [she]302-roberta , for the first time , found [herself]302-roberta . For on the one hand all [her]302-roberta conventional training was now urging [her]302-roberta to stand firm — not to belittle [herself]302-roberta in this way — whereas on the other , all [her]302-roberta desires for love , understanding , companionship , urged [her]302-roberta to run after [him]2679-he before it was too late , and [he]2679-he was gone . [His]2679-he beautiful face , [his]2679-he beautiful hands . [His]2679-he eyes . And still the receding echo of [his]2679-he feet . And yet so binding were the conventions which had been urged upon [her]302-roberta up to this time that , though suffering horribly , a balance between the two forces was struck , and [she]302-roberta paused , feeling that [she]302-roberta could neither go forward nor stand still — understand or endure this sudden rift in [their]2684-their wonderful friendship .

Pain constricted [her]302-roberta heart and whitened [her]302-roberta lips . [She]302-roberta stood there numb and silent — unable to voice anything , even the name [Clyde]201-clyde which persistently arose as a call in [her]302-roberta throat . Instead [she]302-roberta was merely thinking , " Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde , please do n't go , [Clyde]201-clyde . Oh , please do n't go . "[302-roberta] And [he]2679-he was already out of hearing , walking briskly and grimly on , the click and echo of [his]2679-he receding steps falling less and less clearly on [her]302-roberta suffering ears .

It was the first flashing , blinding , bleeding stab of love for [her]302-roberta .

The state of [Roberta]302-roberta 's mind for that night is not easily to be described . For here was true and poignant love , and in youth true and poignant love is difficult to withstand . Besides it was coupled with the most stirring and grandiose illusions in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde 's local material and social condition — illusions which had little to do with anything [he]2679-he had done to build up , but were based rather on conjecture and gossip over which [he]2679-he had no control . And [[her]302-roberta own home]2685-her own home , as well as [her]302-roberta personal situation was so unfortunate — no promise of any kind save in [his]2679-he direction . And here [she]302-roberta was quarreling with [him]2679-he — sending [him]2679-he away angry . On the other hand was [he]2679-he not beginning to push too ardently toward those troublesome and no doubt dreadful liberties and familiarities which [her]302-roberta morally trained conscience would not permit [her]302-roberta to look upon as right ? How was [she]302-roberta to do now ? What to say ?

Now it was that [she]302-roberta said to [herself]302-roberta in the dark of [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , after having slowly and thoughtfully undressed and noiselessly crept into the large , old - fashioned bed . " No , [I]302-roberta wo n't do that . [I]302-roberta must n't . [I]302-roberta ca n't . [I]302-roberta will be [a bad girl]2457-a bad girl if [I]302-roberta do . [I]302-roberta should not do that for [him]2679-he even though [he]2679-he does want [me]302-roberta to , and should threaten to leave [me]302-roberta forever in case [I]302-roberta refuse . [He]2679-he should be ashamed to ask [me]302-roberta . "[302-roberta] And at the very same moment , or the next , [she]302-roberta would be asking [herself]302-roberta what else under the circumstances [they]2687-they were to do . For most certainly [Clyde]201-clyde was at least partially correct in [his]201-clyde contention that [they]2687-they had scarcely anywhere else [they]2687-they could go and not be recognized . How unfair was that rule of [the company]990-the company . And no doubt apart from that rule , [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths would think it beneath [him]201-clyde to be troubling with [her]302-roberta , as would no doubt [the Newtons]313-the newtons and [the Gilpins]2690-the gilpins for that matter , if [they]2687-they should hear and know who [he]201-clyde was . And if this information came to [their]2687-they knowledge it would injure [him]201-clyde and [her]302-roberta . And [she]302-roberta would not do anything that would injure [him]201-clyde — never .

One thing that occurred to [her]302-roberta at this point was that [she]302-roberta should get a place somewhere else so that this problem should be solved — a problem which at the moment seemed to have little to do with the more immediate and intimate one of desiring to enter [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room . But that would mean that [she]302-roberta would not see [him]201-clyde any more all day long — only at night . And then not every night by any means . And that caused [her]302-roberta to lay aside this thought of seeking [another place]2692-another place .

At the same time as [she]302-roberta now meditated the dawn would come to - morrow and there would be [Clyde]201-clyde at [the factory]440-the factory . And supposing that [he]201-clyde should not speak to [her]302-roberta nor [she]302-roberta to [him]201-clyde . Impossible ! Ridiculous ! Terrible ! The mere thought brought [her]302-roberta to a sitting posture in bed , where distractedly a vision of [Clyde]201-clyde looking indifferently and coldly upon [her]302-roberta came to [her]302-roberta .

On the instant [she]302-roberta was on [her]302-roberta feet and had turned on the one incandescent globe which dangled from the center of [the room]489-the room . [She]302-roberta went to the mirror hanging above the old walnut dresser in the corner and stared at [herself]302-roberta . Already [she]302-roberta imagined [she]302-roberta could see dark rings under [her]302-roberta eyes . [She]302-roberta felt numb and cold and now shook [her]302-roberta head in a helpless and distracted way . [He]201-clyde could n't be that mean . [He]201-clyde could n't be that cruel to [her]302-roberta now — could [he]201-clyde ? Oh , if [he]201-clyde but knew how difficult — how impossible was the thing [he]201-clyde was asking of [her]302-roberta ! Oh , if the day would only come so that [she]302-roberta could see [his]201-clyde face again ! Oh , if it were only another night so that [she]302-roberta could take [his]201-clyde hands in [hers]302-roberta — [his]201-clyde arm — feel [his]201-clyde arms about [her]302-roberta .

" [Clyde]201-clyde , [Clyde]201-clyde , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta exclaimed half aloud , " [you]201-clyde would n't do that to [me]302-roberta , would [you]201-clyde — [you]201-clyde could n't . "[302-roberta]

[She]302-roberta crossed to an old , faded and somewhat decrepit overstuffed chair which stood in the center of [the room]489-the room beside a small table whereon lay some nondescript books and magazines — the Saturday Evening Post , [Munsey]338-munsey 's , the Popular Science Monthly , [Bebe]339-bebe 's Garden Seeds , and to escape most distracting and searing thoughts , sat down , [her]302-roberta chin in [her]302-roberta hands , [her]302-roberta elbows planted on [her]302-roberta knees . But the painful thoughts continuing and a sense of chill overtaking [her]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta took a comforter off the bed and folded it about [her]302-roberta , then opened the seed catalogue — only to throw it down .

" No , no , no , [he]2696-he could n't do that to [me]224-ratterer , [he]2696-he would n't . "[224-ratterer] [She]302-roberta must not let [him]2696-he . Why , [he]2696-he had told [her]302-roberta over and over that [he]2696-he was crazy about [her]302-roberta — madly in love with [her]302-roberta . [They]2697-they had been to all these wonderful places together .

And now , without any real consciousness of [her]302-roberta movements , [she]302-roberta was moving from the chair to the edge of the bed , sitting with elbows on knees and chin in hands ; or [she]302-roberta was before the mirror or peering restlessly out into the dark to see if there were any trace of day . And at six , and six - thirty when the light was just breaking and it was nearing time to dress , [she]302-roberta was still up — in the chair , on the edge of the bed , in the corner before the mirror .

But [she]302-roberta had reached but one definite conclusion and that was that in some way [she]302-roberta must arrange not to have [Clyde]201-clyde leave [her]302-roberta . That must not be . There must be something that [she]302-roberta could say or do that would cause [him]201-clyde to love [her]302-roberta still — even if , even if — well , even if [she]302-roberta must let [him]201-clyde stop in [here]4728-here or somewhere from time to time — [some other room in [some other rooming house]2700-some other rooming house]2699-some other room in some other rooming house maybe , where [she]302-roberta could arrange in some way beforehand — say that [he]201-clyde was [[her]302-roberta brother]4719-her brother or something .

But the mood that dominated [Clyde]201-clyde was of a different nature . To have understood it correctly , the full measure and obstinacy and sullen contentiousness that had suddenly generated , [one]578-one would have had to return to [Kansas City]23-kansas city and the period in which [he]201-clyde had been so futilely dancing attendance upon [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs . Also [his]201-clyde having been compelled to give up [Rita,—yet]340-rita,—yet to no end . For , although the present conditions and situation were different , and [he]201-clyde had no moral authority wherewith to charge [Roberta]302-roberta with any such unfair treatment as [Hortense]220-hortense briggs had meted out to [him]201-clyde , still there was this other fact that [girls]894-girls — [all of [them]894-girls]643-all of them — were obviously stubborn and self - preservative , always setting [themselves]894-girls apart from and even above [the average man]2705-the average man and so wishing to compel [him]201-clyde to do a lot of things for [them]894-girls without [their]894-girls wishing to do anything in return . And had not [Ratterer]224-ratterer always told [him]201-clyde that in so far as [girls]894-girls were concerned [he]201-clyde was more or less of a fool — too easy — too eager to show [his]201-clyde hand and let [them]894-girls know that [he]201-clyde was struck on [them]894-girls . Whereas , as [Ratterer]224-ratterer had explained , [Clyde]201-clyde possessed the looks — the " goods"—and[302-roberta] why should [he]201-clyde always be trailing after [girls]894-girls unless [they]894-girls wanted [him]201-clyde very much . And this thought and compliment had impressed [him]201-clyde very much at that time . Only because of the fiascos in connection with [Hortense]220-hortense briggs and [Rita]260-rita [he]201-clyde was more earnest now . Yet here [he]201-clyde was again in danger of repeating or bringing upon [himself]201-clyde what had befallen [him]201-clyde in the case of [Hortense]220-hortense briggs and [Rita]260-rita .

At the same time [he]201-clyde was not without the self - incriminating thought that in seeking this , most distinctly [he]201-clyde was driving toward a relationship which was not legitimate and that would prove dangerous in the future . For , as [he]201-clyde now darkly and vaguely thought , if [he]201-clyde sought a relationship which [her]894-girls prejudices and [her]894-girls training would not permit [her]894-girls to look upon as anything but evil , was [he]201-clyde not thereby establishing in some form a claim on [her]894-girls part to some consideration from [him]201-clyde in the future which it might not be so easy for [him]201-clyde to ignore ? For after all [he]201-clyde was [the aggressor]2708-the aggressor — not [she]894-girls . And because of this , and whatever might follow in connection with it , might not [she]894-girls be in a position to demand more from [him]201-clyde than [he]201-clyde might be willing to give ? For was it [his]201-clyde intention to marry [her]894-girls ? In the back of [his]201-clyde mind there lurked something which even now assured [him]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde would never desire to marry [her]894-girls — could not in the face of [his]201-clyde high family connections here . Therefore should [he]201-clyde proceed to demand — or should [he]201-clyde not ? And if [he]201-clyde did , could [he]201-clyde avoid that which would preclude any claim in the future ?

[He]201-clyde did not thus so distinctly voice [his]201-clyde inmost feelings to [himself]201-clyde , but relatively of such was their nature . Yet so great was the temperamental and physical enticement of [Roberta]302-roberta that in spite of a warning nudge or mood that seemed to hint that it was dangerous for [him]201-clyde to persist in [his]201-clyde demand , [he]201-clyde kept saying to [himself]201-clyde that unless [she]302-roberta would permit [him]201-clyde to [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , [he]201-clyde would not have anything more to do with [her]302-roberta , the desire for [her]302-roberta being all but overpowering .

This contest which every primary union between [the sexes]2710-the sexes , whether with or without marriage implies , was fought out the next day in [the factory]440-the factory . And yet without a word on either side . For [Clyde]201-clyde , although [he]201-clyde considered [himself]201-clyde to be deeply in love with [Roberta]302-roberta , was still not so deeply involved but that a naturally selfish and ambitious and seeking disposition would in this instance stand its ground and master any impulse . And [he]201-clyde was determined to take the attitude of [one who had been injured]2712-one who had been injured and was determined not to be [friends]451-friends any more or yield in any way unless some concession on [her]2712-one who had been injured part , such as would appease [him]201-clyde , was made .

And in consequence [he]201-clyde came into [the stamping department]2714-the stamping department that morning with the face and air of one who was vastly preoccupied with matters which had little , if anything , to do with what had occurred the night before . Yet , being far from certain that this attitude on [his]201-clyde part was likely to lead to anything but defeat , [he]201-clyde was inwardly depressed and awry . For , after all , the sight of [Roberta]302-roberta , freshly arrived , and although pale and distrait , as charming and energetic as ever , was not calculated to assure [him]201-clyde of any immediate or even ultimate victory . And knowing [her]302-roberta as well as [he]201-clyde thought [he]201-clyde did , by now , [he]201-clyde was but weakly sustained by the thought that [she]302-roberta might yield .

[He]201-clyde looked at [her]302-roberta repeatedly when [she]302-roberta was not looking . And when in turn [she]302-roberta looked at [him]201-clyde repeatedly , but only at first when [he]201-clyde was not looking , later when [she]302-roberta felt satisfied that [his]201-clyde eyes , whether directly bent on [her]302-roberta or not , must be encompassing [her]302-roberta , still no trace of recognition could [she]302-roberta extract . And now to [her]302-roberta bitter disappointment , not only did [he]201-clyde choose to ignore [her]302-roberta , but quite for the first time since [they]2715-they had been so interested in [each other]1439-each other , [he]201-clyde professed to pay , if not exactly conspicuous at least noticeable and intentional attention to [those other girls who were always so interested in [him]201-clyde and who always , as [she]302-roberta had been constantly imagining , were but waiting for any slight overture on [his]201-clyde part , to yield [themselves]2717-those other girls who were always so interested in him and who always , as she had been constantly imagining , were but waiting for any slight overture on his part , to yield themselves to him in any way that he might dictate to [him]201-clyde in any way that [he]201-clyde might dictate]2717-those other girls who were always so interested in him and who always , as she had been constantly imagining , were but waiting for any slight overture on his part , to yield themselves to him in any way that he might dictate .

Now [he]201-clyde was looking over the shoulder of [Ruza Nikoforitch]298-ruza nikoforitch , [her]298-ruza nikoforitch plump face with its snub nose and weak chin turned engagingly toward [him]201-clyde , and [he]201-clyde commenting on something not particularly connected with the work in hand apparently , for [both]874-both were idly smiling . Again , in a little while , [he]201-clyde was by the side of [Martha Bordaloue]299-martha bordaloue , [her]299-martha bordaloue plump French shoulders and arms bare to the pits next to [his]201-clyde . And for all [her]299-martha bordaloue fleshy solidity and decidedly foreign flavor , there was still enough about [her]299-martha bordaloue which [most men]2719-most men would like . And with [her]299-martha bordaloue [Clyde]201-clyde was attempting to jest , too .

And later it was [Flora Brandt]337-flora brandt , [the very sensuous and not unpleasing American girl whom [Roberta]302-roberta had seen [Clyde]201-clyde cultivating from time to time]2720-the very sensuous and not unpleasing american girl whom roberta had seen clyde cultivating from time to time . Yet , even so , [she]302-roberta had never been willing to believe that [he]201-clyde might become interested in any of these . Not [Clyde]201-clyde , surely .

And yet [he]201-clyde could not see [her]302-roberta at all now — could not find time to say a single word , although all these pleasant words and gay looks for [all these others]2721-all these others . Oh , how bitter ! Oh , how cruel ! And how utterly [she]302-roberta despised [those other girls]2722-those other girls with [[their]2722-those other girls oglings]2723-their oglings and [their]2722-those other girls open attempts to take [him]201-clyde from [her]302-roberta . Oh , how terrible . Surely [he]201-clyde must be very opposed to [her]302-roberta now — otherwise [he]201-clyde could not do this , and especially after all that had been between [them]2724-them — the love — the kisses .

The hours dragged for both , and with as much poignance for [Clyde]201-clyde as for [Roberta]302-roberta . For [his]201-clyde was a feverish , urgent disposition where [his]201-clyde dreams were concerned , and could ill brook the delay or disappointments that are the chief and outstanding characteristics of the ambitions of [men]445-men , whatever [their]445-men nature . [He]201-clyde was tortured hourly by the thought that [he]201-clyde was to lose [Roberta]302-roberta or that to win [her]302-roberta back [he]201-clyde would have to succumb to [her]302-roberta wishes .

And on [her]302-roberta part [she]302-roberta was torn , not so much by the question as to whether [she]302-roberta would have to yield in this matter ( for by now that was almost the least of [her]302-roberta worries ) , but whether , once so yielding , [Clyde]201-clyde would be satisfied with just some form of guarded social contact in [the room]489-the room — or not . And so continue on the strength of that to be friends with [her]302-roberta . For more than this [she]302-roberta would not grant — never . And yet — this suspense . The misery of [his]201-clyde indifference . [She]302-roberta could scarcely endure it from minute to minute , let alone from hour to hour , and finally in an agony of dissatisfaction with [herself]302-roberta at having brought all this on [herself]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta retired to [the rest room]1914-the rest room at about three in the afternoon and there with the aid of a piece of paper found on the floor and a small bit of pencil which [she]302-roberta had , [she]302-roberta composed a brief note :

" Please , [Clyde]201-clyde , do n't be mad at [me]302-roberta , will [you]201-clyde ? Please do n't . Please look at [me]302-roberta and speak to [me]302-roberta , wo n't [you]201-clyde ? [I]302-roberta 'm so sorry about last night , really [I]302-roberta am — terribly . And [I]302-roberta must see [you]201-clyde to - night at the end of [Elm Street]90-elm street at 8:30 if [you]201-clyde can , will [you]201-clyde ? [I]302-roberta have something to tell [you]201-clyde . Please do come . And please do look at [me]302-roberta and tell [me]302-roberta [you]201-clyde will , even though [you]201-clyde are angry . [You]201-clyde wo n't be sorry . [I]302-roberta love [you]201-clyde so . [You]201-clyde know [I]302-roberta do .[302-roberta]

" [Your]201-clyde sorrowful ,[2729-her]

" [ROBERTA]302-roberta . "[201-clyde] And in the spirit of [one who is in agonized search for an opiate]2728-one who is in agonized search for an opiate , [she]2729-her folded up the paper and returning to [the room]489-the room , drew close to [Clyde]201-clyde 's desk . [He]201-clyde was before it at the time , bent over some slips . And quickly as [she]2729-her passed [she]2729-her dropped the paper between [his]201-clyde hands . [He]201-clyde looked up instantly , [his]201-clyde dark eyes still hard at the moment with the mingled pain and unrest and dissatisfaction and determination that had been upon [him]201-clyde all day , and noting [Roberta]302-roberta 's retreating figure as well as the note , [he]201-clyde at once relaxed , a wave of puzzled satisfaction as well as delight instantly filled [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde opened it and read . And as instantly [his]201-clyde body was suffused with a warm and yet very weakening ray .

And [Roberta]302-roberta in turn , having reached [her]302-roberta table and paused to note if by any chance [any one]4764-any one had observed [her]302-roberta , now looked cautiously about , a strained and nervous look in [her]302-roberta eyes . But seeing [Clyde]201-clyde looking directly at [her]2729-her , [his]201-clyde eyes filled with a conquering and yet yielding light and a smile upon [his]201-clyde lips , and [his]201-clyde head nodding a happy assent , [she]2729-her as suddenly experienced a dizzying sensation , as though [her]2729-her hitherto constricted blood , detained by a constricted heart and constricted nerves , were as suddenly set free . And all the dry marshes and cracked and parched banks of [her]2729-her soul — the dry rivulets and streams and lakes of misery that seemed to dot [her]2729-her being — were as instantly flooded with this rich upwelling force of life and love .

[He]201-clyde would meet [her]2729-her . [They]2732-they would meet to - night . [He]201-clyde would put [his]201-clyde arms around [her]2729-her and kiss [her]2729-her as before . [She]2729-her would be able to look in [his]201-clyde eyes . [They]2732-they would not quarrel any more — oh , never if [she]2729-her could help it .

The wonder and , delight of a new and more intimate form of contact , of protest gainsaid , of scruples overcome ! Days , when both , having struggled in vain against the greater intimacy which [each]2733-each knew that [the other]5024-the other was desirous of yielding to , and eventually so yielding , looked forward to the approaching night with an eagerness which was as a fever embodying a fear . For with what qualms — what protests on the part of [Roberta]302-roberta ; what determination , yet not without a sense of evil — seduction — betrayal , on the part of [Clyde]201-clyde . Yet the thing once done , a wild convulsive pleasure motivating both . Yet , not without , before all this , an exaction on the part of [Roberta]302-roberta to the effect that never — come what might ( the natural consequences of so wild an intimacy strong in [her]2729-her thoughts ) would [he]201-clyde desert [her]2729-her , since without [his]201-clyde aid [she]2729-her would be helpless . Yet , with no direct statement as to marriage . And [he]201-clyde , so completely overcome and swayed by [his]201-clyde desire , thoughtlessly protesting that [he]201-clyde never would — never . [She]2729-her might depend on that , at least , although even then there was no thought in [his]201-clyde mind of marriage . [He]201-clyde would not do that . Yet nights and nights — all scruples for the time being abandoned , and however much by day [Roberta]302-roberta might brood and condemn [herself]302-roberta — when each yielded to [the other]5024-the other completely . And dreamed thereafter , recklessly and wildly , of the joy of it — wishing from day to day for the time being that the long day might end — that the concealing , rewarding feverish night were at hand .

And [Clyde]201-clyde feeling , and not unlike [Roberta]302-roberta , who was firmly and even painfully convinced of it , that this was sin — deadly , mortal — since both [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother and [father]435-father had so often emphasized that — the seducer — [adulterer — who preys outside the sacred precincts of marriage]2738-adulterer — who preys outside the sacred precincts of marriage . And [Roberta]302-roberta , peering nervously into the blank future , wondering what — how , in any case , by any chance , [Clyde]201-clyde should change , or fail [her]302-roberta . Yet the night returning , [her]302-roberta mood once more veering , and [she]302-roberta as well as [he]201-clyde hurrying to meet somewhere — only later , in the silence of the middle night , to slip into [this unlighted room]2739-this unlighted room which was proving so much more of a Paradise than either might ever know again — so wild and unrecapturable is the fever of youth .

And — at times — and despite all [his]201-clyde other doubts and fears , [Clyde]201-clyde , because of this sudden abandonment by [Roberta]302-roberta of [herself]302-roberta to [his]201-clyde desires , feeling for the first time , really , in all [his]201-clyde feverish years , that at last [he]201-clyde was [a man of [the world]4755-the world]2740-a man of the world — one who was truly beginning to know [women]467-women . And so taking to [himself]201-clyde an air or manner that said as plainly as might have any words—"Behold [I]2813-the chauffeur am no longer [the inexperienced , neglected simpleton of but a few weeks ago]5426-the inexperienced , neglected simpleton of but a few weeks ago , but [an individual of import]5427-an individual of import now — [some one who knows something about life]5428-some one who knows something about life . What have any of [these strutting young men]5429-these strutting young men , and gay , coaxing , [flirting girls all about [me]2813-the chauffeur]5430-flirting girls all about me , that [I]2813-the chauffeur have not ? And if [I]2813-the chauffeur chose — were less loyal than [I]2813-the chauffeur am — what might [I]2813-the chauffeur not do ? "[2813-the chauffeur] And this was proving to [him]201-clyde that the notion which [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs , to say nothing of the more recent fiasco in connection with [Rita]260-rita had tended to build up in [his]201-clyde mind , [i.e.]2743-i.e. ,—that [he]201-clyde was either unsuccessful or ill - fated where [girls]894-girls were concerned was false . [He]201-clyde was after all and despite various failures and inhibitions [a youth of [the Don Juan]341-the don juan or [Lothario stripe]342-lothario stripe]2745-a youth of the don juan or lothario stripe .

And if now [Roberta]302-roberta was obviously willing to sacrifice [herself]302-roberta for [him]201-clyde in this fashion , must there not be [others]561-others ?

And this , in spite of the present indifference of [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths , caused [him]201-clyde to walk with even more of an air than had hitherto characterized [him]201-clyde . Even though neither [they]2748-they nor [any of those connected with [them]2748-they]2749-any of those connected with them recognized [him]201-clyde , still [he]201-clyde looked at [himself]201-clyde in [his]201-clyde mirror from time to time with an assurance and admiration which before this [he]201-clyde had never possessed . For now [Roberta]302-roberta , feeling that [her]302-roberta future was really dependent on [his]201-clyde will and whim , had set [herself]302-roberta to flatter [him]201-clyde almost constantly , to be as obliging and convenient to [him]201-clyde as possible . Indeed , according to [her]302-roberta notion of the proper order of life , [she]302-roberta was now [his]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde only , as much as [any wife]2750-any wife is ever to [a husband]2751-a husband , to do with as [he]201-clyde wished .

And for a time therefore , [Clyde]201-clyde forgot [his]201-clyde rather neglected state here and was content to devote [himself]201-clyde to [her]302-roberta without thinking much of the future . The one thing that did trouble [him]201-clyde at times was the thought that possibly , in connection with the original fear [she]302-roberta had expressed to [him]201-clyde , something might go wrong , which , considering [her]302-roberta exclusive devotion to [him]201-clyde , might prove embarrassing . At the same time [he]201-clyde did not trouble to speculate too deeply as to that . [He]201-clyde had [Roberta]302-roberta now . These relations , in so far as either of [them]2752-them could see , or guess , were a dark secret . The pleasures of [this left - handed honeymoon]2753-this left - handed honeymoon were at full tide . And [the remaining brisk and often sunshiny and warm November]2754-the remaining brisk and often sunshiny and warm november and first December days passed — as in a dream , really — [an ecstatic paradise of sorts in the very center of [a humdrum conventional and petty and underpaid work - a - day world]2756-a humdrum conventional and petty and underpaid work - a - day world]2755-an ecstatic paradise of sorts in the very center of a humdrum conventional and petty and underpaid work - a - day world .

In the meantime [the Griffiths]201-clyde had been away from [the city]477-the city since the middle of June and ever since [their]2752-them departure [Clyde]201-clyde had been meditating upon [them]2752-them and all [they]2752-them represented in [his]201-clyde life and that of [the city]477-the city . [[Their]2752-them great house]2759-their great house closed and silent , except for [gardeners]2760-gardeners and an occasional chauffeur or [servant]2761-servant visible as [he]201-clyde walked from time to time past [the place]727-the place , was the same as [a shrine to [him]201-clyde]2763-a shrine to him , nearly — the symbol of that height to which by some turn of fate [he]201-clyde might still hope to attain . For [he]201-clyde had never quite been able to expel from [his]201-clyde mind the thought that [his]201-clyde future must in some way be identified with the grandeur that was here laid out before [him]201-clyde .

Yet so far as the movements of [the Griffiths family]866-the griffiths family and [[their]866-the griffiths family social peers outside [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2765-their social peers outside lycurgus were concerned , [he]201-clyde knew little other than that which from time to time [he]201-clyde had read in the society columns of the two local papers which almost obsequiously pictured the comings and goings of [all those who were connected with [the more important families of [the city]477-the city]2767-the more important families of the city]2766-all those who were connected with the more important families of the city . The thing had had a bite and ache for [him]201-clyde that was almost unendurable and had lit up for [him]201-clyde at times and with overwhelming clarity this connection of [his]201-clyde with [Roberta]302-roberta . For after all , who was [she]302-roberta ? [A factory girl]4736-a factory girl ! [The daughter of parents who lived and worked on [a farm]2777-a farm and one who was compelled to work for [her]302-roberta own living]2776-the daughter of parents who lived and worked on a farm and one who was compelled to work for her own living . Whereas [he]201-clyde — [he]201-clyde — if fortune would but favor [him]201-clyde a little — ! Was this to be the end of all [his]201-clyde dreams in connection with [his]201-clyde perspective superior life [here]4728-here ?

So it was that at moments and in [his]201-clyde darker moods , and especially after [she]302-roberta had abandoned [herself]302-roberta to [him]201-clyde , [his]201-clyde thoughts ran . [She]302-roberta was not of [[his]201-clyde station]2779-his station , really — at least not of that of [the Griffiths]200-gilbert to which still [he]201-clyde most eagerly aspired . But [the Griffiths]200-gilbert and [[their]2780-their friends]1829-their friends having returned to [the city]477-the city , and [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus once more taken on that brisk , industrial and social mood which invariably characterized it for at least seven months in the year , [he]201-clyde was again , and even more vigorously than before , intrigued by it . And then , one November evening as [Clyde]201-clyde was walking along [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue , just west of [Central]81-central , [a portion of [the locally celebrated avenue which , ever since [he]201-clyde had moved to [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton 's [he]201-clyde was accustomed to traverse to and from [his]201-clyde work]2785-the locally celebrated avenue which , ever since he had moved to mrs. peyton 's he was accustomed to traverse to and from his work]2784-a portion of the locally celebrated avenue which , ever since he had moved to mrs. peyton 's he was accustomed to traverse to and from his work , one thing did occur which in so far as [he]201-clyde and [the Griffiths]200-gilbert were concerned was destined to bring about a chain of events which none of [them]2780-their could possibly have foreseen . At the time there was in [his]201-clyde heart and mind that singing which is the inheritance of youth and ambition and which the dying of the old year , instead of depressing , seemed but to emphasize . [He]201-clyde had a good position . [He]201-clyde was respected [here]4728-here . Over and above [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room and board [he]201-clyde had not less than fifteen dollars a week to spend on [himself]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta , an income which , while it did not parallel that which had been derived from [the Green - Davidson]35-the green - davidson or the Union League , was still not so involved with family miseries in the one place or personal loneliness in the other . And [he]201-clyde had [Roberta]302-roberta secretly devoted to [him]201-clyde . And [the Griffiths]200-gilbert , thank goodness , did not and should not know anything of that , though just how in case of a difficulty it was to be avoided , [he]201-clyde was not even troubling to think . [His]201-clyde was a disposition which did not tend to load itself with more than the most immediate cares .

And although [the Griffiths]200-gilbert and [[their]2788-their friends]1829-their friends had not chosen to recognize [him]201-clyde socially , still more and more [all others who were not connected with [local society]2791-local society and who knew of [him]201-clyde]2790-all others who were not connected with local society and who knew of him , did . This thought , together with one other — that once more after dinner [he]201-clyde was to see [Roberta]302-roberta and in [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room as early as eleven o'clock or even earlier — cheered [him]201-clyde and caused [him]201-clyde to step along most briskly and gayly . For , since having indulged in this secret adventure so many times , [both]874-both were unconsciously becoming bolder . Not having been detected to date , [they]874-both were of the notion that it was possible [they]874-both might not be . Or if [they]874-both were [Clyde]201-clyde might be introduced as [[her]302-roberta brother]4719-her brother or [cousin]1822-cousin for the moment , anyhow , in order to avoid immediate scandal . Later , to avoid danger of comment or subsequent detection , as [both]874-both had agreed after some discussion , [Roberta]302-roberta might have to move to some other place where the same routine was to be repeated . But that would be easy , or at least better than no freedom of contact . And with that [Roberta]302-roberta had been compelled to agree .

However , on this occasion there came a contact and an interruption which set [his]201-clyde thoughts careening in an entirely different direction . Reaching [the first of [the more important houses of [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue]2807-the more important houses of wykeagy avenue]2806-the first of the more important houses of wykeagy avenue , although [he]201-clyde had not the slightest idea who lived [there]4705-there , [he]201-clyde was gazing interestedly at the high wrought - iron fence , as well as [the kempt lawn within]2809-the kempt lawn within , dimly illuminated by street lamps , and upon the surface of which [he]201-clyde could detect many heaps of freshly fallen brown leaves being shaken and rolled by a winnowing and gamboling wind . It was all so starkly severe , placid , reserved , beautiful , as [he]201-clyde saw it , that [he]201-clyde was quite stirred by the dignity and richness of it . And as [he]201-clyde neared the central gate , above which two lights were burning , making a circle of light about [it]2810-it , [a closed car]2811-a closed car [of great size and solidity]2812-of great size and solidity stopped directly in front of [it]2810-it . "[200-gilbert] And so it was that [she]2819-her now greeted [Gilbert]200-gilbert as [she]2819-her thought . "[2819-her] while [his]200-gilbert mind was registering that this truly was the beautiful , [the exquisite Sondra whom months before [he]200-gilbert had met at [[his]200-gilbert uncle]692-his uncle 's]2822-the exquisite sondra whom months before he had met at his uncle 's , and concerning whose social activities during the preceding summer [he]200-gilbert had been reading in the papers . [He]201-clyde paused and in a bewildered manner stepped forward and entering [the car]650-the car , slipped into the seat beside [her]2819-her . " Well , that 's too bad , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said stiffly , and with a very awkward and weak attempt at being self - confident and even high - spirited in [her]2819-her presence .

" Oh , it does n't amount to anything , really . [We]5440-we just quarrel , that 's all , once in a while . "[2819-her]

[She]2819-her saw that [he]201-clyde was nervous and bashful and decidedly unresourceful in [her]2819-her presence and it pleased [her]2819-her to think that [she]2819-her could thus befuddle and embarrass [him]201-clyde so much . " Are [you]201-clyde still working for [[your]201-clyde uncle]4868-your uncle ? "[201-clyde]

" Oh , yes , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde quickly , as though it would make an enormous difference to [her]2819-her if [he]201-clyde were not . " [I]2819-her have charge of [a department over there]5442-a department over there now . "[2819-her]

" Oh , really , [I]2819-her did n't know . [I]2819-her have n't seen [you]201-clyde at all , since that one time , [you]201-clyde know . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , yes , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde quite simply and winningly . " [I]2819-her have to be , [you]2819-her know . It 's the work that keeps [me]2819-her [here]4728-here . [I]2819-her certainly thought [you]2819-her looked beautiful , like [an angel almost]5446-an angel almost . "[2819-her]

There was an admiring , pleading light in [his]201-clyde eyes which now quite charmed [her]2819-her . What [a pleasing young man]2832-a pleasing young man — so different to [Gilbert]200-gilbert . Besides what would [Gilbert]200-gilbert think if only [he]200-gilbert knew that [[his]200-gilbert cousin]622-his cousin was so completely reduced by [her]2819-her — how angry [he]200-gilbert would be — [he]200-gilbert , who so plainly thought [her]2819-her a snip ? The thought had a most pleasing tang for [her]2819-her .

However , at this point , unfortunately , [the car]650-the car turned in before [Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton 's door and stopped . The adventure for [Clyde]201-clyde and for [her]2819-her was seemingly over .

" That 's awfully nice of [you]201-clyde to say that . [I]201-clyde wo n't forget that .
