" Good night ! Good night ! "[302-roberta] [she]2819-her called as [the car]650-the car sprang away , and [Clyde]201-clyde , looking after [it]650-the car , wondered if [he]201-clyde would ever see [her]2819-her again so closely and intimately as here . To think that [he]201-clyde should have met [her]2819-her again in this way ! And [she]2819-her had proved so very different from that first time when , as [he]201-clyde distinctly recalled , [she]2819-her took no interest in [him]201-clyde at all .

[He]201-clyde turned hopefully and a little wistfully toward [his]201-clyde own door .

And [Sondra]186-sondra ... why was it , [she]2819-her pondered , as [the motor car]2838-the motor car sped on [its]2838-the motor car way , that [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths were apparently not much interested in [him]201-clyde ?

The effect of this so casual contact was really disrupting in more senses than one . For now in spite of [his]201-clyde comfort in and satisfaction with [Roberta]302-roberta , once more and in this positive and to [him]201-clyde entrancing way , was posed the whole question of [his]201-clyde social possibilities here . And that strangely enough by [the one girl of this upper level who had most materialized and magnified for [him]201-clyde the meaning of that upper level itself]2840-the one girl of this upper level who had most materialized and magnified for him the meaning of that upper level itself . [The beautiful Sondra Finchley]186-sondra ! [Her]2819-her lovely face , smart clothes , gay and superior demeanor ! If only at the time [he]201-clyde had first encountered [her]2819-her [he]201-clyde had managed to interest [her]2819-her . Or could now .

The fact that [his]201-clyde relations with [Roberta]302-roberta were what [they]2841-they were now was not of sufficient import or weight to offset the temperamental or imaginative pull of [such a girl]2842-such a girl as [Sondra]186-sondra and all that [she]2819-her represented . Just to think [the Wimblinger Finchley Electric Sweeper Company]2843-the wimblinger finchley electric sweeper company was [one of the largest manufacturing concerns [here]4728-here]2844-one of the largest manufacturing concerns here . [Its]2843-the wimblinger finchley electric sweeper company tall walls and stacks made a part of the striking sky line across [the Mohawk]44-the mohawk . And [the Finchley residence]2846-the finchley residence in [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue , near that of [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths , was one of the most impressive among [that distinguished row of houses which had come with the latest and most discriminating architectural taste here]2848-that distinguished row of houses which had come with the latest and most discriminating architectural taste here — Italian Renaissance — cream hued marble and Dutchess County sandstone combined . And [the Finchleys]184-the finchleys were among [the most discussed of [families here]2850-families here]2849-the most discussed of families here .

Ah , to know [this perfect girl]2851-this perfect girl more intimately ! To be looked upon by [her]2851-this perfect girl with favor,—made , by reason of that favor , a part of that fine world to which [she]2851-this perfect girl belonged . Was [he]555-the griffiths not a [Griffiths]201-clyde — as good looking as [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert any day ? And as attractive if [he]555-the griffiths only had as much money — or a part of it even . To be able to dress in the [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert ' fashion ; to ride around in [one of the handsome cars [he]555-the griffiths sported]2852-one of the handsome cars he sported ! [Analschar]348-analschar and the tray of glasses . But now , as [he]555-the griffiths gloomily thought , [he]555-the griffiths could only hope , hope , hope .

[The devil]2856-the devil ! [He]555-the griffiths would not go around to [Roberta]302-roberta 's this evening . [He]555-the griffiths could not and would not go , feeling as [he]555-the griffiths did just now .

So much for the effect of wealth , beauty , the peculiar social state to which [he]555-the griffiths most aspired , on a temperament that was as fluid and unstable as water .

On the other hand , later , thinking over [her]302-roberta contact with [Clyde]201-clyde , [Sondra]186-sondra was definitely taken with what may only be described as [his]201-clyde charm for [her]302-roberta , all the more definite in this case since it represented a direct opposite to all that [[his]201-clyde cousin]622-his cousin offered by way of offense . [His]201-clyde clothes and [his]201-clyde manner , as well as a remark [he]201-clyde had dropped , to the effect that [he]201-clyde was connected with [the company]990-the company in some official capacity , seemed to indicate that [he]201-clyde might be better placed than [she]302-roberta had imagined . Yet [she]302-roberta also recalled that although [she]302-roberta had been about with [Bella]183-bella all summer and had encountered [Gilbert]200-gilbert , [Myra]182-myra and [[their]2861-their parents]668-their parents from time to time , there had never been a word about [Clyde]201-clyde . Indeed all the information [she]302-roberta had gathered concerning [him]201-clyde was that originally furnished by [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths , who had said that [he]201-clyde was [a poor nephew whom [[her]180-mrs. griffiths husband]614-her husband had brought on from [the west]437-the west in order to help in some way]2863-a poor nephew whom her husband had brought on from the west in order to help in some way . Yet now , as [she]302-roberta viewed [Clyde]201-clyde on this occasion , [he]201-clyde did not seem so utterly unimportant or poverty - stricken by any means — quite interesting and rather smart and very attractive , and obviously anxious to be taken seriously by [a girl like [herself]302-roberta]2866-a girl like herself , as [she]302-roberta could see . And this coming from [[Gilbert]200-gilbert 's cousin]2831-gilbert 's cousin — [a Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths — was flattering .

Now [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra 's nature was of just such a turn that a thought of this kind was most appealing to [her]2886-her . However , as interesting as the idea was to [her]2886-her at the time , nothing definite might have come of it , had it not been that subsequent to this conversation and several others held with [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull , [Patricia Anthony]354-patricia anthony , and [Arabella Stark]353-bella , the news of this adventure , together with some comments as to [himself]2887-himself , finally came to the ears of [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , yet only via [Constance Wynant]203-constance to whom , as local gossips would have it , [he]200-gilbert was prospectively engaged . And [Constance]203-constance , hoping that [Gilbert]200-gilbert would marry [her]203-constance eventually , was [herself]203-constance irritated by the report that [Sondra]186-sondra had chosen to interest [herself]186-sondra in [Clyde]201-clyde , and then , for no sane reason , as [she]203-constance saw it , proclaim that [he]201-clyde was more attractive than [Gilbert]200-gilbert . So , as much to relieve [herself]203-constance as to lay some plan of avenging [herself]203-constance upon [Sondra]186-sondra , if possible , [she]203-constance conveyed the whole matter in turn to [Gilbert]200-gilbert , who at once proceeded to make various cutting references to [Clyde]201-clyde and [Sondra]186-sondra . And these carried back to [Sondra]186-sondra , along with certain embellishments by [Constance]203-constance , had the desired effect . It served to awaken in [her]203-constance the keenest desire for retaliation . For if [she]203-constance chose [she]203-constance certainly could be nice to [Clyde]201-clyde , and have [others]561-others be nice to [him]201-clyde , too . And that would mean perhaps that [Gilbert]200-gilbert would find [himself]200-gilbert faced by [a social rival of sorts]2889-a social rival of sorts — [[his]200-gilbert own cousin]2890-his own cousin , too , who , even though [he]201-clyde was poor , might come to be liked better . What a lark ! At the very same time there came to [her]203-constance a way by which [she]203-constance might most easily introduce [Clyde]201-clyde , and yet without seeming so to do , and without any great harm to [herself]203-constance , if it did not terminate as [she]203-constance wished .

For in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus among [the younger members of [those smarter families whose children had been to [the Snedeker School]95-the snedeker school]2892-those smarter families whose children had been to the snedeker school , existed a rather illusory and casual dinner and dance club called the " Now and Then . "[203-constance] [It]2893-it had no definite organization , [officers]2894-officers or abode]2891-the younger members of those smarter families whose children had been to the snedeker school , existed a rather illusory and casual dinner and dance club called the " now and then . " it had no definite organization , officers or abode . [Any one , who , because of class and social connections was eligible and chose to belong]2895-any one , who , because of class and social connections was eligible and chose to belong , could call a meeting of [other members]2896-other members to give a dinner or dance or tea in [[their]2896-other members homes]2897-their homes .

And how simple , thought [Sondra]186-sondra in browsing around for a suitable vehicle by which to introduce [Clyde]201-clyde , if [some one other than [herself]186-sondra who belonged]2898-some one other than herself who belonged could be induced to get up something and then at [her]203-constance suggestion invite [Clyde]201-clyde . How easy , say , for [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull to give a dinner and dance to the " Now and Thens , "[201-clyde] to which [Clyde]201-clyde might be invited . And by this ruse [she]203-constance would thus be able to see [him]201-clyde again and find out just how much [he]201-clyde did interest [her]203-constance and what [he]201-clyde was like .

Accordingly a small dinner for [this club]728-this club and [its friends]2900-its friends was announced for the first Thursday in December , [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull to be [the hostess]2901-the hostess . To it were to be invited [Sondra]186-sondra and [[her]203-constance brother]4719-her brother , [Stuart]188-stuart , [Tracy]352-tracy trumbull and [Gertrude Trumbull]351-gertrude , [Arabella Stark]353-bella , [Bertine]197-bertine and [[her]203-constance brother]4719-her brother , and [some others from [Utica]3-utica and [Gloversville]52-gloversville]2904-some others from utica and gloversville as well . And [Clyde]201-clyde . But in order to safeguard [Clyde]201-clyde against any chance of failure or even invidious comment of any kind , not only [she]203-constance but [Bertine]197-bertine and [Jill]349-jill trumbull and [Gertrude]351-gertrude were to be attentive to and considerate of [him]201-clyde . [They]2905-they were to see that [his]201-clyde dance program was complete and that neither at dinner nor on the dance floor was [he]201-clyde to be left to [himself]201-clyde , but was to be passed on most artfully from one to the other until evening should be over . For , by reason of that , [others]561-others might come to be interested in [him]201-clyde , which would not only take the thorn from the thought that [Sondra]186-sondra alone , of [all the better people of [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]2907-all the better people of lycurgus , had been friendly to [him]201-clyde , but would sharpen the point of this development for [Gilbert]200-gilbert , if not for [Bella]353-bella and [the other members of [the Griffiths family]866-the griffiths family]2908-the other members of the griffiths family .

And in accordance with this plan , so it was done .

And so it was that [Clyde]201-clyde , returning from [the factory]440-the factory one early December evening about two weeks after [his]201-clyde encounter with [Sondra]186-sondra , was surprised by the sight of a cream - colored note leaning against the mirror of [his]201-clyde dresser . It was addressed in a large , scrawly and unfamiliar hand . [He]201-clyde picked it up and turned it over without being able in any way to fix upon the source . On the back were the initials B. T. or J. T. , [he]201-clyde could not decide which , so elaborately intertwined was the engraved penmanship . [He]201-clyde tore it open and drew out a card which read .

On the back of this , though , in the same scrawly hand that graced the envelope was written : " [Dear Mr. Griffiths]200-gilbert : Thought [you]201-clyde might like to come . It will be quite informal . And [I]201-clyde 'm sure [you]201-clyde 'll like it . If so , will [you]201-clyde let [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull know ? [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra . "[201-clyde]

Quite amazed and thrilled , [Clyde]201-clyde stood and stared . For ever since that second contact with [her]2911-her , [he]201-clyde had been more definitely fascinated than at any time before by the dream that somehow , in some way , [he]201-clyde was to be lifted from the lowly state in which [he]201-clyde now dwelt . [He]201-clyde was , as [he]201-clyde now saw it , really too good for [the Commonplace world by which [he]201-clyde was environed]2912-the commonplace world by which he was environed . And now here was this — a social invitation issued by the " Now and Then Club , "[349-jill trumbull] of which , even though [he]201-clyde had never heard of it , must be something since it was sponsored by [such exceptional people]2913-such exceptional people . And on the back of it , was there not the writing of [Sondra]186-sondra [herself]2911-her ? How marvelous , really !

So astonished was [he]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde could scarcely contain [himself]201-clyde for joy , but now on the instant must walk to and fro , looking at [himself]201-clyde in the mirror , washing [his]201-clyde hands and face , then deciding that [his]201-clyde tie was not just right , perhaps , and changing to another — thinking forward to what [he]201-clyde should wear and back upon how [Sondra]186-sondra had looked at [him]201-clyde on that last occasion . And how [she]2911-her had smiled . At the same time [he]201-clyde could not help wondering even at this moment of what [Roberta]302-roberta would think , if now , by some extra optical power of observation [she]302-roberta could note [his]201-clyde present joy in connection with this note . For plainly , and because [he]201-clyde was no longer governed by the conventional notions of [[his]201-clyde parents]549-his parents , [he]201-clyde had been allowing [himself]201-clyde to drift into a position in regard to [her]2911-her which would certainly spell torture to [her]2911-her in case [she]2911-her should discover the nature of [his]201-clyde present mood , a thought which puzzled [him]201-clyde not a little , but did not serve to modify [his]201-clyde thoughts in regard to [Sondra]186-sondra in the least .

[That wonderful girl]2915-that wonderful girl !

That beauty !

That world of wealth and social position [she]2911-her lived in !

At the same time so innately pagan and unconventional were [his]201-clyde thoughts in regard to all this that [he]201-clyde could now ask [himself]201-clyde , and that seriously enough , why should [he]201-clyde not be allowed to direct [his]201-clyde thoughts toward [her]2911-her and away from [Roberta]302-roberta , since at the moment [Sondra]186-sondra supplied the keener thought of delight . [Roberta]302-roberta could not know about this . [She]302-roberta could not see into [his]201-clyde mind , could [she]302-roberta — become aware of any such extra experience as this unless [he]201-clyde told [her]302-roberta . And most assuredly [he]201-clyde did not intend to tell [her]302-roberta . And what harm , [he]201-clyde now asked [himself]201-clyde , was there in [a poor youth like [himself]201-clyde aspiring to such heights]2916-a poor youth like himself aspiring to such heights ? [Other youths as poor as [himself]201-clyde]2917-other youths as poor as himself had married [girls as rich]2918-girls as rich as [Sondra]186-sondra .

For in spite of all that had occurred between [him]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta [he]201-clyde had not , as [he]201-clyde now clearly recalled , given [her]302-roberta [his]201-clyde word that [he]201-clyde would marry [her]302-roberta except under one condition . And such a condition , especially with the knowledge that [he]201-clyde had all too clearly acquired in [Kansas City]23-kansas city , was not likely to happen as [he]201-clyde thought .

And [Sondra]186-sondra , now that [she]302-roberta had thus suddenly burst upon [him]201-clyde again in this way was the same as a fever to [his]201-clyde fancy . [This goddess in [her]302-roberta shrine of gilt and tinsel so utterly enticing to [him]201-clyde]2919-this goddess in her shrine of gilt and tinsel so utterly enticing to him , had deigned to remember [him]201-clyde in this open and direct way and to suggest that [he]201-clyde be invited . And no doubt [she]302-roberta , [herself]302-roberta , was going to be [there]4705-there , a thought which thrilled [him]201-clyde beyond measure .

And what would not [Gilbert]200-gilbert and [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths think if [they]2922-they were to hear of [his]201-clyde going to this affair now , as [they]2922-they surely would ? Or meet [him]201-clyde later at some other party to which [Sondra]186-sondra might invite [him]201-clyde ? Think of that ! Would it irritate or please [them]2922-they ? Make [them]2922-they think less or more of [him]201-clyde ? For , after all , this certainly was not of [his]201-clyde doing . Was [he]201-clyde not properly invited by people of [[their]2922-they own station]2923-their own station here in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus whom most certainly [they]2922-they were compelled to respect ? And by no device of [his]201-clyde , either — sheer accident — the facts concerning which would most certainly not reflect on [him]201-clyde as pushing . As lacking as [he]201-clyde was in some of the finer shades of mental discrimination , a sly and ironic pleasure lay in the thought that now [Gilbert]200-gilbert and [the Griffiths]200-gilbert might be compelled to countenance [him]201-clyde whether [they]2922-they would or not — invite [him]201-clyde to [[their]2922-they home]2924-their home , even . For , if [these others]1409-these others did , how could [they]2922-they avoid it , really ? Oh , joy ! And that in the face of [Gilbert]200-gilbert 's high contempt for [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde fairly chuckled as [he]201-clyde thought of it , feeling that however much [Gilbert]200-gilbert might resent it , neither [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle nor [Myra]182-myra were likely to , and that hence [he]201-clyde would be fairly safe from any secret desire on the part of [Gilbert]200-gilbert to revenge [himself]200-gilbert on [him]201-clyde for this .

But how wonderful this invitation ! Why that intriguing scribble of [Sondra]186-sondra 's unless [she]2927-she was interested in [him]201-clyde some ? Why ? The thought was so thrilling that [Clyde]201-clyde could scarcely eat [his]201-clyde dinner that night . [He]201-clyde took up the card and kissed the handwriting . And instead of going to see [Roberta]302-roberta as usual , [he]201-clyde decided as before on first reencountering [her]302-roberta , to walk a bit , then return to [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room , and retire early . And on the morrow as before [he]201-clyde could make some excuse — say that [he]201-clyde had been over to [[the Griffiths]200-gilbert ' home]2929-the griffiths ' home , or [some one of [the heads of [the factory]440-the factory]2931-the heads of the factory]2930-some one of the heads of the factory , in order to listen to an explanation in regard to something in connection with the work , since there were often such conferences . For , in the face of this , [he]201-clyde did not care to see or talk to [Roberta]302-roberta this night . [He]201-clyde could not . The other thought — that of [Sondra]186-sondra and [her]302-roberta interest in [him]201-clyde — was too enticing .

But in the interim , in connection with [his]201-clyde relations with [Roberta]302-roberta no least reference to [Sondra]186-sondra , although , even when near [her]302-roberta in [the factory]440-the factory or [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , [he]201-clyde could not keep [his]201-clyde thoughts from wandering away to where [Sondra]186-sondra in [[her]302-roberta imaginary high social world]2935-her imaginary high social world might be . The while [Roberta]302-roberta , at moments only sensing a drift and remoteness in [his]201-clyde thought and attitude which had nothing to do with [her]302-roberta , was wondering what it was that of late was beginning to occupy [him]201-clyde so completely . And [he]201-clyde , in [his]201-clyde turn , when [she]302-roberta was not looking was thinking — supposing?—supposing—(since [she]302-roberta had troubled to recall [herself]302-roberta to [him]201-clyde ) , that [he]201-clyde could interest [a girl like [Sondra]186-sondra]2936-a girl like sondra in [him]201-clyde ? What then of [Roberta]302-roberta ? What ? And in the face of this intimate relation that had now been established between [them]2937-them ? ( Goodness ! The deuce ! ) And that [he]201-clyde did care for [her]302-roberta ( yes , [he]201-clyde did ) , although now — basking in the direct rays of [this newer luminary]2938-this newer luminary — [he]201-clyde could scarcely see [Roberta]302-roberta any longer , so strong were the actinic rays of this other . Was [he]201-clyde all wrong ? Was it evil to be like this ? [[His]201-clyde mother]587-his mother would say so ! And [[his]201-clyde father]539-his father too — and perhaps [everybody who thought right about life]2941-everybody who thought right about life — [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , maybe — [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths — all .

And yet ! And yet ! It was snowing the first light snow of the year as [Clyde]201-clyde , arrayed in a new collapsible silk hat and white silk muffler , both suggested by [a friendly haberdasher]2943-a friendly haberdasher — [Orrin Short]355-short , with whom recently [he]201-clyde had come in contact here — and a new silk umbrella wherewith to protect [himself]201-clyde from the snow , made [his]201-clyde way toward [the very interesting , if not so very imposing residence of [the Trumbulls]346-the trumbulls on [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue]2944-the very interesting , if not so very imposing residence of the trumbulls on wykeagy avenue . [It]2944-the very interesting , if not so very imposing residence of the trumbulls on wykeagy avenue was quaint , low and rambling , and the lights beaming from within upon the many drawn blinds gave it a Christmas - card effect . And before it , even at the prompt hour at which [he]201-clyde arrived , were ranged [a half dozen handsome cars]2945-a half dozen handsome cars of various builds and colors . The sight of them , sprinkled on tops , running boards and fenders with the fresh , flaky snow , gave [him]201-clyde a keen sense of a deficiency that was not likely soon to be remedied in [his]201-clyde case — the want of ample means wherewith to equip [himself]201-clyde with such a necessity as that . And inside as [he]201-clyde approached the door [he]201-clyde could hear voices , laughter and conversation commingled .

The impact of this remark , a reflection of the exact truth , was not necessary to cause [Clyde]201-clyde to gaze attentively , and even eagerly . For apart from [her]351-gertrude local position and means and taste in dress and manners , [Sondra]186-sondra was of the exact order and spirit that most intrigued [him]201-clyde — a somewhat refined ( and because of means and position showered upon [her]351-gertrude ) less savage , although scarcely less self - centered , [Hortense Briggs]220-hortense briggs . " Well , make it three , five and eight then , in the first half . "[362-nina temple] [She]3018-she waved [him]3019-he gayly away and [he]3019-he hurried for a dance card .

The dances were all of the eager fox - trotting type of the period with interpolations and variations according to the moods and temperaments of [the individual dancers]3023-the individual dancers . Having danced so much with [Roberta]302-roberta during the preceding month , [Clyde]201-clyde was in excellent form and keyed to the breaking point by the thought that at last [he]201-clyde was in social and even affectional contact with [a girl as wonderful as [Sondra]186-sondra]3024-a girl as wonderful as sondra .

And although wishing to seem courteous and interested in others with whom [he]201-clyde was dancing , [he]201-clyde was almost dizzied by passing contemplations of [Sondra]186-sondra . [She]3018-she swayed so droopily and dreamily in the embrace of [Grant Cranston]207-grant , the while without seeming to , looking in [his]201-clyde direction when [he]201-clyde was near , permitting [him]201-clyde to sense how graceful and romantic and poetic was [her]3018-she attitude toward all things — what a flower of life [she]3018-she really was . " [You]201-clyde do dance well , do n't [you]201-clyde ? [I]201-clyde suppose [you]201-clyde must have done a lot of dancing before [you]201-clyde came here — in [Chicago]5-chicago , was n't it , or where ? "[201-clyde]

[She]362-nina temple talked slowly and indifferently .

" [I]362-nina temple was in [Chicago]5-chicago before [I]362-nina temple came [here]4728-here , but [I]362-nina temple did n't do so very much dancing . [I]362-nina temple had to work . "[362-nina temple] [He]201-clyde was thinking how such girls as [she]362-nina temple had everything , as contrasted with girls like [Roberta]302-roberta , who had nothing . And yet , as [he]201-clyde now felt in this instance , [he]201-clyde liked [Roberta]302-roberta better . [She]302-roberta was sweeter and warmer and kinder — not so cold .

When the music started again with the sonorous melancholy of a single saxophone interjected at times , [Sondra]186-sondra came over to [him]201-clyde and placed [her]362-nina temple right hand in [his]201-clyde left and allowed [him]201-clyde to put [his]201-clyde arm about [her]362-nina temple waist , an easy , genial and unembarrassed approach which , in the midst of [Clyde]201-clyde 's dream of [her]362-nina temple , was thrilling .

And then in [her]362-nina temple coquettish and artful way [she]362-nina temple smiled up in [his]201-clyde eyes , a bland , deceptive and yet seemingly promising smile , which caused [his]201-clyde heart to beat faster and [his]201-clyde throat to tighten . Some delicate perfume that [she]362-nina temple was using thrilled in [his]201-clyde nostrils as might have the fragrance of spring .

" Having a good time ? "[362-nina temple]

" Yes — looking at [you]201-clyde . "[362-nina temple]

" When there are so many other [nice girls]5011-nice girls to look at ? "[362-nina temple]

" Oh , there are [no other girls as nice as [you]201-clyde]5521-no other girls as nice as you . "[362-nina temple]

" And [I]201-clyde dance better than [any other girl]5522-any other girl , and [I]201-clyde 'm much the best - looking of [any other girl here]5523-any other girl here . Now — [I've]201-clyde said it all for [you]362-nina temple . Now what are [you]362-nina temple going to say ? "[201-clyde]

[She]362-nina temple looked up at [him]201-clyde teasingly , and [Clyde]201-clyde realizing that [he]201-clyde had a very different type to [Roberta]302-roberta to deal with , was puzzled and flushed .

" [I]201-clyde see , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said , seriously . " [Every fellow]5524-every fellow tells [you]362-nina temple that , so [you]362-nina temple do n't want [me]186-sondra to . "[186-sondra]

" Oh , no , [not every fellow]5525-not every fellow . "[186-sondra] [Sondra]186-sondra was at once intrigued and checkmated by the simplicity of [his]201-clyde retort . " There are lots of people who do n't think [I]201-clyde 'm very pretty . "[201-clyde]

" Oh , do n't [they]5526-they , though ? "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde returned quite gayly , for at once [he]201-clyde saw that [she]362-nina temple was not making fun of [him]201-clyde . "[362-nina temple]

" Oh , do [I]362-nina temple ? "[362-nina temple] was [her]362-nina temple quick and enthusiastic response . " There is n't anything [I]201-clyde like as much , really . " Well , [I]201-clyde 've just taken it up , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said , fearing to admit that [he]201-clyde did not play at all .

" Oh , [I]362-nina temple just love tennis . [We]5527-we might play sometime together . "[362-nina temple] [Clyde]201-clyde 's spirits were completely restored by this . And tripping as lightly as dawn to the mournful strains of a popular love song , [she]362-nina temple went right on . " [Bella Griffiths]183-bella and [Stuart]188-stuart and [Grant]207-grant and [I]201-clyde play fine doubles . [We]5527-we won nearly all the finals at [Greenwood]12-greenwood and [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake last summer . [We]5527-we have [the swiftest motor - boat]5528-the swiftest motor - boat up at [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake now — [Stuart]188-stuart has . It can do sixty miles an hour . "[201-clyde]

At once [Clyde]201-clyde realized that [he]201-clyde had hit upon the one subject that not only fascinated , but even excited [her]362-nina temple . For not only did it involve outdoor exercise , in which obviously [she]362-nina temple reveled , but also the power to triumph and so achieve laurels in such phases of sport as most interested those with whom [she]362-nina temple was socially connected . And lastly , although this was something which [he]201-clyde did not so clearly realize until later , [she]362-nina temple was fairly dizzied by the opportunity all this provided for frequent changes of costume and hence social show , which was the one thing above all others that did interest [her]362-nina temple . How [she]362-nina temple looked in a bathing suit — a riding or tennis or dancing or automobile costume !

[They]3027-they danced on together , thrilled for the moment at least , by this mutual recognition of the identity and reality of this interest [each]2733-each felt for [the other]5024-the other — a certain momentary warmth or enthusiasm which took the form of genial and seeking glances into [each other]1439-each other 's eyes , hints on the part of [Sondra]186-sondra that , assuming that [Clyde]201-clyde could fit [himself]201-clyde athletically , financially and in other ways for such a world as this , it might be possible that [he]201-clyde would be invited here and there by [her]362-nina temple ; broad and for the moment self - deluding notions on [his]201-clyde part that such could and would be the case , while in reality just below the surface of [his]201-clyde outward or seeming conviction and assurance ran a deeper current of self - distrust which showed as a decidedly eager and yet slightly mournful light in [his]201-clyde eye , a certain vigor and assurance in [his]201-clyde voice , which was nevertheless touched , had [she]362-nina temple been able to define it , with something that was not assurance by any means .

" Oh , the dance is done , "[362-nina temple] [he]201-clyde said sadly .

" Let 's try to make [them]3027-they encore , "[3033-me] [she]362-nina temple said , applauding . " Oh , yes . Let 's go . "[349-jill trumbull]

Through [the moving couples]3034-the moving couples [they]3035-they hurried out a side - door to [a world that was covered thick with soft , cottony , silent snow]3036-a world that was covered thick with soft , cottony , silent snow . The air was filled with it silently eddying down .

The ensuing December days brought to [Clyde]201-clyde some pleasing and yet complicating and disturbing developments . For [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , having found [him]201-clyde so agreeable [an admirer of [hers]186-sondra]3037-an admirer of hers , was from the first inclined neither to forget nor neglect [him]201-clyde . But , occupying the rather prominent social position which [she]362-nina temple did , [she]362-nina temple was at first rather dubious as to how to proceed . For [Clyde]201-clyde was too poor and decidedly too much ignored by [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths [themselves]555-the griffiths , even , for [her]362-nina temple to risk any marked manifestation of interest in [him]201-clyde .

And now , in addition to the primary motivating reason for all this — [her]362-nina temple desire to irritate [Gilbert]200-gilbert by being friends with [[his]200-gilbert cousin]622-his cousin — there was another . [She]362-nina temple liked [him]201-clyde . [His]201-clyde charm and [his]201-clyde reverence for [her]362-nina temple and [her]362-nina temple station flattered and intrigued [her]362-nina temple . For [hers]3040-hers was a temperament which required adulation in about the measure which [Clyde]201-clyde provided it — sincere and romantic adulation . And at the very same time [he]201-clyde represented physical as well as mental attributes which were agreeable to [her]362-nina temple — amorousness without the courage at the time , anyhow , to annoy [her]362-nina temple too much ; reverence which yet included [her]362-nina temple as [a very human being]3041-a very human being ; a mental and physical animation which quite matched and companioned [her]362-nina temple own .

Hence it was decidedly a troublesome thought with [Sondra]186-sondra how [she]362-nina temple was to proceed with [Clyde]201-clyde without attracting too much attention and unfavorable comment to [herself]362-nina temple — a thought which kept [her]362-nina temple sly little brain going at nights after [she]362-nina temple had retired . However , [those who had met [him]201-clyde at [the Trumbulls]346-the trumbulls ']3042-those who had met him at the trumbulls ' were so much impressed by [her]362-nina temple interest in [him]201-clyde that evening and the fact that [he]201-clyde had proved so pleasing and affable , [they]3042-those who had met him at the trumbulls ' in turn , [the girls]5027-the girls particularly , were satisfied that [he]201-clyde was eligible enough .

And in consequence , two weeks later , [Clyde]201-clyde , searching for inexpensive Christmas presents in [Stark]353-bella 's for [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother , [father]435-father , [sisters]1025-sisters , [brother]3047-brother and [Roberta]302-roberta , and encountering [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull doing a little belated shopping [herself]349-jill trumbull , was invited by [her]349-jill trumbull to attend a pre - Christmas dance that was to be given the next night by [Vanda Steele]361-miss vanda steele at [[her]349-jill trumbull home in [Gloversville]52-gloversville]3048-her home in gloversville . " [Tracy]352-tracy trumbull will be glad to stop for [you]201-clyde in time , "[349-jill trumbull] [she]349-jill trumbull went on , " or — "[349-jill trumbull] [she]349-jill trumbull hesitated—"perhaps [you]201-clyde 'd like to come over for dinner with [us]5529-we before [we]5529-we go . The dance was for Friday night , and on that night [Clyde]201-clyde had arranged to be with [Roberta]302-roberta because on the following day [she]302-roberta was leaving for a three - day - over - Christmas holiday visit to [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents — the longest stretch of time thus far [she]302-roberta had spent away from [him]201-clyde . And because , apart from [his]201-clyde knowledge [she]302-roberta had arranged to present [him]201-clyde with a new fountain pen and Eversharp pencil , [she]302-roberta had been most anxious that [he]201-clyde should spend this last evening with [her]302-roberta , a fact which [she]302-roberta had impressed upon [him]201-clyde . And [he]201-clyde , on [his]201-clyde part , had intended to make use of this last evening to surprise [her]302-roberta with a white - and - black toilet set .

But now , so thrilled was [he]201-clyde at the possibility of a reencounter with [Sondra]186-sondra , [he]201-clyde decided that [he]201-clyde would cancel this last evening engagement with [Roberta]302-roberta , although not without some misgivings as to the difficulty as well as the decency of it . For despite the fact that [he]201-clyde was now so lured by [Sondra]186-sondra , nevertheless [he]201-clyde was still deeply interested in [Roberta]302-roberta and [he]201-clyde did not like to grieve [her]302-roberta in this way . [She]302-roberta would look so disappointed , as [he]201-clyde knew . In consequence [he]201-clyde announced that [he]201-clyde would go , but immediately afterwards decided that [he]201-clyde must go round and explain to [Roberta]302-roberta , make some suitable excuse — that [the Griffiths]201-clyde , for instance , had invited [him]201-clyde for dinner . [I]3074-i 'm going to - morrow , but [I]3074-i 'll be back before New Year 's . [She]3074-i had been about to say " [me]3074-i , "[3074-i] but had changed it to " [us]5538-us . " But [you]201-clyde know , "[3074-i] [she]3074-i said cautiously , " [you]201-clyde must n't pay so very much attention to [me]3083-i over there or here or anywhere or think anything of it , if [I]3083-i do n't to [you]201-clyde . " And if by any chance there 's any change or [I]201-clyde have to break the engagement , do n't think anything of it . [I]201-clyde 'll see [you]201-clyde later — somewhere , sure . "[201-clyde] [She]3086-her smiled and [Clyde]201-clyde felt as though [he]201-clyde were choking . Six - thirty the following morning . And [Clyde]201-clyde , after but a single hour 's rest after [his]201-clyde return from [Gloversville]52-gloversville , rising , [his]201-clyde mind full of mixed and troubled thoughts as to how to readjust [his]201-clyde affairs in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta . [She]3087-this beautiful girl was going to [Biltz]62-biltz to - day . [He]201-clyde had promised to go as far as [Fonda]47-fonda . But now [he]201-clyde did not want to go . Of course [he]201-clyde would have to concoct some excuse . But what ?

Fortunately the day before [he]201-clyde had heard [Whiggam]245-whiggam tell [Liggett]292-liggett there was to be a meeting of [department heads]3089-department heads after closing hours in [[Smillie]241-mr. smillie 's office]3090-smillie 's office to - day , and that [he]201-clyde was to be [there]4705-there . Nothing was said to [Clyde]201-clyde , since [[his]201-clyde department]2321-his department was included in [Liggett]292-liggett 's , but now [he]201-clyde decided that [he]201-clyde could offer this as a reason and accordingly , about an hour before noon , [he]201-clyde dropped a note on [her]3093-her desk which read :

" [HONEY]377-honey : Awfully sorry , but just told that [I]3093-her have to be at a meeting of [department heads]3089-department heads [downstairs]513-downstairs at three . " [CLYDE]201-clyde . "[201-clyde] At first , since [she]3093-her could not read it at once , [Roberta]302-roberta was pleased because [she]3093-her imagined it contained some further favorable word about the afternoon . But on opening it in [[the ladies]3094-the ladies ' rest room]3095-the ladies ' rest room a few minutes afterwards , [her]3093-her face fell . Coupled as this was with the disappointment of the preceding evening , when [Clyde]201-clyde had failed to appear , together with [his]201-clyde manner of the morning which to [her]3093-her had seemed self - absorbed , if not exactly distant , [she]3093-her began to wonder what it was that was bringing about this sudden change . Perhaps [he]201-clyde could not avoid attending a meeting any more than [he]201-clyde could avoid going to [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle 's when [he]201-clyde was asked . But the day before , following [his]201-clyde word to [her]3093-her that [he]201-clyde could not be with [her]3093-her that evening , [his]201-clyde manner was gayer , less sober , than [his]201-clyde supposed affection in the face of [her]3093-her departure would warrant . After all [he]201-clyde had known before that [she]3093-her was to be gone for three days . [He]201-clyde also knew that nothing weighed on [her]3093-her more than being absent from [him]201-clyde any length of time .

At once [her]3093-her mood from one of hopefulness changed to one of deep depression — the blues . [Life]329-life was always doing things like this to [her]3093-her . Here it was — two days before Christmas , and now [she]3093-her would have to go to [Biltz]62-biltz , where there was nothing much but such cheer as [she]3093-her could bring , and all by [herself]3093-her , and after scarcely a moment with [him]201-clyde . [She]3093-her returned to [her]3093-her bench , [her]3093-her face showing all the unhappiness that had suddenly overtaken [her]3093-her . [Her]3093-her manner was listless and [her]3093-her movements indifferent — a change which [Clyde]201-clyde noticed ; but still , because of [his]201-clyde sudden and desperate feeling for [Sondra]186-sondra , [he]201-clyde could not now bring [himself]201-clyde to repent .

At one , the giant whistles of some of [the neighboring factories]3097-the neighboring factories sounding the Saturday closing hours , both [he]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta betook [themselves]3098-themselves separately to [[her]3093-her room]4766-her room . And [he]201-clyde was thinking to [himself]201-clyde as [he]201-clyde went what to say now . What to do ? How in the face of this suddenly frosted and blanched affection to pretend an interest [he]201-clyde did not feel — how , indeed , continue with a relationship which now , as alive and vigorous as it might have been as little as fifteen days before , appeared exceedingly anemic and colorless . It would not do to say or indicate in any way that [he]201-clyde did not care for [her]3093-her any more — for that would be so decidedly cruel and might cause [Roberta]302-roberta to say what ? Do what ? And on the other hand , neither would it do , in the face of [his]201-clyde longings and prospects in the direction of [Sondra]186-sondra to continue in a type of approach and declaration that was not true or sound and that could only tend to maintain things as they were . Impossible ! Besides , at the first hint of reciprocal love on the part of [Sondra]186-sondra , would [he]201-clyde not be anxious and determined to desert [Roberta]302-roberta if [he]201-clyde could ? And why not ? As contrasted with one of [Sondra]186-sondra 's position and beauty , what had [Roberta]302-roberta really to offer [him]201-clyde ? And would it be fair in one of [[her]302-roberta station]3100-her station and considering the connections and the possibilities that [Sondra]186-sondra offered , for [her]302-roberta to demand or assume that [he]201-clyde should continue a deep and undivided interest in [her]302-roberta as opposed to this other ? That would not really be fair , would it ?

It was thus that [he]201-clyde continued to speculate while [Roberta]302-roberta , preceding [him]201-clyde to [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , was asking [herself]302-roberta what was this now that had so suddenly come upon [her]302-roberta — over [Clyde]201-clyde — this sudden indifference , this willingness to break a pre - Christmas date , and when [she]302-roberta was about to leave for [home]4793-home and not to see [him]201-clyde for three days and over Christmas , too , to make [him]201-clyde not wish to ride with [her]302-roberta even so far as [Fonda]47-fonda . [He]201-clyde might say that it was that meeting , but was it ? [She]302-roberta could have waited until four if necessary , but something in [his]201-clyde manner had precluded that — something distant and evasive . Oh , what did this all mean ? And , so soon after the establishing of this intimacy , which at first and up to now at least had seemed to be drawing [them]3103-them indivisibly together . Did it spell a change — danger to or the end even of [their]3103-them wonderful love dream ? Oh , dear ! And [she]302-roberta had given [him]201-clyde so much and now [his]201-clyde loyalty meant everything — [her]302-roberta future — [her]302-roberta life .

[She]302-roberta stood in [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room pondering this new problem as [Clyde]201-clyde arrived , [his]201-clyde Christmas package under [his]201-clyde arm , but still fixed in [his]201-clyde determination to modify [his]201-clyde present relationship with [Roberta]302-roberta , if [he]201-clyde could — yet , at the same time anxious to put as inconsequential a face on the proceeding as possible .

" Gee , [I]201-clyde 'm awfully sorry about this , [Roberta]302-roberta , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde began briskly , [his]201-clyde manner a mixture of attempted gayety , sympathy and uncertainty . But because of the manner in saying it — something in the tone of [his]3111-him voice and flick of [his]3111-him eyes , the answer did not satisfy [Roberta]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta was really intensely troubled by this new development , but did not feel that under the circumstances it was wise to importune [Clyde]201-clyde too much . [He]3111-him might resent it . After all [he]3111-him had always been identified with [this world]1288-this world since ever [she]302-roberta had known [him]3111-him . And [she]302-roberta did not want [him]3111-him to feel that [she]302-roberta was attempting to assert any claims over [him]3111-him , though such was [her]302-roberta true desire .

" [I]201-clyde wanted so much to be with [you]3111-him last night to give [you]3111-him [your]3111-him present , "[201-clyde] [she]302-roberta returned instead , as much to divert [her]302-roberta own thoughts as to appeal to [his]3111-him regard for [her]302-roberta . [Clyde]201-clyde sensed the sorrow in [her]302-roberta voice and as of old it appealed to [him]201-clyde , only now [he]201-clyde could not and would not let it take hold of [him]201-clyde as much as otherwise it might have .

" But [you]302-roberta know how that was , [Roberta]302-roberta , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde replied , with almost an air of bravado . " [I]302-roberta just told [you]302-roberta . "[302-roberta]

" [I]302-roberta know , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta replied sadly and attempting to conceal the true mood that was dominating [her]302-roberta . At the same time [she]302-roberta was removing the paper and opening the lid to the case that contained [her]302-roberta toilet set . And once opened , [her]302-roberta mood changed slightly because never before had [she]302-roberta possessed anything so valuable or original . " Oh , this is beautiful , is n't it ? "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta exclaimed , interested for the moment in spite of [herself]302-roberta . " [I]201-clyde did n't expect anything like this . [My]201-clyde two little presents wo n't seem like very much now . "[201-clyde]

[She]302-roberta crossed over at once to get [her]302-roberta gifts . Yet [Clyde]201-clyde could see that although [his]201-clyde gift was exceptional , still it was not sufficient to overcome the depression which [his]201-clyde indifference had brought upon [her]302-roberta . [His]201-clyde continued love was far more vital than any present .

" [You]302-roberta like it , do [you]302-roberta ? "[302-roberta] [he]201-clyde asked , eagerly hoping against hope that it would serve to divert [her]302-roberta .

" Of course , [dear]5356-dear , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta replied , looking at it interestedly . " But [mine]302-roberta wo n't seem so much , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta added gloomily , and not a little depressed by the general outcome of all [her]302-roberta plans . " But they 'll be useful to [you]5356-dear and [you]5356-dear 'll always have them near [you]5356-dear , next [your]5356-dear heart , where [I]201-clyde want them to be . "[201-clyde]

[She]302-roberta handed over the small box which contained the metal Eversharp pencil and the silver ornamental fountain pen [she]302-roberta had chosen for [him]201-clyde because [she]302-roberta fancied they would be useful to [him]201-clyde in [his]201-clyde work at [the factory]440-the factory . Two weeks before [he]201-clyde would have taken [her]302-roberta in [his]201-clyde arms and sought to console [her]302-roberta for the misery [he]201-clyde was now causing [her]302-roberta . But now [he]201-clyde merely stood there wondering how , without seeming too distant , [he]201-clyde could assuage [her]302-roberta and yet not enter upon the customary demonstrations . And in order so to do [he]201-clyde burst into enthusiastic and yet somehow hollow words in regard to [her]302-roberta present to [him]201-clyde .

" Oh , gee , these are swell , [honey]5354-honey , and just what [I]201-clyde need . [You]5354-honey certainly could n't have given [me]201-clyde anything that would come in handier . [I]201-clyde can use them all the time . "[201-clyde] [He]201-clyde appeared to examine them with the utmost pleasure and afterwards fastened them in [his]201-clyde pocket ready for use . Also , because for the moment [she]302-roberta was before [him]201-clyde so downcast and wistful , epitomizing really all the lure of the old relationship , [he]201-clyde put [his]201-clyde arms around [her]302-roberta and kissed [her]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta was winsome , no doubt of it . And then when [she]302-roberta threw [her]302-roberta arms around [his]201-clyde neck and burst into tears , [he]201-clyde held [her]302-roberta close , saying that there was no cause for all this and that [she]302-roberta would be back Wednesday and all would be as before . At the same time [he]201-clyde was thinking that this was not true , and how strange that was — seeing that only so recently [he]201-clyde had cared for [her]302-roberta so much . It was amazing how [another girl]2369-another girl could divert [him]201-clyde in this way . And yet so it was . And although [she]302-roberta might be thinking that [he]201-clyde was still caring for [her]302-roberta as [he]201-clyde did before , [he]201-clyde was not and never would again . And because of this [he]201-clyde felt really sorry for [her]302-roberta .

Something of this latest mood in [him]201-clyde reached [Roberta]302-roberta now , even as [she]302-roberta listened to [his]201-clyde words and felt [his]201-clyde caresses . They failed to convey sincerity . [His]201-clyde manner was too restless , [his]201-clyde embraces too apathetic , [his]201-clyde tone without real tenderness . Further proof as to this was added when , after a moment or two , [he]201-clyde sought to disengage [himself]201-clyde and look at [his]201-clyde watch , saying , " [I]302-roberta guess [I]302-roberta 'll have to be going now , [honey]5354-honey . It 's twenty of three now and that meeting is for three . [I]302-roberta wish [I]302-roberta could ride over with [you]5354-honey , but [I]302-roberta 'll see [you]5354-honey when [you]5354-honey get back . "[302-roberta]

[He]201-clyde bent down to kiss [her]302-roberta but with [Roberta]302-roberta sensing once and for all , this time , that [his]201-clyde mood in regard to [her]302-roberta was different , colder . [He]201-clyde was interested and kind , but [his]201-clyde thoughts were elsewhere — and at this particular season of the year , too — of all times . [She]302-roberta tried to gather [her]302-roberta strength and [her]302-roberta self - respect together and did , in part — saying rather coolly , and determinedly toward the last : " Well , [I]201-clyde do n't want [you]201-clyde to be late , [Clyde]201-clyde . [You]201-clyde better hurry . But [I]201-clyde do n't want to stay over [there]4705-there either later than Christmas night . Do [you]201-clyde suppose if [I]201-clyde come back early Christmas afternoon , [you]201-clyde will come over here at all ? [I]201-clyde do n't want to be late Wednesday for work . "[201-clyde]

" Why , sure , of course , [honey]5354-honey , [I]201-clyde 'll be around , "[201-clyde] replied [Clyde]201-clyde genially and even wholeheartedly , seeing that [he]201-clyde had nothing else scheduled , that [he]201-clyde knew of , for then , and would not so soon and boldly seek to evade [her]302-roberta in this fashion . " What time do [you]302-roberta expect to get in ? "[201-clyde]

The hour was to be eight and [he]201-clyde decided that for that occasion , anyhow , a reunion would be acceptable . [He]201-clyde drew out [his]201-clyde watch again and saying , " [I]302-roberta 'll have to be going now , though , "[302-roberta] moved toward the door .

Nervous as to the significance of all this and concerned about the future , [she]302-roberta now went over to [him]201-clyde and seizing [his]201-clyde coat lapels and looking into [his]201-clyde eyes , half - pleaded and half - demanded : " Now , this is sure for Christmas night , is it , [Clyde]201-clyde ? [You]201-clyde wo n't make any other engagement this time , will [you]201-clyde ? "[201-clyde]

" Oh , do n't worry . [You]302-roberta know [me]447-her mother . [You]302-roberta know [I]447-her mother could n't help [that other]5572-that other , honey , but [I]447-her mother 'll be on hand Tuesday , sure , "[447-her mother] [he]201-clyde returned . And kissing [her]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde hurried out , feeling , perhaps , that [he]201-clyde was not acting as wisely as [he]201-clyde should , but not seeing clearly how otherwise [he]201-clyde was to do . [A man]4740-a man could n't break off with [a girl]2278-a girl as [he]201-clyde was trying to do , or at least might want to , without exercising some little tact or diplomacy , could [he]201-clyde ? There was no sense in that nor any real skill , was there ? There must be some other and better way than that , surely . At the same time [his]201-clyde thoughts were already running forward to [Sondra]186-sondra and New Year 's Eve . [He]201-clyde was going with [her]302-roberta to [Schenectady]60-schenectady to a party and then [he]201-clyde would have a chance to judge whether [she]302-roberta was caring for [him]201-clyde as much as [she]302-roberta had seemed to the night before .

After [he]201-clyde had gone , [Roberta]302-roberta turned in a rather lorn and weary way and looked out the window after [him]201-clyde , wondering as to what [her]302-roberta future with [him]201-clyde was to be , if at all ? Supposing now , for any reason , [he]201-clyde should cease caring for [her]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta had given [him]201-clyde so much . And [her]302-roberta future was now dependent upon [him]201-clyde , [his]201-clyde continued regard . Was [he]201-clyde going to get tired of [her]302-roberta now — not want to see [her]302-roberta any more ? Oh , how terrible that would be . What would [she]302-roberta — what could [she]302-roberta do then ? If only [she]302-roberta had not given [herself]302-roberta to [him]201-clyde , yielded so easily and so soon upon [his]201-clyde demand .

[She]302-roberta gazed out of [her]302-roberta window at the bare snow - powdered branches of the trees outside and sighed . The holidays ! And going away like this . Oh ! Besides [he]201-clyde was so high placed in [this local society]1635-this local society . And there were so many things brighter and better than [she]302-roberta could offer calling [him]201-clyde .

[She]302-roberta shook [her]302-roberta head dubiously , surveyed [her]302-roberta face in the mirror , put together the few presents and belongings which [she]302-roberta was taking with [her]302-roberta to [[her]302-roberta home]1450-her home , and departed .

[Biltz]62-biltz and [the fungoid farm land after [Clyde]201-clyde and [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]3120-the fungoid farm land after clyde and lycurgus was depressing enough to [Roberta]302-roberta , for all there was too closely identified with deprivations and repressions which discolor the normal emotions centering about old scenes .

As [she]302-roberta stepped down from [the train]3121-the train at [the drab and aged chalet which did service for [a station]3123-a station]3122-the drab and aged chalet which did service for a station , [she]302-roberta observed [[her]302-roberta father]510-her father in the same old winter overcoat [he]510-her father had worn for a dozen years , waiting for [her]302-roberta with the old family conveyance , [a decrepit but still whole buggy]3125-a decrepit but still whole buggy and a horse as bony and weary as [himself]510-her father . [He]510-her father had , as [she]302-roberta had always thought , the look of [a tired and defeated man]3126-a tired and defeated man . [His]510-her father face brightened when [he]510-her father saw [Roberta]302-roberta , for [she]302-roberta had always been [[his]510-her father favorite child]3127-his favorite child , and [he]510-her father chatted quite cheerfully as [she]302-roberta climbed in alongside of [him]510-her father and [they]3128-they turned around and started toward [the road that led to [the farmhouse]3130-the farmhouse]3129-the road that led to the farmhouse , [a rough and winding affair of dirt at a time when [excellent automobile roads]3132-excellent automobile roads were a commonplace elsewhere]3131-a rough and winding affair of dirt at a time when excellent automobile roads were a commonplace elsewhere .

As [they]3128-they rode along [Roberta]302-roberta found [herself]302-roberta checking off mentally every tree , curve , landmark with which [she]302-roberta had been familiar . But with no happy thoughts . It was all too drab . [The farm]3133-the farm itself , coupled with the chronic illness and inefficiency of [Titus]304-titus alden and the inability of [the youngest boy]3134-the youngest boy [Tom]225-tom or [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother to help much , was as big a burden as ever . A mortgage of $ 2000 that had been placed on [it]3133-the farm years before had never been paid off , the north chimney was still impaired , the steps were sagging even more than ever and the walls and fences and [outlying buildings]3136-outlying buildings were no different — save to be made picturesque now by the snows of winter covering them . Even the furniture remained the same jumble that it had always been . And there were [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [younger sister]3138-younger sister and brother , who knew nothing of [her]302-roberta true relationship to [Clyde]201-clyde — a mere name [his]201-clyde here — and assuming that [she]302-roberta was wholeheartedly delighted to be back with [them]3139-them once more . Indeed , the fact that despite [her]302-roberta seeming recent success [she]302-roberta had really compromised [herself]302-roberta in such a way that unless through marriage with [Clyde]201-clyde [she]302-roberta was able to readjust [herself]302-roberta to the moral level which [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents understood and approved , [she]302-roberta , instead of being [the emissary of a slowly and modestly improving social condition for all]3141-the emissary of a slowly and modestly improving social condition for all , might be looked upon as [one who had reduced it to a lower level still — its destroyer]3142-one who had reduced it to a lower level still — its destroyer — was sufficient to depress and reduce [her]302-roberta even more . A very depressing and searing thought .

Worse and more painful still was the thought in connection with all this that , by reason of the illusions which from the first had dominated [her]302-roberta in connection with [Clyde]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta had not been able to make [a confidant of [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother or [any one else]5282-any one else in regard to [him]201-clyde]3143-a confidant of her mother or any one else in regard to him . For [she]302-roberta was dubious as to whether [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother would not consider that [her]302-roberta aspirations were a bit high . "[302-roberta]

" [I]380-gifford suppose so , "[380-gifford] replied [Roberta]302-roberta , who knew [the old Trippetts Mills]65-trippetts mills character well . In the meantime [she]302-roberta had relieved [him]3191-i of [his]3191-i coat and packages which , piled on the dining - room table , were being curiously eyed by [Emily]336-emily .

" Hands off , [Em]336-emily ! "[380-gifford] called [Gifford]380-gifford to [[his]380-gifford little sister]3192-his little sister . " Nothing doing with those until Christmas morning . Has [anybody]1510-anybody cut a Christmas tree yet ? That was [my]587-his mother job last year . "[587-his mother]

" It still is , [Gifford]380-gifford , "[587-his mother] [[his]380-gifford mother]587-his mother replied . " [I]302-roberta told [Tom]225-tom to wait until [you]380-gifford came , 'cause [you]380-gifford always get such a good one . "[302-roberta]

And just then through the kitchen door [Titus]304-titus alden entered , bearing an armload of wood , [his]304-titus alden gaunt face and angular elbows and knees contributing a sharp contrast to the comparative hopefulness of [the younger generation]3194-the younger generation . [Roberta]302-roberta noticed it as [he]304-titus alden stood smiling upon [[his]304-titus alden son]4794-his son , and , because [she]302-roberta was so eager for something better than ever had been to come to all , now went over to [[her]302-roberta father]510-her father and put [her]302-roberta arms around [him]510-her father . " [I]302-roberta know something [Santy]384-santy has brought [[my]302-roberta Dad]5614-my dad that [he]510-her father 'll like . "[302-roberta] It was a dark red plaid mackinaw that [she]302-roberta was sure would keep [him]510-her father warm while executing [his]510-her father chores about [the house]532-the house , and [she]302-roberta was anxious for Christmas morning to come so that [he]510-her father could see it .

[She]302-roberta then went to get an apron in order to help [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother with the evening meal . No additional moment for complete privacy occurring , the opportunity to say more concerning that which [both]874-both were so interested in — the subject of [Clyde]201-clyde — did not come up again for several hours , after which length of time [she]302-roberta found occasion to say : " Yes , but [you]510-her father must n't ever say anything to [anybody]1510-anybody yet . [I]302-roberta told [him]510-her father [I]302-roberta would n't tell , and [you]510-her father must n't . "[302-roberta]

" No , [I]3200-her wo n't , [dear]5356-dear . But [I]3200-her was just wondering . But [I]3200-her suppose [you]510-her father know what [you]510-her father 're doing . [You]510-her father 're old enough now to take care of [yourself]510-her father , [Bob]378-bob , are n't [you]510-her father ? "[3200-her]

" Yes , [I]387-gabel am , [Ma]385-ma . And [you]510-her father must n't worry about [me]387-gabel , [dear]5356-dear , "[387-gabel] [she]3200-her added , seeing a shadow , not of distrust but worry , passing over [[her]3200-her beloved mother]3201-her beloved mother 's face . How careful [she]3200-her must be not to cause [her]3200-her to worry when [she]3200-her had so much else to think about here on [the farm]3133-the farm .

Sunday morning brought [the Gabels]386-the gabels with full news of [their]3203-their social and material progress in [Homer]66-homer . Although [[her]3200-her sister]461-her sister was not as attractive as [she]3200-her , and [Fred Gabel]387-gabel was not such [a man]4740-a man as at any stage in [her]3200-her life [Roberta]302-roberta could have imagined [herself]3200-her interested in , still , after [her]3200-her troublesome thoughts in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde , the sight of [Agnes]309-agnes emotionally and materially content and at ease in the small security which matrimony and [[her]309-agnes none - too - efficient husband]3206-her none - too - efficient husband provided , was sufficient to rouse in [her]3200-her that flapping , doubtful mood that had been assailing [her]3200-her since the previous morning . Was it not better , [she]3200-her thought , to be married to [a man even as inefficient and unattractive but steadfast as [Fred Gabel]387-gabel]3207-a man even as inefficient and unattractive but steadfast as fred gabel , than to occupy the anomalous position in which [she]3200-her now found [herself]3200-her in [her]3200-her relations with [Clyde]201-clyde ? For here was [Gabel]387-gabel now talking briskly of the improvements that had come to [himself]387-gabel and [Agnes]309-agnes during the year in which [they]3208-they had been married . In that time [he]387-gabel had been able to resign [his]387-gabel position as [teacher]3209-teacher in [Homer]66-homer and take over on shares the management of [a small book and [stationery store]3211-stationery store whose principal contributory features were [a toy department]3212-a toy department and [soda fountain]3213-soda fountain]3210-a small book and stationery store whose principal contributory features were a toy department and soda fountain . [They]3208-they had been doing a good business . [Agnes]309-agnes , if all went well , would be able to buy [a mission parlor suite]3214-a mission parlor suite by next summer . [Fred]387-gabel had already bought [her]3200-her a phonograph for Christmas . In proof of [their]3208-they well - being , [they]3208-they had brought satisfactory remembrances for [all of [the Aldens]388-the aldens]3215-all of the aldens .

But [Gabel]387-gabel had with [him]387-gabel a copy of the Lycurgus Star , and at breakfast , which because of [the visitors]3216-the visitors this morning was unusually late , was reading the news of [that city]444-that city , for in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus was located [the wholesale house from which [he]387-gabel secured a portion of [his]387-gabel stock]3218-the wholesale house from which he secured a portion of his stock .

" Well , [I]387-gabel see things are going full blast in [[your]302-roberta town]5618-your town , [Bob]378-bob , "[387-gabel] [he]387-gabel observed . " The Star here says [the Griffiths Company]1879-the griffiths company have got an order for 120,000 collars from the Buffalo trade alone . [They]5620-they must be just coining money over there . "[302-roberta]

" There 's always plenty to do in [[my]302-roberta department]5621-my department , [I]302-roberta know that , "[302-roberta] replied [Roberta]302-roberta , briskly . " [We]5622-we never seem to have any the less to do whether business is good or bad . [I]387-gabel guess it must be good all the time . "[387-gabel]

" Pretty soft for [those people]5623-those people . [They]5623-those people do n't have to worry about anything . " Why , no , [I]3219-i have n't . Maybe it 's [some other company]5626-some other company . "[3219-i]

" By the way , what 's the name of [that young man [you]3219-i said]5627-that young man you said was [the head of [[your]3219-i department]5629-your department]5628-the head of your department ?
