" Yes , [his]5627-that young man you said name is [Griffiths]201-clyde — [Clyde Griffiths]201-clyde . Why ? "[3219-i]

" [I]3219-i think [I]3219-i saw [his]5627-that young man you said name in here a minute ago . [I]3219-i just wanted to see if it ai n't [the same fellow]4863-the same fellow . Sure , here [you]3219-i are . Ai n't this the one ? "[3219-i] [He]3219-i passed the paper to [Roberta]302-roberta with [his]3219-i finger on an item which read :

" [Miss Vanda Steele]361-miss vanda steele , of [Gloversville]52-gloversville , was hostess at an informal dance held at [[her]361-miss vanda steele home]1450-her home in [that city]444-that city Friday night , at which were present [several prominent members of Lycurgus society]5633-several prominent members of lycurgus society , among [them]5633-several prominent members of lycurgus society [the Misses Sondra Finchiey]389-the misses sondra finchiey , [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , [Jill]349-jill trumbull and [Gertrude Trumbull]351-gertrude and [Perley Haynes]360-perley haynes , and [Messrs. Clyde Griffiths]201-clyde , [Frank Harriet]357-frank harriet , [Tracy Trumbull]352-tracy trumbull , [Grant Cranston]207-grant and [Scott Nicholson]356-scott nicholson . The party , as is usual whenever [the younger group]5634-the younger group assembles , did not break up until late , [the Lycurgus members]5635-the lycurgus members motoring back just before dawn . It is already rumored that [most of [this group]2965-this group]5636-most of this group will gather at [the Ellerslies]391-the ellerslies ' , in [Schenectady]60-schenectady , New Year 's Eve for another event of this same gay nature . "[387-gabel] " [He]201-clyde seems to be quite [a fellow over there]5638-a fellow over there , "[387-gabel] [Gabel]387-gabel remarked , even as [Roberta]302-roberta was reading .

The first thing that occurred to [Roberta]302-roberta on reading this item was that it appeared to have little , if anything , to do with the group which [Clyde]201-clyde had said was present . In the first place there was no mention of [Myra]182-myra or [Bella Griffiths]183-bella . On the other hand , all those names with which , because of recent frequent references on the part of [Clyde]201-clyde , [she]3221-her was becoming most familiar were recorded as present . [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , [the Trumbull girls]3222-the trumbull girls , [Perley Haynes]360-perley haynes . [He]201-clyde had said it had not been very interesting , and here it was spoken of as gay and [he]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde was listed for another engagement of the same character New Year 's Eve , when , as a matter of fact , [she]3221-her had been counting on being with [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde had not even mentioned this New Year 's engagement . And perhaps [he]201-clyde would now make some last minute excuse for that , as [he]201-clyde had for the previous Friday evening . Oh , dear ! What did all this mean , anyhow !

Immediately what little romantic glamour this Christmas homecoming had held for [her]3221-her was dissipated . [She]3221-her began to wonder whether [Clyde]201-clyde really cared for [her]3221-her as [he]201-clyde had pretended . The dark state to which [her]3221-her incurable passion for [him]201-clyde had brought [her]3221-her now pained [her]3221-her terribly . For without [him]201-clyde and marriage and [a home]3223-a home and [children]3224-children , and a reasonable place in [such a local world as [she]3221-her was accustomed to]3225-such a local world as she was accustomed to , what was there for [a girl like [her]3221-her in [the world]4755-the world]3226-a girl like her in the world ? And apart from [his]201-clyde own continuing affection for [her]3221-her — if it was really continuing , what assurance had [she]3221-her , in the face of such incidents as these , that [he]201-clyde would not eventually desert [her]3221-her ? And if this was true , here was [her]3221-her future , in so far as marriage with [any one else]5282-any one else was concerned , compromised or made impossible , maybe , and with no reliance to be placed on [him]201-clyde .

[She]3221-her fell absolutely silent . And although [Gabel]387-gabel inquired : " That 's [the fellow]5639-the fellow , is n't it ? "[3221-her] [she]3221-her arose without answering and said : " Excuse [me]200-gilbert , please , a moment . [I]200-gilbert want to get something out of [my]200-gilbert bag , "[200-gilbert] and hurried once more to [[her]3221-her former room [upstairs]575-upstairs]3229-her former room upstairs . Once there [she]3221-her sat down on the bed , and , resting [her]3221-her chin in [her]3221-her hands , a habit when troublesome or necessary thoughts controlled [her]3221-her , gazed at the floor .

Where was [Clyde]201-clyde now ?

What one , if any , of [those girls]1668-those girls did [he]201-clyde take to the Steele party ? Was [he]201-clyde very much interested in [her]3221-her ? Until this very day , because of [Clyde]201-clyde 's unbroken devotion to [her]3221-her , [she]3221-her had not even troubled to think there could be [any other girl to whom [his]201-clyde attentions could mean anything]3232-any other girl to whom his attentions could mean anything .

But now — now !

[She]3221-her got up and walked to the window and looked out on [that same orchard]3233-that same orchard where as [a girl]2278-a girl so many times [she]3221-her had been thrilled by the beauty of life . The scene was miserably bleak and bare . The thin , icy arms of the trees — the gray , swaying twigs — a lone , rustling leaf somewhere . And snow . And wretched outbuildings in need of repair . And [Clyde]201-clyde becoming indifferent to [her]3221-her . And the thought now came to [her]3221-her swiftly and urgently that [she]3221-her must not stay [here]4728-here any longer than [she]3221-her could help — not even this day , if possible . [She]3221-her must return to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and be near [Clyde]201-clyde , if no more than to persuade [him]201-clyde to [his]201-clyde old affection for [her]3221-her , or if not that , then by [her]3221-her presence to prevent [him]201-clyde from devoting [himself]201-clyde too wholly to [these others]1409-these others . Decidedly , to go away like this , even for the holidays , was not good . In [her]3221-her absence [he]201-clyde might desert [her]3221-her completely for [another girl]2369-another girl , and if so , then would it not be [her]3221-her fault ? At once [she]3221-her pondered as to what excuse [she]3221-her could make in order to return this day . But realizing that in view of all these preliminary preparations this would seem inexplicably unreasonable , to [[her]3221-her mother]447-her mother most of all , [she]3221-her decided to endure it as [she]3221-her had planned until Christmas afternoon , then to return , never to leave for so long a period again .

But ad interim , all [her]3221-her thoughts were on how and in what way [she]3221-her could make more sure , if at all , of [Clyde]201-clyde 's continued interest and social and emotional support , as well as marriage in the future . Supposing [he]201-clyde had lied to [her]3221-her , how could [she]3221-her influence [him]201-clyde , if at all , not to do so again ? How to make [him]201-clyde feel that lying between [them]3239-them was not right ? How to make [herself]3221-her securely first in [his]201-clyde heart against the dreams engendered by the possible charms of another ?

How ?

But [Roberta]302-roberta 's return to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room at [the Gilpins]395-the gilpins ' Christmas night brought no sign of [Clyde]201-clyde nor any word of explanation . For in connection with the Griffiths in the meantime there had been a development relating to all this which , could [she]3221-her or [Clyde]201-clyde have known , would have interested both not a little . For subsequent to the Steele dance that same item read by [Roberta]302-roberta fell under the eyes of [Gilbert]200-gilbert . [He]200-gilbert was seated at the breakfast table the Sunday morning after the party and was about to sip from a cup of coffee when [he]200-gilbert encountered it . On the instant [his]200-gilbert teeth snapped about as [a man]4740-a man might snap [his]4740-a man watch lid , and instead of drinking [he]200-gilbert put [his]200-gilbert cup down and examined the item with more care . Other than [[his]200-gilbert mother]587-his mother there was [no one at the table]3243-no one at the table or in [the room]489-the room with [him]200-gilbert , but knowing that [she]3221-her , more than any of [the others]629-the others , shared [his]200-gilbert views in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde , [he]200-gilbert now passed the paper over to [her]3221-her .

" Look at who 's breaking into society now , will [you]180-mrs. griffiths ? "[200-gilbert] [he]200-gilbert admonished sharply and sarcastically , [his]200-gilbert eyes radiating the hard and contemptuous opposition [he]200-gilbert felt . " [We]433-the family 'll be having [him]201-clyde up here next ! "[180-mrs. griffiths]

" Who ? "[180-mrs. griffiths] inquired [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths , as [she]180-mrs. griffiths took the paper and examined the item calmly and judicially , yet not without a little of outwardly suppressed surprise when [she]180-mrs. griffiths saw the name . For although the fact of [Clyde]201-clyde 's having been picked up by [Sondra]186-sondra in [[her]3221-her car]3078-her car sometime before and later been invited to dinner at [the Trumbulls]346-the trumbulls ' , had been conveyed to [the family]433-the family sometime before , still a society notice in The Star was different . " Now [I]200-gilbert wonder how it was that [he]201-clyde came to be invited to that ? "[200-gilbert] meditated [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths who was always conscious of [[her]180-mrs. griffiths son]678-her son 's mood in regard to all this .

" Now , who would do it but that little [Finchley snip]186-sondra , [the little smart aleck]5640-the little smart aleck ? "[200-gilbert] snapped [Gilbert]200-gilbert . " [She]5641-she 's got the idea from somewhere — from [Bella]183-bella for all [I]3249-he know — that [we]5642-we do n't care to have anything to do with [him]201-clyde , and [she]5641-she thinks this is a clever way to hit back at [me]3249-he for some of the things [I]3249-he 've done to [her]5641-she , or that [she]5641-she thinks [I]3249-he 've done . At any rate , [she]5641-she thinks [I]3249-he do n't like [her]5641-she , and that 's right , [I]3249-he do n't . And [Bella]183-bella knows it , too . And that goes for [that little Cranston]197-bertine show - off , too . [They]5643-they 're both always running around with [her]183-bella . [They]5643-they 're [a set of show - offs and wasters]5644-a set of show - offs and wasters , [the whole bunch]5645-the whole bunch , and that goes for [[their]5643-they brothers]5646-their brothers , too — [Grant Cranston]207-grant and [Stew Finchley]188-stuart — and if something do n't go wrong with one or another of that bunch one of these days , [I]3249-he miss [my]3249-he guess . [You]5647-you mark [my]3249-he word ! [They]5643-they do n't do a thing , [the whole lot of [them]5643-they]5648-the whole lot of them , from one year 's end to the other but play around and dance and run here and there , as though there was n't anything else in [the world]4755-the world for [them]5643-they to do . And why [you]5647-you and [Dad]191-dad let [Bella]183-bella run with ['em]183-bella as much as [she]183-bella does is more than [I]3249-he can see . "[3249-he]

To this [[his]3249-he mother]587-his mother protested . It was not possible for [her]587-his mother to entirely estrange [Bella]183-bella from [one portion of [this local social group]3252-this local social group]3251-one portion of this local social group and direct [her]183-bella definitely toward [the homes of [certain others]3254-certain others]3253-the homes of certain others . [They]3255-they all mingled too freely . And [she]587-his mother was getting along in years and had a mind of [her]587-his mother own .

Just the same [[his]3249-he mother]587-his mother 's apology and especially in the face of the publication of this item by no means lessened [Gilbert]200-gilbert 's opposition to [Clyde]201-clyde 's social ambitions and opportunities . What ! [That poor little moneyless cousin of [his]200-gilbert who had committed first the unpardonable offense of looking like [him]200-gilbert and , second , of coming here to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and fixing [himself]200-gilbert on [this very superior family]3258-this very superior family]3257-that poor little moneyless cousin of his who had committed first the unpardonable offense of looking like him and , second , of coming here to lycurgus and fixing himself on this very superior family . And after [he]200-gilbert had shown [him]200-gilbert all too plainly , and from the first , that [he]200-gilbert personally did not like [him]200-gilbert , did not want [him]200-gilbert , and if left to [himself]200-gilbert would never for so much as a moment endure [him]200-gilbert .

" [He]3249-he has n't any money , "[3249-he] [he]3249-he declared finally and very bitterly to [[his]3249-he mother]587-his mother , " and [he]3249-he 's hanging on here by the skin of [his]3249-he teeth as it is . And what for ? If [he]3249-he is taken up by [these people]1401-these people , what can [he]3249-he do ? [He]3249-he certainly has n't the money to do as [they]1401-these people do , and [he]3249-he ca n't get it . And if [he]3249-he could , [his]3249-he job [here]4728-here would n't let [him]3249-he go anywhere much , unless [some one]4723-some one troubled to pay [his]3249-he way . And how [he]3249-he is going to do [his]3249-he work and run with [that crowd]5653-that crowd is more than [I]3260-he know . [That bunch]5654-that bunch is on the go all the time . "[3260-he]

Actually [he]3260-he was wondering whether [Clyde]201-clyde would be included from now on , and if so , what was to be done about it . If [he]3260-he were to be taken up in this way , how was [he]3260-he , or [the family]433-the family , either , to escape from being civil to [him]3260-he ? For obviously , as earlier and subsequent developments proved , [[his]3260-he father]539-his father did not choose to send [him]3260-he away .

Indeed , subsequent to this conversation , [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths had laid the paper , together with a version of [Gilbert]200-gilbert 's views before [[her]180-mrs. griffiths husband]614-her husband at this same breakfast table . But [he]3260-he , true to [his]3260-he previous mood in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde , was not inclined to share [[his]3260-he son]4794-his son 's opinion . On the contrary , [he]3260-he seemed , as [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths saw it , to look upon the development recorded by [the item]3265-the item as a justification in part of [his]3260-he own original estimate of [Clyde]201-clyde .

" [I]3260-he must say , "[3260-he] [he]3260-he began , after listening to [[his]3260-he wife]576-his wife to the end , " [I]200-gilbert ca n't see what 's wrong with [his]201-clyde going to a party now and then , or being invited [here]4728-here and there even if [he]201-clyde has n't any money . It looks more like a compliment to [him]201-clyde and to [us]5656-us than anything else . [I]200-gilbert know how [Gil]189-gil feels about [him]201-clyde . But it rather looks to [me]200-gilbert as though [Clyde]201-clyde 's just a little better than [Gil]189-gil thinks [he]201-clyde is . At any rate , [I]200-gilbert ca n't and [I]200-gilbert would n't want to do anything about it . [I]200-gilbert 've asked [him]201-clyde to come down here , and the least [I]200-gilbert can do is to give [him]201-clyde an opportunity to better [himself]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde seems to be doing [his]201-clyde work all right . Besides , how would it look if [I]200-gilbert did n't ? "[200-gilbert]

And later , because of some additional remarks on the part of [Gilbert]200-gilbert to [[his]200-gilbert mother]587-his mother , [he]200-gilbert added : " [I]200-gilbert 'd certainly rather have [him]201-clyde going with [some of [the better people]5658-the better people than [some of [the worse ones]5660-the worse ones]5659-some of the worse ones]5657-some of the better people than some of the worse ones — that 's one thing sure . [He]201-clyde 's neat and polite and from all [I]200-gilbert hear at [the factory]440-the factory does [his]201-clyde work well enough . As a matter of fact , [I]200-gilbert think it would have been better if [we]5662-we had invited [him]201-clyde up to [the lake]4706-the lake last summer for a few days anyhow , as [I]200-gilbert suggested . As it is now , if [we]5662-we do n't do something pretty soon , it will look as though [we]5662-we think [he]201-clyde is n't good enough for [us]5662-we when [the other people here]5664-the other people here seem to think [he]201-clyde is . If [you]5665-you 'll take [my]200-gilbert advice , [you]5665-you 'll have [him]201-clyde up here for Christmas or New Year 's , anyhow , just to show that [we]5662-we do n't think any less of [him]201-clyde than [[our]5662-we friends]5666-our friends do . "[200-gilbert]

This suggestion , once transferred to [Gilbert]200-gilbert by [[his]200-gilbert mother]587-his mother , caused [him]200-gilbert to exclaim : " Well , [I]200-gilbert 'll be hanged ! All right , only do n't think [I]200-gilbert 'm going to lay [myself]200-gilbert out to be civil to [him]201-clyde . It 's a wonder , if [Father]274-father thinks [he]274-father 's so able , that [he]274-father do n't make a real position for [him]274-father somewhere . "[200-gilbert]

Just the same , nothing might have come of this had it not been that [Bella]183-bella , returning from [Albany]4-albany this same day , learned via contacts and telephone talks with [Sondra]186-sondra and [Bertine]197-bertine of the developments in connection with [Clyde]201-clyde . Also that [he]201-clyde had been invited to accompany [them]3269-them to the New Year 's Eve dance at [the Ellerslies ' in [Schenectady]60-schenectady]113-the ellerslies ' in schenectady , [Bella]183-bella having been previously scheduled to make a part of [this group]2965-this group before [Clyde]201-clyde was thought of .

This sudden development , reported by [Bella]183-bella to [[her]183-bella mother]447-her mother , was of sufficient import to cause [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths as well as [Samuel]179-samuel griffiths , if not [Gilbert]200-gilbert , later to decide to make the best of a situation which obviously was being forced upon [them]3269-them and [themselves]3269-them invite [Clyde]201-clyde for dinner — Christmas Day — a sedate affair to which many others were bid . For this as [they]3269-them now decided would serve to make plain to [all]1395-all and at once that [Clyde]201-clyde was not being as wholly ignored as some might imagine . It was the only reasonable thing to do at this late date . And [Gilbert]200-gilbert , on hearing this , and realizing that in this instance [he]200-gilbert was checkmated , exclaimed sourly : " Oh , all right . Invite [him]201-clyde if [you]183-bella want to — if that 's the way [you]183-bella and [Dad]191-dad feel about it . [I]201-clyde do n't see any real necessity for it even now . But [you]183-bella fix it to suit [yourself]183-bella . [Constance]203-constance and [I]201-clyde are going over to [Utica]3-utica for the afternoon , anyhow , so [I]201-clyde could n't be there even if [I]201-clyde wanted to . "[201-clyde]

[He]200-gilbert was thinking of what an outrageous thing it was that [a girl whom [he]200-gilbert disliked as much as [he]200-gilbert did [Sondra]186-sondra]3273-a girl whom he disliked as much as he did sondra could thus via [her]3273-a girl whom he disliked as much as he did sondra determination and plottings thrust [[his]200-gilbert own cousin]2890-his own cousin on [him]200-gilbert and [he]200-gilbert be unable to prevent it . And what [a beggar]448-a beggar [Clyde]201-clyde must be to attempt to attach [himself]201-clyde in this way when [he]201-clyde knew that [he]201-clyde was not wanted ! What sort of [a youth]3276-a youth was [he]201-clyde , anyhow ?

And so it was that on Monday morning [Clyde]201-clyde had received another letter from [the Griffiths]201-clyde , this time signed by [Myra]182-myra , asking [him]201-clyde to have dinner with [them]3277-them at two o'clock Christmas Day . But , since this at that time did not seem to interfere with [his]200-gilbert meeting [Roberta]302-roberta Christmas night at eight , [he]200-gilbert merely gave [himself]200-gilbert over to extreme rejoicing in regard to it all now , and at last [he]200-gilbert was nearly as well placed here , socially , as [any one]4764-any one . For although [he]200-gilbert had no money , see how [he]200-gilbert was being received — and by [the Griffiths]201-clyde , too — among [all the others]3011-all the others . And [Sondra]186-sondra taking so great an interest in [him]200-gilbert , actually talking and acting as though [she]3280-she might be ready to fall in love . And [Gilbert]200-gilbert checkmated by [his]200-gilbert social popularity . What would [you]3281-you say to that ? It testified , as [he]200-gilbert saw it now , that at least [[his]200-gilbert relatives]1379-his relatives had not forgotten [him]200-gilbert or that , because of [his]200-gilbert recent success in other directions , [they]1379-his relatives were finding it necessary to be civil to [him]200-gilbert — a thought that was the same as the bays of victory to [a contestant]3283-a contestant . [He]200-gilbert viewed it with as much pleasure almost as though there had never been any hiatus at all .

Unfortunately , however , the Christmas dinner at [the Griffiths ']3284-the griffiths ' , which included [the Starks]258-the starks and [[their]258-the starks daughter]3285-their daughter [Arabella]183-bella , [Mr.]3286-mr. and [Mrs. Wynant]392-mrs. wynant , who in the absence of [[their]258-the starks daughter]3285-their daughter [Constance]203-constance with [Gilbert]200-gilbert were dining with [the Griffiths]200-gilbert , [the Arnolds]393-the arnolds , [Anthonys]192-the anthonys , [Harriets]196-the harriets , [Taylors]194-the taylors and others of note in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , so impressed and even overawed [Clyde]201-clyde that although five o'clock came and then six , [he]201-clyde was incapable of breaking away or thinking clearly and compellingly of [his]201-clyde obligation to [Roberta]302-roberta . Even when , slightly before six , [the greater portion of those who had been thus cheerfully entertained]3288-the greater portion of those who had been thus cheerfully entertained began rising and making [their]3288-the greater portion of those who had been thus cheerfully entertained bows and departing ( and when [he]201-clyde , too , should have been doing the same and thinking of [his]201-clyde appointment with [Roberta]302-roberta ) , being accosted by [Violet Taylor]394-violet taylor , who was part of [the younger group]5634-the younger group , and who now began talking of some additional festivities to be held that same evening at [the Anthonys ']3290-the anthonys ' , and who added most urgently , " [You]201-clyde 're coming with [us]5667-us , are n't [you]201-clyde ? Sure [you]302-roberta are , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde at once acquiesced , although [his]201-clyde earlier promise to [Roberta]302-roberta forced the remembrance that [she]302-roberta was probably already back and expecting [him]201-clyde . But still [he]201-clyde had time even now , did n't [he]201-clyde ?

Yet , once at [the Anthonys ']3290-the anthonys ' , and talking and dancing with [various girls]3292-various girls , the obligation faded . But at nine [he]201-clyde began worrying a little . For by this time [she]302-roberta must be in [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room and wondering what had become of [him]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde promise . And on Christmas night , too . And after [she]302-roberta had been away three days .

Inwardly [he]201-clyde grew more and more restless and troubled , the while outwardly [he]201-clyde maintained that same high spirit that characterized [him]201-clyde throughout the afternoon . Fortunately for [his]201-clyde own mood , [this same group]3294-this same group , having danced and frolicked every night for the past week until almost nervously exhausted , it now unanimously and unconsciously yielded to weariness and at eleven thirty , broke up . And after having escorted [Bella Griffiths]183-bella to [her]183-bella door , [Clyde]201-clyde hurried around to [Elm Street]90-elm street to see if by any chance [Roberta]302-roberta was still awake .

As [he]201-clyde neared [the Gilpins]395-the gilpins ' [he]201-clyde perceived through the snow - covered bushes and trees the glow of [her]302-roberta single lamp . And for the time being , troubled as to what [he]201-clyde should say — how excuse [himself]201-clyde for this inexplicable lapse — [he]201-clyde paused near one of the large trees that bordered [the street]1421-the street , debating with [himself]201-clyde as to just what [he]201-clyde would say . Would [he]201-clyde insist that [he]201-clyde had again been to [the Griffiths ']3284-the griffiths ' , or where ? For according to [his]201-clyde previous story [he]201-clyde had only been [there]4705-there the Friday before . In the months before when [he]201-clyde had no social contacts , but was merely romanticizing in regard to [them]3298-them , the untruths [he]201-clyde found [himself]201-clyde telling [her]302-roberta caused [him]201-clyde no twinges of any kind . They were not real and took up no actual portion of [his]201-clyde time , nor did they interfere with any of [his]201-clyde desired contacts with [her]302-roberta . But now in the face of the actuality and the fact that these new contacts meant everything to [his]201-clyde future , as [he]201-clyde saw it , [he]201-clyde hesitated . [His]201-clyde quick conclusion was to explain [his]201-clyde absence this evening by a second invitation which had come later , also by asseverating that [the Griffiths]183-bella being potentially in charge of [his]201-clyde material welfare , it was becoming more and more of a duty rather than an idle , evasive pleasure to desert [her]302-roberta in this way at [their]3299-their command . Could [he]201-clyde help it ? And with this half - truth permanently fixed in [his]201-clyde mind , [he]201-clyde crossed the snow and gently tapped at [her]302-roberta window .

At once the light was extinguished and a moment later the curtain lifted . Then [Roberta]302-roberta , who had been mournfully brooding , opened the door and admitted [him]201-clyde , having previously lit a candle as was [her]302-roberta custom in order to avoid detection as much as possible , and at once [he]201-clyde began in a whisper :

" [Gee]205-gee , but this society business here is getting to be the dizzy thing , [honey]5354-honey . [I]3300-i never saw such [a town as this]5669-a town as this . Once [you]5670-you go with [these people]1401-these people one place to do one thing , [they]1401-these people always have something else [they]1401-these people want [you]5670-you to do . [They]1401-these people 're on the go all the time . When [I]3300-i went [there]4705-there Friday ( [he]201-clyde was referring to [his]201-clyde lie about having gone to [the Griffiths]183-bella ' ) , [I]3300-i thought that would be the last until after the holidays , but yesterday , and just when [I]3300-i was planning to go somewhere else , [I]3300-i got a note saying [they]1401-these people expected [me]3300-i to come [there]4705-there again to - day for dinner sure . "[3300-i]

" And to - day when [I]3300-i thought the dinner would begin at two , "[3300-i] [he]3300-i continued to explain , " and end in time for [me]3301-she to be around [here]4728-here by eight like [I]3301-she said , it did n't start until three and only broke up a few minutes ago . Is n't that the limit ? And [I]3301-she just could n't get away for the last four hours . How 've [you]3301-she been , [honey]5354-honey ? Did [you]3301-she have a good time ? [I]3301-she hope so . Did [they]1401-these people like the present [I]3301-she gave [you]3301-she ? "[3301-she]

[He]3300-i rattled off these questions , to which [she]3301-she made brief and decidedly terse replies , all the time looking at [him]3300-i as much as to say , " Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde , how can [you]3300-i treat [me]3301-she like this ? "[3301-she]

But [Clyde]201-clyde was so much interested in [his]201-clyde own alibi , and how to convince [Roberta]302-roberta of the truth of it , that neither before nor after slipping off [his]201-clyde coat , muffler and gloves and smoothing back [his]201-clyde hair , did [he]201-clyde look at [her]3301-she directly , or even tenderly , or indeed do anything to demonstrate to [her]3301-she that [he]201-clyde was truly delighted to see [her]3301-she again . On the contrary , [he]201-clyde was so fidgety and in part flustered that despite [his]201-clyde past professions and actions [she]3301-she could feel that apart from being moderately glad to see [her]3301-she again [he]201-clyde was more concerned about [himself]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde own partially explained defection than [he]201-clyde was about [her]3301-she . And although after a few moments [he]201-clyde took [her]3301-she in [his]201-clyde arms and pressed [his]201-clyde lips to [hers]3301-she , still , as on Saturday , [she]3301-she could feel that [he]201-clyde was only partially united to [her]3301-she in spirit . Other things — the affairs that had kept [him]201-clyde from [her]3301-she on Friday and to - night — were disturbing [his]201-clyde thoughts and [hers]3301-she .

[She]3301-she looked at [him]201-clyde , not exactly believing and yet not entirely wishing to disbelieve [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde might have been at the Griffiths ' , as [he]201-clyde said , and [they]3302-they might have detained [him]201-clyde . And yet [he]201-clyde might not have , either . For [she]3301-she could not help recalling that on the previous Saturday [he]201-clyde had said [he]201-clyde had been there Friday and the paper on the other hand had stated that [he]201-clyde was in [Gloversville]52-gloversville . But if [she]3301-she questioned [him]201-clyde in regard to these things now , would [he]201-clyde not get angry and lie to [her]3301-she still more ? For after all [she]3301-she could not help thinking that apart from [his]201-clyde love for [her]3301-she [she]3301-she had no real claim on [him]201-clyde . But [she]3301-she could not possibly imagine that [he]201-clyde could change so quickly .

" So that was why [you]201-clyde did n't come to - night , was it ? "[3301-she] [she]3301-she asked , with more spirit and irritation than [she]3301-she had ever used with [him]201-clyde before . " [I]201-clyde thought [you]201-clyde told [me]201-clyde sure [you]201-clyde would n't let anything interfere , "[201-clyde] [she]3301-she went on , a little heavily .

" Well , so [I]3301-she did , "[3301-she] [he]201-clyde admitted . " And [I]302-roberta would n't have either , except for the letter [I]302-roberta got . [You]201-clyde know [I]302-roberta would n't let [any one]4764-any one but [[my]302-roberta uncle]4905-my uncle interfere , but [I]302-roberta could n't turn [them]4764-any one down when [they]4764-any one asked [me]302-roberta to come [there]4705-there on Christmas Day . It 's too important . It would n't look right , would it , especially when [you]201-clyde were n't going to be [here]4728-here in the afternoon ? "[302-roberta]

The manner and tone in which [he]201-clyde said this conveyed to [Roberta]302-roberta more clearly than anything that [he]201-clyde had ever said before how significant [he]201-clyde considered this connection with [[his]201-clyde relatives]1379-his relatives to be and how unimportant anything [she]302-roberta might value in regard to this relationship was to [him]201-clyde . It came to [her]302-roberta now that in spite of all [his]201-clyde enthusiasm and demonstrativeness in the first stages of this affair , possibly [she]302-roberta was much more trivial in [his]201-clyde estimation than [she]302-roberta had seemed to [herself]302-roberta . And that meant that [her]302-roberta dreams and sacrifices thus far had been in vain . [She]302-roberta became frightened .

" Well , anyhow , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta went on dubiously in the face of this , " do n't [you]201-clyde think [you]201-clyde might have left a note here , [Clyde]201-clyde , so [I]302-roberta would have got it when [I]302-roberta got in ? "[302-roberta] [She]302-roberta asked this mildly , not wishing to irritate [him]201-clyde too much .

" But did n't [I]302-roberta just tell [you]201-clyde , [honey]5354-honey , [I]302-roberta did n't expect to be so late . [I]302-roberta thought the thing would all be over by six , anyhow . "[302-roberta]

" Yes — well — anyhow — [I]302-roberta know — but still — "[302-roberta]

[Her]302-roberta face wore a puzzled , troubled , nervous look , in which was mingled fear , sorrow , depression , distrust , a trace of resentment and a trace of despair , all of which , coloring and animating [her]302-roberta eyes , which were now fixed on [him]201-clyde in round orblike solemnity , caused [him]201-clyde to suffer from a sense of having misused and demeaned [her]302-roberta not a little . And because [her]302-roberta eyes seemed to advertise this , [he]201-clyde flushed a dark red flush that colored deeply [his]201-clyde naturally very pale cheeks . But without appearing to notice this or lay any stress on it in any way at the time , [Roberta]302-roberta added after a moment : " [I]201-clyde notice that [The Star]296-the star mentioned that [Gloversville]52-gloversville party Sunday , but it did n't say anything about [[your]201-clyde cousins]5560-your cousins being over there . Were [they]5560-your cousins ? "[201-clyde]

For the first time in all [her]302-roberta questioning of [him]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta asked this as though [she]302-roberta might possibly doubt [him]201-clyde — a development which [Clyde]201-clyde had scarcely anticipated in connection with [her]302-roberta up to this time , and more than anything else , it troubled and irritated [him]201-clyde .

" Of course [they]5560-your cousins were , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde replied falsely . " Why do [you]302-roberta want to ask a thing like that when [I]3304-she told [you]302-roberta [they]5560-your cousins were ? "[3304-she]

" Well , [dear]5356-dear , [I]201-clyde do n't mean anything by it . [I]201-clyde only wanted to know . But [I]201-clyde did notice that it mentioned [all those other people from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]5683-all those other people from lycurgus that [you]302-roberta are always talking about , [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra , [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine . [You]302-roberta know [you]302-roberta never mentioned [anybody]1510-anybody but [the Trumbulls]346-the trumbulls . "[201-clyde]

[Her]3304-she tone tended to make [him]201-clyde bristle and grow cross , as [she]3304-she saw .

" Yes , [I]3304-she saw that , too , but it ai n't so . If [they]346-the trumbulls were there , [I]3304-she did n't see [them]346-the trumbulls . The papers do n't always get everything right . "[3304-she] In spite of a certain crossness and irritation at being trapped in this fashion , [his]201-clyde manner did not carry conviction , and [he]201-clyde knew it . And [he]201-clyde began to resent the fact that [she]3304-she should question [him]201-clyde so . Why should [she]3304-she ? Was n't [he]201-clyde of sufficient importance to move in this new world without [her]3304-she holding [him]201-clyde back in this way ?

Instead of denying or reproaching [him]201-clyde further , [she]3304-she merely looked at [him]201-clyde , [her]3304-she expression one of injured wistfulness . [She]3304-she did not believe [him]201-clyde now entirely and [she]3304-she did not utterly disbelieve [him]201-clyde . A part of what [he]201-clyde said was probably true . More important was it that [he]201-clyde should care for [her]3304-she enough not to want to lie to [her]3304-she or to treat [her]3304-she badly . But how was that to be effected if [he]201-clyde did not want to be kind or truthful ? [She]3304-she moved back from [him]201-clyde a few steps and with a gesture of helplessness said : " Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde , [you]201-clyde do n't have to story to [me]201-clyde . Do n't [you]201-clyde know that ? [I]201-clyde would n't care where [you]201-clyde went if [you]201-clyde would just tell [me]201-clyde beforehand and not leave [me]201-clyde like this all alone on Christmas night . It 's just that that hurts so . "[201-clyde]

" But [I]201-clyde 'm not storying to [you]3304-she , [Roberta]302-roberta , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde reiterated crossly . " [I]302-roberta ca n't help how things look even if the paper did say so . [The Griffiths]201-clyde were over there , and [I]302-roberta can prove it . [I]302-roberta got around here as soon as [I]302-roberta could to - day . What do [you]3304-she want to get so mad about all at once ? [I]302-roberta 've told [you]3304-she how things are . [I]302-roberta ca n't do just as [I]302-roberta want to here . [They]5685-they call [me]302-roberta up at the last minute and want [me]302-roberta to go . And [I]302-roberta just ca n't get out of it . What 's the use of being so mad about it ? "[302-roberta]

[He]201-clyde stared defiantly while [Roberta]302-roberta , checkmated in this general way , was at a loss as to how to proceed . The item about New Year 's Eve was in [her]302-roberta mind , but [she]302-roberta felt that it might not be wise to say anything more now . More poignantly than ever now [she]302-roberta was identifying [him]201-clyde with that gay life of which [he]201-clyde , but not [she]302-roberta , was a part . And yet [she]302-roberta hesitated even now to let [him]201-clyde know how sharp were the twinges of jealousy that were beginning to assail [her]302-roberta . [They]3305-they had such a good time in that fine world — [he]201-clyde and [those [he]201-clyde knew]3306-those he knew — and [she]302-roberta had so little . And besides , now [he]201-clyde was always talking about that [Sondra Finchley]186-sondra and that [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine , or the papers were . Was it in either of those that [he]201-clyde was most interested ?

" Do [you]201-clyde like that [Miss Finchley]283-miss finchley very much ? "[201-clyde] [she]302-roberta suddenly asked , looking up at [him]201-clyde in the shadow , [her]302-roberta desire to obtain some slight satisfaction — some little light on all this trouble — still torturing [her]302-roberta .

At once [Clyde]201-clyde sensed the importance of the question — a suggestion of partially suppressed interest and jealousy and helplessness , more in [her]302-roberta voice even than in the way [she]302-roberta looked . There was something so soft , coaxing and sad about [her]302-roberta voice at times , especially when [she]302-roberta was most depressed . At the same time [he]201-clyde was slightly taken back by the shrewd or telepathic way in which [she]302-roberta appeared to fix on [Sondra]186-sondra . Immediately [he]201-clyde felt that [she]302-roberta should not know — that it would irritate [her]302-roberta . At the same time , vanity in regard to [his]201-clyde general position here , which hourly was becoming more secure apparently , caused [him]201-clyde to say :

" Oh , [I]302-roberta like [her]1435-this girl some , sure . [She]1435-this girl 's very pretty , and [a dandy dancer]5686-a dandy dancer . And [she]1435-this girl has lots of money and dresses well . "[302-roberta] [He]201-clyde was about to add that outside of that [Sondra]186-sondra appealed to [him]201-clyde in no other way , when [Roberta]302-roberta , sensing something of the true interest [he]201-clyde felt in [this girl]1435-this girl perhaps and the wide gulf that lay between [herself]302-roberta and [all [his]201-clyde world]3308-all his world , suddenly exclaimed : " Yes , and who would n't , with all the money [she]1435-this girl has ? If [I]201-clyde had as much money as that , [I]201-clyde could too . "[201-clyde]

And to [his]201-clyde astonishment and dismay even , at this point [her]302-roberta voice grew suddenly vibrant and then broke , as on a sob . And as [he]201-clyde could both see and feel , [she]302-roberta was deeply hurt — terribly and painfully hurt — heartsore and jealous ; and at once , although [his]201-clyde first impulse was to grow angry and defiant again , [his]201-clyde mood as suddenly softened . For it now pained [him]201-clyde not a little to think that [some one of whom [he]201-clyde [had once been so continuously fond up to this time]3310-had once been so continuously fond up to this time]3309-some one of whom he had once been so continuously fond up to this time should be made to suffer through jealousy of [him]201-clyde , for [he]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde well knew the pangs of jealousy in connection with [Hortense]220-hortense briggs . [He]201-clyde could for some reason almost see [himself]201-clyde in [[Roberta]302-roberta 's place]3311-roberta 's place . And for this reason , if no other , [he]201-clyde now said , and quite softly : " Oh , now , [Roberta]302-roberta , as though [I]302-roberta could n't tell [you]302-roberta about [her]302-roberta or [any one else]5282-any one else without [your]302-roberta getting mad about it ! [I]302-roberta did n't mean that [I]302-roberta was especially interested in [her]302-roberta . [I]302-roberta was just telling [you]302-roberta what [I]302-roberta thought [you]302-roberta wanted to know because [you]302-roberta asked [me]302-roberta if [I]302-roberta liked [her]302-roberta , that 's all . "[302-roberta]

" Oh , yes , [I]302-roberta know , "[302-roberta] replied [Roberta]302-roberta , standing tensely and nervously before [him]201-clyde , [her]302-roberta face white , [her]302-roberta hands suddenly clenched , and looking up at [him]201-clyde dubiously and yet pleadingly . " But [they]5688-they 've got everything . [You]201-clyde know [they]5688-they have . And [I]302-roberta have n't got anything , really . And it 's so hard for [me]302-roberta to keep up [my]302-roberta end and against all of [them]5688-they , too , and with all [they]5688-they have . "[302-roberta] [Her]302-roberta voice shook , and [she]302-roberta ceased talking , [her]302-roberta eyes filling and [her]302-roberta lips beginning to quiver . And as swiftly [she]302-roberta concealed [her]302-roberta face with [her]302-roberta hands and turned away , [her]302-roberta shoulders shaking as [she]302-roberta did so . Indeed [her]302-roberta body was now torn for the moment by the most desperate and convulsive sobs , so much so that [Clyde]201-clyde , perplexed and astonished and deeply moved by this sudden display of a pent - up and powerful emotion , as suddenly was [himself]201-clyde moved deeply . For obviously this was no trick or histrionic bit intended to influence [him]201-clyde , but rather a sudden and overwhelming vision of [herself]302-roberta , as [he]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde could sense , as [a rather lorn and isolated girl without [friends]451-friends or prospects as opposed to those others in whom [he]201-clyde was now so interested and who had so much more — everything in fact . [She]302-roberta was really intensely moved — overwhelmingly and helplessly .

And now from the very bottom of [her]302-roberta heart [she]302-roberta exclaimed : " If [I]201-clyde 'd ever had a chance like [some girls]446-some girls — if [I]201-clyde 'd ever been anywhere or seen anything ! But just to be brought up in [the country]5374-the country and without any money or clothes or anything — and [nobody]4859-nobody to show [you]201-clyde . Oh , oh , oh , oh , oh ! "[201-clyde]

The moment [she]302-roberta said these things [she]302-roberta was actually ashamed of having made so weak and self - condemnatory a confession , since that was what really was troubling [him]201-clyde in connection with [her]302-roberta , no doubt .

" Oh , [Roberta]302-roberta , [darling]5692-darling , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said instantly and tenderly , putting [his]201-clyde arms around [her]302-roberta , genuinely moved by [his]201-clyde own dereliction . " [You]302-roberta must n't cry like that , [dearest]5383-dearest . [You]302-roberta must n't . [I]188-stuart did n't mean to hurt [you]302-roberta , honest [I]188-stuart did n't . There was about [Clyde]201-clyde at times a certain strain of tenderness , evoked by experiences , disappointments , and hardships in [his]201-clyde own life , which came out to one and another , almost any other , under such circumstances as these . At such times [he]201-clyde had a soft and melting voice . [His]201-clyde manner was as tender and gentle almost as that of [a mother]3314-a mother with [a baby]2313-a baby . It drew [a girl like [Roberta]302-roberta]3316-a girl like roberta intensely to [him]201-clyde . At the same time , such emotion in [him]201-clyde , though vivid , was of brief duration . It was like the rush and flutter of a summer storm — soon come and soon gone . Yet in this instance it was sufficient to cause [Roberta]302-roberta to feel that [he]201-clyde fully understood and sympathized with [her]302-roberta and perhaps liked [her]302-roberta all the better for it . Things were not so had for the moment , anyhow . [She]302-roberta had [him]201-clyde and [his]201-clyde love and sympathy to a very marked degree at any rate , and because of this and [her]302-roberta very great comfort in it , and [his]201-clyde soothing words , [she]302-roberta began to dry [her]302-roberta eyes , to say that [she]302-roberta was sorry to think that [she]302-roberta was such [a cry - baby]3317-a cry - baby and that [she]302-roberta hoped [he]201-clyde would forgive [her]302-roberta , because in crying [she]302-roberta had wet the bosom of [his]201-clyde spotless white shirt with [her]302-roberta tears . And [she]302-roberta would not do it any more if [Clyde]201-clyde would just forgive [her]302-roberta this once — the while , touched by a passion [he]201-clyde scarcely believed was buried in [her]302-roberta in any such volume , [he]201-clyde now continued to kiss [her]302-roberta hands , cheeks , and finally [her]302-roberta lips .

And between these pettings and coaxings and kissings it was that [he]201-clyde reaffirmed to [her]302-roberta , most foolishly and falsely in this instance ( since [he]201-clyde was really caring for [Sondra]186-sondra in a way which , while different , was just as vital — perhaps even more so ) , that [he]201-clyde regarded [her]302-roberta as first , last and most in [his]201-clyde heart , always — a statement which caused [her]302-roberta to feel that perhaps after all [she]302-roberta might have misjudged [him]201-clyde . Also that [her]302-roberta position , if anything , was more secure , if not more wonderful than ever it had been before — far superior to that of [these other girls who might see [him]201-clyde socially perhaps , but who did not have [him]201-clyde to love [them]3318-these other girls who might see him socially perhaps , but who did not have him to love them in this wonderful way in this wonderful way]3318-these other girls who might see him socially perhaps , but who did not have him to love them in this wonderful way .

[Clyde]201-clyde now was actually part and parcel of this local winter social scene . [The Griffiths]201-clyde having introduced [him]201-clyde to [[their]3319-their friends]1829-their friends and connections , it followed as a matter of course that [he]201-clyde would be received in [most homes]3321-most homes [here]4728-here . But in this very limited world , where [quite every one who was anything at all]3323-quite every one who was anything at all knew [every one else]3324-every one else , the state of [one]578-one 's purse was as much , and in some instances even more , considered than one 's social connections . For [these local families of distinction]3326-these local families of distinction were convinced that not only [[one]578-one 's family]3328-one 's family but [one]578-one 's wealth was the be - all and end - all of every happy union meant to include social security . And in consequence , while considering [Clyde]201-clyde as one who was unquestionably eligible socially , still , because it had been whispered about that [his]201-clyde means were very slender , [they]3319-their were not inclined to look upon [him]201-clyde as [one who might aspire to marriage with any of [[their]3319-their daughters]3331-their daughters]3330-one who might aspire to marriage with any of their daughters . Hence , while [they]3319-their were to the fore with invitations , still in so far as [[their]3319-their own children]3332-their own children and connections were concerned [they]3319-their were also to the fore with precautionary hints as to the inadvisability of too numerous contacts with [him]201-clyde .

However , the mood of [Sondra]186-sondra and [[her]3333-her group]3334-her group being friendly toward [him]201-clyde , and the observations and comments of [[their]3319-their friends]1829-their friends and [parents]3336-parents not as yet too definite , [Clyde]201-clyde continued to receive invitations to the one type of gathering that most interested [him]201-clyde — that which began and ended with dancing . And although [his]201-clyde purse was short , [he]201-clyde got on well enough . For once [Sondra]186-sondra had interested [herself]186-sondra in [him]201-clyde , it was not long before [she]3333-her began to realize what [his]201-clyde financial state was and was concerned to make [his]201-clyde friendship for [her]3333-her at least as inexpensive as possible . And because of this attitude on [her]3333-her part , which in turn was conveyed to [Bertine]197-bertine , [Grant Cranston]207-grant and [others]561-others , it became possible on most occasions for [Clyde]201-clyde , especially when the affair was local , to go here and there without the expenditure of any money . Even when the affair was at any point beyond [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and [he]201-clyde consented to go , [the car]650-the car of [another]3339-another was delegated to pick [him]201-clyde up .

Frequently after the New Year 's Eve trip to [Schenectady]60-schenectady , which proved to be an outing of real import to both [Clyde]201-clyde and [Sondra]186-sondra — seeing that on that occasion [she]3333-her drew nearer to [him]201-clyde affectionately than ever before — it was [Sondra]186-sondra [herself]186-sondra who chose to pick [him]201-clyde up in [[her]3333-her car]3078-her car . [He]201-clyde had actually succeeded in impressing [her]3333-her , and in a way that most flattered [her]3333-her vanity at the same time that it appealed to the finest trait in [her]3333-her — a warm desire to have [some one]4723-some one , [some youth like [Clyde]201-clyde , who was at once attractive and of good social station , dependent upon [her]3333-her]3342-some youth like clyde , who was at once attractive and of good social station , dependent upon her . [She]3333-her knew that [[her]3333-her parents]453-her parents would not countenance an affair between [her]3333-her and [Clyde]201-clyde because of [his]201-clyde poverty . [She]3333-her had originally not contemplated any , though now [she]3333-her found [herself]3333-her wishing that something of the kind might be .

However , no opportunity for further intimacies occurred until one night about two weeks after the New Year 's party . [They]453-her parents were returning from a similar affair at [Amsterdam]55-amsterdam , and after [Bella Griffiths]183-bella and [Grant]207-grant and [Bertine Cranston]197-bertine had been driven to [[their]453-her parents respective homes]3344-their respective homes , [Stuart Finchley]188-stuart had called back : " Now [we]453-her parents 'll take [you]201-clyde [home]4793-home , [Griffiths]183-bella . "[186-sondra] At once [Sondra]186-sondra , swayed by the delight of contact with [Clyde]201-clyde and not willing to end it so soon , said : " If [you]201-clyde want to come over to [[our]453-her parents place]5703-our place , [I]201-clyde 'll make some hot chocolate before [you]201-clyde go [home]4793-home . " Oh , sure [I]188-stuart would , "[188-stuart] [Clyde]201-clyde had answered gayly .

And having turned [the car]650-the car into [the garage]1117-the garage , [the three]1616-the three made [their]1616-the three way through the rear entrance into [the kitchen]1443-the kitchen . [[Her]3351-she brother]4719-her brother having left [them]1616-the three , [Sondra]186-sondra asked [Clyde]201-clyde to be seated at [a servants]3353-a servants ' table while [she]3351-she brought the ingredients . But [he]201-clyde , impressed by this culinary equipment , the like of which [he]201-clyde had never seen before , gazed about wondering at the wealth and security which could sustain it .

" [My]201-clyde , this is [a big kitchen]5706-a big kitchen , is n't [it]5706-a big kitchen ? "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde remarked . " What a lot of things [you]3351-she have here to cook with , have n't [you]3351-she ? "[3351-she]

[Clyde]201-clyde , thinking of the poverty [he]201-clyde knew , and assuming from this that [she]3351-she was scarcely aware of anything less than this , was all the more overawed by the plethora of [the world to which [she]3351-she belonged]3354-the world to which she belonged . What means ! Only to think of being married to [such a girl]2842-such a girl , when all such as this would become an everyday state . [One]578-one would have [a cook]3357-a cook and [servants]3358-servants , [a great house]3359-a great house and [car]3360-car , [no one to work for , and only orders to give]3361-no one to work for , and only orders to give , a thought which impressed [him]201-clyde greatly . It made [her]3351-she various self - conscious gestures and posings all the more entrancing . And [she]3351-she , sensing the import of all this to [Clyde]201-clyde , was inclined to exaggerate [her]3351-she own inseparable connection with it . To [him]201-clyde , more than [any one else]5282-any one else , as [she]3351-she now saw , [she]3351-she shone as a star , [a paragon of luxury and social supremacy]3363-a paragon of luxury and social supremacy .

Having prepared the chocolate in a commonplace aluminum pan , to further impress [him]201-clyde [she]3351-she sought out a heavily chased silver service which was in [another room]2575-another room . [She]3351-she poured the chocolate into a highly ornamented urn and then carried it to the table and put it down before [him]201-clyde . " Oh , is that so ? "[3351-she] asked [Clyde]201-clyde , who was quite unaware of the ways of cooks in connection with [private homes]3365-private homes — an inquiry which quite convinced [Sondra]186-sondra that there must have been little if any real means in [the world from which [he]201-clyde sprang]3366-the world from which he sprang . In fact , [his]201-clyde imagination in regard to [her]3351-she was really inflamed . Youth , beauty , wealth such as this — what would it not mean ? And [she]3351-she , feeling the intensity of [his]201-clyde admiration and infected in part at least by the enchantment and fervor that was so definitely dominating [him]201-clyde , was swayed to the point where [she]3351-she was seeing [him]201-clyde as one for whom [she]3351-she could care — very much . Were n't [his]201-clyde eyes bright and dark — very liquid and eager ? And [his]201-clyde hair ! It looked so enticing , lying low upon [his]201-clyde white forehead . [She]3351-she wished that [she]3351-she could touch it now — smooth it with [her]3351-she hands and touch [his]201-clyde cheeks . And [his]201-clyde hands — they were thin and sensitive and graceful . Like [Roberta]302-roberta , and [Hortense]220-hortense briggs and [Rita]260-rita before [her]3351-she , [she]3351-she noticed them .

But [he]201-clyde was silent now with a tightly restrained silence which [he]201-clyde was afraid to liberate in words . For [he]201-clyde was thinking : " Oh , if only [I]3351-she could say to [her]3351-she how beautiful [I]3351-she really think [she]3351-she is . "[3351-she] And strangely , considering [his]201-clyde first approaches toward [Roberta]302-roberta , the thought was without lust , just the desire to constrain and fondle a perfect object . Indeed , [his]201-clyde eyes fairly radiated this desire and intensity . And while [she]3351-she noted this and was in part made dubious by it , since it was the thing in [Clyde]201-clyde [she]3351-she most feared — still [she]3351-she was intrigued by it to the extent of wishing to know its further meaning .

And so [she]3351-she now said , teasingly : " Was there anything very important [you]201-clyde wanted to say ? "[201-clyde]

" [I]3351-she 'd like to say a lot of things to [you]3351-she , [Sondra]186-sondra , if [you]3351-she would only let [me]3351-she , "[3351-she] [he]201-clyde returned eagerly . " But [you]3351-she told [me]3351-she not to . "[3351-she]

"[201-clyde]

[He]3367-him lifted [his]3367-him hands as though to caress [her]3368-her gently , yet holding them back , and at the same time dreamed into [her]3368-her eyes as might [a devotee]3369-a devotee into those of [a saint]3370-a saint , then suddenly put [his]3367-him arms about [her]3368-her and drew [her]3368-her close to [him]3367-him . [She]3368-her was so trapped and entranced by [his]3367-him passion for [her]3368-her that it seemed to [her]3368-her now as though [she]3368-her might care for [him]3367-him as much as [he]3367-him wished . Very , very much , if [she]3368-her only dared . [He]3367-him , too , was beautiful and alluring to [her]3368-her . [He]3367-him , too , was really wonderful , even if [he]3367-him were poor — so much more intense and dynamic than any of [these other youths that [she]3368-her knew here]3371-these other youths that she knew here . Yet regardless of this thought now , which arrested and stilled [her]3368-her for a moment , [she]3368-her continued to yearn toward [him]3367-him . "[3367-him]

" Oh , [Sondra]186-sondra , when [I]3368-her love [you]3367-him so much and [I]3368-her 'm so crazy about [you]3367-him ! Do n't [you]3367-him care at all like [I]3368-her care for [you]3367-him ? "[3368-her]

Because of the uncertainty expressed by [her]3368-her , [his]3367-him eyes were now seeking , frightened , sad . The combination had an intense appeal for [her]3368-her . [She]3368-her merely looked at [him]3367-him dubiously , wondering what could be the result of such an infatuation as this . And [he]3367-him , noting the wavering something in [her]3368-her own eyes , pulled [her]3368-her closer and kissed [her]3368-her . Instead of resenting it [she]3368-her lay for a moment willingly , joyously , in [his]3367-him arms , then suddenly sat up , the thought of what [she]3368-her was permitting [him]3367-him to do — kiss [her]3368-her in this way — and what it must mean to [him]3367-him , causing [her]3368-her on the instant to recover all [her]3368-her poise . " [I]3368-her think [you]201-clyde 'd better go now , "[3368-her] [she]3368-her said definitely , yet not unkindly . " Do n't [you]201-clyde ? "[201-clyde]

And [Clyde]201-clyde , who [himself]201-clyde had been surprised and afterwards a little startled , and hence reduced by [his]201-clyde own boldness , now pleaded rather weakly , and yet submissively . " Angry ? "[3368-her]

And [she]3368-her , in turn sensing [his]201-clyde submissiveness , that of [the slave]3374-the slave for [the master]3375-the master , and in part liking and in part resenting it , since like [Roberta]302-roberta and [Hortense]220-hortense briggs , even [she]3368-her preferred to be mastered rather than to [master]1067-master , shook [her]3368-her head negatively and a little sadly .

" It 's very late , "[302-roberta] was all [she]3368-her said , and smiled tenderly .

And [Clyde]201-clyde , realizing that for some reason [he]201-clyde must not say more , had not the courage or persistence or the background to go further with [her]3368-her now , went for [his]201-clyde coat and , looking sadly but obediently back at [her]3368-her , departed .

One of the things that [Roberta]302-roberta soon found was that [her]302-roberta intuitive notions in regard to all this were not without speedy substantiation . For exactly as before , though with the usual insistence afterward that there was no real help for it , there continued to be these same last moment changes of plan and unannounced absences . And although [she]302-roberta complained at times , or pleaded , or merely contented [herself]302-roberta with quite silent and not always obvious " blues , "[302-roberta] still these same effected no real modification or improvement . For [Clyde]201-clyde was now hopelessly enamored of [Sandra]343-sandra and by no means to be changed , or moved even , by anything in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta . [Sondra]186-sondra was too wonderful !

At the same time because [she]3368-her was there all of the working hours of each day in [the same room]3377-the same room with [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde could not fail instinctively to feel some of the thoughts that employed [her]3368-her mind — such dark , sad , despairing thoughts . And these seized upon [him]201-clyde at times as definitely and poignantly as though they were voices of accusation or complaint — so much so that [he]201-clyde could not help but suggest by way of amelioration that [he]201-clyde would like to see [her]3368-her and that [he]201-clyde was coming around that night if [she]3368-her were going to be [home]4793-home . And so distrait was [she]3368-her , and still so infatuated with [him]201-clyde , that [she]3368-her could not resist admitting that [she]3368-her wanted [him]201-clyde to come . And once there , the psychic personality of the past as well as of [the room itself]3379-the room itself was not without its persuasion and hence emotional compulsion .

But most foolishly anticipating , as [he]201-clyde now did , a future more substantial than the general local circumstances warranted , [he]201-clyde was more concerned than ever lest [his]201-clyde present relationship to [Roberta]302-roberta should in any way prove inimical to all this . Supposing that [Sondra]186-sondra at some time , in some way , should find out concerning [Roberta]302-roberta ? How fatal that would be ! Or that [Roberta]302-roberta should become aware of [his]201-clyde devotion to [Sondra]186-sondra and so develop an active resentment which should carry [her]3368-her to the length of denouncing or exposing [him]201-clyde . For subsequent to the New Year 's Eve engagement , [he]201-clyde was all too frequently appearing at the factory of a morning with explanatory statements that because of some invitation from [the Griffiths]201-clyde , [Harriets]196-the harriets , or others , [he]201-clyde would not be able to keep an engagement with [her]3368-her that night , for instance , that [he]201-clyde had made a day or two before . And later , on three different occasions , because [Sondra]186-sondra had called for [him]201-clyde in [[her]3368-her car]3078-her car , [he]201-clyde had departed without a word , trusting to what might come to [him]201-clyde the next day in the way of an excuse to smooth the matter over .

Yet anomalous , if not exactly unprecedented as it may seem , this condition of mingled sympathy and opposition gave rise at last to the feeling in [him]201-clyde that come what might [he]201-clyde must find some method of severing this tie , even though it lacerated [Roberta]302-roberta to the point of death ( Why should [he]201-clyde care ? [He]201-clyde had never told [her]3368-her that [he]201-clyde would marry [her]3368-her . ) or endangered [his]201-clyde own position here in case [she]3368-her were not satisfied to release [him]201-clyde as voicelessly as [he]201-clyde wished . At other times it caused [him]201-clyde to feel that indeed [he]201-clyde was [a sly and shameless and cruel person who had taken undue advantage of [a girl who , left to [herself]3368-her , would never have troubled with [him]201-clyde]3382-a girl who , left to herself , would never have troubled with him]3381-a sly and shameless and cruel person who had taken undue advantage of a girl who , left to herself , would never have troubled with him . And this latter mood , in spite of slights and lies and thinly excused neglects and absences at times in the face of the most definite agreements — so strange is the libido of the race — brought about the reenactment of the infernal or celestial command laid upon [Adam]396-adam and [[his]396-adam breed]3383-his breed : " [Thy]396-adam desire shall be to [[thy]396-adam mate]5716-thy mate . "[302-roberta]

But there was this to be said in connection with the relationship between [these two]2958-these two , that no time , owing to the inexperience of [Clyde]201-clyde , as well as [Roberta]302-roberta , had there been any adequate understanding or use of more than the simplest , and for the most part unsatisfactory , contraceptive devices . About the middle of February , and , interestingly enough , at about the time when [Clyde]201-clyde , because of the continuing favor of [Sondra]186-sondra , had about reached the point where [he]201-clyde was determined once and for all to end , not only this physical , but all other connection with [Roberta]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta on [her]302-roberta part was beginning to see clearly that , in spite of [his]201-clyde temporizing and [her]302-roberta own incurable infatuation for [him]201-clyde , pursuit of [him]201-clyde by [her]302-roberta was futile and that it would be more to the satisfaction of [her]302-roberta pride , if not to the ease of [her]302-roberta heart , if [she]302-roberta were to leave [here]4728-here and in some other place seek some financial help that would permit [her]302-roberta to live and still help [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents and forget [him]201-clyde if [she]302-roberta could . Unfortunately for this , [she]302-roberta was compelled , to [her]302-roberta dismay and terror , to enter [the factory]440-the factory one morning , just about this time , [her]302-roberta face a symbol of even graver and more terrifying doubts and fears than any that had hitherto assailed [her]302-roberta . For now , in addition to [her]302-roberta own troubled conclusions in regard to [Clyde]201-clyde , there had sprung up over night the dark and constraining fear that even this might not now be possible , for the present at least . For because of [her]302-roberta own and [Clyde]201-clyde 's temporizing over [his]201-clyde and [her]302-roberta sentimentality and [her]302-roberta unconquerable affection for [him]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta now , at a time when it was most inimical for both , found [herself]302-roberta pregnant .

Ever since [she]302-roberta had yielded to [his]201-clyde blandishments , [she]302-roberta had counted the days and always had been able to congratulate [herself]302-roberta that all was well . But forty - eight hours since the always exactly calculated time had now passed , and there had been no sign . And for four days preceding this [Clyde]201-clyde had not even been near [her]302-roberta . And [his]201-clyde attitude at [the factory]440-the factory was more remote and indifferent than ever .

And now , this !

And [she]302-roberta had [no one]4713-no one but [him]201-clyde to whom [she]302-roberta might turn . And [he]201-clyde was in this estranged and indifferent mood .

Because of [her]302-roberta fright , induced by the fear that with or without [Clyde]201-clyde 's aid [she]302-roberta might not easily be extricated from [her]302-roberta threatened predicament , [she]302-roberta could see [[her]302-roberta home]1450-her home , [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother , [[her]302-roberta relatives]3392-her relatives , all who knew [her]302-roberta , and [their]3392-her relatives thoughts in case anything like this should befall [her]302-roberta . For of the opinion of [society in general]3393-society in general and what [other people]5417-other people might say , [Roberta]302-roberta stood in extreme terror . The stigma of unsanctioned concupiscence ! The shame of illegitimacy for [a child]3395-a child ! It was bad enough , as [she]302-roberta had always thought , listening to [girls]894-girls and [women]467-women talk of life and marriage and adultery and the miseries that had befallen girls who had yielded to [men and subsequently been deserted]3398-men and subsequently been deserted , for [a woman when [she]302-roberta was safely married and sustained by the love and strength of [a man]4740-a man — such love , for instance , as [[her]302-roberta brother]4719-her brother - in - law [Gabel]387-gabel brought to [[her]302-roberta sister]461-her sister [Agnes]309-agnes , and [[her]302-roberta father]510-her father to [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother in the first years , no doubt]3399-a woman when she was safely married and sustained by the love and strength of a man — such love , for instance , as her brother - in - law gabel brought to her sister agnes , and her father to her mother in the first years , no doubt — and [Clyde]201-clyde to [her]302-roberta when [he]201-clyde had so feverishly declared that [he]201-clyde loved [her]302-roberta .

But now — now !

[She]302-roberta could not permit any thoughts in regard to [his]201-clyde recent or present attitude to delay [her]302-roberta . Regardless of either , [he]201-clyde must help [her]302-roberta . [She]302-roberta did not know what else to do under such circumstances — which way to turn . And no doubt [Clyde]201-clyde did . At any rate [he]201-clyde had said once that [he]201-clyde would stand by [her]302-roberta in case anything happened . And although , because at first , even on the third day on reaching [the factory]440-the factory , [she]302-roberta imagined that [she]302-roberta might be exaggerating the danger and that it was perhaps some physical flaw or lapse that might still overcome itself , still by late afternoon no evidence of any change coming to [her]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta began to be a prey to the most nameless terrors . What little courage [she]302-roberta had mustered up to this time began to waver and break . [She]302-roberta was all alone , unless [he]201-clyde came to [her]302-roberta now . And [she]302-roberta was in need of advice and good counsel — loving counsel . Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde ! [Clyde]201-clyde ! If [he]201-clyde would only not be so indifferent to [her]302-roberta ! [He]201-clyde must not be ! Something must be done , and right away — quick — else — Great Heavens , what a terrible thing this could easily come to be !

At once [she]302-roberta stopped [her]302-roberta work between four and five in the afternoon and hurried to [the dressing - room]3406-the dressing - room . And there [she]302-roberta penned a note — hurried , hysterical — a scrawl .

" [CLYDE]201-clyde — [I]201-clyde must see [you]201-clyde to - night , sure , sure . [You]201-clyde must n't fail [me]201-clyde . [I]201-clyde have something to tell [you]201-clyde . Please come as soon after work as possible , or meet [me]201-clyde anywhere . [I]201-clyde 'm not angry or mad about anything . But [I]201-clyde must see [you]201-clyde to - night , sure . Please say right away where .[201-clyde]

" [ROBERTA]302-roberta . "[302-roberta] And [he]201-clyde , sensing a new and strange and quite terrified note in all this the moment [he]201-clyde read it , at once looked over [his]201-clyde shoulder at [her]302-roberta and , seeing [her]302-roberta face so white and drawn , signaled that [he]201-clyde would meet [her]302-roberta . For judging by [her]302-roberta face the thing [she]302-roberta had to tell must be of the utmost importance to [her]302-roberta , else why this tensity and excitement on [her]302-roberta part . And although [he]201-clyde had another engagement later , as [he]201-clyde now troublesomely recalled , at [the Starks]258-the starks for dinner , still it was necessary to do this first . Yet , what was it anyhow ? Was [anybody]1510-anybody dead or hurt or what — [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother or [father]435-father or [brother]3047-brother or [sister]2579-sister ?

At five - thirty , [he]201-clyde made [his]201-clyde way to [the appointed place]3412-the appointed place , wondering what it could be that could make [her]302-roberta so pale and concerned . Yet at the same time saying to [himself]201-clyde that if this other dream in regard to [Sondra]186-sondra were to come true [he]201-clyde must not let [himself]201-clyde be reentangled by any great or moving sympathy — must maintain [his]201-clyde new poise and distance so that [Roberta]302-roberta could see that [he]201-clyde no longer cared for [her]302-roberta as [he]201-clyde had . Reaching the appointed place at six o'clock , [he]201-clyde found [her]302-roberta leaning disconsolately against a tree in the shadow . [She]302-roberta looked distraught , despondent .

" Why , what 's the matter , [Roberta]302-roberta ? What are [you]302-roberta so frightened about ? What 's happened ? "[302-roberta]

Even [his]201-clyde obviously dwindling affection was restimulated by [her]302-roberta quite visible need of help .

" Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta said at last , " [I]201-clyde hardly know how to tell [you]201-clyde . It 's so terrible for [me]201-clyde if it 's so . "[201-clyde] [Her]302-roberta voice , tense and yet low , was in itself a clear proof of [her]302-roberta anguish and uncertainty .

" Why , what is it , [Bert]189-gil ? Why do n't [you]302-roberta tell [me]201-clyde ? "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde reiterated , briskly and yet cautiously , essaying an air of detached assurance which [he]201-clyde could not quite manage in this instance . " What 's wrong ? What are [you]302-roberta so excited about ? [You]302-roberta 're all trembly . "[302-roberta]

Because of the fact that never before in all [his]201-clyde life had [he]201-clyde been confronted by any such predicament as this , it did not even now occur to [him]201-clyde just what the true difficulty could be . At the same time , being rather estranged and hence embarrassed by [his]201-clyde recent treatment of [her]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde was puzzled as to just what attitude to assume in a situation where obviously something was wrong . Being sensitive to conventional or moral stimuli as [he]201-clyde still was , [he]201-clyde could not quite achieve a discreditable thing , even where [his]201-clyde own highest ambitions were involved , without a measure of regret or at least shame . Also [he]201-clyde was so anxious to keep [his]201-clyde dinner engagement and not to be further involved that [his]201-clyde manner was impatient . It did not escape [Roberta]302-roberta .

" [You]201-clyde know , [Clyde]201-clyde , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta pleaded , both earnestly and eagerly , the very difficulty of [her]302-roberta state encouraging [her]302-roberta to be bold and demanding , " [you]201-clyde said if anything went wrong [you]201-clyde 'd help [me]201-clyde . "[201-clyde]

At once , because of those recent few and , as [he]201-clyde now saw [them]3413-them , foolish visits to [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , on which occasions because of some remaining sentiment and desire on the part of both [he]201-clyde had been betrayed into sporadic and decidedly unwise physical relations with [her]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde now realized what the difficulty was . And that it was a severe , compelling , dangerous difficulty , if it were true . Also that [he]201-clyde was to blame and that here was a real predicament that must be overcome , and that quickly , unless a still greater danger was to be faced . Yet , simultaneously , [his]201-clyde very recent and yet decidedly compelling indifference dictating , [he]201-clyde was almost ready now to assume that this might be little more than a ruse or lovelorn device or bit of strategy intended to retain or reenlist [his]201-clyde interest in spite of [himself]201-clyde — a thought which [he]201-clyde was only in part ready to harbor . [Her]302-roberta manner was too dejected and despairing . And with the first dim realization of how disastrous such a complication as this might prove to be in [his]201-clyde case , [he]201-clyde began to be somewhat more alarmed than irritated . So much so that [he]201-clyde exclaimed :

" Yes , but how do [you]302-roberta know that there is anything wrong ? [You]302-roberta ca n't be sure so soon as all this , can [you]302-roberta ? How can [you]302-roberta ? [You]302-roberta 'll probably be all right to - morrow , wo n't [you]302-roberta ? "[302-roberta] At the same time [his]201-clyde voice was beginning to suggest the uncertainty that [he]201-clyde felt .

" Oh , no , [I]201-clyde do n't think so , [Clyde]201-clyde . [I]201-clyde wish [I]201-clyde did . It 's two whole days , and it 's never been that way before . "[201-clyde]

[Her]302-roberta manner as [she]302-roberta said this was so obviously dejected and self - commiserating that at once [he]201-clyde was compelled to dismiss the thought of intrigue . At the same time , unwilling to face so discouraging a fact so soon , [he]201-clyde added : " Oh , well , that might not mean anything , either . [Girls]894-girls go longer than two days , do n't [they]894-girls ? "[302-roberta]

The tone , implying as it did uncertainty and non - sophistication even , which previously had not appeared characteristic of [him]201-clyde , was sufficient to alarm [Roberta]302-roberta to the point where [she]302-roberta exclaimed : " Oh , no , [I]201-clyde do n't think so . Anyhow , it would be terrible , would n't it , if something were wrong ? What do [you]302-roberta suppose [I]201-clyde ought to do ? Do n't [you]302-roberta know something [I]201-clyde can take ? "[201-clyde]

At once [Clyde]201-clyde , who had been so brisk and urgent in establishing this relationship and had given [Roberta]302-roberta the impression that [he]201-clyde was [a sophisticated and masterful youth who knew much more of life than ever she could hope to know , and to whom all such dangers and difficulties as were implied in the relationship could be left with impunity]3415-a sophisticated and masterful youth who knew much more of life than ever she could hope to know , and to whom all such dangers and difficulties as were implied in the relationship could be left with impunity , was at a loss what to do . Actually , as [he]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde now realized , [he]201-clyde was as sparingly informed in regard to the mysteries of sex and the possible complications attending upon such a situation as [any youth of [his]201-clyde years]3416-any youth of his years could well be .
