True , before coming here [he]201-clyde had browsed about [Kansas City]23-kansas city and [Chicago]5-chicago with [such worldly - wise [mentors of the hotel bell - boy]3418-mentors of the hotel bell - boy world]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world as [Ratterer]224-ratterer , [Higby]230-higby , [Hegglund]226-hegglund and [others]561-others and had listened to much of [their]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world gossiping and boasting . But [their]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world knowledge , for all [their]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world boasting , as [he]201-clyde now half guessed , must have related to girls who were as careless and uninformed as [themselves]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world . And beyond those again , although [he]201-clyde was by no means so clearly aware of that fact now , lay little more than those rumored specifics and preventatives of [such quack doctors]3420-such quack doctors and [shady druggists]3421-shady druggists and [chemists]3422-chemists as dealt with intelligences of [the Hegglund]226-hegglund and [Ratterer]224-ratterer order . But even so , where were such things to be obtained in [a small city]3423-a small city like [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus ? Since [dropping Dillard]257-dillard [he]201-clyde had no intimates let alone [trustworthy friends who could be depended on to help in such a crisis]3424-trustworthy friends who could be depended on to help in such a crisis .

The best [he]201-clyde could think of for the moment was to visit [some local or near - by druggist who might , for a price , provide [him]201-clyde with some worth - while prescription or information]3425-some local or near - by druggist who might , for a price , provide him with some worth - while prescription or information . But for how much ? And what were the dangers in connection with such a proceeding ? Did [they]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world talk ? Did [they]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world ask questions ? Did [they]3417-such worldly - wise mentors of the hotel bell - boy world tell [any one else]5282-any one else about such inquiries or needs ? [He]201-clyde looked so much like [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , who was so well known in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus that any one recognizing [him]201-clyde as [Gilbert]200-gilbert might begin to talk of [him]201-clyde in that way and so bring about trouble .

And this terrible situation arising now — when in connection with [Sondra]186-sondra , things had advanced to the point where [she]3427-her was now secretly permitting [him]201-clyde to kiss [her]3427-her , and , more pleasing still , exhibiting little evidences of [her]3427-her affection and good will in the form of presents of ties , a gold pencil , a box of most attractive handkerchiefs , all delivered to [his]201-clyde door in [his]201-clyde absence with a little card with [her]3427-her initials , which had caused [him]201-clyde to feel sure that [his]201-clyde future in connection with [her]3427-her was of greater and greater promise . So much so that even marriage , assuming that [[her]3427-her family]1607-her family might not prove too inimical and that [her]3427-her infatuation and diplomacy endured , might not be beyond the bounds of possibility . [He]201-clyde could not be sure , of course . [Her]3427-her true intentions and affections so far were veiled behind a tantalizing evasiveness which made [her]3427-her all the more desirable . Yet it was these things that had been causing [him]201-clyde to feel that [he]201-clyde must now , and speedily , extract [himself]201-clyde as gracefully and unirritatingly as possible from [his]201-clyde intimacy with [Roberta]302-roberta .

For that reason , therefore , [he]201-clyde now announced , with pretended assurance : " Well , [I]201-clyde would n't worry about it any more to - night if [I]201-clyde were [you]302-roberta . [You]302-roberta may be all right yet , [you]302-roberta know . [You]302-roberta ca n't be sure . Anyhow , [I]201-clyde 'll have to have a little time until [I]201-clyde can see what [I]201-clyde can do . [I]201-clyde think [I]201-clyde can get something for [you]302-roberta . But [I]201-clyde wish [you]302-roberta would n't get so excited . "[201-clyde]

At the same time [he]201-clyde was far from feeling as secure as [he]201-clyde sounded . In fact [he]201-clyde was very much shaken . [His]201-clyde original determination to have as little to do with [her]302-roberta as possible , was now complicated by the fact that [he]201-clyde was confronted by a predicament that spelled real danger to [himself]201-clyde , unless by some argument or assertion [he]201-clyde could absolve [himself]201-clyde of any responsibility in connection with this — a possibility which , in view of the fact that [Roberta]302-roberta still worked for [him]201-clyde , that [he]201-clyde had written [her]302-roberta some notes , and that any least word from [her]302-roberta would precipitate an inquiry which would prove fatal to [him]201-clyde , was sufficient to cause [him]201-clyde to feel that [he]201-clyde must assist [her]302-roberta speedily and without a breath of information as to all this leaking out in any direction . At the same time it is only fair to say that because of all that had been between [them]3429-them , [he]201-clyde did not object to assisting [her]302-roberta in any way that [he]201-clyde could . But in the event that [he]201-clyde could not ( it was so that [his]201-clyde thoughts raced forward to an entirely possible inimical conclusion to all this ) well , then — well , then — might it not be possible at least — [some fellows]3430-some fellows , if not [himself]201-clyde would — to deny that [he]201-clyde had held any such relationship with [her]302-roberta and so escape . That possibly might be one way out — if only [he]201-clyde were not as treacherously surrounded as [he]201-clyde was [here]4728-here .

But the most troublesome thing in connection with all this was the thought that [he]201-clyde knew of nothing that would really avail in such a case , other than [a doctor]3432-a doctor . Also that that probably meant money , time , danger — just what did it mean ? [He]201-clyde would see [her]302-roberta in the morning , and if [she]302-roberta were n't all right by then [he]201-clyde would act .

And [Roberta]302-roberta , for the first time forsaken in this rather casual and indifferent way , and in such a crisis as this , returned to [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room with [her]302-roberta thoughts and fears , more stricken and agonized than ever before [she]302-roberta had been in all [her]302-roberta life .

But the resources of [Clyde]201-clyde , in such a situation as this , were slim . For , apart from [Liggett]292-liggett , [Whiggam]245-whiggam , and [a few minor though decidedly pleasant and yet rather remote department heads]3434-a few minor though decidedly pleasant and yet rather remote department heads , all of whom were now looking on [him]201-clyde as [a distinctly superior person who could scarcely be approached too familiarly in connection with anything]3435-a distinctly superior person who could scarcely be approached too familiarly in connection with anything , there was [no one to whom [he]201-clyde could appeal]3436-no one to whom he could appeal . In so far as [the social group to which [he]201-clyde was now so eagerly attaching [himself]201-clyde]3437-the social group to which he was now so eagerly attaching himself was concerned , it would have been absurd for [him]201-clyde to attempt , however slyly , to extract any information there . For while [the youths of [this world]1288-this world]3438-the youths of this world at least were dashing here and there , and because of [their]3438-the youths of this world looks , taste and means indulging [themselves]3438-the youths of this world in phases of libertinism — the proper wild oats of youth — such as [he]201-clyde and [others like [himself]201-clyde]3440-others like himself could not have dreamed of affording , still so far was [he]201-clyde from any real intimacy with any of these that [he]201-clyde would not have dreamed of approaching [them]3438-the youths of this world for helpful information .

[His]201-clyde sanest thought , which occurred to [him]201-clyde almost immediately after leaving [Roberta]302-roberta , was that instead of inquiring of [any druggist]3441-any druggist or [doctor]3442-doctor or person in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus — more particularly [any doctor]3443-any doctor , since [the entire medical profession here]3444-the entire medical profession here , as elsewhere , appeared to [him]201-clyde as remote , cold , unsympathetic and likely very expensive and unfriendly to such an immoral adventure as this — was to go to [some near - by city]3445-some near - by city , preferably [Schenectady]60-schenectady , since [it]60-schenectady was larger and as near as any , and there inquire what , if anything , could be obtained to help in such a situation as this . For [he]201-clyde must find something .

At the same time , the necessity for decision and prompt action was so great that even on [his]201-clyde way to [the Starks]258-the starks ' , and without knowing any drug or prescription to ask for , [he]201-clyde resolved to go to [Schenectady]60-schenectady the next night . Only that meant , as [he]201-clyde later reasoned , that a whole day must elapse before anything could be done for [Roberta]302-roberta , and that , in [her]302-roberta eyes , as well as [his]201-clyde own , would be leaving [her]302-roberta open to the danger that any delay at all involved . Therefore , [he]201-clyde decided to act at once , if [he]201-clyde could ; excuse [himself]201-clyde to [the Starks]258-the starks and then make the trip to [Schenectady]60-schenectady on [the interurban]3446-the interurban before [the drug - stores over there]3447-the drug - stores over there should close . But once [there]4705-there — what ? How face [the local druggist]3449-the local druggist or [clerk]3450-clerk — and ask for what ? [His]201-clyde mind was troubled with hard , abrasive thoughts as to what [the druggist]3451-the druggist might think , look or say . If only [Ratterer]224-ratterer or [Hegglund]226-hegglund were here ! [They]3452-they would know , of course , and be glad to help [him]201-clyde . Or [Higby]230-higby , even . But here [he]201-clyde was now , all alone , for [Roberta]302-roberta knew nothing at all . There must be something though , of course . If not , if [he]201-clyde failed [there]4705-there , [he]201-clyde would return and write [Ratterer]224-ratterer in [Chicago]5-chicago , only in order to keep [himself]201-clyde out of this as much as possible [he]201-clyde would say that [he]201-clyde was writing for [a friend]2343-a friend .

Once in [Schenectady]60-schenectady , since [no one]4713-no one knew [him]201-clyde [there]4705-there , of course [he]201-clyde might say ( the thought came to [him]201-clyde as an inspiration ) that [he]201-clyde was [a newly married man]3457-a newly married man — why not ? [He]201-clyde was old enough to be [one]578-one , and that [[his]201-clyde wife]576-his wife , and that in the face of inability to care for [a child]3395-a child now , was " past [her]576-his wife time "[201-clyde] ( [he]201-clyde recalled a phrase that [he]201-clyde had once heard [Higby]230-higby use ) , and that [he]201-clyde wanted something that would permit [her]576-his wife to escape from that state . What was so wrong with that as an idea ? [A young married couple]3461-a young married couple might be in just such a predicament . And possibly [the druggist]3451-the druggist would , or should be stirred to a little sympathy by such a state and might be glad to tell [him]201-clyde of something . Why not ? That would be no real crime . To be sure , [one and another]3463-one and another might refuse , but [a third]3464-a third might not . And then [he]201-clyde would be rid of this . And then never again , without knowing a lot more than [he]201-clyde did now , would [he]201-clyde let [himself]201-clyde drift into any such predicament as this . Never ! It was too dreadful .

[He]201-clyde betook [himself]201-clyde to [[the Stark]353-bella house]3465-the stark house very nervous and growing more so every moment . So much so that , the dinner being eaten , [he]201-clyde finally declared as early as nine - thirty that at the last moment at [the factory]440-the factory a very troublesome report , covering a whole month 's activities , had been requested of [him]201-clyde . And since it was not anything [he]201-clyde could do at [the office]1022-the office , [he]201-clyde was compelled to return to [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room and make it out there — a bit of energetic and ambitious commercialism , as [the Starks]258-the starks saw it , worthy of [their]258-the starks admiration and sympathy . And in consequence [he]201-clyde was excused .

But arrived at [Schenectady]60-schenectady , [he]201-clyde had barely time to look around a little before [the last car]3469-the last car for [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus should be leaving . [His]201-clyde nerve began to fail [him]201-clyde . Did [he]201-clyde look enough like [a young married man]3470-a young married man to convince [any one]4764-any one that [he]201-clyde was [one]578-one ? Besides were not such preventatives considered very wrong — even by [druggists]3473-druggists ?

Walking up and down [the one very long [Main Street]116-main street]3474-the one very long main street still brightly lighted at this hour , looking now in [one drug - store]3475-one drug - store window and another , [he]201-clyde decided for different reasons that each particular one was not the one . In one , as [he]201-clyde saw at a glance , stood [a stout , sober , smooth - shaven man of fifty whose bespectacled eyes and iron gray hair]3476-a stout , sober , smooth - shaven man of fifty whose bespectacled eyes and iron gray hair seemed to indicate to [Clyde]201-clyde 's mind that [he]201-clyde would be most certain to deny [such a youthful applicant as [himself]201-clyde]3477-such a youthful applicant as himself — refuse to believe that [he]201-clyde was married — or to admit that [he]201-clyde had any such remedy , and suspect [him]201-clyde of illicit relations with [some young , unmarried girl into the bargain]3478-some young , unmarried girl into the bargain . [He]201-clyde looked so sober , God - fearing , ultra - respectable and conventional . No , it would not do to apply to [him]201-clyde . [He]201-clyde had not the courage to enter and face [such a person]1907-such a person .

In [another drug - store]3480-another drug - store [he]201-clyde observed [a small , shriveled and yet dapper and shrewd - looking man of perhaps thirty - five , who appeared to [him]201-clyde at the time as satisfactory enough , only , as [he]201-clyde could see from the front , [he]201-clyde was being briskly assisted by [a young woman of not more than twenty or twenty - five]3482-a young woman of not more than twenty or twenty - five]3481-a small , shriveled and yet dapper and shrewd - looking man of perhaps thirty - five , who appeared to him at the time as satisfactory enough , only , as he could see from the front , he was being briskly assisted by a young woman of not more than twenty or twenty - five . And assuming that [she]3482-a young woman of not more than twenty or twenty - five would approach [him]201-clyde instead of [the man]1113-the man — an embarrassing and impossible situation — or if [the man]1113-the man waited on [him]201-clyde , was it not probable that [she]3482-a young woman of not more than twenty or twenty - five would hear ? In consequence [he]201-clyde gave up [that place]3485-that place , and a third , a fourth , and a fifth , for varying and yet equally cogent reasons — [customers]2530-customers inside , [a girl]2278-a girl and [a boy]645-a boy at a soda fountain in front , [an owner]3489-an owner posed near the door and surveying [Clyde]201-clyde as [he]201-clyde looked in and thus disconcerting [him]201-clyde before [he]201-clyde had time to consider whether [he]201-clyde should enter or not .

Finally , however , after having abandoned so many , [he]201-clyde decided that [he]201-clyde must act or return defeated , [his]201-clyde time and carfare wasted . Returning to [one of [the lesser stores]3491-the lesser stores in [a side street]1186-a side street]3490-one of the lesser stores in a side street , in which a moment before [he]201-clyde had observed [an undersized chemist idling about]3493-an undersized chemist idling about , [he]201-clyde entered , and summoning all the bravado [he]201-clyde could muster , began : " [I]201-clyde want to know something . [I]201-clyde want to know if [you]3493-an undersized chemist idling about know of anything — well , [you]3493-an undersized chemist idling about see , it 's this way — [I'm]201-clyde just married and [[my]201-clyde wife]5718-my wife is past [her]5718-my wife time and [I]201-clyde ca n't afford to have [any children]5719-any children now if [I]201-clyde can help it . Is there anything [a person]5720-a person can get that will get [her]5718-my wife out of it ? "[201-clyde]

[His]201-clyde manner was brisk and confidential enough , although tinged with nervousness and the inner conviction that [the druggist]3451-the druggist must guess that [he]201-clyde was lying . At the same time , although [he]201-clyde did not know it , [he]201-clyde was talking to [a confirmed religionist of [the Methodist group who did not believe in interfering with the motives or impulses of nature]3496-the methodist group who did not believe in interfering with the motives or impulses of nature]3495-a confirmed religionist of the methodist group who did not believe in interfering with the motives or impulses of nature . Any such trifling was against the laws of [God]306-god and [he]201-clyde carried nothing in stock that would in any way interfere with the ways of [the Creator]3497-the creator . At the same time [he]201-clyde was too good [a merchant]3498-a merchant to wish to alienate [a possible future customer]3499-a possible future customer , and so [he]201-clyde now said : " [I]3509-the clerk 'm sorry , [young man]5721-young man , but [I]3509-the clerk 'm afraid [I]3509-the clerk ca n't help [you]5721-young man in this case . [I]3509-the clerk have n't a thing of that kind in stock here — never handle anything of that kind because [I]3509-the clerk do n't believe in ['em]5722-'em . It may be , though , that some of [the other stores here in [town]1686-town]5723-the other stores here in town carry something of the sort . [I]3509-the clerk would n't be able to tell [you]5721-young man . "[3509-the clerk] [His]201-clyde manner as [he]201-clyde spoke was solemn , the convinced and earnest tone and look of [the moralist who knows that [he]201-clyde is right]3500-the moralist who knows that he is right .

And at once [Clyde]201-clyde gathered , and fairly enough in this instance , that [this man]1044-this man was reproachful . It reduced to a much smaller quantity the little confidence with which [he]201-clyde had begun [his]201-clyde quest . And yet , since [the dealer]3502-the dealer had not directly reproached [him]201-clyde and had even said that it might be possible that [some of [the other druggists]3504-the other druggists]3503-some of the other druggists carried such a thing , [he]201-clyde took heart after a few moments , and after a brief fit of pacing here and there in which [he]201-clyde looked through one window and another , [he]201-clyde finally espied [a seventh dealer]3505-a seventh dealer alone . [He]201-clyde entered , and after repeating [his]201-clyde first explanation [he]201-clyde was informed , very secretively and yet casually , by [the thin , dark , casuistic person who waited on [him]201-clyde]3506-the thin , dark , casuistic person who waited on him — not [the owner in this instance]3507-the owner in this instance — that there was such a remedy . Yes . Did [he]201-clyde wish a box ? That ( because [Clyde]201-clyde asked the price ) would be six dollars — a staggering sum to [the salaried inquirer]3508-the salaried inquirer . However , since the expenditure seemed unescapable — to find anything at all a great relief — [he]201-clyde at once announced that [he]201-clyde would take it , and [the clerk]3509-the clerk , bringing [him]201-clyde something which [he]201-clyde hinted ought to prove " effectual "[201-clyde] and wrapping it up , [he]201-clyde paid and went out .

And then actually so relieved was [he]201-clyde , so great had been the strain up to this moment , that [he]201-clyde could have danced for joy . Then there was a cure , and it would work , of course . The excessive and even outrageous price seemed to indicate as much . And under the circumstances , might [he]201-clyde not even consider that sum moderate , seeing that [he]201-clyde was being let off so easily ? However , [he]201-clyde forgot to inquire as to whether there was any additional information or special direction that might prove valuable , and instead , with the package in [his]201-clyde pocket , some central and detached portion of the ego within [himself]201-clyde congratulating [him]201-clyde upon [his]201-clyde luck and undaunted efficiency in such a crisis as this , [he]201-clyde at once returned to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus , where [he]201-clyde proceeded to [[Roberta]302-roberta 's room]3510-roberta 's room .

And [she]302-roberta , like [himself]201-clyde , impressed by [his]201-clyde success in having secured something which both [he]201-clyde and [she]302-roberta had feared did not exist , or if it did , might prove difficult to procure , felt enormously relieved . In fact , [she]302-roberta was reimpressed by [his]201-clyde ability and efficiency , qualities with which , up to this time at least , [she]302-roberta had endowed [him]201-clyde . Also that [he]201-clyde was more generous and considerate than under the circumstances [she]302-roberta feared [he]201-clyde would be . At least [he]201-clyde was not coldly abandoning [her]302-roberta to fate , as previously in [her]302-roberta terror [she]302-roberta had imagined that [he]201-clyde might . And this fact , even in the face of [his]201-clyde previous indifference , was sufficient to soften [her]302-roberta mood in regard to [him]201-clyde . So with a kind of ebullience , based on fattened hope resting on the pills , [she]302-roberta undid the package and read the directions , assuring [him]201-clyde the while of [her]302-roberta gratitude and that [she]302-roberta would not forget how good [he]201-clyde had been to [her]302-roberta in this instance . At the same time , even as [she]302-roberta untied the package , the thought came to [her]302-roberta — supposing they would not work ? Then what ? And how would [she]302-roberta go about arranging with [Clyde]201-clyde as to that ? However , for the time being , as [she]302-roberta now reasoned , [she]302-roberta must be satisfied and grateful for this , and at once took one of the pills .

But once [her]302-roberta expressions of gratefulness had been offered and [Clyde]201-clyde sensed that these same might possibly be looked upon as overtures to a new intimacy between [them]3511-them , [he]201-clyde fell back upon the attitude that for days past had characterized [him]201-clyde at [the factory]440-the factory . Under no circumstances must [he]201-clyde lend [himself]201-clyde to any additional blandishments or languishments in this field . And if this drug proved effectual , as [he]201-clyde most earnestly hoped , it must be the last of any save the most accidental and casual contacts . For there was too much danger , as this particular crisis had proved — too much to be lost on [his]201-clyde side — everything , in short — nothing but worry and trouble and expense .

In consequence [he]201-clyde retreated to [his]201-clyde former reserve . " Well , [you]302-roberta 'll be all right now , eh ? Anyhow , let 's hope so , huh ? It says to take one every two hours for eight or ten hours . And if [you]302-roberta 're just a little sick , it says it does n't make any difference . [You]302-roberta may have to knock off a day or two at [the factory]440-the factory , but [you]302-roberta wo n't mind that , will [you]302-roberta , if it gets [you]302-roberta out of this ? [I]201-clyde 'll come around to - morrow night and see how [you]302-roberta are , if [you]302-roberta do n't show up any time to - morrow . "[201-clyde]

[He]201-clyde laughed genially , the while [Roberta]302-roberta gazed at [him]201-clyde , unable to associate [his]201-clyde present casual attitude with [his]201-clyde former passion and deep solicitude . [His]201-clyde former passion ! And now this ! And yet , under the circumstances , being truly grateful , [she]302-roberta now smiled cordially and [he]201-clyde the same . Yet , seeing [him]201-clyde go out , the door close , and no endearing demonstrations of any kind having been exchanged between [them]3513-them , [she]302-roberta returned to [her]302-roberta bed , shaking [her]302-roberta head dubiously . For , supposing that this remedy did not work after all ? And [he]201-clyde continued in this same casual and remote attitude toward [her]302-roberta ? Then what ? For unless this remedy proved effectual , [he]201-clyde might still be so indifferent that [he]201-clyde might not want to help [her]302-roberta long — or would [he]201-clyde ? Could [he]201-clyde do that , really ? [He]201-clyde was the one who had brought [her]302-roberta to this difficulty , and against [her]302-roberta will , and [he]201-clyde had so definitely assured [her]302-roberta that nothing would happen . And now [she]302-roberta must lie here alone and worry , [not a single person to turn to]3514-not a single person to turn to , except [him]201-clyde , and [he]201-clyde was leaving [her]302-roberta for [others]561-others with the assurance that [she]302-roberta would be all right . And [he]201-clyde had caused it all ! Was this quite right ?

" Oh , [Clyde]201-clyde ! [Clyde]201-clyde ! "[201-clyde]

But the remedy [he]201-clyde purchased failed to work . And because of nausea and [his]201-clyde advice [she]302-roberta had not gone to [the factory]440-the factory , but lay about worrying . But , no saving result appearing , [she]302-roberta began to take two pills every hour instead of one — eager at any cost to escape the fate which seemingly had overtaken [her]302-roberta . And this made [her]302-roberta exceedingly sick — so much so that when [Clyde]201-clyde arrived at six - thirty [he]201-clyde was really moved by [her]302-roberta deathly white face , drawn cheeks and large and nervous eyes , the pupils of which were unduly dilated . Obviously [she]302-roberta was facing a crisis , and because of [him]201-clyde , and , while it frightened , at the same time it made [him]201-clyde sorry for [her]302-roberta . Still , so confused and perplexed was [he]201-clyde by the problem which [her]302-roberta unchanged state presented to [him]201-clyde that [his]201-clyde mind now leaped forward to the various phases and eventualities of such a failure as this . The need of additional advice or service of [some physician somewhere]3517-some physician somewhere ! But where and how and who ? And besides , as [he]201-clyde now asked [himself]201-clyde , where was [he]201-clyde to obtain the money in any such event ?

Plainly in view of no other inspiration it was necessary for [him]201-clyde to return to [the druggist]3451-the druggist at once and there inquire if there was anything else — some other drug or some other thing that [one]578-one might do . Or if not that , then [some low - priced shady doctor]3520-some low - priced shady doctor somewhere , who , for a small fee , or a promise of payments on time , would help in this case .

Yet even though this other matter was so important — tragic almost — once outside [his]201-clyde spirits lifted slightly . For [he]201-clyde now recalled that [he]201-clyde had an appointment with [Sondra]186-sondra at [the Cranstons ']3521-the cranstons ' , where at nine [he]201-clyde and [she]302-roberta , along with [a number of others]3522-a number of others , were to meet and play about as usual — a party . Yet once at [the Cranstons ']195-the cranstons , and despite the keen allurement of [Sondra]186-sondra , [he]201-clyde could not keep [his]201-clyde mind off [Roberta]302-roberta 's state , which rose before [him]201-clyde as [a specter]3523-a specter . Supposing now any one of those whom [he]201-clyde found gathered here — [Nadine Harriet]285-nadine , [Perley Haynes]360-perley haynes , [Violet Taylor]394-violet taylor , [Jill Trumbull]349-jill trumbull , [Bella]353-bella , [Bertine]197-bertine , and [Sondra]186-sondra , should gain the least inkling of the scene [he]201-clyde had just witnessed ? In spite of [Sondra]186-sondra at the piano throwing [him]201-clyde a welcoming smile over [her]302-roberta shoulder as [he]201-clyde entered , [his]201-clyde thoughts were on [Roberta]302-roberta . [He]201-clyde must go around [there]4705-there again after this was over , to see how [she]302-roberta was and so relieve [his]201-clyde own mind in case [she]302-roberta were better . In case [she]302-roberta was not , [he]201-clyde must write to [Ratterer]224-ratterer at once for advice .

In spite of [his]201-clyde distress [he]201-clyde was trying to appear as gay and unconcerned as ever — dancing first with [Perley Haynes]360-perley haynes and then with [Nadine]285-nadine and finally , while waiting for a chance to dance with [Sondra]186-sondra , [he]201-clyde approached a group who were trying to help [Vanda Steele]361-miss vanda steele solve a new scenery puzzle and asserted that [he]201-clyde could read messages written on paper and sealed in envelopes ( the old serial letter trick which [he]201-clyde had found explained in an ancient book of parlor tricks discovered on a shelf at [the Peytons ']3525-the peytons ' ) . It had been [his]201-clyde plan to use it before in order to give [himself]201-clyde an air of ease and cleverness , but to - night [he]201-clyde was using it to take [his]201-clyde mind off the greater problem that was weighing on [him]201-clyde . And , although with the aid of [Nadine Harriet]285-nadine , whom [he]201-clyde took into [his]201-clyde confidence , [he]201-clyde succeeded in thoroughly mystifying [the others]629-the others , still [his]201-clyde mind was not quite on it . [Roberta]302-roberta was always there . Supposing something should really be wrong with [her]285-nadine and [he]201-clyde could not get [her]285-nadine out of it . [She]285-nadine might even expect [him]201-clyde to marry [her]285-nadine , so fearful was [she]285-nadine of [[her]285-nadine parents]453-her parents and [people]4823-people . What would [he]201-clyde do then ? [He]201-clyde would lose [the beautiful Sondra]186-sondra and [she]285-nadine might even come to know how and why [he]201-clyde had lost [her]285-nadine . But that would be wild of [Roberta]302-roberta to expect [him]201-clyde to do that . [He]201-clyde would not do it . [He]201-clyde could not do it .

One thing was certain . [He]201-clyde must get [her]285-nadine out of this . [He]201-clyde must ! But how ? How ?

And although at twelve o'clock [Sondra]186-sondra signaled that [she]285-nadine was ready to go and that if [he]201-clyde chose [he]201-clyde might accompany [her]285-nadine to [her]285-nadine door ( and even stop in for a few moments ) and although once [there]4705-there , in the shade of a pergola which ornamented the front gate , [she]285-nadine had allowed [him]201-clyde to kiss [her]285-nadine and told [him]201-clyde that [she]285-nadine was beginning to think [he]201-clyde was the nicest ever and that the following spring when [the family]433-the family moved to [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake [she]285-nadine was going to see if [she]285-nadine could n't think of some way by which [she]285-nadine could arrange to have [him]201-clyde [there]4705-there over week - ends , still , because of this pressing problem in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta , [Clyde]201-clyde was so worried that [he]201-clyde was not able to completely enjoy this new and to [him]201-clyde exquisitely thrilling demonstration of affection on [her]285-nadine part — this new and amazing social and emotional victory of [his]201-clyde .

[He]201-clyde must send that letter to [Ratterer]224-ratterer to - night . But before that [he]201-clyde must return to [Roberta]302-roberta as [he]201-clyde had promised and find out if [she]302-roberta was better . And after that [he]201-clyde must go over to [Schenectady]60-schenectady in the morning , sure , to see [the druggist]3451-the druggist over there . For something must be done about this unless [she]302-roberta were better to - night .

And so , with [Sondra]186-sondra 's kisses thrilling on [his]201-clyde lips , [he]201-clyde left [her]302-roberta to go to [Roberta]302-roberta , whose white face and troubled eyes told [him]201-clyde as [he]201-clyde entered [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room that no change had taken place . If anything [she]302-roberta was worse and more distressed than before , the larger dosage having weakened [her]302-roberta to the point of positive illness . However , as [she]302-roberta said , nothing mattered if only [she]302-roberta could get out of this — that [she]302-roberta would almost be willing to die rather than face the consequences . And [Clyde]201-clyde , realizing what [she]302-roberta meant and being so sincerely concerned for [himself]201-clyde , appeared in part distressed for [her]302-roberta . However , [his]201-clyde previous indifference and the manner in which [he]201-clyde had walked off and left [her]302-roberta alone this very evening prevented [her]302-roberta from feeling that there was any abiding concern in [him]201-clyde for [her]302-roberta now . And this grieved [her]302-roberta terribly . For [she]302-roberta sensed now that [he]201-clyde did not really care for [her]302-roberta any more , even though now [he]201-clyde was saying that [she]302-roberta must n't worry and that it was likely that if these did n't work [he]201-clyde would get something else that would ; that [he]201-clyde was going back to [the druggist at [Schenectady]60-schenectady]3534-the druggist at schenectady the first thing in the morning to see if there was n't something else that [he]201-clyde could suggest .

But [the Gilpins]395-the gilpins had no telephone , and since [he]201-clyde never ventured to call at [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room during the day and [he]201-clyde never permitted [her]302-roberta to call [him]201-clyde at [[Mrs. Peyton]297-mrs. peyton 's]2179-mrs. peyton 's , [his]201-clyde plan in this instance was to pass by the following morning before work . If [she]302-roberta were all right , the two front shades would be raised to the top ; if not , then lowered to the center . In that case [he]201-clyde would depart for [Schenectady]60-schenectady at once , telephoning [Mr. Liggett]292-liggett that [he]201-clyde had some outside duties to perform .

Just the same , [both]874-both were terribly depressed and fearful as to what this should mean for each of [them]874-both . [Clyde]201-clyde could not quite assure [himself]201-clyde that , in the event that [Roberta]302-roberta was not extricated , [he]201-clyde would be able to escape without indemnifying [her]302-roberta in some form which might not mean just temporary efforts to aid [her]302-roberta , but something more — marriage , possibly — since already [she]302-roberta had reminded [him]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde had promised to see [her]302-roberta through . But what had [he]201-clyde really meant by that at the time that [he]201-clyde said it , [he]201-clyde now asked [himself]201-clyde . Not marriage , most certainly , since [his]201-clyde thought was not that [he]201-clyde had ever wanted to marry [her]302-roberta , but rather just to play with [her]302-roberta happily in love , although , as [he]201-clyde well knew , [she]302-roberta had no such conception of [his]201-clyde eager mood at that time . [He]201-clyde was compelled to admit to [himself]201-clyde that [she]302-roberta had probably thought [his]201-clyde intentions were more serious or [she]302-roberta would not have submitted to [him]201-clyde at all .

But reaching [home]4793-home , and after writing and mailing the letter to [Ratterer]224-ratterer , [Clyde]201-clyde passed a troubled night . Next morning [he]201-clyde paid a visit to [the druggist at [Schenectady]60-schenectady]3534-the druggist at schenectady , the curtains of [Roberta]302-roberta 's windows having been lowered to the center when [he]201-clyde passed . But on this occasion [the latter]546-the latter had no additional aid to offer other than the advisability of a hot and hence weakening bath , which [he]201-clyde had failed to mention in the first instance . Also some wearying form of physical exercise . But noting [Clyde]201-clyde 's troubled expression and judging that the situation was causing [him]201-clyde great worry , [he]201-clyde observed : " Of course , the fact that [[your]201-clyde wife]5726-your wife has skipped a month does n't mean that there is anything seriously wrong , [you]201-clyde know . [Women]467-women do that sometimes . Anyhow , [you]201-clyde ca n't ever be sure until the second month has passed . [Any doctor]3443-any doctor will tell [you]201-clyde that . If [she]5726-your wife 's nervous , let [her]5726-your wife try something like this . But even if it fails to work , [you]201-clyde ca n't be positive . [She]5726-your wife might be all right next month just the same . "[201-clyde]

Thinly cheered by this information , [Clyde]201-clyde was about to depart , for [Roberta]302-roberta might be wrong . [He]201-clyde and [she]302-roberta might be worrying needlessly . Still — [he]201-clyde was brought up with a round turn as [he]201-clyde thought of it — there might be real danger , and waiting until the end of the second period would only mean that a whole month had elapsed and nothing helpful accomplished — a freezing thought . In consequence [he]201-clyde now observed : " In case things do n't come right , [you]201-clyde do n't happen to know of [a doctor [she]5726-your wife could go to]5729-a doctor she could go to , do [you]201-clyde ? This is rather a serious business for both of [us]5730-us , and [I]201-clyde 'd like to get [her]5726-your wife out of it if [I]201-clyde could . "[201-clyde]

Something about the way in which [Clyde]201-clyde said this — [his]201-clyde extreme nervousness as well as [his]201-clyde willingness to indulge in a form of malpractice which [the pharmacist]3541-the pharmacist by some logic all [his]3541-the pharmacist own considered very different from just swallowing a preparation intended to achieve the same result — caused [him]201-clyde to look suspiciously at [Clyde]201-clyde , the thought stirring in [his]201-clyde brain that very likely after all [Clyde]201-clyde was not married , also that this was one of those youthful affairs which spelled license and future difficulty for [some unsophisticated girl]3542-some unsophisticated girl . Hence [his]201-clyde mood now changed , and instead of being willing to assist , [he]201-clyde now said coolly : " Well , there may be [a doctor around here]5731-a doctor around here , but if so [I]201-clyde do n't know . And [I]201-clyde would n't undertake to send [any one]4764-any one to [a doctor like that]5733-a doctor like that . It 's against the law . It would certainly go hard with [any doctor around here who was caught doing that sort of thing]5734-any doctor around here who was caught doing that sort of thing . That 's not to say , though , that [you]302-roberta are n't at liberty to look around for [yourself]302-roberta , if [you]302-roberta want to , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde added gravely , giving [Clyde]201-clyde a suspicious and examining glance , and deciding it were best if [he]201-clyde had nothing further to do with [such a person]1907-such a person .

[Clyde]201-clyde therefore returned to [Roberta]302-roberta with the same prescription renewed , although [she]302-roberta had most decidedly protested that , since the first box had not worked , it was useless to get more . But since [he]201-clyde insisted , [she]302-roberta was willing to try the drug the new way , although the argument that a cold or nerves was the possible cause was only sufficient to convince [her]302-roberta that [Clyde]201-clyde was at the end of [his]201-clyde resources in so far as [she]302-roberta was concerned , or if not that , [he]201-clyde was far from being alive to the import of this both to [herself]302-roberta and to [him]201-clyde . And supposing this new treatment did not work , then what ? Was [he]201-clyde going to stop now and let the thing rest there ?

Yet so peculiar was [Clyde]201-clyde 's nature that in the face of [his]201-clyde fears in regard to [his]201-clyde future , and because it was far from pleasant to be harried in this way and an infringement on [his]201-clyde other interests , the assurance that the delay of a month might not prove fatal was sufficient to cause [him]201-clyde to be willing to wait , and that rather indifferently , for that length of time . [Roberta]302-roberta might be wrong . [She]302-roberta might be making all this trouble for nothing . [He]201-clyde must see how [she]302-roberta felt after [she]302-roberta had tried this new way .

But the treatment failed . Despite the fact that in [her]302-roberta distress [Roberta]302-roberta returned to [the factory]440-the factory in order to weary [herself]302-roberta , until [all the girls in [the department]3546-the department]3545-all the girls in the department assured [her]302-roberta that [she]302-roberta must be ill — that [she]302-roberta should not be working when [she]302-roberta looked and plainly felt so bad — still nothing came of it . And the fact that [Clyde]201-clyde could dream of falling back on the assurance of [the druggist]3451-the druggist that a first month 's lapse was of no import only aggravated and frightened [her]3451-the druggist the more .

The truth was that in this crisis [he]201-clyde was as interesting an illustration of the enormous handicaps imposed by ignorance , youth , poverty and fear as [one]578-one could have found . Technically [he]201-clyde did not even know the meaning of the word " [midwife]5735-midwife , "[201-clyde] or the nature of the services performed by [her]3451-the druggist . ( And there were three here in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus at this time in [the foreign family section]3549-the foreign family section . ) Again , [he]201-clyde had been in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus so short a time , and apart from [the young society men and [Dillard]257-dillard whom [he]201-clyde had cut]3550-the young society men and dillard whom he had cut , and [the various department heads at [the factory]440-the factory]3551-the various department heads at the factory , [he]201-clyde knew [no one]4713-no one — [an occasional barber]3554-an occasional barber , [haberdasher]3555-haberdasher , [cigar dealer]3556-cigar dealer and the like , [the majority of whom , as [he]201-clyde saw [them]3558-them]3557-the majority of whom , as he saw them , were either too dull or too ignorant for [his]201-clyde purpose .

One thing , however , which caused [him]201-clyde to pause before ever [he]201-clyde decided to look up [a physician]3559-a physician was the problem of who was to approach [him]201-clyde and how . To go [himself]201-clyde was simply out of the question . In the first place , [he]201-clyde looked too much like [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert , who was decidedly too well - known here and for whom [he]201-clyde might be mistaken . Next , it was unquestionable that , being as well - dressed as [he]201-clyde was , [the physician]3560-the physician would want to charge [him]201-clyde more , maybe , than [he]201-clyde could afford and ask [him]201-clyde all sorts of embarrassing questions , whereas if it could be arranged through some one else — the details explained before ever [Roberta]302-roberta was sent — Why not [Roberta]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta ! Why not ? [She]302-roberta looked so simple and innocent and unassuming and appealing at all times . And in such a situation as this , as depressed and downcast as [she]302-roberta was , well ... For after all , as [he]201-clyde now casuistically argued with [himself]201-clyde , it was [she]302-roberta and not [he]201-clyde who was facing the immediate problem which had to be solved .

And again , as it now came to [him]201-clyde , would [she]302-roberta not be able to get it done cheaper ? For looking as [she]302-roberta did now , so distrait — If only [he]201-clyde could get [her]302-roberta to say that [she]302-roberta had been deserted by [some young man , whose name [she]302-roberta would refuse to divulge]3561-some young man , whose name she would refuse to divulge , of course , well , what physician seeing [a girl like [her]302-roberta alone and in such a state — [no one]4713-no one to look after [her]302-roberta]3562-a girl like her alone and in such a state — no one to look after her — would refuse [her]302-roberta ? It might even be that [he]201-clyde would help [her]302-roberta out for nothing . Who could tell ? And that would leave [him]201-clyde clear of it all .

And in consequence [he]201-clyde now approached [Roberta]302-roberta , intending to prepare [her]302-roberta for the suggestion that , assuming that [he]201-clyde could provide [a physician]3559-a physician and the nature of [his]201-clyde position being what it was , [she]302-roberta must speak for [herself]302-roberta . But before [he]201-clyde had spoken [she]302-roberta at once inquired of [him]201-clyde as to what , if anything , more [he]201-clyde had heard or done . Was n't some other remedy sold somewhere ? And this giving [him]201-clyde the opportunity [he]201-clyde desired , [he]201-clyde explained : " Well , [I]3565-i 've asked around and looked into [most of [the drug - stores]5737-the drug - stores]5736-most of the drug - stores and [they]5736-most of the drug - stores tell [me]3565-i if this one wo n't work that none will . That leaves [me]3565-i sorta stumped now , unless [you]302-roberta 're willing to go and see [a doctor]3432-a doctor . But the trouble with that is [they]5736-most of the drug - stores 're hard to find — [the ones who 'll do anything and keep [their]5736-most of the drug - stores mouths shut]5739-the ones who 'll do anything and keep their mouths shut . [I]3565-i 've talked with [several fellows]5740-several fellows without saying who it 's for , of course , but it ai n't so easy to get [one around here]5741-one around here , because [they]5740-several fellows are all too much afraid . It 's against the law , [you]302-roberta see . But what [I]3565-i want to know now is , supposing [I]3565-i find [a doctor who would do it]5742-a doctor who would do it , will [you]302-roberta have the nerve to go and see [him]5742-a doctor who would do it and tell [him]5742-a doctor who would do it what the trouble is ? That 's what [I]3565-i want to know . "[3565-i]

[She]3565-i looked at [him]3566-he dazedly , not quite grasping that [he]3566-he was hinting that [she]3565-i was to go entirely alone , but rather assuming that of course [he]3566-he meant to go with [her]3565-i . Then , [her]3565-i mind concentrating nervously upon the necessity of facing [a doctor]3432-a doctor in [[his]3566-he company]3568-his company , [she]3565-i first exclaimed : " Oh , [dear]5356-dear , is n't it terrible to think of [us]5744-us having to go to [a doctor]3432-a doctor in this way ? Then [he]5742-a doctor who would do it 'll know all about [us]5744-us , wo n't [he]5742-a doctor who would do it ? And besides it 's dangerous , is n't it , although [I]201-clyde do n't suppose it could be much worse than those old pills . "[201-clyde] [She]3565-i went off into more intimate inquiries as to what was done and how , but [Clyde]201-clyde could not enlighten [her]3565-i .

" Oh , do n't be getting nervous over that now , "[3565-i] [he]201-clyde said . " It is n't anything that 's going to hurt [you]3565-i , [I]201-clyde know . Besides [we]5744-us 'll be lucky if [we]5744-us find [some one to do it]5746-some one to do it . What [I]201-clyde want to know is if [I]201-clyde do find [a doctor]3432-a doctor , will [you]3565-i be willing to go to [him]5742-a doctor who would do it alone ? "[201-clyde] [She]3565-i started as if struck , but unabashed now [he]201-clyde went on , " As things stand with [me]302-roberta here , [I]302-roberta ca n't go with [you]3565-i , that 's sure . [I]302-roberta 'm too well known around here , and besides [I]302-roberta look too much like [Gilbert]200-gilbert and [he]5742-a doctor who would do it 's known to [everybody]1330-everybody . If [I]302-roberta should be mistaken for [him]5742-a doctor who would do it , or be taken for [[his]5742-a doctor who would do it cousin]622-his cousin or [relative]5750-relative , well , then the jig 's up . "[302-roberta]

[His]201-clyde eyes were not only an epitome of how wretched [he]201-clyde would feel were [he]201-clyde exposed to [all Lycurgus]1-lycurgus for what [he]201-clyde was , but also in them lurked a shadow of the shabby role [he]201-clyde was attempting to play in connection with [her]3569-you — in hiding thus completely behind [her]3569-you necessity . And yet so tortured was [he]201-clyde by the fear of what was about to befall [him]201-clyde in case [he]201-clyde did not succeed in so doing , that [he]201-clyde was now prepared , whatever [Roberta]302-roberta might think or say , to stand [his]201-clyde ground . But [Roberta]302-roberta , sensing only the fact that [he]201-clyde was thinking of sending [her]3569-you alone , now exclaimed incredulously : " Not alone , [Clyde]201-clyde ! Oh , no , [I]3570-i could n't do that ! Oh , dear , no ! Why , [I]3570-i 'd be frightened to death . Oh , dear , no . Why , [I]3570-i 'd be so frightened [I]3570-i would n't know what to do . Just think how [I]3570-i 'd feel , trying to explain to [him]201-clyde alone . [I]3570-i just could n't do that . Besides , how would [I]3570-i know what to say — how to begin ? [You]3569-you 'll just have to go with [me]3570-i at first , that 's all , and explain , or [I]3570-i never can go — [I]3570-i do n't care what happens . "[3570-i] [Her]3569-you eyes were round and excited and [her]3569-you face , while registering all the depression and fear that had recently been there , was transfigured by definite opposition .

But [Clyde]201-clyde was not to be shaken either .

" [You]3569-you know how it is with [me]302-roberta here , [Roberta]302-roberta . [I]302-roberta ca n't go , and that 's all there is to it . Why , supposing [I]302-roberta were seen — supposing [some one]4723-some one should recognize [me]302-roberta ? What then ? [You]3569-you know how much [I]302-roberta 've been going around here since [I]302-roberta 've been [here]4728-here . Why , it 's crazy to think that [I]302-roberta could go . Besides , it will be a lot easier for [you]3569-you than for [me]302-roberta . [No doctor]5753-no doctor 's going to think anything much of [your]3569-you coming to [him]5753-no doctor , especially if [you]3569-you 're alone . [He]5753-no doctor 'll just think [you]3569-you 're [some one who 's got in trouble]5754-some one who 's got in trouble and with [no one]4713-no one to help [you]3569-you . But if [I]302-roberta go , and it should be [any one who knows anything about [the Griffiths]201-clyde]5756-any one who knows anything about the griffiths , there 'd be the deuce to pay . Right off [he]5753-no doctor 'd think [I]302-roberta was stuffed with money . Besides , if [I]302-roberta did n't do just what [he]5753-no doctor wanted [me]302-roberta to do afterwards , [he]5753-no doctor could go to [[my]302-roberta uncle]4905-my uncle , or [[my]302-roberta cousin]4912-my cousin , and then , good night ! That would be the end of [me]302-roberta . And if [I]302-roberta lost [my]302-roberta place here now , and with no money and that kind of scandal connected with [me]302-roberta , where do [you]3569-you suppose [I]302-roberta would be after that , or [you]3569-you either ? [I]302-roberta certainly could n't look after [you]3569-you then . And then what would [you]3569-you do ? [I]302-roberta should think [you]3569-you 'd wake up and see what a tough proposition this is . [My]302-roberta name ca n't be pulled into this without trouble for [both of [us]5759-both of us]5759-both of us . It 's got to be kept out , that 's all , and the only way for [me]302-roberta to keep it out is for [me]302-roberta to stay away from [any doctor]3443-any doctor . Besides , [he]3443-any doctor 'd feel a lot sorrier for [you]3569-you than [he]3443-any doctor would for [me]302-roberta . [You]3569-you ca n't tell [me]302-roberta ! "[302-roberta]

[His]3570-i eyes were distressed and determined , and , as [Roberta]302-roberta could gather from [his]3570-i manner , a certain hardness , or at least defiance , the result of fright , showed in every gesture . [He]3570-i was determined to protect [his]3570-i own name , come what might — a fact which , because of [her]302-roberta own acquiescence up to this time , still carried great weight with [her]302-roberta .

" Oh , dear ! dear ! "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta exclaimed , nervously and sadly now , the growing and drastic terror of the situation dawning upon [her]302-roberta , " [I]3570-i do n't see how [we]5761-we are to do then . [I]3570-i really do n't . For [I]3570-i ca n't do that and that 's all there is to it . It 's all so hard — so terrible . [I]3570-i 'd feel too much ashamed and frightened to ever go alone . "[3570-i]

But even as [she]302-roberta said this [she]302-roberta began to feel that [she]302-roberta might , and even would , go alone , if must be . For what else was there to do ? And how was [she]302-roberta to compel [him]3570-i , in the face of [his]3570-i own fears and dangers , to jeopardize [his]3570-i position here ? [He]3570-i began once more , in self - defense more than from any other motive :

" Besides , unless this thing is n't going to cost very much , [I]3570-i do n't see how [I]3570-i 'm going to get by with it anyhow , [Roberta]302-roberta . [I]3570-i really do n't . [I]3570-i do n't make so very much , [you]302-roberta know — only twenty - five dollars up to now . "[3570-i] ( [Necessity]397-necessity was at last compelling [him]3570-i to speak frankly with [Roberta]302-roberta . ) " And [I]3570-i have n't saved anything — not a cent . And [you]302-roberta know why as well as [I]3570-i do . [We]5762-we spent the most of it together . Besides if [I]3570-i go and [he]3570-i thought [I]3570-i had money , [he]3570-i might want to charge [me]3570-i more than [I]3570-i could possibly dig up . But if [you]302-roberta go and just tell [him]3570-i how things are — and that [you]302-roberta have n't got anything — if [you]302-roberta 'd only say [I]3570-i 'd run away or something , see — "[3570-i]

[He]3570-i paused because , as [he]3570-i said it , [he]3570-i saw a flicker of shame , contempt , despair at being connected with anything so cheap and shabby , pass over [Roberta]302-roberta 's face . And yet in spite of this sly and yet muddy tergiversation on [his]3570-i part — so great is the compelling and enlightening power of necessity — [she]302-roberta could still see that there was some point to [his]3570-i argument . [He]3570-i might be trying to use [her]302-roberta as a foil , a mask , behind which [he]3570-i , and [she]302-roberta too for that matter , was attempting to hide . But just the same , shameful as it was , here were the stark , bald headlands of fact , and at their base the thrashing , destroying waves of necessity . [She]302-roberta heard [him]3570-i say : " [You]302-roberta would n't have to give [your]302-roberta right name , [you]302-roberta know , or where [you]302-roberta came from . [I]355-short do n't intend to pick out [any doctor right around here]5763-any doctor right around here , see . Then , if [you]302-roberta 'd tell [him]5763-any doctor right around here [you]302-roberta did n't have much money — just [your]302-roberta weekly salary — "[355-short]

[She]302-roberta sat down weakly to think , the while this persuasive trickery proceeded from [him]3570-i — the import of most of [his]3570-i argument going straight [home]4793-home . For as false and morally meretricious as this whole plan was , still , as [she]302-roberta could see for [herself]302-roberta , [her]302-roberta own as well as [Clyde]201-clyde 's situation was desperate . And as honest and punctilious as [she]302-roberta might ordinarily be in the matter of truth - telling and honest - dealing , plainly this was one of those whirling tempests of fact and reality in which the ordinary charts and compasses of moral measurement were for the time being of small use .

And so , insisting then that [they]3572-they go to [some doctor far away]3573-some doctor far away , [Utica]3-utica or [Albany]4-albany , maybe — but still admitting by this that [she]302-roberta would go — the conversation was dropped . And [he]3570-i having triumphed in the matter of excepting [his]3570-i own personality from this , took heart to the extent , at least , of thinking that at once now , by some hook or crook , [he]3570-i must find [a doctor to whom [he]3570-i could send [her]302-roberta]3574-a doctor to whom he could send her . Then [his]3570-i terrible troubles in connection with all this would be over . And after that [she]302-roberta could go [her]302-roberta way , as surely [she]302-roberta must ; then , seeing that [he]3570-i would have done all that [he]3570-i could for [her]302-roberta [he]3570-i would go [his]3570-i way to the glorious denouement that lay directly before [him]3570-i in case only this were adjusted .

Nevertheless hours and even days , and finally a week and then ten days , passed without any word from [him]3570-i as to the whereabouts of [a doctor to whom [she]302-roberta could go]3575-a doctor to whom she could go . For although having said so much to [her]302-roberta [he]3570-i still did not know to whom to apply . And each hour and day as great a menace to [him]3570-i as to [her]302-roberta . And [her]302-roberta looks as well as [her]302-roberta inquiries registering how intense and vital and even clamorous at moments was [her]302-roberta own distress . Also [he]3570-i was harried almost to the point of nervous collapse by [his]3570-i own inability to think of any speedy and sure way by which [she]302-roberta might be aided . Where did [a physician]3559-a physician live to whom [he]3570-i might send [her]302-roberta with some assurance of relief for [her]302-roberta , and how was [he]3570-i to find out about [him]3570-i ?

After a time , however , in running over all the names of those [he]3570-i knew , [he]3570-i finally struck upon a forlorn hope in the guise of [Orrin Short]355-short , [the young man conducting the one small " [gents ' furnishing store "[201-clyde] in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]5764-gents ' furnishing store " in lycurgus which catered more or less exclusively to [the rich youths of [the city]477-the city]3578-the rich youths of the city]3577-the young man conducting the one small " gents ' furnishing store " in lycurgus which catered more or less exclusively to the rich youths of the city — [a youth of about [his]355-short own years and proclivities , as [Clyde]201-clyde had guessed , who ever since [he]355-short had been [here]4728-here]3580-a youth of about his own years and proclivities , as clyde had guessed , who ever since he had been here had been useful to [him]355-short in the matter of tips as to dress and style in general . Indeed , as [Clyde]201-clyde had for some time noted , [Short]355-short was [a brisk , inquiring and tactful person , who , in addition to being quite attractive personally to [girls]894-girls , was also always most courteous to [[his]355-short patrons]3584-his patrons , particularly to [those whom [he]355-short considered above [him]355-short in the social scale]3585-those whom he considered above him in the social scale , and among these was [Clyde]201-clyde]3582-a brisk , inquiring and tactful person , who , in addition to being quite attractive personally to girls , was also always most courteous to his patrons , particularly to those whom he considered above him in the social scale , and among these was clyde . For having discovered that [Clyde]201-clyde was related to [the Griffiths]555-the griffiths , [this same Short]355-short had sought , as a means for [his]355-short own general advancement in other directions , to scrape as much of a genial and intimate relationship with [him]201-clyde as possible , only , as [Clyde]201-clyde saw it , and in view of the general attitude of [[his]201-clyde very high relatives]3587-his very high relatives , it had not , up to this time at least , been possible for [him]201-clyde to consider any such intimacy seriously . And yet , finding [Short]355-short so very affable and helpful in general , [he]201-clyde was not above reaching at least an easy and genial surface relationship with [him]355-short , which [Short]355-short appeared to accept in good part . Indeed , as at first , [his]355-short manner remained seeking and not a little sycophantic at times . And so it was that among all those with whom [he]355-short could be said to be in either intimate or casual contact , [Short]355-short was about [the only one who offered even a chance for an inquiry which might prove productive of some helpful information]3588-the only one who offered even a chance for an inquiry which might prove productive of some helpful information .

In consequence , in passing [[Short]355-short 's place]3589-short 's place each evening and morning , once [he]201-clyde thought of [him]355-short in this light , [he]201-clyde made it a point to nod and smile in a most friendly manner , until at least three days had gone by . And then , feeling that [he]201-clyde had paved the way as much as [his]201-clyde present predicament would permit , [he]201-clyde stopped in , not at all sure that on this first occasion [he]201-clyde would be able to broach the dangerous subject . The tale [he]201-clyde had fixed upon to tell [Short]355-short was that [he]201-clyde had been approached by [a young working - man in [the factory]440-the factory]3590-a young working - man in the factory , newly - married , who , threatened with [an heir and not being able to afford one as yet]3592-an heir and not being able to afford one as yet , had appealed to [him]201-clyde for information as to where [he]201-clyde might now find [a doctor]3432-a doctor to help [him]201-clyde . The only interesting additions which [Clyde]201-clyde proposed to make to this were that [the young man]3594-the young man , being very poor and timid and not so very intelligent , was not able to speak or do much for [himself]3594-the young man . Also that [he]201-clyde , [Clyde]201-clyde , being better informed , although so new locally as not to be able to direct [him]3594-the young man to [any physician]3595-any physician ( an after - thought intended to put the idea into [Short]355-short 's mind that [he]355-short [himself]355-short was never helpless and so not likely ever to want such advice [himself]355-short ) , had already advised [the young man]3594-the young man of a temporary remedy . But unfortunately , so [his]355-short story was to run , this had already failed to work . Hence something more certain — [a physician]3559-a physician , no less — was necessary . And [Short]355-short , having been [here]4728-here longer , and , as [he]355-short had heard [him]355-short explain , hailing previously from [Gloversville]52-gloversville , it was quite certain , as [Clyde]201-clyde now argued with [himself]201-clyde , that [he]201-clyde would know of at least one — or should . But in order to divert suspicion from [himself]355-short [he]355-short was going to add that of course [he]355-short probably could get news of some one in [his]355-short own set , only , the situation being so unusual ( any reference to any such thing in [[his]355-short own world]2673-his own world being likely to set [[his]355-short own group]3600-his own group talking ) , [he]355-short preferred to ask [some one like [Short]355-short , who as a favor would keep it quiet]3601-some one like short , who as a favor would keep it quiet .

As it chanced on this occasion , [Short]355-short [himself]355-short , owing to [his]355-short having done a very fair day 's business , was in an exceedingly jovial frame of mind . And [Clyde]201-clyde having entered , to buy a pair of socks , perhaps , [he]201-clyde began : " Well , it 's good to see [you]355-short again , [Mr. Griffiths]200-gilbert . How are [you]355-short ? How are things with [the Griffiths Company]1879-the griffiths company anyhow ? "[355-short]

[Short]355-short 's manner , always brisk , was on this occasion doubly reassuring , since [he]355-short liked [Clyde]201-clyde , only now the latter was so intensely keyed up by the daring of [his]355-short own project that [he]355-short could scarcely bring [himself]355-short to carry the thing off with the air [he]355-short would have liked to have employed .

Nevertheless , being in [the store]699-the store and so , seemingly , committed to the project , [he]355-short now began : " Oh , pretty fair . Ca n't kick a bit . [I]398-short always have all [I]398-short can do , [you]355-short know . "[398-short] At the same time [he]355-short began nervously fingering some ties hung upon movable nickeled rods . But before [he]355-short had wasted a moment on these , [Mr. Short]398-short , turning and spreading some boxes of very special ties from a shelf behind [him]355-short on the glass case , remarked : " Never mind looking at those , [Mr. Griffiths]200-gilbert . "[355-short] [He]398-short picked up several bundles of six each , the very latest , as [he]398-short explained . " See anything else like this anywhere around here yet ? [I]201-clyde 'll say [you]355-short have n't . "[201-clyde] [He]355-short eyed [Clyde]201-clyde smilingly , the while [he]355-short wished sincerely that [such a young man]3603-such a young man , so well connected , yet not rich like [the others]629-the others , would be friends with [him]355-short . It would place [him]355-short here .

[Clyde]201-clyde , fingering the offerings and guessing that what [Short]398-short was saying was true , was now so troubled and confused in [his]201-clyde own mind that [he]201-clyde could scarcely think and speak as planned . " Very nice , sure , "[201-clyde] [he]201-clyde said , turning them over , feeling that at another time [he]201-clyde would have been pleased to possess at least two . " [I]398-short think maybe [I]398-short 'll take this one , anyhow , and this one , too . "[398-short] [He]201-clyde drew out two and held them up , while [he]201-clyde was thinking how to broach the so much more important matter that had brought [him]201-clyde [here]4728-here . For why should [he]201-clyde be troubling to buy ties , dilly - dallying in this way , when all [he]201-clyde wanted to ask [Short]398-short about was this other matter ? Yet how hard it was now — how very hard . And yet [he]201-clyde really must , although perhaps not so abruptly . [He]201-clyde would look around a little more at first in order to allay suspicion — ask about some socks . Only why should [he]201-clyde be doing that , since [he]201-clyde did not need anything , [Sondra]186-sondra only recently having presented [him]201-clyde with a dozen handkerchiefs , some collars , ties and socks . Nevertheless every time [he]201-clyde decided to speak [he]201-clyde felt a sort of sinking sensation at the pit of [his]201-clyde stomach , a fear that [he]201-clyde could not or would not carry the thing off with the necessary ease and conviction . It was all so questionable and treacherous — so likely to lead to exposure and disgrace in some way . [He]201-clyde would probably not be able to bring [himself]201-clyde to speak to [Short]398-short to - night . And yet , as [he]201-clyde argued with [himself]201-clyde , how could the occasion ever be more satisfactory ?

[Short]398-short , in the meantime having gone to the rear of [the store]699-the store and now returning , with a most engaging and even sycophantic smile on [his]398-short face , began with : " Saw [you]201-clyde last Tuesday evening about nine o'clock going into [[the Finchleys]184-the finchleys ' place]5768-the finchleys ' place , did n't [I]201-clyde ? [Clyde]201-clyde saw that [Short]398-short really was impressed by [his]398-short social station [here]4728-here . There was a wealth of admiration mingled with a touch of servility . [Short]398-short , sensing [his]201-clyde relief , was inclined to wonder whether there was [a working - man]3611-a working - man , or whether it was not [Clyde]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde who was in [this scrape]3612-this scrape . But , gee , would n't that be the ...

The information thus gained was a relief , but only partially so . For both [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta there was no real relief now until this problem should be definitely solved . And although within a few moments after [he]201-clyde had obtained it , [he]201-clyde appeared and explained that at last [he]201-clyde had secured the name of [some one who might help [her]302-roberta]3628-some one who might help her , still there was yet the serious business of heartening [her]302-roberta for the task of seeing [the doctor]3610-the doctor alone , also for the story that was to exculpate [him]201-clyde and at the same time win for [her]302-roberta sufficient sympathy to cause [the doctor]3610-the doctor to make the charge for [his]201-clyde service merely nominal .

But now , instead of protesting as at first [he]201-clyde feared that [she]302-roberta might , [Roberta]302-roberta was moved to acquiesce . So many things in [Clyde]201-clyde 's attitude since [Christmas]399-christmas had so shocked [her]302-roberta that [she]302-roberta was bewildered and without a plan other than to extricate [herself]302-roberta as best [she]302-roberta might without any scandal attaching to [her]302-roberta or [him]201-clyde and then going [her]302-roberta own way — pathetic and abrasive though it might be . For since [he]201-clyde did not appear to care for [her]302-roberta any more and plainly desired to be rid of [her]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta was in no mood to compel [him]201-clyde to do other than [he]201-clyde wished . Let [him]201-clyde go . [She]302-roberta could make [her]302-roberta own way . [She]302-roberta had , and [she]302-roberta could too , without [him]201-clyde , if only [she]302-roberta could get out of this . Yet , as [she]302-roberta said this to [herself]302-roberta , however , and a sense of the full significance of it all came to [her]302-roberta , the happy days that would never be again , [she]302-roberta put [her]302-roberta hands to [her]302-roberta eyes and brushed away uncontrollable tears . To think that all that was should come to this .

Yet when [he]201-clyde called the same evening after visiting [Short]398-short , [his]201-clyde manner redolent of a fairly worth - while achievement , [she]302-roberta merely said , after listening to [his]201-clyde explanation in as receptive a manner as [she]302-roberta could : " Do [you]201-clyde know just where this is , [Clyde]201-clyde ? Can [we]5801-we get there on [the car]650-the car without much trouble , or will [we]5801-we have to walk a long way ? "[302-roberta] And after [he]201-clyde had explained that it was but [a little way out of [Gloversville]52-gloversville]3631-a little way out of gloversville , in [the suburbs]3632-the suburbs really , [an interurban stop]3633-an interurban stop being but a quarter of a mile from [the house]532-the house , [she]302-roberta had added : " Is [he]201-clyde [home]4793-home at night , or will [we]5801-we have to go in the daytime ? "[302-roberta] And being assured that [he]201-clyde was , as [Clyde]201-clyde had learned from [Short]398-short , [she]302-roberta went on : " But do [you]201-clyde know is [he]201-clyde old or young ? "[302-roberta]

[Clyde]201-clyde did not know . [He]201-clyde had not thought to inquire , but to reassure [her]302-roberta [he]201-clyde ventured that [he]201-clyde was middle - aged — which chanced to be the fact .

The following evening [the two of [them]3635-the two of them]3635-the two of them departed , but separately as usual , for [Fonda]47-fonda , where it was necessary to change [cars]504-cars . And once within [the approximate precincts of [[the physician]3560-the physician 's residence]3639-the physician 's residence]3637-the approximate precincts of the physician 's residence , [they]3635-the two of them stepped down and made [their]3635-the two of them way along [a road]1980-a road , which in this mid - state winter weather was still covered with old and dry - packed snow . It offered a comparatively smooth floor for [their]3635-the two of them quick steps . For in these days , there was no longer that lingering intimacy which formerly would have characterized [both]874-both . In those other and so recent days , as [Roberta]302-roberta was constantly thinking , [he]201-clyde would have been only too glad in such a place as this , if not on such an occasion , to drag [his]201-clyde steps , put an arm about [her]302-roberta waist , and talk about nothing at all — the night , the work at [the factory]440-the factory , [Mr. Liggett]292-liggett , [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle , the current movies , [some place [they]3635-the two of them were planning to go]3644-some place they were planning to go , something [they]3635-the two of them would love to do together if [they]3635-the two of them could . But now ... And on this particular occasion , when most of all , and if ever , [she]302-roberta needed the full strength of [his]201-clyde devotion and support ! Yet now , as [she]302-roberta could see , [he]201-clyde was most nervously concerned as to whether , going alone in this way , [she]302-roberta was going to get scared and " back out "[201-clyde] ; whether [she]302-roberta was going to think to say the right thing at the right time and convince [the doctor]3610-the doctor that [he]201-clyde must do something for [her]302-roberta , and for a nominal fee .

" Well , [Roberta]302-roberta , how about [you]302-roberta ? All right ? [You]302-roberta 're not going to get cold feet now , are [you]302-roberta ? Gee , [I]201-clyde hope not because this is going to be a good chance to get this thing done and over with . [I]201-clyde got that straight . All [you]302-roberta have to do now , is to say , well , [you]302-roberta know , that [you]302-roberta 're in trouble , see , and that [you]302-roberta do n't know how [you]302-roberta 're going to get out of it unless [he]5786-this fellow 'll help [you]302-roberta in some way , because [you]302-roberta have n't [any friends here [you]302-roberta can go to]5811-any friends here you can go to . "[201-clyde]

[Clyde]201-clyde was so nervous and so full of the necessity of charging [Roberta]302-roberta with sufficient energy and courage to go through with this and succeed , now that [he]201-clyde had brought [her]302-roberta this far along with it , that [he]201-clyde scarcely realized how inadequate and trivial , even , in so far as [her]302-roberta predicament and [the doctor]3610-the doctor 's mood and temperament were concerned , [his]201-clyde various instructions and bits of inexperienced advice were . And [she]302-roberta on [her]302-roberta part was not only thinking how easy it was for [him]201-clyde to stand back and make suggestions , while [she]302-roberta was confronted with the necessity of going forward , and that alone , but also that [he]201-clyde was really thinking more of [himself]201-clyde than [he]201-clyde was of [her]302-roberta — some way to make [her]302-roberta get [herself]302-roberta out of it inexpensively and without any real trouble to [him]201-clyde .

At the same time , even here and now , in spite of all this , [she]302-roberta was still decidedly drawn to [him]201-clyde — [his]201-clyde white face , [his]201-clyde thin hands , nervous manner . And although [she]302-roberta knew [he]201-clyde talked to encourage [her]302-roberta to do what [he]201-clyde had not the courage or skill to do [himself]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta was not angry . Rather , [she]302-roberta was merely saying to [herself]302-roberta in this crisis that although [he]201-clyde advised so freely [she]302-roberta was not going to pay attention to [him]201-clyde — much . What [she]302-roberta was going to say was not that [she]302-roberta was deserted , for that seemed too much of a disagreeable and self - incriminating remark for [her]302-roberta to make concerning [herself]302-roberta , but rather that [she]302-roberta was married and that [she]302-roberta and [[her]302-roberta young husband]3647-her young husband were too poor to have [a baby]2313-a baby as yet — the same story [Clyde]201-clyde had told [the druggist]3451-the druggist in [Schenectady]60-schenectady , as [she]302-roberta recalled . For after all , what did [he]201-clyde know about how [she]302-roberta felt ? And [he]201-clyde was not going with [her]302-roberta to make it easier for [her]302-roberta .

Yet dominated by the purely feminine instinct to cling to [some one]4723-some one for support , [she]302-roberta now turned to [Clyde]201-clyde , taking hold of [his]201-clyde hands and standing quite still , wishing that [he]201-clyde would hold and pet [her]302-roberta and tell [her]302-roberta that it was all right and that [she]302-roberta must not be afraid . And although [he]201-clyde no longer cared for [her]302-roberta , now in the face of this involuntary evidence of [her]302-roberta former trust in [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde released both hands and putting [his]201-clyde arms about [her]302-roberta , the more to encourage [her]302-roberta than anything else , observed : " Come on now , [Roberta]302-roberta . Gee , [you]302-roberta ca n't act like this , [you]302-roberta know . [You]302-roberta do n't want to lose [your]302-roberta nerve now that [we]5817-we 're here , do [you]302-roberta ?
