The way [he]201-clyde put it was that unless left undisturbed in [his]201-clyde present situation [he]201-clyde would be in no position to marry [her]302-roberta and furthermore could not possibly do anything to aid [her]302-roberta at the coming time when most of all [she]302-roberta would stand in need of aid — a hint which caused [Roberta]302-roberta to reflect on a hitherto not fully developed vein of hardness in [Clyde]201-clyde , although had [she]302-roberta but sufficiently reflected , it had shown itself at the time that [he]201-clyde compelled [her]302-roberta to admit [him]201-clyde to [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room .

In addition and because [she]302-roberta was doing nothing and yet [he]201-clyde feared that at any moment [she]302-roberta might , [he]201-clyde shifted in part at least from the attitude of complete indifference , which had availed [him]201-clyde up to the time that [she]302-roberta had threatened [him]201-clyde , to one of at least simulated interest and good - will and friendship . For the very precarious condition in which [he]201-clyde found [himself]201-clyde was sufficiently terrifying to evoke more diplomacy than ever before had characterized [him]201-clyde . Besides [he]201-clyde was foolish enough to hope , if not exactly believe , that by once more conducting [himself]201-clyde as though [he]201-clyde still entertained a lively sense of the problem that afflicted [her]302-roberta and that [he]201-clyde was willing , in case no other way was found , to eventually marry [her]302-roberta ( though [he]201-clyde could never definitely be persuaded to commit [himself]201-clyde as to this ) , [he]201-clyde could reduce [her]302-roberta determination to compel [him]201-clyde to act soon at least to a minimum , and so leave [him]201-clyde more time in which to exhaust every possibility of escape without marriage , and without being compelled to run away .

And although [Roberta]302-roberta sensed the basis of this sudden shift , still [she]302-roberta was so utterly alone and distrait that [she]302-roberta was willing to give ear to [Clyde]201-clyde 's mock genial , if not exactly affectionate observations and suggestions . It caused [her]302-roberta , at [his]201-clyde behest , to wait a while longer , the while , as [he]201-clyde now explained , [he]201-clyde would not only have saved up some money , but devised some plan in connection with [his]201-clyde work which would permit [him]201-clyde to leave for a time anyhow , marry [her]302-roberta somewhere and then establish [her]302-roberta and [the baby]5896-the baby as [a lawful married woman]3811-a lawful married woman [somewhere else]3812-somewhere else , while , although [he]201-clyde did not explain this just now , [he]201-clyde returned to [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus and sent [her]302-roberta such aid as [he]201-clyde could . But on condition , of course , that never anywhere , unless [he]201-clyde gave [her]302-roberta permission , must [she]302-roberta assert that [he]201-clyde had married [her]302-roberta , or point to [him]201-clyde in any way as [the father of [her]302-roberta child]3813-the father of her child . Also it was understood that [she]302-roberta , as [she]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta had asserted over and over that [she]302-roberta would , if only [he]201-clyde would do this — marry [her]302-roberta — take steps to free [herself]302-roberta on the ground of desertion , or something , in some place sufficiently removed from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus for [no one]4713-no one to hear . And that within a reasonable time after [her]302-roberta marriage to [him]201-clyde , although [he]201-clyde was not at all satisfied that , assuming that [he]201-clyde did marry [her]302-roberta , [she]302-roberta would .

But [Clyde]201-clyde , of course , was insincere in regard to all [his]201-clyde overtures at this time , and really not concerned as to [her]302-roberta sincerity or insincerity . Nor did [he]201-clyde have any intention of leaving [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus even for the moderate length of time that [her]302-roberta present extrication would require unless [he]201-clyde had to . For that meant that [he]201-clyde would be separated from [Sondra]186-sondra , and such absence , for whatever period , would most definitely interfere with [his]201-clyde plans . And so , on the contrary , [he]201-clyde drifted — thinking most idly at times of some possible fake or mock marriage such as [he]201-clyde had seen in some melodramatic movie — [a fake minister]3815-a fake minister and [witnesses]3816-witnesses combining to deceive [some simple country girl]3817-some simple country girl such as [Roberta]302-roberta was not , but at such expense of time , resources , courage and subtlety as [Clyde]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde , after a little reflection , was wise enough to see was beyond [him]201-clyde .

Again , knowing that , unless some hitherto unforeseen aid should eventuate , [he]201-clyde was heading straight toward a disaster which could not much longer be obviated , [he]201-clyde even allowed [himself]201-clyde to dream that , once the fatal hour was at hand and [Roberta]302-roberta , no longer to be put off by any form of subterfuge , was about to expose [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde might even flatly deny that [he]201-clyde had ever held any such relationship with [her]302-roberta as then [she]302-roberta would be charging — rather that at all times [his]201-clyde relationship with [her]302-roberta had been that of [a department manager to [employee]3819-employee]3818-a department manager to employee — no more . Terror — no less !

But at the same time , early in May , when [Roberta]302-roberta , because of various gestative signs and ailments , was beginning to explain , as well as insist , to [Clyde]201-clyde that by no stretch of the imagination or courage could [she]302-roberta be expected to retain [her]302-roberta position at [the factory]440-the factory or work later than [June]405-june first , because by then the likelihood of [the girls there]3821-the girls there beginning to notice something , would be too great for [her]302-roberta to endure , [Sondra]186-sondra was beginning to explain that not so much later than the fourth or fifth of [June]405-june [she]302-roberta and [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [Stuart]188-stuart , together with [some servants]3823-some servants , would be going to [[their]3824-their new lodge at [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake]3825-their new lodge at twelfth lake in order to supervise certain installations then being made before the regular season should begin . And after that , not later than the eighteenth , at which time [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons , [Harriets]196-the harriets , and [some others]1406-some others would have arrived , including very likely visits from [Bella]183-bella and [Myra]182-myra , [he]3827-he might expect a week - end invitation from [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons , with whom , through [Bertine]197-bertine , [she]302-roberta would arrange as to this . And after that , the general circumstances proving fairly propitious , there would be , of course , other week - end invitations to [the Harriets]196-the harriets ' , [Phants]190-the phants ' and [some others who dwelt [there]4705-there]3828-some others who dwelt there , as well as to [the Griffiths]183-bella ' at [Greenwood]12-greenwood , to which place , on account of [Bella]183-bella , [he]3827-he could easily come . And during [his]3827-he two weeks ' vacation in July , [he]3827-he could either stop at [the Casino]3830-the casino , which was at [Pine Point]9-pine point , or perhaps [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons or [Harriets]196-the harriets , at [her]302-roberta suggestion , might choose to invite [him]3827-he . At any rate , as [Clyde]201-clyde could see , and with no more than such expenditures as , with a little scrimping during [his]201-clyde ordinary working days [here]4728-here , [he]201-clyde could provide for , [he]201-clyde might see not a little of that lake life of which [he]201-clyde had read so much in the local papers , to say nothing of [Sondra]186-sondra at one and another of [the lodges]3832-the lodges , [the masters of which]3833-the masters of which were not so inimical to [his]3827-he presence and overtures as were [[Sondra]186-sondra 's parents]3834-sondra 's parents .

For now it was , and for the first time , as [she]302-roberta proceeded to explain to [him]201-clyde that [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [father]435-father , because of [his]201-clyde continued and reported attentions to [her]302-roberta , were already beginning to talk of an extended European tour which might keep [her]302-roberta and [Stuart]188-stuart and [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother abroad for at least the next two years . But since , at news of this , [Clyde]201-clyde 's face as well as [his]201-clyde spirits darkened , and [she]302-roberta [herself]302-roberta was sufficiently enmeshed to suffer because of this , [she]302-roberta at once added that [he]201-clyde must not feel so bad — [he]201-clyde must not ; things would work out well enough , [she]302-roberta knew . For at the proper time , and unless between then and now , something — [her]302-roberta own subtle attack if not [her]302-roberta at present feverish interest in [Clyde]201-clyde — should have worked to alter [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother 's viewpoint in regard to [him]201-clyde — [she]302-roberta might be compelled to take some steps of [her]302-roberta own in order to frustrate [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother . Just what , [she]302-roberta was not willing to say at this time , although to [Clyde]201-clyde 's overheated imagination it took the form of an elopement and marriage , which could not then be gainsaid by [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents whatever [they]453-her parents might think . And it was true that in a vague and as yet repressed way some such thought was beginning to form in [Sondra]186-sondra 's mind . For , as [she]302-roberta now proceeded to explain to [Clyde]201-clyde , it was so plain that [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother was attempting to steer [her]302-roberta in the direction of a purely social match — the one with [the youth who had been paying [her]302-roberta such marked attention the year before]3842-the youth who had been paying her such marked attention the year before . But because of [her]302-roberta present passion for [Clyde]201-clyde , as [she]302-roberta now gayly declared , it was not easy to see how [she]302-roberta was to be made to comply . " The only trouble with [me]302-roberta is that [I]302-roberta 'm not of age yet , "[302-roberta] [she]302-roberta here added briskly and slangily . " [They]453-her parents 've got [me]186-sondra there , of course . But [I]186-sondra will be by next October and [they]453-her parents ca n't do very much with [me]186-sondra after that , [I]186-sondra want to let [you]201-clyde know . [I]186-sondra can marry [the person [I]186-sondra want]5934-the person i want , [I]186-sondra guess . And if [I]186-sondra ca n't do it here , well , there are more ways than one to kill a cat . "[186-sondra]

The thought was like some sweet , disarranging poison to [Clyde]201-clyde . It fevered and all but betrayed [him]201-clyde mentally . If only — if only — it were not for [Roberta]302-roberta now . That terrifying and all but insoluble problem . But for that , and the opposition of [[Sondra]186-sondra 's parents]3834-sondra 's parents which [she]302-roberta was thinking [she]302-roberta would be able to overcome , did not heaven itself await [him]201-clyde ? [Sondra]186-sondra , [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake , society , wealth , [her]302-roberta love and beauty . [He]201-clyde grew not a little wild in thinking of it all . Once [he]201-clyde and [she]302-roberta were married , what could [[Sondra]186-sondra 's relatives]3844-sondra 's relatives do ? What , but acquiesce and take [them]3844-sondra 's relatives into the glorious bosom of [[their]3844-sondra 's relatives resplendent home at [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]3845-their resplendent home at lycurgus or provide for [them]3844-sondra 's relatives in some other way — [he]201-clyde to no doubt eventually take some place in connection with [the Finchley Electric Sweeper Company]3846-the finchley electric sweeper company . And then would [he]201-clyde not be the equal , if not the superior , of [Gilbert Griffiths]200-gilbert [himself]201-clyde and [all those others who originally had ignored [him]201-clyde here]3847-all those others who originally had ignored him here — [joint heir with [Stuart]188-stuart to all the [Finchley]186-sondra means]3848-joint heir with stuart to all the finchley means . And with [Sondra]186-sondra as the central or crowning jewel to so much sudden and such Aladdin - like splendor .

No thought as to how [he]201-clyde was to overcome the time between now and [October]124-october . No serious consideration of the fact that [Roberta]302-roberta then and there was demanding that [he]201-clyde marry [her]302-roberta . [He]201-clyde could put [her]302-roberta off , [he]201-clyde thought . And yet , at the same time , [he]201-clyde was painfully and nervously conscious of the fact that at no period in [his]201-clyde life before had [he]201-clyde been so treacherously poised at the very brink of disaster . It might be [his]201-clyde duty as [the world]4755-the world would see it — [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother would say so — to at least extricate [Roberta]302-roberta . But in the case of [Esta]219-esta , who had come to [her]302-roberta rescue ? [[Her]219-esta lover]2661-her lover ? [He]201-clyde had walked off from [her]219-esta without a qualm and [she]219-esta had not died . And why , when [Roberta]302-roberta was no worse off than [[his]201-clyde sister]1594-his sister had been , why should [she]219-esta seek to destroy [him]201-clyde in this way ? Force [him]201-clyde to do something which would be little less than social , artistic , passional or emotional assassination ? And when later , if [she]219-esta would but spare [him]201-clyde for this , [he]201-clyde could do so much more for [her]219-esta — with [Sondra]186-sondra 's money of course . [He]201-clyde could not and would not let [her]219-esta do this to [him]201-clyde . [His]201-clyde life would be ruined !

Two incidents which occurred at this time tended still more to sharpen the contrary points of view holding between [Clyde]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta . One of these was no more than a glimpse which [Roberta]302-roberta had one evening of [Clyde]201-clyde pausing at [the Central Avenue curb in front of [the post - office]1181-the post - office]3853-the central avenue curb in front of the post - office to say a few words to [Arabella Stark]353-bella , who in [a large and impressive - looking car]3855-a large and impressive - looking car , was waiting for [[her]353-bella father]510-her father who was still in [the [Stark Building]125-stark building opposite]3857-the stark building opposite . And [Miss Stark]406-miss stark , fashionably outfitted according to the season , [her]406-miss stark world and [her]406-miss stark own pretentious taste , was affectedly posed at the wheel , not only for the benefit of [Clyde]201-clyde but [the public]3858-the public in general . And to [Roberta]302-roberta , who by now was reduced to the verge of distraction between [Clyde]201-clyde 's delay and [her]302-roberta determination to compel [him]201-clyde to act in [her]302-roberta behalf , [she]302-roberta appeared to be little less than an epitome of all the security , luxury and freedom from responsibility which so enticed and hence caused [Clyde]201-clyde to delay and be as indifferent as possible to the dire state which confronted [her]302-roberta . For , alas , apart from this claim of [her]302-roberta condition , what had [she]302-roberta to offer [him]201-clyde comparable to all [he]201-clyde would be giving up in case [he]201-clyde acceded to [her]302-roberta request ? Nothing — a thought which was far from encouraging .

Yet , at this moment contrasting [her]302-roberta own wretched and neglected state with that of [this Miss Stark]406-miss stark , for example , [she]302-roberta found [herself]302-roberta a prey to an even more complaining and antagonistic mood than had hitherto characterized [her]302-roberta . It was not right . It was not fair . For during the several weeks that had passed since last [they]3859-they had discussed this matter , [Clyde]201-clyde had scarcely said a word to [her]302-roberta at [the factory]440-the factory or elsewhere , let alone called upon [her]302-roberta at [[her]302-roberta room]4766-her room , fearing as [he]201-clyde did the customary inquiry which [he]201-clyde could not satisfy . And this caused [her]302-roberta to feel that not only was [he]201-clyde neglecting but resenting [her]302-roberta most sharply .

And yet as [she]302-roberta walked [home]4793-home from this trivial and fairly representative scene , [her]302-roberta heart was not nearly so angry as it was sad and sore because of the love and comfort that had vanished and was not likely ever to come again ... ever ... ever ... ever . Oh , how terrible ... how terrible !

On the other hand , [Clyde]201-clyde , and at approximately this same time , was called upon to witness a scene identified with [Roberta]302-roberta , which , as some might think , only an ironic and even malicious fate could have intended or permitted to come to pass . For motoring north the following Sunday to [Arrow Lake]126-arrow lake to [the lodge of [the Trumbulls]346-the trumbulls ']3863-the lodge of the trumbulls ' to take advantage of an early spring week - end planned by [Sondra]186-sondra , [the party on [nearing Biltz]62-biltz , which was in the direct line of the trip]3864-the party on nearing biltz , which was in the direct line of the trip , was compelled to detour east in the direction of [[Roberta]302-roberta 's home]3865-roberta 's home . And coming finally to [a north and south road which ran directly from [Trippettsville]128-trippettsville]3866-a north and south road which ran directly from trippettsville past [the Alden farm]2037-the alden farm , [they]3868-they turned north into that . And a few minutes later , came directly to the corner adjoining [the Alden farm]2037-the alden farm , where [an east and west road]3870-an east and west road led to [Biltz]62-biltz . Here [Tracy Trumbull]352-tracy trumbull , driving at the time , requested that [some one]4723-some one should get out and inquire at [the adjacent farm - house]3872-the adjacent farm - house as to whether [this road]3873-this road did lead to [Biltz]62-biltz . And [Clyde]201-clyde , being nearest to one door , jumped out . And then , glancing at the name on the mail - box which stood at the junction and evidently belonged to [the extremely dilapidated old farm - house on the rise above]3874-the extremely dilapidated old farm - house on the rise above , [he]201-clyde was not a little astonished to note that the name was that of [Titus Alden]304-titus alden — [[Roberta]302-roberta 's father]3875-roberta 's father . Also , as it instantly came to [him]201-clyde , since [she]302-roberta had described [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents as being near [Biltz]62-biltz , this must be [[her]302-roberta home]1450-her home . It gave [him]201-clyde pause , caused [him]201-clyde for the moment to hesitate as to whether to go on or not , for once [he]201-clyde had given [Roberta]302-roberta a small picture of [himself]201-clyde , and [she]302-roberta might have shown it up here . Again the mere identification of [this lorn , dilapidated realm with [Roberta]302-roberta and hence [himself]201-clyde]3878-this lorn , dilapidated realm with roberta and hence himself , was sufficient to cause [him]201-clyde to wish to turn and run .

But [Sondra]186-sondra , who was sitting next [him]201-clyde in [the car]650-the car and now noting [his]201-clyde hesitation , called : " What 's the matter , [Clyde]201-clyde ? [Afraid of the bow - wow]5935-afraid of the bow - wow ? "[302-roberta] And [he]201-clyde , realizing instantly that [they]3880-they would comment further on [his]201-clyde actions if [he]201-clyde did not proceed at once , started up [the path]3881-the path . But the effect of [this house]5066-this house , once [he]201-clyde contemplated [it]5066-this house thoroughly , was sufficient to arouse in [his]201-clyde brain the most troubled and miserable of thoughts . For what [a house]3883-a house , to be sure ! So lonely and bare , even in this bright , spring weather ! The decayed and sagging roof . The broken chimney to the north — rough lumps of cemented field stones lying at its base ; the sagging and semi - toppling chimney to the south , sustained in place by a log chain . The unkempt path from [the road below]3884-the road below , which slowly [he]201-clyde ascended ! [He]201-clyde was not a little dejected by the broken and displaced stones which served as steps before the front door . And [the unpainted dilapidated out - buildings]3885-the unpainted dilapidated out - buildings , all the more dreary because of these others .

" [Gee]205-gee ! "[201-clyde] To think that this was [[Roberta]302-roberta 's home]3865-roberta 's home . And to think , in the face of all that [he]201-clyde now aspired to in connection with [Sondra]186-sondra and [this social group at [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus]3887-this social group at lycurgus , [she]302-roberta should be demanding that [he]201-clyde marry [her]302-roberta ! And [Sondra]186-sondra in [the car]650-the car with [him]201-clyde here to see — if not know . The poverty ! The reduced grimness of it all . How far [he]201-clyde had traveled away from just such a beginning as this !

With a weakening and sickening sensation at the pit of [his]201-clyde stomach , as of some blow administered there , [he]201-clyde now approached the door . And then , as if to further distress [him]201-clyde , if that were possible , the door was opened by [Titus Alden]304-titus alden , who , in an old , thread - bare and out - at - elbows coat , as well as baggy , worn , jean trousers and rough , shineless , ill - fitting country shoes , desired by [his]201-clyde look to know what [he]201-clyde wanted . And [Clyde]201-clyde , being taken aback by the clothes , as well as a marked resemblance to [Roberta]302-roberta about the eyes and mouth , now as swiftly as possible asked if [the east and west road below]3889-the east and west road below ran through [Biltz]62-biltz and joined [the main highway north]3890-the main highway north . And although [he]201-clyde would have preferred a quick " yes "[1435-this girl] so that [he]201-clyde might have turned and gone , [Titus]304-titus alden preferred to step down into [the yard]3891-the yard and then , with a gesture of the arm , indicate that if [they]3892-they wanted to strike a really good part of [the road]3893-the road , [they]3892-they had better follow this Trippettsville north and [south road]3894-south road for at least two more miles , and then turn west . [Clyde]201-clyde thanked [him]201-clyde briefly and turned almost before [he]201-clyde had finished and hurried away .

For , as [he]201-clyde now recalled , and with an enormous sense of depression , [Roberta]302-roberta was thinking and at this very time , that soon now , and in the face of all [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus had to offer [him]201-clyde — [Sondra]186-sondra — the coming spring and summer — the love and romance , gayety , position , power — [he]201-clyde was going to give all that up and go away with and marry [her]302-roberta . Sneak away to [some out - of - the - way place]3895-some out - of - the - way place ! Oh , how horrible ! And with [a child]3395-a child at [his]201-clyde age ! Oh , why had [he]201-clyde ever been so foolish and weak as to identify [himself]201-clyde with [her]302-roberta in this intimate way ? Just because of a few lonely evenings ! Oh , why , why could n't [he]201-clyde have waited and then [this other world]3897-this other world would have opened up to [him]201-clyde just the same ? If only [he]201-clyde could have waited !

And now unquestionably , unless [he]201-clyde could speedily and easily disengage [himself]201-clyde from [her]302-roberta , all this other splendid recognition would be destined to be withdrawn from [him]201-clyde , and this other world from which [he]201-clyde sprang might extend its gloomy , poverty - stricken arms to [him]201-clyde and envelop [him]201-clyde once more , just as the poverty of [[his]201-clyde family]521-his family had enveloped and almost strangled [him]201-clyde from the first . And it even occurred to [him]201-clyde , in a vague way for the first time , how strange it was that [this girl]1435-this girl and [he]201-clyde , whose origin had been strikingly similar , should have been so drawn to [each other]1439-each other in the beginning . Why should it have been ? How strange life was , anyway ? But even more harrowing than this , was the problem of a way out that was before [him]201-clyde . And [his]201-clyde mind from now on , on this trip , was once more searching for some solution . A word of complaint from [Roberta]302-roberta or [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents to [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle or [Gilbert]200-gilbert , and assuredly [he]201-clyde would be done for .

The thought so troubled [him]201-clyde that once in [the car]650-the car , and although previously [he]201-clyde had been chattering along with [the others]629-the others about what might be in store ahead in the way of divertissement , [he]201-clyde now sat silent . And [Sondra]186-sondra , who sat next to [him]201-clyde and who previously had been whispering at intervals of [her]1435-this girl plans for the summer , now , instead of resuming the patter , whispered : " What come over de sweet phing ? "[201-clyde] ( When [Clyde]201-clyde appeared to be the least reduced in mind [she]1435-this girl most affected this patter with [him]201-clyde , since it had an almost electric , if sweetly tormenting effect on [him]201-clyde . " [[His]201-clyde baby - talking girl]5936-his baby - talking girl , "[1435-this girl] [he]201-clyde sometimes called [her]1435-this girl . ) " Facey all dark now . Little while ago facey all smiles . Come make facey all nice again . Smile at [Sondra]186-sondra . Squeeze [Sondra]186-sondra 's arm like [good boy]5937-good boy , [Clyde]201-clyde . "[1113-the man]

[She]1435-this girl turned and looked up into [his]201-clyde eyes to see what if any effect [this baby - worded cajolery]3905-this baby - worded cajolery was having , and [Clyde]201-clyde did [his]201-clyde best to brighten , of course . But even so , and in the face of all this amazingly wonderful love on [her]1435-this girl part for [him]201-clyde , the specter of [Roberta]302-roberta and all that [she]1435-this girl represented now in connection with all this , was ever before [him]201-clyde — [her]1435-this girl state , [her]1435-this girl very recent edict in regard to it , the obvious impossibility of doing anything now but go away with [her]1435-this girl .

Why — rather than let [himself]201-clyde in for a thing like that — would it not be better , and even though [he]201-clyde lost [Sondra]186-sondra once and for all , for [him]201-clyde to decamp as in the instance of [the slain child in [Kansas City]23-kansas city]3906-the slain child in kansas city — and be heard of nevermore here . But then [he]201-clyde would lose [Sondra]186-sondra , [his]201-clyde connections here , and [[his]201-clyde uncle]692-his uncle — [this world]1288-this world ! The loss ! The loss ! The misery of once more drifting about here and there ; of being compelled to write [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother once more concerning certain things about [his]201-clyde flight , which [some one writing from here]3910-some one writing from here might explain to [her]587-his mother afterwards — and so much more damagingly . And the thoughts concerning [him]201-clyde on the part of [[his]201-clyde relatives]1379-his relatives ! And of late [he]201-clyde had been writing [[his]201-clyde mother]587-his mother that [he]201-clyde was doing so well . What was it about [his]201-clyde life that made things like this happen to [him]201-clyde ? Was this what [his]201-clyde life was to be like ? Running away from one situation and another just to start all over somewhere else — perhaps only to be compelled to flee from something worse . No , [he]201-clyde could not run away again . [He]201-clyde must face it and solve it in some way . [He]201-clyde must !

[God]306-god !

The fifth of June arriving , [the Finchleys]184-the finchleys departed as [Sondra]186-sondra had indicated , but not without a most urgent request from [her]587-his mother that [he]201-clyde be prepared to come to [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons ' either the second or third week - end following — [she]587-his mother to advise [him]201-clyde definitely later — a departure which so affected [Clyde]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde could scarcely think what to do with [himself]201-clyde in [her]587-his mother absence , depressed as [he]201-clyde was by the tangle which [Roberta]302-roberta 's condition presented . And exactly at this time also , [Roberta]302-roberta 's fears and demands had become so urgent that it was really no longer possible for [him]201-clyde to assure [her]587-his mother that if [she]587-his mother would but wait a little while longer , [he]201-clyde would be prepared to act in [her]587-his mother behalf . Plead as [he]201-clyde might , [her]587-his mother case , as [she]587-his mother saw it , was at last critical and no longer to be trifled with in any way . [Her]587-his mother figure , as [she]587-his mother insisted ( although this was largely imaginative on [her]587-his mother part ) , had altered to such an extent that it would not be possible for [her]587-his mother longer to conceal it , and [all those who worked with [her]587-his mother at [the factory]440-the factory]3913-all those who worked with her at the factory were soon bound to know . [She]587-his mother could no longer work or sleep with any comfort — [she]587-his mother must not stay [here]4728-here any more . [She]587-his mother was having preliminary pains — purely imaginary ones in [her]587-his mother case . [He]201-clyde must marry [her]587-his mother now , as [he]201-clyde had indicated [he]201-clyde would , and leave with [her]587-his mother at once — for some place — any place , really — near or far — so long as [she]587-his mother was extricated from this present terrible danger . And [she]587-his mother would agree , as [she]587-his mother now all but pleaded , to let [him]201-clyde go [his]201-clyde way again as soon as [[their]3916-they child]3917-their child was born — truly — and would not ask any more of [him]201-clyde ever — ever . But now , this very week — not later than the fifteenth at the latest — [he]201-clyde must arrange to see [her]587-his mother through with this as [he]201-clyde had promised .

But this meant that [he]201-clyde would be leaving with [her]587-his mother before ever [he]201-clyde should have visited [Sondra]186-sondra at [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake at all , and without ever seeing [her]587-his mother any more really . And , besides , as [he]201-clyde so well knew , [he]201-clyde had not saved the sum necessary to make possible the new venture on which [she]587-his mother was insisting . In vain it was that [Roberta]302-roberta now explained that [she]587-his mother had saved over a hundred , and [they]3916-they could make use of that once [they]3916-they were married or to help in connection with whatever expenses might be incurred in getting to wherever [he]201-clyde should decide [they]3916-they were going . All that [he]201-clyde would see or feel was that this meant the loss of everything to [him]201-clyde , and that [he]201-clyde would have to go away with [her]587-his mother to [some relatively near - by place]3918-some relatively near - by place and get work at anything [he]201-clyde could , in order to support [her]587-his mother as best [he]201-clyde might . But the misery of such a change ! The loss of all [his]201-clyde splendid dreams . And yet , racking [his]201-clyde brains , [he]201-clyde could think of nothing better than that [she]587-his mother should quit and go [home]4793-home for the time being , since as [he]201-clyde now argued , and most shrewdly , as [he]201-clyde thought , [he]201-clyde needed a few more weeks to prepare for the change which was upon [them]3916-they both . For , in spite of all [his]201-clyde efforts , as [he]201-clyde now falsely asserted , [he]201-clyde had not been able to save as much as [he]201-clyde had hoped . [He]201-clyde needed at least three or four more weeks in which to complete the sum , which [he]201-clyde had been looking upon as advisable in the face of this meditated change . Was not [she]587-his mother [herself]587-his mother guessing , as [he]201-clyde knew , that it could not be less than a hundred and fifty or two hundred dollars — quite large sums in [her]587-his mother eyes — whereas , above [his]201-clyde current salary , [Clyde]201-clyde had no more than forty dollars and was dreaming of using that and whatever else [he]201-clyde might secure in the interim to meet such expenses as might be incurred in the anticipated visit to [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake .

But to further support [his]201-clyde evasive suggestion that [she]587-his mother now return to [[her]587-his mother home]1450-her home for a short period , [he]201-clyde added that [she]587-his mother would want to fix [herself]587-his mother up a little , would n't [she]587-his mother ? [She]587-his mother could n't go away on a trip like this , which involved marriage and a change of social contacts in every way , without some improvements in [her]587-his mother wardrobe . Why not take [her]587-his mother hundred dollars or a part of it anyhow and use it for that ? So desperate was [his]201-clyde state that [he]201-clyde even suggested that . And [Roberta]302-roberta , who , in the face of [her]302-roberta own uncertainty up to this time as to what was to become of [her]302-roberta had not ventured to prepare or purchase anything relating either to a trousseau or layette , now began to think that whatever the ulterior purpose of [his]201-clyde suggestion , which like all the others was connected with delay , it might not be unwise even now if [she]587-his mother did take a fortnight or three weeks , and with the assistance of [an inexpensive and yet tolerable dressmaker]3921-an inexpensive and yet tolerable dressmaker , who had aided [[her]587-his mother sister]461-her sister at times , make at least one or two suitable dresses — a flowered gray taffeta afternoon dress , such as [she]587-his mother had once seen in a movie , in which , should [Clyde]201-clyde keep [his]201-clyde word , [she]587-his mother could be married . To match this pleasing little costume , [she]587-his mother planned to add a chic little gray silk hat — poke - shaped , with pink or scarlet cherries nestled up under the brim , together with a neat little blue serge traveling suit , which , with brown shoes and a brown hat , would make [her]587-his mother as smart as [any bride]3923-any bride . The fact that such preparations as these meant additional delay and expense , or that [Clyde]201-clyde might not marry [her]587-his mother after all , or that this proposed marriage from the point of view of both was the tarnished and discolored thing that it was , was still not sufficient to take from the thought of marriage as an event , or sacrament even , that proper color and romance with which it was invested in [her]587-his mother eyes and from which , even under such an unsatisfactory set of circumstances as these , it could not be divorced . And , strangely enough , in spite of all the troubled and strained relations that had developed between [them]3924-them , [she]587-his mother still saw [Clyde]201-clyde in much the same light in which [she]587-his mother had seen [him]201-clyde at first . [He]201-clyde was [a Griffiths]1127-a griffiths , [a youth of genuine social , if not financial distinction]3926-a youth of genuine social , if not financial distinction , [one whom [all the girls in [her]587-his mother position]3928-all the girls in her position , as well as [many of those far above [her]587-his mother]3929-many of those far above her , would be delighted to be connected with in this way — that is , via marriage]3927-one whom all the girls in her position , as well as many of those far above her , would be delighted to be connected with in this way — that is , via marriage . [He]201-clyde might be objecting to marrying [her]587-his mother , but [he]201-clyde was [a person of consequence , just the same]3930-a person of consequence , just the same . And one with whom , if [he]201-clyde would but trouble to care for [her]587-his mother a little , [she]587-his mother could be perfectly happy . And at any rate , once [he]201-clyde had loved [her]587-his mother . And it was said of [men]445-men — [some men]3932-some men , anyway ( so [she]587-his mother had heard [[her]587-his mother mother]447-her mother and [others]561-others say ) that once [a child]3395-a child was presented to [them]445-men , it made a great difference in [their]445-men attitude toward [the mother]5836-the mother , sometimes . [They]445-men came to like [the mother]5836-the mother , too . Anyhow for a little while — a very little while — if what [she]587-his mother had agreed to were strictly observed , [she]587-his mother would have [him]201-clyde with [her]587-his mother to assist [her]587-his mother through this great crisis — to give [his]201-clyde name to [[her]587-his mother child]3938-her child — to aid [her]587-his mother until [she]587-his mother could once more establish [herself]587-his mother in some way .

For the time being , therefore , and with no more plan than this , although with great misgivings and nervous qualms , since , as [she]587-his mother could see , [Clyde]201-clyde was decidedly indifferent , [she]587-his mother rested on this . And it was in this mood that five days later , and after [Roberta]302-roberta had written to [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents that [she]302-roberta was coming [home]4793-home for two weeks at least , to get a dress or two made and to rest a little , because [she]302-roberta was not feeling very well , that [Clyde]201-clyde saw [her]302-roberta off for [[her]302-roberta home in [Biltz]62-biltz]3941-her home in biltz , riding with [her]302-roberta as far as [Fonda]47-fonda . But in so far as [he]201-clyde was concerned , and since [he]201-clyde had really no definite or workable idea , it seemed important to [him]201-clyde that only silence , silence was the great and all essential thing now , so that , even under the impending edge of the knife of disaster , [he]201-clyde might be able to think more , and more , and more , without being compelled to do anything , and without momentarily being tortured by the thought that [Roberta]302-roberta , in some nervous or moody or frantic state , would say or do something which , assuming that [he]201-clyde should hit upon some helpful thought or plan in connection with [Sondra]186-sondra , would prevent [him]201-clyde from executing it .

And about the same time , [Sondra]186-sondra was writing [him]201-clyde gay notes from [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake as to what [he]201-clyde might expect upon [his]201-clyde arrival a little later . Blue water — white sails — tennis — golf - horseback riding — driving . [She]302-roberta had it all arranged with [Bertine]197-bertine , as [she]302-roberta said . And kisses — kisses — kisses !

To which [Clyde]201-clyde responded eagerly and in kind in the same hour . But almost the same mail , at least the same day , brought the following letter from [Roberta]302-roberta .

[Biltz]62-biltz , June 10th .

And it was the contrast presented by these two scenes which finally determined for [him]201-clyde the fact that [he]201-clyde would never marry [Roberta]302-roberta — never — nor even go to [her]302-roberta at [Biltz]62-biltz , or let [her]302-roberta come back to [him]201-clyde here , if [he]201-clyde could avoid that . For would not [his]201-clyde going , or [her]302-roberta return , put a period to all the joys that so recently in connection with [Sondra]186-sondra had come to [him]201-clyde here — make it impossible for [him]201-clyde to be with [Sondra]186-sondra at [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake this summer — make it impossible for [him]201-clyde to run away with and marry [her]302-roberta ? In [God]306-god 's name was there no way ? No outlet from this horrible difficulty which now confronted [him]201-clyde ?

And in a fit of despair , having found the letters in [[his]201-clyde room]530-his room on [his]201-clyde return from work one warm evening in June , [he]201-clyde now threw [himself]201-clyde upon [his]201-clyde bed and fairly groaned . The misery of this ! The horror of [his]201-clyde almost insoluble problem ! Was there no way by which [she]302-roberta could be persuaded to go away — and stay — remain at [home]4793-home , maybe for a while longer , while [he]201-clyde sent [her]302-roberta ten dollars a week , or twelve , even — a full half of all [his]201-clyde salary ? Or could [she]302-roberta go to [some neighboring town]3944-some neighboring town — [Fonda]47-fonda , [Gloversville]52-gloversville , [Schenectady]60-schenectady — [she]302-roberta was not so far gone but what [she]302-roberta could take care of [herself]302-roberta well enough as yet , and rent [a room]4918-a room and remain there quietly until the fatal time , when [she]302-roberta could go to [some doctor]3946-some doctor or [nurse]3947-nurse ? [He]201-clyde might help [her]302-roberta to find some one like that when the time came , if only [she]302-roberta would be willing not to mention [his]201-clyde name .

But this business of making [him]201-clyde come to [Biltz]62-biltz , or meeting [her]302-roberta somewhere , and that within two weeks or less . [He]201-clyde would not , [he]201-clyde would not . [He]201-clyde would do something desperate if [she]302-roberta tried to make [him]201-clyde do that — run away — or — maybe go up to [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake before it should be time for [him]201-clyde to go to [Biltz]62-biltz , or before [she]302-roberta would think it was time , and then persuade [Sondra]186-sondra if [he]201-clyde could — but oh , what a wild , wild chance was that — to run away with and marry [him]201-clyde , even if [she]302-roberta was n't quite eighteen — and then — and then — being married , and [[her]302-roberta family]1607-her family not being able to divorce [them]1607-her family , and [Roberta]302-roberta not being able to find [him]201-clyde , either , but only to complain — well , could n't [he]201-clyde deny it — say that it was not so — that [he]201-clyde had never had any relationship , other than that which [any department head might have with [any girl working for [him]201-clyde]3950-any girl working for him]3949-any department head might have with any girl working for him . [He]201-clyde had not been introduced to [the Gilpins]395-the gilpins , nor had [he]201-clyde gone with [Roberta]302-roberta to see that [Dr. Glenn]402-dr. glenn near [Gloversville]52-gloversville , and [she]302-roberta had told [him]201-clyde at the time , [she]302-roberta had not mentioned [his]201-clyde name .

But the nerve of trying to deny it !

The courage it would take .

The courage to try to face [Roberta]302-roberta when , as [he]201-clyde knew , [her]302-roberta steady , accusing , horrified , innocent , blue eyes would be about as difficult to face as anything in [all the world]3951-all the world . And could [he]201-clyde do that ? Had [he]201-clyde the courage ? And would it all work out satisfactorily if [he]201-clyde did ? Would [Sondra]186-sondra believe [him]201-clyde — once [she]302-roberta heard ?

But just the same in pursuance of this idea , whether finally [he]201-clyde executed it or not , even though [he]201-clyde went to [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake , [he]201-clyde must write [Sondra]186-sondra a letter saying that [he]201-clyde was coming . And this [he]201-clyde did at once , writing [her]302-roberta passionately and yearningly . At the same time [he]201-clyde decided not to write [Roberta]302-roberta at all . Maybe call [her]302-roberta on long distance , since [she]302-roberta had recently told [him]201-clyde that there was [a neighbor near - by]3952-a neighbor near - by who had a telephone , and if for any reason [he]201-clyde needed to reach [her]302-roberta , [he]201-clyde could use that . For writing [her]302-roberta in regard to all this , even in the most guarded way , would place in [her]302-roberta hands , and at this time , exactly the type of evidence in regard to this relationship which [she]302-roberta would most need , and especially when [he]201-clyde was so determined not to marry [her]302-roberta . The trickery of all this ! It was low and shabby , no doubt . Yet if only [Roberta]302-roberta had agreed to be a little reasonable with [him]201-clyde , [he]201-clyde would never have dreamed of indulging in any such low and tricky plan as this . But , oh , [Sondra]186-sondra ! [Sondra]186-sondra ! And [the great estate that [she]302-roberta had described]3953-the great estate that she had described , lying along [the west shore of [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake]3954-the west shore of twelfth lake . How beautiful that must be ! [He]201-clyde could not help it ! [He]201-clyde must act and plan as [he]201-clyde was doing ! [He]201-clyde must !

And forthwith [he]201-clyde arose and went to mail the letter to [Sondra]186-sondra . And then while out , having purchased an evening paper and hoping via the local news of [all whom [he]201-clyde knew]3955-all whom he knew , to divert [his]201-clyde mind for the time being , there , upon the first page of [the Times - Union of [Albany]4-albany]129-the times - union of albany , was an item which read .

Because of [his]201-clyde own great interest in canoeing , and indeed in any form of water life , as well as [his]201-clyde own particular skill when it came to rowing , swimming , diving , [he]201-clyde now read with interest :

[Pancoast]130-pancoast , [Mass.]131-mass. , June 7th ... What proved to be [a fatal boat ride]3956-a fatal boat ride for two , apparently , was taken here day before yesterday by [an unidentified man and girl who came presumably from [Pittsfield]132-pittsfield to spend the day at [Pass Lake]133-pass lake]3957-an unidentified man and girl who came presumably from pittsfield to spend the day at pass lake , which is [fourteen miles north of [this place]793-this place]3958-fourteen miles north of this place .

Tuesday morning [a man]4740-a man and [a girl]2278-a girl , who said to [Thomas Lucas]225-tom , who conducts [the Casino Lunch and Boat House]3962-the casino lunch and boat house [there]4705-there , that [they]3957-an unidentified man and girl who came presumably from pittsfield to spend the day at pass lake were from [Pittsfield]132-pittsfield , rented [a small row - boat about]3964-a small row - boat about ten o'clock in the morning and with a basket , presumably containing lunch , departed for [the northern end of [the lake]4706-the lake]3965-the northern end of the lake . At seven o'clock last evening , when [they]3957-an unidentified man and girl who came presumably from pittsfield to spend the day at pass lake did not return , [Mr. Lucas]407-mr. lucas , in company with [[his]407-mr. lucas son]4794-his son [Jeffrey]253-old jeff , made a tour of [the lake]4706-the lake in [[his]407-mr. lucas motor boat]3969-his motor boat and discovered [the row - boat]3970-the row - boat upside down in [the shallows near [the north shore]3972-the north shore]3971-the shallows near the north shore , but no trace of [the occupants]3973-the occupants . Thinking at the time that it might be another instance of [renters]3974-renters having decamped in order to avoid payment , [he]407-mr. lucas returned [the boat]2311-the boat to [[his]407-mr. lucas own dock]3976-his own dock .

But this morning , doubtful as to whether or not an accident had occurred , [he]407-mr. lucas and [[his]407-mr. lucas assistant]3977-his assistant , [Fred Walsh]408-fred walsh , together with [[his]407-mr. lucas son]4794-his son , made a second tour of [the north shore]3972-the north shore and finally came upon the hats of both [the girl]3980-the girl and [the man]1113-the man floating among some rushes near [the shore]2281-the shore . At once [a dredging party]3983-a dredging party was organized , and by three o'clock to - day the body of [the girl]3980-the girl , concerning whom nothing is known here , other than that [she]3980-the girl came here with [[her]3980-the girl companion]2303-her companion , was brought up and turned over to [the authorities]3986-the authorities . That of [the man]1113-the man has not yet been found . The water in [the immediate vicinity of the accident]3988-the immediate vicinity of the accident in some places being over thirty feet deep , it is not certain whether the trolling and dredging will yield [the other body]3989-the other body or not . In the case of a similar accident which took place [here]4728-here some fifteen years ago , [neither body]3991-neither body was ever recovered .

To the lining of the small jacket which [the girl]3980-the girl wore was sewed the tag of [a [Pittsfield]132-pittsfield dealer]3993-a pittsfield dealer . Also in [her]3980-the girl shoe lining was stamped the name of [Jacobs of [this same city]3995-this same city]3994-jacobs of this same city . But other than these there was no evidence as to [her]3980-the girl identity . It is assumed by [the authorities]3986-the authorities here that if [she]3980-the girl carried a bag of any kind it lies at [the bottom of [the lake]4706-the lake]3997-the bottom of the lake .

[The man]1113-the man is recalled as being tall , dark , about thirty - five years of age , and wore a light green suit and straw hat with a white and blue band . [The girl]3980-the girl appears to be not more than twenty - five , five feet five inches tall , and weighs 130 pounds . [She]3980-the girl wore [her]3980-the girl hair , which was long and dark brown , in braids about [her]3980-the girl forehead . On [her]3980-the girl left middle finger is a small gold ring with an amethyst setting . [The police of [Pittsfield]132-pittsfield and [other cities in this vicinity]4002-other cities in this vicinity]4001-the police of pittsfield and other cities in this vicinity have been notified , but as yet no word as to [her]3980-the girl identity has been received . This item , commonplace enough in the usual grist of summer accidents , interested [Clyde]201-clyde only slightly . It seemed odd , of course , that [a girl]2278-a girl and [a man]4740-a man should arrive at [a small lake anywhere]4005-a small lake anywhere , and setting forth in [a small boat]4006-a small boat in broad daylight thus lose [their]4007-their lives . Also it was odd that afterwards [no one]4713-no one should be able to identify [either of [them]4007-their]5125-either of them . And yet here it was . [The man]1113-the man had disappeared for good . [He]1113-the man threw the paper down , little concerned at first , and turned to other things — the problem that was confronting [him]1113-the man really — how [he]1113-the man was to do . But later — and because of that , and as [he]1113-the man was putting out the light before getting into bed , and still thinking of the complicated problem which [his]1113-the man own life here presented , [he]1113-the man was struck by the thought ( what devil 's whisper ? — what evil hint of an evil spirit?)—supposing that [he]1113-the man and [Roberta]302-roberta — no , say [he]1113-the man and [Sondra—(no]409-sondra—(no , [Sondra]186-sondra could swim so well , and so could [he)—he]1113-the man and [Roberta]302-roberta were in [a small boat]4006-a small boat [somewhere and]4012-somewhere and [it]4006-a small boat should capsize at the very time , say , of this dreadful complication which was so harassing [him]1113-the man ? What an escape ? What a relief from a gigantic and by now really destroying problem ! On the other hand — hold — not so fast!—for could [a man]4740-a man even think of such a solution in connection with so difficult a problem as [his]4740-a man without committing a crime in [his]4740-a man heart , really — a horrible , terrible crime ? [He]4740-a man must not even think of such a thing . It was wrong — wrong — terribly wrong . And yet , supposing,—by accident , of course — such a thing as this did occur ? That would be the end , then , would n't it , of all [his]1113-the man troubles in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta ? No more terror as to [her]302-roberta — no more fear and heartache even as to [Sondra]186-sondra . A noiseless , pathless , quarrelless solution of all [his]1113-the man present difficulties , and only joy before [him]1113-the man forever . Just an accidental , unpremeditated drowning — and then the glorious future which would be [his]1113-the man !

But the mere thinking of such a thing in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta at this time—(why was it that [his]1113-the man mind persisted in identifying [her]302-roberta with it ? ) was terrible , and [he]1113-the man must not , [he]1113-the man must not , allow such a thought to enter [his]1113-the man mind . Never , never , never ! [He]1113-the man must not . It was horrible ! Terrible ! A thought of murder , no less ! Murder ? ! ! ! Yet so wrought up had [he]1113-the man been , and still was , by the letter which [Roberta]302-roberta had written [him]1113-the man , as contrasted with the one from [Sondra]186-sondra — so delightful and enticing was the picture of [her]302-roberta life and [his]1113-the man as [she]302-roberta now described it , that [he]1113-the man could not for the life of [him]1113-the man quite expel that other and seemingly easy and so natural a solution of all [his]1113-the man problem — if only such an accident could occur to [him]1113-the man and [Roberta]302-roberta . For after all [he]1113-the man was not planning any crime , was [he]1113-the man ? Was [he]1113-the man not merely thinking of an accident that , had it occurred or could it but occur in [his]1113-the man case ... Ah — but that " could it but occur . "[207-grant] There was the dark and evil thought about which [he]1113-the man must not , [He]1113-the man must not think . [He]1113-the man must not . And yet — and yet ... [He]1113-the man was [an excellent swimmer]4014-an excellent swimmer and could swim ashore , no doubt — whatever the distance . [Whereas Roberta]302-roberta , as [he]1113-the man knew from swimming with [her]302-roberta at [one beach]4015-one beach and another the previous summer , could not swim . And then — and then — well and then , unless [he]1113-the man chose to help [her]302-roberta , of course ...

As [he]1113-the man thought , and for the time , sitting in the lamplight of [[his]1113-the man own room]4016-his own room between nine - thirty and ten at night , a strange and disturbing creepiness as to flesh and hair and finger - tips assailed [him]1113-the man . The wonder and the horror of such a thought ! And presented to [him]1113-the man by this paper in this way . Was n't that strange ? Besides , up in [that lake country to which [he]1113-the man was now going to [Sondra]186-sondra]4017-that lake country to which he was now going to sondra , were [many , many lakes about everywhere]4018-many , many lakes about everywhere — were there not ? Scores up there where [Sondra]186-sondra was . Or so [she]302-roberta had said . And [Roberta]302-roberta loved the out - of - doors and the water so — although [she]302-roberta could not swim — could not swim — could not swim . And [they]4019-they or at least [he]1113-the man was going where [lakes were]4020-lakes were , or [they]4019-they might , might [they]4019-they not — and if not , why not ? since [both]874-both had talked of some Fourth of July resort in [their]874-both planning , [their]874-both final departure — [he]1113-the man and [Roberta]302-roberta .

But , no ! no ! The mere thought of an accident such as that in connection with [her]302-roberta , however much [he]1113-the man might wish to be rid of [her]302-roberta — was sinful , dark and terrible ! [He]1113-the man must not let [his]1113-the man mind run on any such things for even a moment . It was too wrong — too vile — too terrible ! Oh , dreadful thought ! To think it should have come to [him]1113-the man ! And at this time of all times — when [she]302-roberta was demanding that [he]1113-the man go away with [her]302-roberta !

Death !

Murder !

The murder of [Roberta]302-roberta !

But to escape [her]302-roberta of course — this unreasonable , unshakable , unchangeable demand of [hers]302-roberta ! Already [he]1113-the man was quite cold , quite damp — with the mere thought of it . And now — when — when — ! But [he]1113-the man must not think of that ! The death of [that unborn child]4022-that unborn child , too ! !

But how could [any one]4764-any one even think of doing any such thing with [calculation]4024-calculation — deliberately ? And yet — [many people]1333-many people were drowned like that — [boys]465-boys and [girls]894-girls — [men]445-men and [women]467-women — here and there — everywhere [the world]4755-the world over in the summer time . To be sure , [he]1113-the man would not want anything like that to happen to [Roberta]302-roberta . And especially at this time . [He]1113-the man was [not that kind of a person]4031-not that kind of a person , whatever else [he]1113-the man was . [He]1113-the man was not . [He]1113-the man was not . [He]1113-the man was not . The mere thought now caused a damp perspiration to form on [his]1113-the man hands and face . [He]1113-the man was [not that kind of a person]4031-not that kind of a person . [Decent , sane people]4033-decent , sane people did not think of such things . And so [he]1113-the man would not either — from this hour on .

In a tremulous state of dissatisfaction with [himself]1113-the man — that any such grisly thought should have dared to obtrude itself upon [him]1113-the man in this way — [he]1113-the man got up and lit the lamp — re - read this disconcerting item in as cold and reprobative way as [he]1113-the man could achieve , feeling that in so doing [he]1113-the man was putting anything at which it hinted far from [him]1113-the man once and for all . Then , having done so , [he]1113-the man dressed and went out of [the house]532-the house for a walk — up [Wykeagy Avenue]11-wykeagy avenue , along [Central Avenue]43-central avenue , out [Oak]135-oak , and then back on [Spruce]136-spruce and to [Central]81-central again — feeling that [he]1113-the man was walking away from the insinuating thought or suggestion that had so troubled [him]1113-the man up to now . And after a time , feeling better , freer , more natural , more human , as [he]1113-the man so much wished to feel — [he]1113-the man returned to [[his]1113-the man room]530-his room , once more to sleep , with the feeling that [he]1113-the man had actually succeeded in eliminating completely [a most insidious and horrible visitation]4036-a most insidious and horrible visitation . [He]1113-the man must never think of it again ! [He]1113-the man must never think of it again . [He]1113-the man must never , never , never think of it — never .

And then falling into a nervous , feverish doze soon thereafter , [he]1113-the man found [himself]1113-the man dreaming of a savage black dog that was trying to bite [him]1113-the man . Having escaped from the fangs of the creature by waking in terror , [he]1113-the man once more fell asleep . But now [he]1113-the man was in [some very strange and gloomy place]4037-some very strange and gloomy place , [a wood]4038-a wood or [a cave or narrow canyon between deep hills]4039-a cave or narrow canyon between deep hills , from which [a path , fairly promising at first]4040-a path , fairly promising at first , seemed to lead . But soon [the path]3881-the path , as [he]1113-the man progressed along [it]3881-the path , became narrower and narrower and darker , and finally disappeared entirely . And then , turning to see if [he]1113-the man could not get back as [he]1113-the man had come , there directly behind [him]1113-the man were arrayed an entangled mass of snakes that at first looked more like a pile of brush . But above it waved the menacing heads of at least a score of reptiles , forked tongues and agate eyes . And in front now , as [he]1113-the man turned swiftly , a horned and savage animal — huge , it was — its heavy tread crushing the brush — blocked the path in that direction . And then , horrified and crying out in hopeless desperation , once more [he]1113-the man awoke — not to sleep again that night .

Yet a thought such as that of [the lake]4706-the lake , connected as it was with the predicament by which [he]1113-the man was being faced , and shrink from it though [he]1113-the man might , was not to be dismissed as easily as [he]1113-the man desired . Born as it was of its accidental relation to this personal problem that was shaking and troubling and all but disarranging [his]1113-the man own none - too - forceful mind , this smooth , seemingly blameless , if dreadful , blotting out of two lives at [Pass Lake]133-pass lake , had its weight . [That girl]4850-that girl 's body — as some peculiar force in [his]1113-the man own brain now still compelled [him]1113-the man to think — being found , but [the man]1113-the man 's not . In that interesting fact — and this quite in spite of [himself]1113-the man — lurked a suggestion that insisted upon obtruding itself on [his]1113-the man mind — to wit , that it might be possible that [the man]1113-the man 's body was not in [that lake]4046-that lake at all . For , since [evil - minded people]4047-evil - minded people did occasionally desire to get rid of [other people]5417-other people , might it not be possible that [that man]5261-that man had gone [there]4705-there with [that girl]4850-that girl in order to get rid of [her]4850-that girl ? A very smooth and devilish trick , of course , but one which , in this instance at least , seemed to have succeeded admirably .

But as for [him]1113-the man accepting such an evil suggestion and acting upon it ... never ! Yet here was [his]1113-the man own problem growing hourly more desperate , since every day , or at least every other day , brought [him]1113-the man either letters from [Roberta]302-roberta or a note from [Sondra]186-sondra — [their]4052-their respective missives maintaining the same relative contrast between ease and misery , gayety of mood and the somberness of defeat and uncertainty .

To [Roberta]302-roberta , since [he]1113-the man would not write [her]302-roberta , [he]1113-the man was telephoning briefly and in as non - committal a manner as possible . How was [she]302-roberta ? [He]1113-the man was so glad to hear from [her]302-roberta and to know that [she]302-roberta was out in [the country]5374-the country and at [home]4793-home , where it must be much nicer than in [the factory]440-the factory here in this weather . Everything was going smoothly , of course , and except for a sudden rush of orders which made it rather hard these last two days , all was as before . [He]1113-the man was doing [his]1113-the man best to save a certain amount of money for a certain project about which [she]302-roberta knew , but otherwise [he]1113-the man was not worrying about anything — and [she]302-roberta must not . [He]1113-the man had not written before because of the work , and could not write much — there were so many things to do — but [he]1113-the man missed seeing [her]302-roberta in [[her]302-roberta old place]4056-her old place , and was looking forward to seeing [her]302-roberta again soon . If [she]302-roberta were coming down toward [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus as [she]302-roberta said , and really thought it important to see [him]1113-the man , well , that could be arranged , maybe — but was it necessary right now ? [He]1113-the man was so very busy and expected to see [her]302-roberta later , of course .

But at the same time [he]1113-the man was writing [Sondra]186-sondra that assuredly on the eighteenth , and the week - end following , if possible , [he]1113-the man would be with [her]302-roberta .

So , by virtue of such mental prestidigitation and tergiversation , inspired and animated as it was by [his]1113-the man desire for [Sondra]186-sondra , [his]1113-the man inability to face the facts in connection with [Roberta]302-roberta , [he]1113-the man achieved the much - coveted privilege of again seeing [her]302-roberta , over one week - end at least , and in such a setting as never before in [his]1113-the man life had [he]1113-the man been privileged to witness .

For as [he]1113-the man came down to [the public dock at [Sharon]10-sharon]4057-the public dock at sharon , adjoining [the veranda of [the inn at the foot of [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake]4059-the inn at the foot of twelfth lake]4058-the veranda of the inn at the foot of twelfth lake , [he]1113-the man was met by [Bertine]197-bertine and [[her]302-roberta brother]4719-her brother as well as [Sondra]186-sondra , who , in [Grant]207-grant 's launch , had motored down [the Chain]138-the chain to pick [him]1113-the man up . Within an hour after [his]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde arrival , as [Clyde]201-clyde could see , the program for the week - end was already full . And then [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde would see what new delight , in connection with [her]4089-her many - faceted temperament , the wonderful occasion would provide . To [him]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde , in spite of the dour burden of [Roberta]302-roberta , which for this one week - end at least [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde could lay aside , it was as though [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde were in [Paradise]141-paradise .

And on [the tennis grounds of [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons]4101-the tennis grounds of the cranstons , it seemed as though never before had [Sondra]186-sondra , attired in a short , severe white tennis skirt and blouse , with a yellow - and - green dotted handkerchief tied about [her]4089-her hair , seemed so gay , graceful and happy . The smile that was upon [her]4089-her lips ! The gay , laughing light of promise that was in [her]4089-her eyes whenever [she]4089-her glanced at [him]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde ! And now and then , in running to serve [him]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde , it was as though [she]4089-her were poised bird - like in flight — [her]4089-her racquet arm high , a single toe seeming barely to touch the ground , [her]4089-her head thrown back , [her]4089-her lips parted and smiling always . And in calling twenty love , thirty love , forty love , it was always with a laughing accent on the word love , which at once thrilled and saddened [him]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde , as [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde saw , and rejoiced in from one point of view , [she]4089-her was [his]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde to take , if only [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde were free to take [her]4089-her now . And then this scene , where a bright sun poured a flood of crystal light upon a greensward that stretched from tall pines to [the silver rippling waters of [a lake]4103-a lake]4102-the silver rippling waters of a lake . And off [shore]4104-shore in a half dozen different directions the bright white sails of [small boats]4105-small boats — the white and green and yellow splashes of color , where [canoes paddled by idling]4106-canoes paddled by idling [lovers]4107-lovers were passing in the sun ! Summertime — leisure — warmth — color — ease — beauty — love — all that [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde had dreamed of the summer before , when [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde was so very much alone .

At moments it seemed to [Clyde]201-clyde that [he]201-clyde would reel from very joy of the certain fulfillment of a great desire , that was all but immediately within [his]201-clyde control ; at other times ( the thought of [Roberta]302-roberta sweeping down upon [him]201-clyde as an icy wind ) , as though nothing could be more sad , terrible , numbing to the dreams of beauty , love and happiness than this which now threatened [him]201-clyde . That terrible item about [the lake]4706-the lake and [those two people]4109-those two people drowned ! The probability that in spite of [his]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde wild plan within a week , or two or three at most , [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde would have to leave all this forever . "[4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde] And from the darkest depths of [his]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde heart [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde would have answered , had [he]4079-a servant john , one of a half dozen who attended the family here , waiting to take the single bag of clyde spoken , " [Roberta]302-roberta . At [the Brookshaws ']4110-the brookshaws ' , again that evening , [a smart company of [friends of [Sondra]186-sondra 's]4112-friends of sondra 's]4111-a smart company of friends of sondra 's , [Bertine]197-bertine 's and [others]561-others . " [You]201-clyde up here ? That 's great . Over at [the Cranstons ']195-the cranstons ? Oh , is n't that dandy ? Right next door to [us]5938-we . " [Sondra]186-sondra so glad [Clydie]410-clydie here . Misses [him]4118-he so much .
