And then at noon on Tuesday , July sixth , [the station platform of [the railroad running from [Fonda]47-fonda to [Utica]3-utica]4327-the railroad running from fonda to utica]4326-the station platform of the railroad running from fonda to utica , with [Roberta]302-roberta stepping down from [the train]3121-the train which came south from [Biltz]62-biltz to await [Clyde]201-clyde , for [the train]3121-the train that was to take [them]4330-them to [Utica]3-utica was not due for another half hour . And fifteen minutes later [Clyde]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde coming from [a side street]1186-a side street and approaching [the station]5997-the station from the south , from which position [Roberta]302-roberta could not see [him]201-clyde but from where , after turning the west corner of [the depot]910-the depot and stationing [himself]201-clyde behind a pile of crates , [he]201-clyde could see [her]302-roberta . How thin and pale indeed ! By contrast with [Sondra]186-sondra , how illy - dressed in the blue traveling suit and small brown hat with which [she]302-roberta had equipped [herself]302-roberta for this occasion — the promise of a restricted and difficult life as contrasted with that offered by [Sondra]186-sondra . And [she]302-roberta was thinking of compelling [him]201-clyde to give up [Sondra]186-sondra in order to marry [her]302-roberta , and from which union [he]201-clyde might never be able to extricate [himself]201-clyde until such time as would make [Sondra]186-sondra and all [she]302-roberta represented a mere recollection . The difference between the attitudes of [these two girls]1473-these two girls — [Sondra]186-sondra with everything offering all — asking nothing of [him]201-clyde ; [Roberta]302-roberta , with nothing , asking all .

A feeling of dark and bitter resentment swept over [him]201-clyde and [he]201-clyde could not help but feel sympathetic toward [that unknown man at [Pass Lake]133-pass lake]4335-that unknown man at pass lake and secretly wish that [he]201-clyde had been successful . Perhaps [he]201-clyde , too , had been confronted by a situation just like this . And perhaps [he]201-clyde had done right , too , after all , and that was why it had not been found out . [His]201-clyde nerves twitched . [His]201-clyde eyes were somber , resentful and yet nervous . Could it not happen again successfully in this case ?

But here [he]201-clyde was now upon the same platform with [her]302-roberta as the result of [her]302-roberta persistent and illogical demands , and [he]201-clyde must be thinking how , and boldly , [he]201-clyde must carry out the plans which , for four days , or ever since [he]201-clyde had telephoned [her]302-roberta , and in a dimmer way for the ten preceding those , [he]201-clyde had been planning . This settled course must not be interfered with now . [He]201-clyde must act ! [He]201-clyde must not let fear influence [him]201-clyde to anything less than [he]201-clyde had now planned .

And so it was that [he]201-clyde now stepped forth in order that [she]302-roberta might see [him]201-clyde , at the same time giving [her]302-roberta a wise and seemingly friendly and informative look as if to say , " [You]302-roberta see [I]302-roberta am here . "[302-roberta] But behind the look ! If only [she]302-roberta could have pierced beneath the surface and sensed that dark and tortured mood , how speedily [she]302-roberta would have fled . But now seeing [him]201-clyde actually present , a heavy shadow that was lurking in [her]302-roberta eyes lifted , the somewhat down - turned corners of [her]302-roberta mouth reversed themselves , and without appearing to recognize [him]201-clyde , [she]302-roberta nevertheless brightened and at once proceeded to the window to purchase [her]302-roberta ticket to [Utica]3-utica , as [he]201-clyde had instructed [her]302-roberta to do .

And [she]302-roberta was now thinking that at last , at last [he]201-clyde had come . And [he]201-clyde was going to take [her]302-roberta away . And hence a kind of gratefulness for this welling up in [her]302-roberta . For [they]4336-they were to be together for seven or eight months at the least . And while it might take tact and patience to adjust things , still it might and probably could be done . From now on [she]302-roberta must be the very soul of caution — not do or say anything that would irritate [him]201-clyde in any way , since naturally [he]201-clyde would not be in the best mood because of this . But [he]201-clyde must have changed some — perhaps [he]201-clyde was seeing [her]302-roberta in a more kindly light — sympathizing with [her]302-roberta a little , since [he]201-clyde now appeared at last to have most gracefully and genially succumbed to the unavoidable . And at the same time noting [his]201-clyde light gray suit , [his]201-clyde new straw hat , [his]201-clyde brightly polished shoes and the dark tan suitcase and ( strange , equivocal , frivolous erraticism of [his]201-clyde in this instance ) the tripod of a recently purchased camera together with [his]201-clyde tennis racquet in its canvas case strapped to the side — more than anything to conceal the initials C. G.—she was seized with much of [her]302-roberta old - time mood and desire in regard to [his]201-clyde looks and temperament . And the oars , too , of course . And [her]302-roberta hat — and — well —

( The long , sad sounding whistle of [this train]4398-this train . Damn . [He]201-clyde was getting nervous already . )

But before going to [the hotel]666-the hotel , [he]201-clyde must go back to [the depot]910-the depot and put [his]201-clyde new hat in the bag , or better yet , carry it while [he]201-clyde looked for [the sort of hotel [he]201-clyde wanted]4430-the sort of hotel he wanted , and then , before going to [Roberta]302-roberta , take the hat and put it in [his]201-clyde bag . Then [he]201-clyde would go and find [her]302-roberta and have [her]302-roberta come to the entrance of [the hotel]666-the hotel [he]201-clyde had found and wait for [him]201-clyde , while [he]201-clyde got the bags . And , of course , if there was [no one]4713-no one around or [very few]4433-very few , [they]4434-they would enter together , only [she]302-roberta could wait in [[the ladies]3094-the ladies ' parlor]4436-the ladies ' parlor somewhere , while [he]201-clyde went and registered as [Charles Golden]426-charles golden , maybe , this time . And then , well , in the morning , if [she]302-roberta agreed , or to - night , for that matter , if there were [any trains]4437-any trains — [he]201-clyde would have to find out about that — [they]4434-they could go up to [Grass Lake]168-grass lake in [separate cars]6031-separate cars until [they]4434-they were past [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake and [Sharon]10-sharon , at any rate .

( [The beautiful [Cranston Lodge]158-the cranston lodge there and [Sondra]186-sondra]4439-the beautiful cranston lodge there and sondra . )

And then — and then —

( [That big red barn]4440-that big red barn and [that small white house near [it]4440-that big red barn]4441-that small white house near it . And [that wind - mill]4442-that wind - mill . So like [those houses]4443-those houses and barns that [he]201-clyde had seen out there in [Illinois]172-illinois and [Missouri]102-missouri . And [Chicago]5-chicago , too . )

And at the same time [Roberta]302-roberta in [[her]302-roberta car]3078-her car forward thinking that [Clyde]201-clyde had not appeared so very unfriendly to [her]302-roberta . To be sure , it was hard on [him]201-clyde , making [him]201-clyde leave [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus in this way , and when [he]201-clyde might be enjoying [himself]201-clyde as [he]201-clyde wished to . But on the other hand , here was [she]302-roberta — and there was no other way for [her]302-roberta to be . [She]302-roberta must be very genial and yet not put [herself]302-roberta forward too much or in [his]201-clyde way . And yet [she]302-roberta must not be too receding or weak , either , for , after all , [Clyde]201-clyde was the one who had placed [her]302-roberta in this position . And it was only fair , and little enough for [him]201-clyde to do . [She]302-roberta would have [a baby to look after in the future]4445-a baby to look after in the future , and all that trouble to go through with from now on . And later , [she]302-roberta would have to explain to [[her]302-roberta parents]453-her parents this whole mysterious proceeding , which covered [her]302-roberta present disappearance and marriage , if [Clyde]201-clyde really did marry [her]302-roberta now . But [she]302-roberta must insist upon that — and soon — in [Utica]3-utica , perhaps — certainly at [the very next place [they]4448-they went to]4447-the very next place they went to — and get a copy of [her]302-roberta marriage certificate , too , and keep it for [her]302-roberta own as well as [the baby]5896-the baby 's sake . [He]201-clyde could get a divorce as [he]201-clyde pleased after that . [She]302-roberta would still be [Mrs. Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths . And [[Clyde]201-clyde 's baby]4450-clyde 's baby and [hers]4451-hers would be [a Griffiths]180-mrs. griffiths , too . That was something .

( How beautiful [the little river]4452-the little river was . It reminded [her]302-roberta of [the Mohawk]44-the mohawk and the walks [she]302-roberta and [he]201-clyde had taken last summer when [they]4448-they first met . Oh , last summer ! And now this ! )

And [they]4448-they would settle somewhere — in [one or two rooms]4453-one or two rooms , no doubt . Where , [she]302-roberta wondered — in [what [town]1686-town or [city]771-city]4454-what town or city ? How far away from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus or [Biltz]62-biltz — [the farther from [Biltz]62-biltz]4457-the farther from biltz the better , although [she]302-roberta would like to see [[her]302-roberta mother]447-her mother and [father]435-father again , and soon — as soon as [she]302-roberta safely could . But what matter , as long as [they]4448-they were going away together and [she]302-roberta was to be married ?

Had [he]201-clyde noticed [her]302-roberta blue suit and little brown hat ? And had [he]201-clyde thought [she]302-roberta looked at all attractive compared to [those rich girls with whom [he]201-clyde was always running]4460-those rich girls with whom he was always running ? [She]302-roberta must be very tactful — not irritate [him]201-clyde in any way . But — oh , the happy life [they]4448-they could have if only — if only [he]201-clyde cared for [her]302-roberta a little — just a little ...

And then [Utica]3-utica , and on [a quiet street]4461-a quiet street [Clyde]201-clyde catching up with [Roberta]302-roberta , [his]201-clyde expression a mixture of innocent geniality and good - will , tempered by worry and opposition , which was really a mask for the fear of the deed that [he]201-clyde [himself]201-clyde was contemplating — [his]201-clyde power to execute it — the consequences in case [he]201-clyde failed .

And then , as planned that night between [them]4448-they — a trip to [Grass Lake]168-grass lake the next morning in [separate cars]6031-separate cars , but which , upon [their]4448-they arrival and to [his]201-clyde surprise , proved to be so much more briskly tenanted than [he]201-clyde anticipated . [He]201-clyde was very much disturbed and frightened by the evidence of so much active life up [here]4728-here . For [he]201-clyde had fancied this , as well as [Big Bittern]148-big bittern , would be all but deserted . Yet here now , as [both]874-both could see , it was [the summer seat and gathering place of [some small religious organization or group]4466-some small religious organization or group]4465-the summer seat and gathering place of some small religious organization or group — [the Winebrennarians of [Pennsylvania]173-pennsylvania]4467-the winebrennarians of pennsylvania — as [it]4468-it proved with [a tabernacle]4469-a tabernacle and [numerous cottages across [the lake]4706-the lake from [the station]5997-the station]4470-numerous cottages across the lake from the station . And [Roberta]302-roberta at once exclaiming :

" Now , there , is n't that cute ? Why could n't [we]874-both be married over there by [the minister of [that church]6069-that church]6068-the minister of that church ? "[201-clyde]

And [Clyde]201-clyde , puzzled and shaken by this sudden and highly unsatisfactory development , at once announced : " Why , sure — [I'll]201-clyde go over after a bit and see , "[4215-the guide] yet [his]201-clyde mind busy with schemes for circumventing [her]302-roberta . [He]201-clyde would take [her]302-roberta out in [a boat]2206-a boat after registering and getting settled and remain too long . Or should [a peculiarly remote and unobserved spot]4474-a peculiarly remote and unobserved spot be found ... but no , there were [too many people]4292-too many people [here]4728-here . [The lake]4706-the lake was not large enough , and probably not very deep . It was black or dark like tar , and sentineled to the east and north by tall , dark pines — the serried spears of armed and watchful giants , as [they]4478-they now seemed to [him]201-clyde — ogres almost — so gloomy , suspicious and fantastically erratic was [his]201-clyde own mood in regard to all this . But still there were [too many people]4292-too many people — as many as ten on [the lake]4706-the lake .

The weirdness of it .

The difficulty .

But [whisper:—one]427-whisper:—one could not walk from here through any woods to [Three Mile Bay]147-three mile bay . Oh , no . That was all of thirty miles to the south now . And besides [this lake]2275-this lake was less lonely — probably continually observed by [members of [this religious group]4483-this religious group]4482-members of this religious group . Oh , no — [he]201-clyde must say — [he]201-clyde must say — but what — could [he]201-clyde say ? That [he]201-clyde had inquired , and that no license could be procured [here]4728-here ? Or that [the minister]1371-the minister was away , or that [he]201-clyde required certain identifications which [he]201-clyde did not have — or — or , well , well — anything that would serve to still [Roberta]302-roberta until such hour to - morrow , as [the train]3121-the train south from [here]4728-here left for [Big Bittern]148-big bittern and [Sharon]10-sharon , where , of course , [they]4488-they would surely be married .

Why should [she]302-roberta be so insistent ? And why , anyhow , and except for [her]302-roberta crass determination to force [him]201-clyde in this way , should [he]201-clyde be compelled to track here and there with [her]302-roberta — every hour — every minute of which was torture — an unending mental crucifixion really , when , if [he]201-clyde were but rid of [her]302-roberta ! Oh , [Sondra]186-sondra , [Sondra]186-sondra , if but now from [[your]186-sondra high estate]4489-your high estate , [you]186-sondra might bend down and aid [me]0-i . No more lies ! No more suffering ! No more misery of any kind !

But instead , more lies . A long and aimless and pestilential search for water - lilies , which because of [his]201-clyde own restless mood , bored [Roberta]302-roberta as much as it did [him]201-clyde . For why , [she]302-roberta was now thinking to [herself]302-roberta as [they]4488-they rowed about , this indifference to this marriage possibility , which could have been arranged before now and given this outing the dream quality it would and should have had , if only — if only [he]201-clyde had arranged for everything in [Utica]3-utica , even as [she]302-roberta had wanted . But this waiting — evasion — and so like [Clyde]201-clyde , [his]201-clyde vacillating , indefinite , uncertain mood , always . [She]302-roberta was beginning to wonder now as to [his]201-clyde intentions again — whether really and truly [he]201-clyde did intend to marry [her]302-roberta as [he]201-clyde had promised . Tomorrow , or the next day at most , would show . So why worry now ?

And then the next day at noon , [Gun Lodge]152-gun lodge and [Big Bittern]148-big bittern [itself]4490-itself and [Clyde]201-clyde climbing down from [the train]3121-the train at [Gun Lodge]152-gun lodge and escorting [Roberta]302-roberta to [the waiting bus]4492-the waiting bus , the while [he]201-clyde assured [her]302-roberta that since [they]4493-they were coming back this way , it would be best if [she]302-roberta were to leave [her]302-roberta bag here , while [he]201-clyde , because of [his]201-clyde camera as well as the lunch done up at [Grass Lake]168-grass lake and crowded into [his]201-clyde suitcase , would take [his]201-clyde own with [him]201-clyde , because [they]4493-they would lunch on [the lake]4706-the lake . But on reaching [the bus]4405-the bus , [he]201-clyde was dismayed by the fact that [the driver]4408-the driver was [the same guide whom [he]201-clyde had heard talk at [Big Bittern]148-big bittern]4497-the same guide whom he had heard talk at big bittern . What if it should prove now that [this guide]4417-this guide had seen and remembered [him]201-clyde ! Would [he]201-clyde not at least recall [the handsome Finchley car]4499-the handsome finchley car — [Bertine]197-bertine and [Stuart]188-stuart on the front seat — [himself]201-clyde and [Sondra]186-sondra at the back — [Grant]207-grant and that [Harley Baggott]415-harley baggott talking to [him]201-clyde outside ?

At once that cold perspiration that had marked [his]201-clyde more nervous and terrified moods for weeks past , now burst forth on [his]201-clyde face and hands . Of what had [he]201-clyde been thinking , anyhow ? How planning ? In [God]306-god 's name , how expect to carry a thing like this through , if [he]201-clyde were going to think so poorly ? It was like [his]201-clyde failing to wear [his]201-clyde cap from [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus to [Utica]3-utica , or at least getting it out of [his]201-clyde bag before [he]201-clyde tried to buy that straw hat ; it was like not buying the straw hat before [he]201-clyde went to [Utica]3-utica at all .

Yet [the guide]4215-the guide did not remember [him]201-clyde , thank [God]306-god ! On the contrary [he]4215-the guide inquired rather curiously , and as of [a total stranger]4501-a total stranger : " Goin' over to [the lodge at [Big Bittern]148-big bittern]6070-the lodge at big bittern ? First time up here ? "[201-clyde] And [Clyde]201-clyde , enormously relieved and yet really tremulous , replied : " Yes , "[201-clyde] and then in [his]201-clyde nervous excitement asked : " [Many people over there]6071-many people over there to - day ? "[4215-the guide] a question which the moment [he]201-clyde had propounded it , seemed almost insane . Why , why , of all questions , should [he]201-clyde ask that ? Oh , [God]306-god , would [his]201-clyde silly , self - destructive mistakes never cease ?

So troubled was [he]201-clyde indeed , now , that [he]201-clyde scarcely heard [the guide]4215-the guide 's reply , or , if at all , as a voice speaking from a long way off . " Not so many . About seven or eight , [I]302-roberta guess . [We]4504-we did have about thirty over [the Fourth]174-the fourth , but [most o ' [them]6073-them]6072-most o ' them went down yesterday . "[302-roberta]

The stillness of these pines lining [this damp yellow road along which [they]4504-we were traveling]4503-this damp yellow road along which they were traveling ; the cool and the silence ; the dark shadows and purple and gray depths and nooks in them , even at high noon . If one were slipping away at night or by day , who would encounter one here ? A blue - jay far in the depths somewhere uttered its metallic shriek ; a field sparrow , tremulous upon some distant twig , filled the silver shadows with its perfect song . And [Roberta]302-roberta , as [this heavy , covered bus]4505-this heavy , covered bus crossed rill and thin stream , and then [rough wooden bridges]4506-rough wooden bridges here and there , commented on the clarity and sparkle of [the water]4702-the water : " Is n't that wonderful in there ? Do [you]302-roberta hear the tinkling of that water , [Clyde]201-clyde ? Oh , the freshness of this air ! "[4516-he]

And yet [she]302-roberta was going to die so soon !

[God]306-god !

But supposing now , at [Big Bittern]148-big bittern — [the lodge]4508-the lodge and [boathouse]4509-boathouse [there]4705-there — there were [many people]1333-many people . Or that [the lake]4706-the lake , peradventure , was literally dotted with those that were [there]4705-there — [all fishermen]4514-all fishermen and all fishing here and there , each one separate and alone — no privacy or [a deserted spot anywhere]4515-a deserted spot anywhere . And how strange [he]4516-he had not thought of that . [This lake]2275-this lake was probably not nearly as deserted as [he]4516-he had imagined , or would not be to - day , any more than [Grass Lake]168-grass lake had proved . And then what ?

Well , flight then — flight — and let it go at that . This strain was too much — hell — [he]4516-he would die , thinking thoughts like these . How could [he]4516-he have dreamed to better [his]4516-he fortunes by any so wild and brutal a scheme as this anyhow — to kill and then run away — or rather to kill and pretend that [he]4516-he and [she]302-roberta had drowned — while [he]4516-he — [the real murderer]4518-the real murderer — slipped away to life and happiness . What a horrible plan ! And yet how else ? How ? Had [he]4516-he not come all this way to do this ? And was [he]4516-he going to turn back now ?

And all this time [Roberta]302-roberta at [his]4516-he side was imagining that [she]302-roberta was not going to anything but marriage — tomorrow morning sure ; and now only to the passing pleasure of seeing [this beautiful lake of which [he]4516-he had been talking]4519-this beautiful lake of which he had been talking — talking , as though it were something more important and delectable than any that had as yet been in [her]302-roberta or [his]4516-he life for that matter .

But now [the guide]4215-the guide was speaking again , and to [him]4516-he : " [You]4516-he 're not mindin ' to stay over , [I]4516-he suppose . [I]4516-he see [you]4516-he left [the young lady]6074-the young lady 's bag over there . "[4516-he] [He]4516-he nodded in the direction of [Gun Lodge]152-gun lodge .

" No , [we]6075-we 're going on down to - night — on that 8:10 . [You]4516-he take [people]4823-people over to that ? "[4516-he]

" Oh , sure . "[4516-he]

" [They]6077-they said [you]4516-he did — at [Grass Lake]168-grass lake . "[4516-he]

But now why should [he]4516-he have added that reference to [Grass Lake]168-grass lake , for that showed that [he]4516-he and [Roberta]302-roberta had been [there]4705-there before coming [here]4728-here . But [this fool]4523-this fool with [his]4516-he reference to " [the young lady]6074-the young lady 's bag "[302-roberta] ! And leaving it at [Gun Lodge]152-gun lodge . The Devil ! Why should n't [he]4516-he mind [his]4516-he own business ? Or why should [he]4516-he have decided that [he]4516-he and [Roberta]302-roberta were not married ? Or had [he]4516-he so decided ? At any rate , why such a question when [they]4524-we were carrying two bags and [he]4516-he had brought one ? Strange ! The effrontery ! How should [he]4516-he know or guess or what ? But what harm could it do — married or unmarried ? If [she]302-roberta were not found—"married or unmarried "[302-roberta] would make no difference , would it ? And if [she]302-roberta were , and it was discovered that [she]302-roberta was not married , would that not prove that [she]302-roberta was off with [some one else]5814-some one else ? Of course ! So why worry over that now ?

And [Roberta]302-roberta asking : " Are there [any hotels or boarding houses on [the lake]4706-the lake]6079-any hotels or boarding houses on the lake besides [this one [we]4524-we 're going to]6081-this one we 're going to ? "[302-roberta]

" Not a one , [miss]6082-miss , outside o ' [the inn that [we]4524-we 're goin' to]6083-the inn that we 're goin' to . There was a crowd of [young fellers]6084-young fellers and [girls]894-girls campin ' over on [the east shore]6086-the east shore , yisterday , [I]302-roberta believe , about a mile from [the inn]6087-the inn — but whether [they]4528-them 're there now or not , [I]302-roberta dunno . Ai n't seen none of 'em to - day . "[302-roberta]

A crowd of [young fellows]4526-young fellows and [girls]894-girls ! For [God]306-god 's sake ! And might not [they]4528-them now be out on [the water]4702-the water — all of [them]4528-them — rowing — or sailing — or what ? And [he]4530-he here with [her]4531-her ! Maybe some of [them]4528-them from [Twelfth Lake]8-twelfth lake ! Just as [he]4530-he and [Sondra]186-sondra and [Harriet]285-nadine and [Stuart]188-stuart and [Bertine]197-bertine had come up two weeks before — [some of [them]4528-them [friends of [the Cranstons]195-the cranstons]4533-friends of the cranstons]4532-some of them friends of the cranstons , [Harriets]196-the harriets , [Finchleys]184-the finchleys or [others who had come up here to play and who would remember [him]4530-he , of course]4534-others who had come up here to play and who would remember him , of course . And again , then , there must be a road to [the east of [this lake]2275-this lake]4535-the east of this lake . And all this knowledge and [their]4528-them presence there now might make this trip of [his]4530-he useless . Such silly plotting ! Such pointless planning as this — when at least [he]4530-he might have taken more time — chosen [a lake still farther away]4537-a lake still farther away and should have — only so tortured had [he]4530-he been for these last many days , that [he]4530-he could scarcely think how to think . Well , all [he]4530-he could do now was to go and see . If there were many [he]4530-he must think of some way to row to some real lonely spot or maybe turn and return to [Grass Lake]168-grass lake — or where ? Oh , what could or would [he]4530-he do — if there were many over here ?

But just then a long aisle of green trees giving out at the far end as [he]4530-he now recalled upon [a square of lawn]4538-a square of lawn , and [the lake]4706-the lake [itself]4706-the lake , [the little inn with [its]4706-the lake pillared verandah]4540-the little inn with its pillared verandah , facing [the dark blue waters of [Big Bittern]148-big bittern]4541-the dark blue waters of big bittern . And [that low , small red - roofed boathouse to the right on the water that [he]4530-he had seen before when [he]4530-he was [here]4728-here]4542-that low , small red - roofed boathouse to the right on the water that he had seen before when he was here . And [Roberta]302-roberta exclaiming on sight , " Oh , it is pretty , is n't [it]4706-the lake — just beautiful . "[201-clyde] And [Clyde]201-clyde surveying [that dark , low island in the distance]4544-that dark , low island in the distance , to the south , and seeing but [few people]6026-few people about — none on [the lake itself]4546-the lake itself — exclaiming nervously , " Yes , it is , [you]4215-the guide bet . "[4549-a medium - sized , red - faced , broad - shouldered man] But feeling half choked as [he]201-clyde said it .

And now [the host of [the inn]6087-the inn]4547-the host of the inn [himself]4530-he appearing and approaching — [a medium - sized , red - faced , broad - shouldered man]4549-a medium - sized , red - faced , broad - shouldered man who was saying most intriguingly , " Staying over for a few days ? "[4530-he]

But [Clyde]201-clyde , irritated by this new development and after paying [the guide]4215-the guide a dollar , replying crustily and irritably , " No , no — just came over for the afternoon . [We]6088-we 're going on down to - night . "[201-clyde]

" [You]201-clyde 'll be staying over for dinner then , [I]4530-he suppose ? [The train]3121-the train does n't leave till eight - fifteen . "[4530-he]

" Oh , yes — that 's so . Sure . Yes , well , in that case , [we]6088-we will . "[4530-he] ... For , of course , [Roberta]302-roberta on [her]302-roberta honeymoon — the day before [her]302-roberta wedding and on a trip like this , would be expecting [her]302-roberta dinner . Damn [this stocky , red - faced fool]4551-this stocky , red - faced fool , anyway .

" Well , then , [I]428-boniface 'll just take [your]201-clyde bag and [you]201-clyde can register . [[Your]201-clyde wife'll]6090-your wife'll probably be wanting to freshen up a bit anyway . "[428-boniface]

[He]4530-he led the way , bag in hand , although [Clyde]201-clyde 's greatest desire was to snatch it from [him]4530-he . For [he]201-clyde had not expected to register here — nor leave [his]201-clyde bag either . And would not . [He]201-clyde would recapture it and hire [a boat]2206-a boat . But on top of that , being compelled " for the register 's sake , "[302-roberta] as [Boniface]428-boniface phrased it , to sign [Clifford Golden]424-clifford golden and [wife]4553-wife — before [he]201-clyde could take [his]201-clyde bag again .

And then to add to the nervousness and confusion engendered by all this , thoughts as to what additional developments or [persons]4554-persons , even , [he]201-clyde might encounter before leaving on [his]201-clyde climacteric errand — [Roberta]302-roberta announcing that because of the heat and the fact that [they]4555-they were coming back to dinner , [she]302-roberta would leave [her]302-roberta hat and coat — a hat in which [he]201-clyde had already seen the label of [Braunstein]429-braunstein in [Lycurgus]1-lycurgus — and which at the time caused [him]201-clyde to meditate as to the wisdom of leaving or extracting it . But [he]201-clyde had decided that perhaps afterwards — afterwards — if [he]201-clyde should really do this — it might not make any difference whether it was there , or not . Was [she]302-roberta not likely to be identified anyhow , if found , and if not found , who was to know who [she]302-roberta was ?

In a confused and turbulent state mentally , scarcely realizing the clarity or import of any particular thought or movement or act now , [he]201-clyde took up [his]201-clyde bag and led the way to [the boathouse platform]4556-the boathouse platform . And then , after dropping the bag into [the boat]2311-the boat , asking of [the boathouse keeper]4558-the boathouse keeper if [he]201-clyde knew where the best views were , that [he]201-clyde wanted to photograph them . And this done — the meaningless explanation over , assisting [Roberta]302-roberta ( an almost nebulous figure , [she]302-roberta now seemed , stepping down into [an insubstantial row - boat upon [a purely ideational lake]4560-a purely ideational lake]4559-an insubstantial row - boat upon a purely ideational lake ) , [he]201-clyde now stepped in after [her]302-roberta , seating [himself]201-clyde in the center and taking the oars .

The quiet , glassy , iridescent surface of [this lake]2275-this lake that now to both seemed , not so much like water as oil — like molten glass that , of enormous bulk and weight , resting upon the substantial earth so very far below . And the lightness and freshness and intoxication of the gentle air blowing here and there , yet scarcely rippling the surface of [the lake]4706-the lake . And the softness and furry thickness of the tall pines about [the shore]2281-the shore . Everywhere pines — tall and spearlike . And above them the humped backs of the dark and [distant Adirondacks]57-the adirondacks beyond . [Not a rower to be seen]4564-not a rower to be seen . Not [a house or cabin]4565-a house or cabin . [He]201-clyde sought to distinguish [the camp of which [the guide]4215-the guide had spoken]4566-the camp of which the guide had spoken . [He]201-clyde could not . Might there not be ? And supposing there were one here now somewhere ? And watching !

Fate !

Destruction !

Death ! Yet no sound and no smoke . Only — only — these tall , dark , green pines — spear - shaped and still , with here and there a dead one — ashen pale in the hard afternoon sun , its gaunt , sapless arms almost menacingly outstretched .

Death !

And the sharp metallic cry of a blue - jay speeding in the depths of [these woods]4627-these woods . Or the lone and ghostly tap - tap - tap of some solitary woodpecker , with now and then the red line of a flying tanager , the yellow and black of a yellow - shouldered blackbird .

And then at last , after fully an hour of rowing , brooding , singing , stopping to look at [some charming point of land]4630-some charming point of land , reconnoitering [some receding inlet which promised [water - lilies]4632-water - lilies]4631-some receding inlet which promised water - lilies , and with [Roberta]302-roberta already saying that [they]4633-they must watch the time and not stay out too long,—the bay , [south of [the island itself]4635-the island itself]4634-south of the island itself — [a beautiful and yet most funereally pine - encircled and land delimited bit of water]4636-a beautiful and yet most funereally pine - encircled and land delimited bit of water — more like [a smaller lake]4637-a smaller lake , connected by [an inlet or passage]4638-an inlet or passage to [the larger one]4639-the larger one , and yet [itself]4635-the island itself a respectable body of water of perhaps twenty acres of surface and almost circular in form . And somehow suggesting [an especially arranged pool or tarn]4646-an especially arranged pool or tarn to which [one who was weary of life and cares]4647-one who was weary of life and cares — anxious to be away from the strife and contentions of [the world]4755-the world , might most wisely and yet gloomily repair .

And as [they]4633-they glided into this , [this still dark water]4649-this still dark water seemed to grip Clyde as nothing here or anywhere before this ever had — to change [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares mood . The insidious beauty of [this place]793-this place ! Truly , it seemed to mock [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares — this strangeness — [this dark pool , surrounded on all sides by those wonderful , soft , fir trees]4652-this dark pool , surrounded on all sides by those wonderful , soft , fir trees . And the water itself looking like a huge , black pearl cast by some mighty hand , in anger possibly , in sport or phantasy maybe , into the bosom of [this valley of dark , green plush]4653-this valley of dark , green plush — and which seemed bottomless as [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares gazed into it .

And yet , what did it all suggest so strongly ? Death ! Death ! More definitely than anything [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares had ever seen before . Death ! But also a still , quiet , unprotesting type of death into which one , by reason of choice or hypnosis or unutterable weariness , might joyfully and gratefully sink . So quiet — so shaded — so serene . Even [Roberta]302-roberta exclaimed over this . And [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares now felt for the first time the grip of some seemingly strong , and yet friendly sympathetic , hands laid firmly on [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares shoulders . The comfort of [them]4654-they ! The warmth ! The strength ! For now [they]4654-they seemed to have a steadying effect on [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares and [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares liked [them]4654-they — [their]4654-they reassurance — [their]4654-they support . If only [they]4654-they would not be removed ! If only [they]4654-they would remain always — the hands of [this friend]4655-this friend ! For where had [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares ever known this comforting and almost tender sensation before in all [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares life ? Not anywhere — and somehow this calmed [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares and [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares seemed to slip away from the reality of all things .

To be sure , there was [Roberta]302-roberta over there , but by now [she]302-roberta had faded to a shadow or thought really , a form of illusion more vaporous than real . And while there was something about [her]302-roberta in color , form that suggested reality — still [she]302-roberta was very insubstantial — so very — and once more now [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares felt strangely alone . For the hands of [the friend of firm grip]4656-the friend of firm grip had vanished also . And [Clyde]201-clyde was alone , so very much alone and forlorn , in [this somber , beautiful realm to which apparently [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares had been led , and then deserted]4657-this somber , beautiful realm to which apparently he had been led , and then deserted . Also [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares felt strangely cold — the spell of this strange beauty overwhelming [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares with a kind of chill .

[He]4647-one who was weary of life and cares had come here for what ?

And [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares must do what ?

Kill [Roberta]302-roberta ? Oh , no !

And again [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares lowered [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares head and gazed into the fascinating and yet treacherous depths of that magnetic , bluish , purple pool , which , as [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares continued to gaze , seemed to change its form kaleidoscopically to a large , crystalline ball . But what was that moving about in this crystal ? A form ! It came nearer — clearer — and as it did so , [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares recognized [Roberta]302-roberta struggling and waving [her]302-roberta thin white arms out of the water and reaching toward [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares ! [God]306-god ! How terrible ! The expression on [her]302-roberta face ! What in [God]306-god 's name was [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares thinking of anyway ? Death ! Murder !

And suddenly becoming conscious that [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares courage , on which [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares had counted so much this long while to sustain [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares here , was leaving [him]4647-one who was weary of life and cares , and [he]4647-one who was weary of life and cares instantly and consciously plumbing the depths of [his]4647-one who was weary of life and cares being in a vain search to recapture it .

[He]4647-one who was weary of life and cares must face this thing ! [He]4647-one who was weary of life and cares must !

[Kit]321-kit , kit , kit , Ca - a - a - ah ! [Kit]321-kit , [kit]4658-kit , [kit]4658-kit , Ca - a - a - ah !

What was it sounding — a warning — a protest — condemnation ? The same bird that had marked the very birth of this miserable plan . For there it was now upon that dead tree — that wretched bird . And now it was flying to another one — as dead — a little farther inland and crying as it did so . God !

And then to [the shore]2281-the shore again in spite of [himself]4647-one who was weary of life and cares . For [Clyde]201-clyde , in order to justify [his]201-clyde having brought [his]201-clyde bag , now must suggest that pictures of this be taken — and of [Roberta]302-roberta — and of [himself]201-clyde , possibly — on [land and water]4663-land and water . For that would bring [her]302-roberta into [the boat]2311-the boat again , without [his]201-clyde bag , which would be safe and dry on [land]4665-land . [They]4667-they would not come on [shore]4104-shore again together . Never ! Never ! And that in spite of [Roberta]302-roberta protesting that [she]302-roberta was getting tired ; and did [he]201-clyde not think [they]4667-they ought to be starting back pretty soon ? It must be after five , surely . And [Clyde]201-clyde , assuring [her]302-roberta that presently [they]4667-they would — after [he]201-clyde had made one or two more pictures of [her]302-roberta in [the boat]2311-the boat with those wonderful trees — [that island]5301-that island and [this dark water]4671-this dark water around and beneath [her]302-roberta .

[His]201-clyde wet , damp , nervous hands ! And [his]201-clyde dark , liquid , nervous eyes , looking anywhere but at [her]302-roberta .

And then once more on [the water]4702-the water again — about five hundred feet from [shore]4104-shore , the while [he]201-clyde fumbled aimlessly with the hard and heavy and yet small camera that [he]201-clyde now held , as [the boat]2311-the boat floated out nearer the center . And then , at this point and time looking fearfully about . For now — now — in spite of [himself]201-clyde , the long evaded and yet commanding moment . And no voice or figure or sound on [shore]4104-shore . [No road]6006-no road or [cabin]4677-cabin or smoke ! And the moment which [he]4678-he or something had planned for [him]201-clyde , and which was now to decide [his]201-clyde fate at hand ! The moment of action — of crisis ! All that [he]201-clyde needed to do now was to turn swiftly and savagely to one side or the other — leap up — upon the left wale or right and upset [the boat]2311-the boat ; or , failing that , rock it swiftly , and if [Roberta]302-roberta protested too much , strike [her]302-roberta with the camera in [his]201-clyde hand , or one of the oars at [his]201-clyde right . It could be done — it could be done — swiftly and simply , were [he]201-clyde now of the mind and heart , or lack of it — with [him]201-clyde swimming swiftly away thereafter to freedom — to success — of course — to [Sondra]186-sondra and happiness — a new and greater and sweeter life than any [he]201-clyde had ever known .

Yet why was [he]201-clyde waiting now ?

What was the matter with [him]201-clyde , anyhow ?

Why was [he]201-clyde waiting ?

At this cataclysmic moment , and in the face of the utmost , the most urgent need of action , a sudden palsy of the will — of courage — of hate or rage sufficient ; and with [Roberta]302-roberta from [her]302-roberta seat in the stern of [the boat]2311-the boat gazing at [his]201-clyde troubled and then suddenly distorted and fulgurous , yet weak and even unbalanced face — [a face of a sudden , instead of angry , ferocious , demoniac]4681-a face of a sudden , instead of angry , ferocious , demoniac — confused and all but meaningless in its registration of a balanced combat between fear ( a chemic revulsion against death or murderous brutality that would bring death ) and a harried and restless and yet self - repressed desire to do — to do — to do — yet temporarily unbreakable here and now — a static between a powerful compulsion to do and yet not to do .

And in the meantime [his]201-clyde eyes — the pupils of the same growing momentarily larger and more lurid ; [his]201-clyde face and body and hands tense and contracted — the stillness of [his]201-clyde position , the balanced immobility of the mood more and more ominous , yet in truth not suggesting a brutal , courageous power to destroy , but the imminence of trance or spasm .

And [Roberta]302-roberta , suddenly noticing the strangeness of it all — the something of eerie unreason or physical and mental indetermination so strangely and painfully contrasting with this scene , exclaiming : " Why , [Clyde]201-clyde ! [Clyde]201-clyde ! What is it ? Whatever is the matter with [you]201-clyde anyhow ? [You]201-clyde look so — so strange — so — so — Why , [I]302-roberta never saw [you]201-clyde look like this before . What is it ? "[302-roberta] And suddenly rising , or rather leaning forward , and by crawling along the even keel , attempting to approach [him]201-clyde , since [he]201-clyde looked as though [he]201-clyde was about to fall forward into [the boat]2311-the boat — or to one side and out into [the water]4702-the water . And [Clyde]201-clyde , as instantly sensing the profoundness of [his]201-clyde own failure , [his]201-clyde own cowardice or inadequateness for such an occasion , as instantly yielding to a tide of submerged hate , not only for [himself]201-clyde , but [Roberta]302-roberta — [her]302-roberta power — or that of life to restrain [him]201-clyde in this way . And yet fearing to act in any way — being unwilling to — being willing only to say that never , never would [he]201-clyde marry [her]302-roberta — that never , even should [she]302-roberta expose [him]201-clyde , would [he]201-clyde leave [here]4728-here with [her]302-roberta to marry [her]302-roberta — that [he]201-clyde was in love with [Sondra]186-sondra and would cling only to [her]302-roberta — and yet not being able to say that even . But angry and confused and glowering . And then , as [she]302-roberta drew near [him]201-clyde , seeking to take [his]201-clyde hand in [hers]302-roberta and the camera from [him]201-clyde in order to put it in [the boat]2311-the boat , [he]201-clyde flinging out at [her]302-roberta , but not even then with any intention to do other than free [himself]201-clyde of [her]302-roberta — [her]302-roberta touch — [her]302-roberta pleading — consoling sympathy — [her]302-roberta presence forever — God !

Yet ( the camera still unconsciously held tight ) pushing at [her]302-roberta with so much vehemence as not only to strike [her]302-roberta lips and nose and chin with it , but to throw [her]302-roberta back sidewise toward the left wale which caused [the boat]2311-the boat to careen to the very water 's edge . And then [he]201-clyde , stirred by [her]302-roberta sharp scream , ( as much due to the lurch of [the boat]2311-the boat , as the cut on [her]302-roberta nose and lip ) , rising and reaching half to assist or recapture [her]302-roberta and half to apologize for the unintended blow — yet in so doing completely capsizing [the boat]2311-the boat — [himself]201-clyde and [Roberta]302-roberta being as instantly thrown into the water . And the left wale of [the boat]2311-the boat as it turned , striking [Roberta]302-roberta on the head as [she]302-roberta sank and then rose for the first time , [her]302-roberta frantic , contorted face turned to [Clyde]201-clyde , who by now had righted [himself]201-clyde . For [she]302-roberta was stunned , horror - struck , unintelligible with pain and fear — [her]302-roberta lifelong fear of water and drowning and the blow [he]201-clyde had so accidentally and all but unconsciously administered .

" Help ! Help ![321-kit]

" Oh , [[my]302-roberta God]6105-my god , [I]302-roberta 'm drowning , [I]302-roberta 'm drowning . Help ! Oh , [my God]6105-my god ![302-roberta]

" [Clyde]201-clyde , [Clyde]201-clyde ! "[321-kit]

And then the voice at [his]201-clyde ear !

" But this — this — is not this that which [you]201-clyde have been thinking and wishing for this while — [you]201-clyde in [your]201-clyde great need ? And behold ! For despite [your]201-clyde fear , [your]201-clyde cowardice , this — this — has been done for [you]201-clyde . An accident — an accident — an unintentional blow on [your]201-clyde part is now saving [you]201-clyde the labor of what [you]201-clyde sought , and yet did not have the courage to do ! But will [you]201-clyde now , and when [you]201-clyde need not , since it is an accident , by going to [her]6107-her rescue , once more plunge [yourself]201-clyde in the horror of that defeat and failure which has so tortured [you]201-clyde and from which this now releases [you]201-clyde ? [You]201-clyde might save [her]6107-her . But again [you]201-clyde might not ! For see how [she]6107-her strikes about . [She]6107-her is stunned . [She]6107-her [herself]6107-her is unable to save [herself]6107-her and by [her]6107-her erratic terror , if [you]201-clyde draw near [her]6107-her now , may bring about [your]201-clyde own death also . But [you]201-clyde desire to live ! And [her]6107-her living will make [your]201-clyde life not worth while from now on . Rest but a moment — a fraction of a minute ! Wait — wait — ignore the pity of that appeal . And then — then — But there ! Behold . It is over . [She]6107-her is sinking now . [You]201-clyde will never , never see [her]6107-her alive any more — ever . And there is [your]201-clyde own hat upon [the water]4702-the water — as [you]201-clyde wished . And upon [the boat]2311-the boat , clinging to that rowlock a veil belonging to [her]6107-her . Leave it . Will it not show that this was an accident ? "[None-None]

And apart from that , nothing — a few ripples — the peace and solemnity of this wondrous scene . And then once more the voice of [that weird , contemptuous , mocking , lonely bird]4690-that weird , contemptuous , mocking , lonely bird .

[Kit]321-kit , kit , kit , Ca - a - a - ah ! [Kit]321-kit , kit , kit , Ca - a - a - ah ! [Kit]321-kit , kit , kit , Ca - a - a - ah !

The cry of that devilish bird upon that dead limb — the wier - wier .

And then [Clyde]201-clyde , with the sound of [Roberta]302-roberta 's cries still in [his]201-clyde ears , that last frantic , white , appealing look in [her]302-roberta eyes , swimming heavily , gloomily and darkly to [shore]4104-shore . And the thought that , after all , [he]201-clyde had not really killed [her]302-roberta . No , no . Thank [God]306-god for that . [He]201-clyde had not . And yet ( stepping up on [the near - by bank]4692-the near - by bank and shaking the water from [his]201-clyde clothes ) had [he]201-clyde ? Or , had [he]201-clyde not ? For had [he]201-clyde not refused to go to [her]302-roberta rescue , and when [he]201-clyde might have saved [her]302-roberta , and when the fault for casting [her]302-roberta in the water , however accidentally , was so truly [his]201-clyde ? And yet — and yet —

The dusk and silence of a closing day . A concealed spot in [the depths of the same sheltering woods]4693-the depths of the same sheltering woods where alone and dripping , [his]201-clyde dry bag near , [Clyde]201-clyde stood , and by waiting , sought to dry [himself]201-clyde . But in the interim , removing from the side of the bag the unused tripod of [his]201-clyde camera and seeking an obscure , dead log farther in [the woods]2501-the woods , hiding it . Had [any one]4764-any one seen ? Was [any one]4764-any one looking ? Then returning and wondering as to the direction ! [He]201-clyde must go west and then south . [He]201-clyde must not get turned about ! But the repeated cry of that bird,—harsh , nerve shaking . And then the gloom , in spite of the summer stars . And [a youth]3276-a youth making [his]3276-a youth way through a dark , uninhabited wood , a dry straw hat upon [his]3276-a youth head , a bag in [his]3276-a youth hand , walking briskly and yet warily — [south — south]4698-south — south .
